40001001	Azezi n de Adavidi yɩɩŋa, la Abraham yɩɩŋa yaabdõma n wãna:
40001002	Abraham n dↄgɛ A'izakɩ, tɩ A'izakɩ dↄgɛ Azakↄbɩ, tɩ Azakↄbɩ dↄgɛ Azuda, la a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ.
40001003	Tɩ Azuda la a pↄga Atamaarɩ dↄgɛ Afarɛsɩ la Azara, tɩ Afarɛsɩ dↄgɛ A'ɛsrↄm, tɩ A'ɛsrↄm dↄgɛ Aram,
40001004	tɩ Aram dↄgɛ Aminadabɩ, tɩ Aminadabɩ dↄgɛ Anaasõ, tɩ Anaasõ dↄgɛ Asalmõ.
40001005	Tɩ Asalmõ la a pↄga Arahabɩ dↄgɛ Aboozɩ, tɩ Aboozɩ la a pↄga Aruti dↄgɛ A'obɛɛdɩ, tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ dↄgɛ Azese.
40001006	Tɩ Azese dↄgɛ naba Adavidi. Tɩ Adavidi daan di A'uuri pↄkõorɛ, tɩ ba dↄgɛ Asalomõ.
40001007	Tɩ Asalomõ dↄgɛ Aroboam, tɩ Aroboam dↄgɛ Abiya, tɩ Abiya dↄgɛ Aza.
40001008	Tɩ Aza dↄgɛ Azozafatɩ, tɩ Azozafatɩ dↄgɛ Azoram, tɩ Azoram dↄgɛ A'oziasɩ.
40001009	Tɩ A'oziasɩ dↄgɛ Azↄtam, tɩ Azↄtam dↄgɛ Akaazɩ, tɩ Akaazɩ dↄgɛ A'ezekiasɩ.
40001010	Tɩ A'ezekiasɩ dↄgɛ Amanase, tɩ Amanase dↄgɛ Amõ, tɩ Amõ dↄgɛ Azoziasɩ.
40001011	Tɩ Azoziasɩ dↄgɛ Azekoniyasɩ la a yɩbsɩ. Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma tarɩ sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ.
40001012	La ban paagɛ Babilↄnɩ na poorʋm, tɩ Azekoniyasɩ dↄgɛ Asalatɩyɛlɩ, tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ dↄgɛ Azorobabɛlɩ.
40001013	Tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ dↄgɛ Abiyuudɩ, tɩ Abiyuudɩ dↄgɛ A'eliakim, tɩ A'eliakim dↄgɛ Azↄↄrɩ.
40001014	Tɩ Azↄↄrɩ dↄgɛ Asadↄkɩ, tɩ Asadↄkɩ dↄgɛ Akim, tɩ Akim dↄgɛ A'eliyuudɩ.
40001015	Tɩ A'eliyuudɩ dↄgɛ A'eleazaarɩ, tɩ A'eleazaarɩ dↄgɛ Amatã, tɩ Amatã dↄgɛ Azakↄbɩ.
40001016	Tɩ Azakↄbɩ dↄgɛ Azozɛfʋ n de Amaari sɩra la. Amaari ẽŋa n dↄgɛ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri Krisi la.
40001017	Lan pı̃'ilum na Abraham wa paagɛ Adavidi, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ. Lan sẽŋɛ la Adavidi wa paagɛ ban yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ na, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ. Ban yõgɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sẽŋɛ Babilↄnɩ wa paagɛ Krisi la, de la zamãana pia la anaasɩ.
40001018	Azezi-krisi dↄka daan ẽŋɛ la wãna: A ma Amaari daan yetɩ a ele la Azozɛfʋ, la ba daan nãn ka gã'arɛ la taaba, dee tɩ a tara pʋʋrɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n botɩ a tara pʋʋrɛ la.
40001019	La Azozɛfʋ n daan yetɩ a di ẽ na de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, a ka boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽ yãnnɛ nẽrba nifum, a daan tẽ'esɛ mɛ tɩ a basɛ ẽ sı̃m.
40001020	La ẽn daan tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ malɛka wa'am wa puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ẽ zãasŋↄ pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azozɛfʋ, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, da zoe dabeem, di Amaari tɩ a dɛna fʋ pↄga, pʋʋrɛ la tɩ a tarɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n bↄ ẽ.
40001021	A wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, la de ẽŋa n wʋn fãagɛ a nẽrba la ba tõon-be'ero pʋam basɛ."
40001022	Bõn-bãma wuu ẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa la yele se'em na n ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
40001023	"Bɩsɛ-ya, pugla n nãn ka mi bʋraaga wʋn yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ dↄgɛ budibla, tɩ ba wi'ira a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ A'emanuwɛlɩ." A võorɛ de la Nawẽnnɛ boe la tɩ lɛ.
40001024	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ nẽegɛ, ẽŋɛ wʋ Zuudãana malɛka la n yele ẽ se'em na, di a pↄga la.
40001025	La a daan ka gã'arɛ la ẽ, halɩ tɩ a wa dↄgɛ budibla la, tɩ a sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
40002001	Ba daan dↄgɛ Azezi la Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm, se'emwẽnnɛ tɩ A'erↄdɩ de naba la. Tɩ bãŋrɩba ze'ele dapↄa bↄba wa'am Zerizalɛm,
40002002	wa soke yetɩ: "Bia la tɩ ba dↄgɛ la boe la bɛ, sɛka n wʋn dɛna Zifdõma naba la? Tõma yẽ la a wõrbiire dapↄa bↄba, bɛla ı̃yã tɩ tõma wa'am tɩ tɩ nã'asɛ ẽ."
40002003	La naba A'erↄdɩ n daan wõm bɛla la, ẽŋa la Zerizalɛm dõma wuu yɛm n yↄↄrɩ.
40002004	Tɩ A'erↄdɩ daan lagsɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wuu, soke ba yetɩ: "Tẽn-kãna tɩ ba wʋn dↄgɛ Krisi la?"
40002005	Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm na, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yele la wãna:
40002006	'Bɛtelɛm n de tẽn-pɩka, fʋ ka pↄ'ↄgɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽn-kãra la pʋam, se'ere n soe la, nẽra n wʋn yese fõn pʋam dɛna nẽŋadãana bɩsra Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de mam nẽrba la yelle.' "
40002007	La A'erↄdɩ sʋgɛ mɛ wi bãŋrɩba la soke ba bãŋɛ wẽnse'ere tɩ wõrbiire la yese,
40002008	dee tõm ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya Bɛtelɛm ka ɛ soke bãŋɛ bia la yelle sõŋa sõŋa, la ya sãn yẽ ẽ, ya leme wa'am wa yele mam tɩ mam mẽ sẽŋɛ ka nã'asɛ ẽ."
40002009	La ban wõm naba la yetↄga la, ba sẽnnɩ mɛ wɛ'ɛsa, darɛ le yẽ wõrbiire la tɩ ba daan yẽ dapↄa bↄba la n tole ba nẽŋa, tarɩ ba halɩ ka paagɛ bia la n boe zẽ'e-sɛka la ze'ele.
40002010	La ban daan yẽ wõrbiire la, ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ halɩ zozo'e.
40002011	Tɩ ba kẽ yire la pʋam yẽ bia la, la a ma Amaari, ka dũma tẽŋa bia la nẽŋam nã'asɛ ẽ, dee lorge ba lↄgrↄ loose ban tarɩ sɛla la bↄ ẽ. Ba daan de la sãlma, la tɩdarɛ, la miiri n tarɩ yũuŋ-yẽlga.
40002012	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan kã'an ba zãasŋↄ pʋam yetɩ, ba da le doose naba A'erↄdɩ zẽ'am, bɛla tɩ ba daan doose sore ayẽma lebe kule ba tẽŋa.
40002013	Bãŋrɩba la n fõrgɛ la, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ Azozɛfʋ zãasŋↄ pʋam, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la zoe sẽŋɛ Ezipti ka bↄna bilam halɩ tɩ m le wa yele fʋ se'ere. Se'ere n soe la, naba A'erↄdɩ wʋn ɛɛra bia la mɛ tɩ a kʋ."
40002014	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ isge yʋ'ʋŋↄ tarɩ bia la, la a ma la sẽŋɛ Ezipti,
40002015	ka bↄna bilam halɩ tɩ A'erↄdɩ wa ki. La ẽŋɛ la bɛla, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam wi m Dayʋa la n boe Ezipti la tɩ a wa'am."
40002016	La A'erↄdɩ n daan bãŋɛ tɩ bãŋrɩba la pã'asɛ ẽŋa mɛ na, a sũure n yı̃ige halɩ, tɩ a tõm nẽrba yetɩ ba sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm, la tẽn-sɛba n boe a kẽnkɛrsɩ la wuu ka kʋ budim-sɛba wuu n masɛ wʋ yʋʋma ayi, la sɛba n ka paagɛ bɛla la, wʋ ẽŋa n daan soke bãŋrɩba la bãŋɛ se'emwẽnnɛ tɩ wõrbiire la yese la.
40002017	Bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
40002018	"Ba wõm tagursi Rama tẽŋa, kʋʋnↄ la fablɩgↄ zozo'e. La de la Arasɛlɩ n kellɩ a kↄma yelle, tɩ ba pã'asra ẽ tɩ a ka sakra tɩ a go'oge. Se'ere n soe la, a kↄma la ka le bↄna."
40002019	La naba A'erↄdɩ daan wa ki mɛ, tɩ Zuudãana malɛka puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ Azozɛfʋ zãasŋↄ pʋam Ezipti, yele ẽ yetɩ:
40002020	"Isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la lebe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, sɛka n daan eerɩ bia la tɩ a kʋ la ki mɛ."
40002021	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ isge tarɩ bia la, la a ma la kule Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋa.
40002022	La a daan wõm mɛ tɩ Arkelawusi n sↄↄgɛ a sↄ A'erↄdɩ zẽ'am di Zude na'am. Tɩ a daan zoe dabeem ka sẽŋɛ Zude so'olʋm. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kã'an ẽ zãasŋↄ pʋam, tɩ a sẽŋɛ Galile so'olʋm.
40002023	A daan sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'era la tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ. Bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la n daan yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. Ba daan yetɩ: "Ba wʋn wi'ira Krisi la tɩ Nazarɛtɩ nẽra."
40003001	Bɛla wẽnnɛ tɩ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, wa sẽŋɛ Zude weem ka mõola
40003002	yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ."
40003003	La de la Azã yelle tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Nẽra ayɩla n boe weem mõola ke'enke'em yetɩ: 'Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana. Malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.' "
40003004	Azã daan yɛ la fuugo n de yʋgnɛ kõbrↄ, dɩkɛ sagãnnɛ lʋ a sɩa. A dia daan de la saniiro la seero.
40003005	Tɩ nẽrba daan ze'ele Zerizalɛm, la Zude so'olʋm wuu, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm kʋlaaga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zʋrdẽ la wuu sẽnna a zẽ'am,
40003006	tↄgra ba tõon-be'ero pa'ala ẽ, tɩ a misra ba Zʋrdẽ ko'om na pʋam.
40003007	La Azã yẽ la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma zozo'e n sẽm a zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n pa'alɛ ya tɩ ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?
40003008	Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
40003009	La ya da tẽ'esra tɩ Abraham n de ya yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ la mɛ. Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ mɛ.
40003010	Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ. Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam, tɩ bugum di ẽ.
40003011	Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero. La sɛka n boe mam poorʋm sẽna la pãŋa gãnnɩ mam mɛ. La mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra. Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
40003012	Ẽŋa wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgↄ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele, ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kı̃ŋri."
40003013	Azezi daan ze'ele la Galile wa'am Zʋrdẽ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ẽ ko'om pʋam.
40003014	Tɩ Azã daan zagsɛ, dee yetɩ: "La de nɩ na mam n wʋn wa'am fõn zẽ'am tɩ fõn mise mam, tɩ fõn sẽna mam zẽ'am?"
40003015	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ la ẽŋɛ bɛla lɛɛlɛ wã, tɩ la de la bɛla tɩ tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ lan masɛ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na wuu." Azezi n yele bɛla la, tɩ Azã sakɛ
40003016	mise ẽ, tɩ a dↄↄra. Haya, tɩ saazuum yo'oge, tɩ a yẽ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n signi a zuo wʋ na'adawenne.
40003017	Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, a paagɛ la mam yɛm."
40004001	Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la weem tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ.
40004002	Azezi daan lʋ la nõorɛ dabsa pinaasɩ, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ. Tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
40004003	Tɩ Asũtãana lɛm ẽ, yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ botɩ kuga wã lebge dia."
40004004	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nẽrsaala kãn vↄa dia mã'a ı̃yã, la de la yetↄg-sɛba wuu n yesrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorʋm ı̃yã.' "
40004005	Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm, ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo ze'ele,
40004006	dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ a malɛkadõma kↄkɛ fʋ la ba nu'usi, tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.' "
40004007	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ken gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.' "
40004008	Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ Azezi zom tãŋa n ba wↄgɛ zuo, ka pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu la a na'am pãŋa,
40004009	yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, mam wʋn bↄ fʋ bãna wã wuu."
40004010	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ fõrgɛ, Asũtãana! La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.' "
40004011	Tɩ Asũtãana basɛ Azezi dee fõrgɛ. Tɩ malɛkadõma wa'am wa sõŋra ẽ.
40004012	Tɩ Azezi wõm tɩ ba yõkɛ Azã yʋ yʋ'a deego pʋam, tɩ a lebe Galile so'olʋm.
40004013	La a daan basɛ Nazarɛtɩ tẽŋa, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'era la Kapɛrnaʋm n lɛm Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, Zabulõ la Nɛftali so'olʋm pʋam,
40004014	tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
40004015	"Zabulõ la Nɛftali tẽnsɩ n tↄglɛ ko-kãtɛ bↄba, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba, Galile tẽnsɩ tɩ bu-zãŋsɩ boe a pʋam na,
40004016	nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam na yẽ peelem zozo'e. La nẽr-sɛba n zı̃ kũm mã'asʋm pʋam na, peelem nẽegɛ mɛ bↄ ba."
40004017	Bɛla wẽnnɛ tɩ Azezi daan pↄsɛ mõola yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ."
40004018	Azezi daan eerɩ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi, Asimõ tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a yɩbga A'ãndre, tɩ ba lobrɩ yʋka mõgrɛ la pʋam, ba daan de la zũn-yõgrɩba.
40004019	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Dↄla-ya mam, tɩ mam wʋn basɛ tɩ ya ɛɛra nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
40004020	Tɩ ba basɛ ba yʋgsɩ la bilam mẽŋa, dee dↄla ẽ.
40004021	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa le yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi n de Azebede kↄma, Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã. Tɩ bãma, la ba sↄ Azebede bↄna õorŋↄ pʋam malgra ba yʋgsɩ. Tɩ Azezi wi ba,
40004022	tɩ ba basɛ õorŋↄ la, la ba sↄ la tↄtↄ, dee dↄla ẽ.
40004023	Azezi daan kaarɩ la Galile so'olʋm wuu zãsna nẽrba Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga dee botɩ bã'adõma, la kobro wuu n boe nẽrba la pʋam yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.
40004024	Tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ daan yese Siiri so'olʋm wuu, tɩ ba tara bã'adõma wuu tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, nẽrba ı̃isi n dõnnɩ tɩ ba nãmsra, la kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ sɛba, la nẽrba n luti kinki'ire, la kↄↄrnↄ wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a botɩ ba wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40004025	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e ze'ele Galile, la Dekapↄlɩ, la Zerizalɛm, la Zude, la tẽnsɩ n boe Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba doose ẽ.
40005001	Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, zom tãŋa zuo zı̃'ire. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
40005002	Tɩ a yãŋa zãsʋm ba yetɩ:
40005003	"Nẽr-sɛba n mi tɩ ba ka masɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ba bõnↄ.
40005004	Sũ-sã'aŋↄ dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ ba sũure mã'agɛ.
40005005	Sũ-bʋgsʋm dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ba dũnia tɩ ba sↄna.
40005006	Sɛba n boorɩ sɛla n masɛ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm la ba sũure wuu tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ba sɛla tɩ ba boorɩ la tɩ la seke.
40005007	Ninbãal-zↄtba tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zoe ba ninbãalga.
40005008	Pʋpeelem dõma tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ.
40005009	Sɛba n botɩ sũ-mã'asʋm bↄna nẽrba tẽŋasʋka tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn wi'ira ba tɩ a kↄma.
40005010	Sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, tɩ ba nãmsra ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ba bõnↄ.
40005011	Yãma sɛba tɩ ba tʋʋrɩ ya, nãmsra ya, tↄgra ya tↄg-be'ero dee parna bↄ'ↄra ya, yan dolɩ mam na ı̃yã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
40005012	Ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, ya yↄↄrↄ n wʋn zo'oge Nawẽnnɛ yire la ı̃yã. Ba mẽ daan nãmsɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n dẽŋɛ yãma la bɛla."
40005013	Azezi daan le yetɩ: "Wʋ yaarʋm n botɩ dia zã'asʋm na, yãma mẽ masɛ tɩ ya ãna wʋ yaarʋm dũnia wã pʋam. La yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, bẽm n wʋn basɛ tɩ a le zã'asʋm? A lebge la zãŋa, a ka le tara yõorↄ, a de la ba lobe ẽ basɛ yẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba nẽ ẽ la nãma.
40005014	Yãma de la dũnia wã peelem. Tẽŋa n boe tãŋa zuo ka tã wʋn sʋgɛ.
40005015	La ba ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla vugra la pɩ'ɩgↄ, ba wʋn zoole ẽ na fɩtla zoolgo zẽ'a, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe yire la pʋam na.
40005016	Bɛla, basɛ-ya tɩ ya peelem nẽegɛ nẽrba tẽŋasʋka, tɩ ba yẽ ya tõon-sõma nã'asɛ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
40005017	"Da tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m sã'am na Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, bɩɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yetↄga la. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m sã'am ba, mam wa'am tɩ m pa'alɛ la ba võorɛ ba'asɛ, dee ẽŋɛ ban yele se'em na.
40005018	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ saazuum la tẽŋa n wʋn yuuge se'em, sɛla sɛla kãn yese Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la pʋam baa fẽfẽe, halɩ tɩ sɛla woo wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.
40005019	Bɛla, nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ ayɩla, baa a sãn ãna pɩka gãnna wuu, dee zãsna nẽrba basɛba tɩ ba da sakɛ, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. La sɛka n sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, dee zãsna nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bɛla, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40005020	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya sãn ka ɩta Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na gãnna lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, ya kãn tã'agɛ kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
40005021	"Yãma wõm tɩ ba daan yele kʋrʋm dõma yetɩ: 'Da kʋ nẽra, la nẽra sãn kʋ nẽra, ba di a sarɩya.'
40005022	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo sũure n isge la a sↄbia, la masɛ tɩ ba di a sarɩya. La sɛka n yele a sↄbia yetɩ: 'Yalma', la masɛ tɩ sarɩyaditba nẽŋadõma di a sarɩya. La sɛka n yele a sↄbia yetɩ: 'Fʋ ka tarɩ võorɛ', ẽŋa dãana masɛ mɛ tɩ a kẽ bug-tẽŋa.
40005023	Bɛla, fʋ sãn tarɩ fʋ bↄ'a wa'am kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne zẽ'a tɩ fʋ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ, sãn tẽegɛ tɩ fõn tarɩ la yelle la fʋ sↄbia,
40005024	fʋ basɛ fʋ bↄ'a la kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne la nẽŋam, dee dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka malgɛ fʋ yelle la, la fʋ sↄbia la, dee yãŋa leme wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ'a la bↄ Nawẽnnɛ.
40005025	Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tara fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, malgɛ fʋ yelle la tↄtↄ, yãma n nãn boe sore la, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tↄgɛ fʋ yetↄga la dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fↄ yʋ'a deem.
40005026	Mam yetɩ fʋ la asɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yↄ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ."
40005027	"Yãma wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga.'
40005028	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, sɛka n bɩsɛ pↄka tɩ a yɛm bↄↄra ẽ, a põn gã'arɛ la ẽ mɛ a sũure pʋam.
40005029	Fʋ zʋʋgↄ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ lobe basɛ zãazãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ ı̃yã sɛla ayɩla sãn ka bↄna mı̃ sõɩ ba wʋn lobe fʋ ı̃yã wuu bug-tẽŋa.
40005030	La fʋ zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ lobe basɛ zãazãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ ı̃yã sɛla ayɩla sãn ka bↄna mı̃ sõɩ ban wʋn lobe fʋ ı̃yã wuu bug-tẽŋa."
40005031	"Ba yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Nẽr-sɛka n lebse a pↄga, a bↄ ẽ gõŋↄ n pa'alɛ tɩ a lebse ẽ mɛ.'
40005032	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, nẽr-sɛka woo n lebse a pↄga, tɩ la sãn dagna tɩ a gã la bʋraasɩ, a wʋn botɩ pↄka la sã'am mɛ, a sãn ele sɩra ayẽma. La nẽr-sɛka n di pↄg-sɛka tɩ ba lebse la, ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɛ la a tadãana pↄga."
40005033	"Ya ken wõm tɩ ba yʋʋn yele kʋrʋm dõma yetɩ: 'Da viige ya pↄrɛ. Fʋ sãn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ pↄɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ bɛla.'
40005034	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, ya põn da pↄɩ. Da pↄɩ saazuum, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la Nawẽnnɛ na'am bı̃mbı̃nne.
40005035	Da pↄɩ tẽŋa, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la a nãma dↄglgↄ zẽ'a. Da pↄɩ Zerizalɛm, bẽm ı̃yã, a de la Nawẽnnɛ n de na-kãtɛ la tẽŋa.
40005036	Da pↄɩ fʋ zuugo, bẽm ı̃yã, fʋ ka tã wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ zomto baa ayɩla lebge pɛɛlga bɩɩ sabga.
40005037	Basɛ-ya tɩ ya 'ẽe' dɛna 'ẽe', tɩ ya 'ayɛɩ' dɛna 'ayɛɩ'. La sãn gãŋɛ bɛla, sɛla n pa'asɛ la de la be'em dãana bõnↄ."
40005038	"Ya wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Nẽra sãn pusge a tadãana nifo, ba mẽ pusge a nifo, nẽra sãn vike a tadãana yẽnnɛ, ba mẽ vike a yẽnnɛ.'
40005039	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ ya be'em, ya da ẽŋɛ be'em lebse. La nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ zʋʋgↄ pɛka, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ fʋ gↄbga pɛka pa'asɛ.
40005040	La nẽra sãn sãm fↄ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-kãtɛ pa'asɛ.
40005041	La nẽra sãn pẽrgɛ fↄ tɩ fʋ kↄlgɛ ẽ kilomẽtrɩ ayɩla, fʋ kↄlgɛ ẽ kilomẽtrɩ bayi.
40005042	Nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bↄ ẽ. La nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a peŋe sɛla fʋ zẽ'am, da mõŋɛ ẽ."
40005043	"Ya wõm tɩ ba daan yetɩ: 'Fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana, dee sise fʋ bɛ.'
40005044	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄra sɛba n nãmsrɩ ya la.
40005045	Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya wʋn dɛna ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum na kↄma, se'ere n soe la, ẽŋa n botɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkra bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sõma la nẽr-be'ero, dee botɩ saaga niira bↄ'ↄra sɛba ɩrgↄ n masɛ, la sɛba ɩrgↄ n ka masɛ.
40005046	Yãma sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, bẽm yↄↄrↄ tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am? Lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba mẽ ɩtɩ la bɛla.
40005047	La yãma sãn pʋ'ʋsra la ya sↄbiisi mã'a, bẽm tɩ yãma ɩtɩ gãnna ya taaba la? Nẽr-sɛba n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ na mẽ ɩtɩ la bɛla.
40005048	Bɛla, dɛna-ya nẽrba tɩ ya ɩrgↄ wuu wʋn masɛ, wʋ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum ɩrgↄ wuu n masɛ se'em na."
40006001	"Guuse-ya, da ɩta-ya ɩr-sõma nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ba yẽta ya. Ya sãn ɩta bɛla, ya kãn to'oge yↄↄrↄ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum zẽ'am.
40006002	Bɛla, fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasa, da kãn mõolɛ nẽrba zẽ'am wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n ɩtɩ se'em ba wẽndeto pʋam, la sorↄↄrↄ zuto tɩ nẽrba pẽgɛ ba la. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bãma põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
40006003	Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasdõma, da basɛ tɩ fʋ gↄbga nu'ugo bãŋɛ fʋ zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo n ɩtɩ sɛla.
40006004	Bɛla nẽra nẽra kãn bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõŋɛ nasdõma, la fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n yẽ fõn sʋgɛ ẽŋɛ la, a wʋn lebse fo.
40006005	Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, da ɩta-ya wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n ɩtɩ se'em na, bãma nõŋɛ la ba zɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, la sorↄ-puursi zuto pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ tɩ nẽrba yẽta ba. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
40006006	Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, fʋ kẽ fʋ deem yʋ kʋlɩŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe zẽ'a n sʋgɛ la. La fʋ Sↄ la n yẽ tɩ fʋ sʋgɛ mɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ la, a wʋn yↄ fↄ.
40006007	Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya da tↄgra yetↄga n ka tarɩ võorɛ kaana wʋ nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em na, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n tↄgrɩ zↄ'ↄra la ı̃yã, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn lerge bãma pʋ'ʋsgↄ mɛ.
40006008	Bɛla, da ãna-ya wʋ bãma n ãn se'em na, se'ere n soe la, lan dẽŋɛ ya wʋn sose ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, a põn mina yãma n boorɩ sɛla mɛ.
40006009	Bɛla, pʋ'ʋsra-ya wãna: 'Tõma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka,
40006010	wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka, botɩ fõn boorɩ se'em ẽŋɛ tẽŋa zuo, wʋ lan ɩtɩ fõn yire se'em na.
40006011	Bↄ tↄ tɩ zı̃na dia.
40006012	Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, wʋ tõma n mẽ basɛ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ se'em na.
40006013	Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tↄ tɩ tɩ lui. Fãagɛ tↄ be'em dãana nu'usum basɛ. ((Tɩ fõn soe so'olʋm, la pãŋa, la nã'asgↄ wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ. Amina!))'
40006014	Ya sãn basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
40006015	La ya sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn basɛ ya taalɛ.
40006016	Ya sãn lʋ nõorɛ, da zũŋe-ya nẽŋa wʋ pʋlibsum dõma n zũŋri ba nẽnsɩ se'em, tɩ ba pa'alɛ nẽrba tɩ bãma lʋ la nõorɛ la. Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ba põn to'oge ba yↄↄrↄ mɛ.
40006017	Fʋ sãn lʋ nõorɛ, wire fʋ nẽŋa dee sãasɛ fʋ zuugo,
40006018	tɩ nẽrba da bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ lʋ la nõorɛ. La fʋ Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe zẽ'a n sʋgɛ la wʋn bãŋɛ. La fʋ Sↄ la n yẽ fõn sʋgɛ lʋ nõorɛ la, a wʋn yↄ fↄ."
40006019	"Da lagsrɩ-ya bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra dũnia wã zuo, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ bõn-mõgla la tẽŋanzẽem wʋn sã'am ba, tɩ nayigba mẽ kẽ'era zũura.
40006020	Lagsra-ya bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra Nawẽnnɛ yire, bilam tɩ mõka la tẽŋanzẽem kãn sã'am ba, tɩ nayigba mẽ kãn kẽ zũ.
40006021	Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam.
40006022	Nini n nẽerɩ peelem bↄ'ↄra ı̃yã wʋ fɩtla la. Bɛla, fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ.
40006023	La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu boe la lika pʋam. Peelem sɛka n wʋn nẽegɛ fʋ pʋam na sãn dɛna lika, la de la lika mẽŋa mẽŋa.
40006024	Nẽra ka boe n tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi, a wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pↄ'ↄra ayɩla la. Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana.
40006025	Bɛla n soe tɩ mam yele ya yetɩ, ya da fabla ya vↄm yelle, yãma n wʋn di sɛla, ((bɩɩ ya wʋn yũ sɛla,)) la ya da fabla ya ı̃yã yelle, ya wʋn yɛ sɛla. Vↄm ka gãnnɩ dia? Bɩɩ ı̃yã ka gãnnɩ futo?
40006026	Bɩsɛ-ya bõn-ẽgla, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba mẽ ka lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla ɩta bã pʋam. La ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄrɩ ba dia mɛ. Yãma ka tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna bõn-ẽgla halɩ zozo'e?
40006027	Ãne n boe yãma pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vↄm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ı̃yã?
40006028	La bẽm tɩ ya fabla futo yelle? Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo.
40006029	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
40006030	La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorↄ n boe zı̃na dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ yãma yelle gãnna bɛla? Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
40006031	Da fabla-ya yɛta tɩ: 'Bẽm tɩ wʋn di?' bɩɩ 'tɩ wʋn yũ la bẽm?' bɩɩ 'tɩ wʋn yɛ la bẽm?'
40006032	La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu. La yãma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
40006033	Dẽŋɛ-ya ɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, la sɛla n masɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya bõn-bãma wuu pa'asɛ.
40006034	Da fabla-ya beere yelle, tɩ beere ya wʋn bãŋɛ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, daarɛ woo n bɩsrɩ a mẽŋa yelle."
40007001	"Da zɛrgra-ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ da zɛrgɛ ya.
40007002	Se'ere n soe la, yan wʋn zɛrgɛ nẽrba se'em na, Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn zɛrgɛ ya la bɛla. La sɛla tɩ ya dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ nẽrba la, ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya.
40007003	Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sↄkↄ n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?
40007004	Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sↄbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sↄkↄ a nifum, dee tɩ dↄↄgↄ bↄna fõn mẽŋa nifum?
40007005	Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dↄↄgↄ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sↄkↄ la n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum na.
40007006	Da dɩkɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ bõn-sõma bↄ baasɩ, la ya da dɩkɛ sɛla n tarɩ yõorↄ zozo'e lobge kurkurdõma nẽŋam, tɩ ba wʋn nẽ ba mɛ la ba nãma, dee tɩ baasɩ la wẽrgɛ dõn ya zõrzõrʋm."
40007007	"Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya. Ɛ-ya, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ. Wẽ-ya kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bↄ ya.
40007008	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bↄ ẽ.
40007009	Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ borborɩ, tɩ a bↄ ẽ kugre?
40007010	Bɩɩ a sãn sose zũfo, tɩ a bↄ ẽ bõnsɛla?
40007011	Yãma nẽrsaalba n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bↄ ya kↄma bõn-sõma, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum kãn bↄ yãma sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ na bõn-sõma n gãnnɩ bɛla?
40007012	Yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta se'em bↄ'ↄra ya la, yãma mẽ ɩta bɛla bↄ'ↄra ba. Ẽna de la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, la a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ se'em n bɛla."
40007013	"Doose-ya zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ, se'ere n soe la, zanõ-yalŋa, la so-kãtɛ la we'esɩ la sã'aŋↄ zẽ'am, la nẽrba zozo'e dolɩ la bilam.
40007014	La zanõ-mika, la so-bãalga we'esɩ la vↄm zẽ'am. La de la nẽrba fẽe n dolɩ ẽ."
40007015	"Guuse ya mẽŋa la nẽr-sɛba n parnɩ tɩ bãma de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la. Ba wʋn ẽŋɛ ba mẽŋa wʋ saasaadõma n dɩkɛ piisi gãna fʋrɛ ba mẽŋa wa'am ya zẽ'am wʋ ba de la piisi la, dee tɩ ba pʋam ba sã'ana wʋ saasaadõma la.
40007016	Ba tõoma pʋam tɩ ya wʋn bãŋɛ ba. Bẽm ı̃yã, zãaŋa ka tã wʋn wↄm tã'ama, la kẽkↄ ka tã wʋn wↄm kẽnkãma.
40007017	Tɩ-sõŋↄ woo wↄnnɩ na biɛ sõma, la tɩ-be'ego woo wↄnnɩ na biɛ be'ero.
40007018	Tɩ-sõŋↄ ka tã wʋn wↄm biɛ be'ero, la tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka tã wʋn wↄm biɛ sõma.
40007019	Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ yõ la bugum.
40007020	Bɛla, la de la nẽrba la tõoma pʋam tɩ yãma wʋn bãŋɛ ban de nẽr-sɛba."
40007021	Azezi daan le yele yetɩ: "Dagɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n wi'iri mam tɩ 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana' la n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. La de la nẽr-sɛka n ɩtɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n boorɩ se'em na n wʋn kẽ.
40007022	Sarɩyadia daarɛ, nẽrba zozo'e wʋn yele mam yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana, tõma daan dɩkɛ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ bↄ nẽrba. La fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ tõma daan dɩkɛ dige kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee daan tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ.'
40007023	La mam wʋn yele ba yetɩ: 'Mam põn ka mina ya, sẽŋɛ-ya fõrgɛ, tõon-be'ero dõma wã.' "
40007024	"Nẽr-sɛka woo n wõm mam yetↄga wã, dee ẽŋɛ wʋ yetↄga la n yele se'em na, a dãana ãn wʋ yɛm dãana n mẽ a yire tãmpı̃a zuo.
40007025	Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ ẽ, tɩ kʋsebgo vuge wẽ ẽ, tɩ a ka lui, se'ere n soe la, a mẽ la tãmpı̃a zuo.
40007026	La nẽr-sɛka woo n wõm mam yetↄga wã, dee ka sakɛ ɩta yetↄga la n yele se'em na, a ãn wʋ yalma n mẽ a yire tẽntõnbı̃'isgo zuo.
40007027	Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ ẽ, tɩ kʋsebgo vuge wẽ ẽ, tɩ a wuu lui saam saam."
40007028	La Azezi n tↄgɛ yetↄga la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la zozo'e mɛ.
40007029	Se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la tarɩ la pãŋa, la ka ãn wʋ ba lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zãsnɩ se'em na.
40008001	Azezi daan ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e dↄla ẽ.
40008002	Tɩ kõnkonne wa'am a zẽ'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
40008003	Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ, dee yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa." Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kõnkↄm na basɛ ẽ, tɩ a le ãna sõŋa.
40008004	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da yele nẽra nẽra. La sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fↄ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ bõn-sɛba tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
40008005	Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ kẽ'era la Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋa pʋam, tɩ Rom dõma sʋda-kɛ'ɛma wa'am a zẽ'am wa sose ẽ
40008006	yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam tõntõnna n bẽ'erɩ kↄↄrʋm gã yire, a ba nãmsra mɛ zozo'e."
40008007	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam wʋn wa'am wa botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
40008008	Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lebse yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka narɩ tɩ fõn wa'am mam yire. Wen tↄgɛ yetↄga mã'a, tɩ mam tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40008009	Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba. Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ', a we'esɩ mɛ. La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: 'Wa'am', a sẽm mɛ. Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: 'Ẽŋɛ wãna', a ɩtɩ mɛ."
40008010	Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Tɩ a yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bↄ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ.
40008011	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ, nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ze'ele zanõ-bↄba, la dapↄ-bↄba wa'am wa zı̃'ire la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ di Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40008012	La ba wʋn lobge Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n wʋn soe nɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na basɛ la yẽŋa lika pʋam, bilam ba wʋn kaasra, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
40008013	A yele bɛla, dee yele sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la yetɩ: "Kule, tɩ la wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn bↄ mam sɩra se'em na." La wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40008014	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ yire ka yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ dɛɛm-pↄka n bẽ'erɩ gã, tɩ a ı̃yã tʋlgɛ.
40008015	Tɩ Azezi kalʋm pↄka la nu'ugo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ ẽ. Tɩ a isge ẽŋɛ Azezi sãanɛ.
40008016	Tɩ zaanõorɛ paagɛ, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ tarɩ ba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am. Tɩ a tↄgɛ yetↄga dige kʋlkã'arsɩ la, dee botɩ sɛba wuu n de bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40008017	La de la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Ẽŋa n to'oge tõma tooro, la tɩ bã'asɩ basɛ."
40008018	Azezi n yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n kaagɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Tɩ dooge-ya mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba."
40008019	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama ayɩla wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn dↄla fʋ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna."
40008020	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto tara tʋgrↄ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose."
40008021	Tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, basɛ tɩ m dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sↄ dee wa'am wa dↄla fↄ."
40008022	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam dee basɛ sɛba n ka tarɩ vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am tɩ ba laagɛ ba kũm."
40008023	Azezi daan kẽ la õorŋↄ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
40008024	Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa'am wa vugra mõgrɛ la zuo. Tɩ ko-mı̃'isi botɩ õorŋↄ la zɩgra la a mise. La Azezi daan gı̃sri mɛ.
40008025	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la paagɛ nẽegɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fãagɛ tↄ, tõma yetɩ ki mɛ."
40008026	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya zↄta dabeem, ya ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge." Azezi yele bɛla, dee isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko'om na mɛ, tɩ ba ãna sı̃m.
40008027	Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Bẽm nẽra n de ẽna tɩ kʋsebgo, la ko'om sakra a nõorɛ?"
40008028	Ba daan dooge mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba paagɛ la Gadara dõma tẽŋa pʋam, tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba ze'ele yↄↄrↄ zẽ'a sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ. Ba daan de la zↄl-wẽensɩ, tɩ nẽrba zↄta ka sakra dↄla bilam tↄlla.
40008029	Tɩ ba kaasra tagursi yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, bẽm boe tõma la fõn tẽŋasʋka? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ nãmsɛ tõma mɛ dee tɩ wakatɛ la nãn ka paagɛ?"
40008030	La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge lɛm bilam ↄbra.
40008031	Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ dige to tɩ tɩ yese, fʋ basɛ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la."
40008032	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya." Tɩ ba yese sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ kurkurdõma la ze'ele tãŋa zuo zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ la pʋam ki.
40008033	Tɩ sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam ka yele lan ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu, la bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la daan dolɩ la.
40008034	Tɩ tẽŋa la dõma wuu yese tʋ'ʋsra Azezi, la ban yẽ ẽ na, ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa.
40009001	Azezi daan kẽ õorŋↄ lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bↄba kule Kapɛrnaʋm, ẽn kẽ'erɩ zẽ'a la.
40009002	Tɩ nẽrba basɛba zɛ bʋraa ayɩla n de kↄↄrŋↄ n gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am a zẽ'am. Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽ sɩra la, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M bia, keŋe fʋ sũure, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
40009003	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba tẽ'esra ba sũure pʋam yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna pↄ'ↄrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ."
40009004	La Azezi mi ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na mɛ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma tẽ'esra pʋtẽ'e-be'ero ya sũure pʋam?
40009005	Bẽm n de nãana gãnna? Mam sãn yele bʋraa la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana gãnna?
40009006	Mam wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa tarɩ nõorɛ dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ." Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "Isge, dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule."
40009007	Tɩ a isge kule.
40009008	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yẽ bɛla, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ ẽn bↄ nẽrsaalba nõor-ẽŋa la ı̃yã.
40009009	Azezi daan ze'ele la bilam sẽnna tↄlla, yẽ bʋraa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amatie n zı̃ tↄ'ↄsra lampo. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge dↄla mam." Tɩ Amatie isge dↄla ẽ.
40009010	Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka zẽa Amatie yire dita, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e wa'am wa lagɩm na Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la zẽa dita.
40009011	Tɩ Farisi dõma yẽ bɛla, soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma karẽnsãama la lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita."
40009012	Tɩ Azezi wõm bɛla, yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba, la de bã'adõma n eerɩ tɩba.
40009013	Sẽŋɛ-ya ka zãsʋm Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na võorɛ, Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam boorɩ tɩ nẽrsaalba zↄta la taaba ninbãalga, dee dagɩ tɩ ba dɩkɛ ba bõnↄ kãabra bↄ'ↄra mam.' Bɛla, mam ka wa'am tɩ m wi sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ mɛ na, mam wa'am na tõon-be'ero dõma ı̃yã."
40009014	Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma la Farisi dõma lʋta nõorɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka lʋta?"
40009015	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn di pↄka ẽŋɛ kibsa wi a tadãandõma tɩ ba wa'am naagɛ la ẽ dita, ba tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-sã'aŋↄ wakat-sɛka tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna la ba lɛ mɛ bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ. La dabsa sẽm mɛ, tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am. Bɛla tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.
40009016	Nẽra kãn dɩkɛ tãn-paalga lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, tãn-paalga la wʋn botɩ fu-kɛka la ãagɛ mɛ gãŋɛ bɛla.
40009017	La nẽra kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ, tɩ dãam na ka'agɛ, tɩ wↄↄsɩ la mẽ sã'am. La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam, bɛla tɩ ba wuu kãn sã'am."
40009018	Azezi n ken tↄgra la ba bɛla la, tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadãana ayɩla wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele yetɩ: "Mam pↄyʋa n ki lɛɛlɛ wã, wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ nu'ugo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ a vo'oge."
40009019	Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan isge dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa.
40009020	Ban daan we'esɩ la, tɩ pↄka ayɩla n luti sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra, wa'am Azezi poorʋm wa kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ.
40009021	Se'ere n soe la, a daan tẽ'esrɩ a sũurum yetɩ: "Mam sãn kalʋm a fuugo mã'a, mam wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
40009022	Tɩ Azezi gelge yẽ ẽ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, keŋe fʋ sũure! Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n basɛ tɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm." Tɩ pↄka la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa.
40009023	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zifdõma nẽŋadãana la yire yẽ wɩ-pɛɛbrɩba la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n bↄgrɩ.
40009024	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yese-ya, tɩ pugla la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ." Tɩ nẽrba la la'ara ẽ.
40009025	La ẽn botɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yese la, a kẽ la deem gʋrɛ pugla la nu'ugo, tɩ a isge.
40009026	Tɩ yel-ẽna saagɛ tẽŋa la wuu.
40009027	Azezi daan yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa mɛ fõrgra, tɩ fↄↄsɩ bayi dↄla ẽ tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga!"
40009028	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ kẽ yire, tɩ fↄↄsɩ la paagɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma bↄ sɩra tɩ mam wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ yan boorɩ se'em na?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe! Zuudãana."
40009029	Tɩ a kalʋm ba nini dee yetɩ: "La wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ yan bↄ sɩra se'em na."
40009030	Tɩ ba nini na pike yẽta. Tɩ a kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da basɛ-ya tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ."
40009031	La ban fõrgɛ la, ba mõolɛ bõn-ẽŋa mɛ tẽŋa la zẽ'a woo.
40009032	Ban daan yesrɩ la, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ, tɩ a dɛna muko, wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
40009033	Tɩ Azezi dige kʋlkã'arga la, tɩ a yese. Tɩ muko la tↄgra. Tɩ la di'ige nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Nẽra nẽra nãn ka yẽ wãna buuri Ɩsrayɛlɩ pʋam."
40009034	La Farisi dõma daan yetɩ: "La de la kʋlkã'arsɩ naba n bↄ ẽ pãŋa, tɩ a tara digra kʋlkã'arsɩ la."
40009035	Azezi daan kaarɩ la tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu, zãsna nẽrba Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma, la kobro buuri wuu yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.
40009036	La Azezi n yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, ba ninbãalga n yõkɛ ẽ. Se'ere n soe la, ba targɛ mɛ bãlɛ, ãna wʋ piisi n ka tarɩ dũnsı̃ina.
40009037	Tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Va'am na bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la pↄ'ↄrɩ mɛ.
40009038	Bɛla ı̃yã, sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la."
40010001	Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mɛ bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee botɩ bã'adõma buuri wuu, la kobro buuri wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40010002	Karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a looge tɩ a tõm na yʋ'ʋra n wãna: Pↄspↄsɩ dãana de la Asimõ tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a yɩbga A'ãndre, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã,
40010003	la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Atoma, la Amatie n de lampo-tↄ'ↄsa la, la Azakɩ n de Alfe dayʋa, la Atade,
40010004	la Asimõ n daan de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la.
40010005	La de la bãna pia la ayi tɩ Azezi daan tõm, yele ba yetɩ: "Da sẽŋɛ-ya bu-zãŋsɩ la zẽ'am, la da kẽ-ya Samaari dõma tẽnsɩ pʋam.
40010006	Sẽŋɛ-ya Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n ãn wʋ piisi n bↄɩ la zẽ'am,
40010007	ka mõola yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na lɛm mɛ.'
40010008	La ya botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee botɩ kũm vo'oge, dee botɩ kõnkↄma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ. Yãma to'oge la zãŋa, bɛla bↄ-ya zãŋa.
40010009	Da dɩkɛ-ya sãlma bɩɩ ligri sũm sẽŋɛ.
40010010	La ya da dɩkɛ tãmpↄkↄ sore la sẽnnɛ ı̃yã, da dɩkɛ-ya futo bayi, bɩɩ tagra, bɩɩ doore. Ba wʋn bↄ tõntõnna ẽn boorɩ sɛla.
40010011	Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-kãtɛ bɩɩ tẽn-pɩka pʋam, soke-ya bãŋɛ nẽr-sõŋↄ sãn bↄna mı̃ wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya kẽ'era a yire, bↄna-ya bilam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
40010012	Ya sãn paagɛ kẽ yire pʋam, ya pʋ'ʋsɛ ba yetɩ: 'Sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ya.'
40010013	La yire la dõma sãn to'oge ya, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ba. La ba sãn zagsɛ ka to'oge ya, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn weege ya zẽ'am.
40010014	La yi-sɛka, bɩɩ tẽn-sɛka nẽrba sãn ka to'oge ya, bɩɩ ka selse ya yetↄga, ya yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ mı̃.
40010015	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ tẽn-ẽŋa dõma wʋn yẽ toogo gãnna Sodom la Gomõorɩ tẽnsɩ nẽrba."
40010016	Azezi le yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, mam tõm ya wʋ piisi saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka. Bɛla ı̃yã, dɛna-ya yɛm dõma wʋ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la ya ãna wʋ na'adawɛma n ka tarɩ yelle se'em na.
40010017	Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la nẽrba la. Se'ere n soe la, ba wʋn wa yõgɛ ya mɛ tarɩ sẽŋɛ sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, dee wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam.
40010018	La ba wʋn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ gↄmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam, yãma n dolɩ mam na ı̃yã, tɩ ya wʋn dɛna kaset-dõma tↄgɛ bↄ bãma la bu-zãŋsɩ.
40010019	La ba sãn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ, da fabla-ya yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ se'em, bɩɩ yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ sɛla yelle. Se'ere n soe la, wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bↄ ya bõn-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn tↄgɛ.
40010020	La dagɩ yãma mẽŋa n wʋn tↄgɛ, la de la ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la n boe ya pʋam na n wʋn tↄgɛ.
40010021	Sↄbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ a sↄbia kʋ. La sↄdõma mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ ba kↄma bɛla. La kↄma mẽ wʋn zɛbɛ la ba dↄgrɩba, botɩ ba kʋ ba.
40010022	Nẽrba wuu wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ la ı̃yã. La sɛka n ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
40010023	Ba sãn nãmsɛ ya tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, ya zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa ayẽma. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ya kãn yãŋɛ kaagɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽnsɩ ba'asɛ dee tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la leme wa'am.
40010024	Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la tõntõnna mẽ ka gãnnɩ a zuudãana.
40010025	La karẽnbia sãn wa ãna wʋ a karẽnsãama la, la tõntõnna sãn wa ãna wʋ a zuudãana la, la seke mɛ. Ban wi'iri yidãana la tɩ Abelzebuli n de Asũtãana la, ba wʋn tʋʋra a yire la dõma gãnna la bɛla."
40010026	"Bɛla, da zↄta-ya nẽrsaalba, tɩ bõn-sɛka woo n lile, wʋn lilge. La bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ, wʋn puke.
40010027	Mam n yele ya se'em lika pʋam wã, tↄgɛ-ya ẽ peelem pʋam. La sɛla tɩ mam waasʋm ya la, zom-ya deto zuto mõolɛ ẽ.
40010028	Da zↄta-ya sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ı̃yã, dee ka tãna wʋn kʋ sɩa la. Zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn botɩ ya ı̃yã, la ya sɩa sã'am bug-tẽŋa la.
40010029	Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto bayi la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla mã'a? La baa niila ayɩla kãn ki, tɩ la sãn dagna ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n sakɛ.
40010030	La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ.
40010031	Bɛla ı̃yã, da zↄta-ya dabeem, yãma tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ.
40010032	Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn ze'ele mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
40010033	La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa ka mi mam, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum nẽŋam tɩ mam ka mi ẽ."
40010034	"Da tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ mam tarɩ la nõ-yẽnnɛ wa'am dũnia zuo. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba dɛna nõorɛ ayɩla dũnia zuo, la de la welgre tɩ mam tarɩ wa'am.
40010035	Se'ere n soe la, mam wa'am tɩ m welge la dayↄↄsɩ la ba sↄdõma, la pugunto la ba madõma, la dayↄↄsɩ pↄgba la ba sɩrba madõma.
40010036	Tɩ nẽra mẽŋa yir-dõma wʋn dɛna a bɛ'ɛba.
40010037	Nẽr-sɛka n nõŋɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma gãnna mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra. La nẽr-sɛka woo n nõŋɛ a dayʋa bɩɩ a pↄyʋa gãnna mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra.
40010038	La nẽr-sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam, a ka masɛ tɩ a dɛna mam nẽra.
40010039	La nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ ẽ."
40010040	"Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge ya, a to'oge la mam. La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na.
40010041	La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ẽn de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la ı̃yã, a wʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yↄↄrↄ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge sɩra dãana ẽn de sɩra dãana la ı̃yã, a wʋn to'oge sɩra dãana yↄↄrↄ.
40010042	La nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ mam nẽrba wã ayɩla ko-mã'asga tɩ a yũ, ẽn de mam karẽnbia la ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a kãn koŋe yↄↄrↄ."
40011001	Azezi n daan pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yese bilam sẽŋɛ la so'olʋm na tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam ka zãsna nẽrba, dee mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
40011002	Tɩ Azã daan bↄna yʋ'a deem, wõm Krisi tõoma la yelle, tõm a karẽnbiisi a zẽ'am,
40011003	tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"
40011004	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n wõnnɩ se'em, la yãma n yẽtɩ se'em na:
40011005	Fↄↄsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkↄma yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vↄ'ↄra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
40011006	La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ı̃yã la tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
40011007	Azã karẽnbiisi la n fõrgɛ la, tɩ Azezi yãŋa tↄgra Azã yelle bↄ'ↄra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma daan sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ weem? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõorↄ tɩ kʋsebgo mı̃ini bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ.
40011008	La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ? Nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma? Ayɛɩ. Nẽr-sɛba n yɛ fu-sõma la boe na'adõma yiɛ.
40011009	La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa bɩɩ? Ẽe. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
40011010	La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam tõntõnna n wãna tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.'
40011011	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dↄgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. La nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
40011012	Lan pↄsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm sẽnnɩ nẽŋa la pãŋa, la pãnsɩ dõma n mõrgrɩ tɩ ba fãagɛ ẽ.
40011013	Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la wuu, la lↄↄ gõnnↄ la wuu dẽŋɛ tↄgɛ so'olʋm na yelle mɛ halɩ wa paagɛ Azã wakatɛ.
40011014	La ya sãn bↄↄra tɩ ya bãŋɛ a võorɛ, Azã n de A'eli tɩ ba yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na.
40011015	Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.
40011016	Mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba? Ba ãn wʋ kↄma n zı̃ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ:
40011017	'Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa. Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka yõom.'
40011018	Se'ere n soe la, Azã wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
40011019	Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ. Yɛm dãana tõoma n pa'alɩ tɩ a tarɩ yɛm."
40011020	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi zɛrgɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e ba tẽnsɩ pʋam, dee tɩ ba ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la yetɩ:
40011021	"Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bↄra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
40011022	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam yɛta ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bↄ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.
40011023	La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ halɩ ka paagɛ kɩ'ɩn-tẽŋa. Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba tɩ mam tõm ya zẽ'am na daan sãn tõm nɩ na Sodom tẽŋam, a wʋn ken boe nɩ mɛ zı̃na.
40011024	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom dõma kãn yẽ toogo paagɛ yãma."
40011025	Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi tↄgɛ mɛ yetɩ: "Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fↄ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄm-pɩgsɩ la.
40011026	Ẽe, mam Sↄ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ı̃yã."
40011027	"Mam Sↄ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum. La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sↄ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sↄ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na."
40011028	"Wa'am-ya mam zẽ'am, yãma sɛba wuu n tʋ ze-tɩbsa targɛ la, tɩ mam wʋn bↄ ya vo'osgo.
40011029	Dɩkɛ-ya mam sↄgrɩga sↄgɛ ya mẽŋa, zãsʋm sɛla tɩ mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya la, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ vo'osgo. Se'ere n soe la, mam de la sũ-bʋgsʋm dãana, la sik-m-mẽŋa dãana.
40011030	Mam sↄgrɩga la fakɛ mɛ, la mam zeero la ka tɩbgɛ."
40012001	Wakat-ẽŋa, Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan dolɩ la vatↄ pʋam, Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tↄlla. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi kↄm dõnna, tɩ ba kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
40012002	Tɩ Farisi dõma yẽ, yele Azezi yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, fʋ karẽnbiisi la ɩtɩ la sɛla n sisri vo'osgo daarɛ."
40012003	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ se'em na?
40012004	A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego la pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe, dee bↄ a nẽrba la. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna kãabgↄ kẽma la mã'a.
40012005	Bɩɩ yãma ka karẽŋɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam n yetɩ, vo'osgo daarɛ, kãabgↄ kẽma la n tõnnɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam na sã'anɩ vo'osgo daarɛ sisgo la mɛ tɩ taalɛ ka bↄna?
40012006	Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽra n gãnnɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n boe kalam.
40012007	La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam boorɩ tɩ nẽrsaalba zↄta la taaba ninbãalga, dee dagɩ tɩ ba dɩkɛ ba bõnↄ kãabra bↄ'ↄra mam.' Yãma sãn bãŋɛ nɩ yetↄg-ẽna wã võorɛ, ya kãn yele nɩ sɛba n ka tõm be'em tɩ ba tuuge ya.
40012008	Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ."
40012009	Azezi fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la ba wẽndeem.
40012010	Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla daan bↄna mı̃, tɩ a nu'ugo ki. Tɩ Farisi dõma bↄↄra tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ ba botɩ nẽra yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ?"
40012011	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-kãna n boe yãma pʋam wʋn tara pesgo, tɩ a lui boko pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ a kãn yõkɛ ẽ tɩ a dooge?
40012012	Nẽrsaala tarɩ yõorↄ mɛ gãnna pesgo zozo'e. Bɛla, sore boe mɛ tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ."
40012013	La Azezi yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ, tɩ a nu'ugo la ãna sõŋa wʋ nu'ugo ayẽma la.
40012014	Tɩ Farisi dõma la yese yẽŋa ka bãm bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi.
40012015	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ bɛla, fõrgɛ bilam. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e doose ẽ. Tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40012016	Dee kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da botɩ nẽra bãŋɛ.
40012017	A ẽŋɛ la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi yele se'em na ẽŋɛ.
40012018	A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam tõntõnna tɩ mam looge n wãna: Nẽr-sɛka tɩ mam nõŋɛ, a paagɛ la mam yɛm. Mam wʋn basɛ tɩ m Sɩa pãŋa bↄna la ẽ, tɩ a mõolɛ sɩra, la sɛla n masɛ mam yɛm bↄ buuri wuu.
40012019	A kãn wẽ'era nõke'ene, la a kãn zɛbra. La nẽra kãn wõm a kõa sorↄↄrↄ zuto.
40012020	A kãn kↄ'ↄgɛ mõ-sɛka n kↄ'ↄgɛ la ba'asɛ. La a kãn kı̃ŋe fɩtla gõngõŋↄ la n diti fẽfẽ la ba'asɛ, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn botɩ sɩra, la sɛla n masɛ to'oge zẽ'a wuu.
40012021	Tɩ buuri la wuu wʋn te'ege ẽ."
40012022	Tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ, tɩ a dɛna fʋa la muko wa'am Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ Azezi botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, tↄgra dee yẽta.
40012023	Tɩ la di'ige nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu, tɩ ba yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã kãn dɛna naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa la?"
40012024	Tɩ Farisi dõma wõm bɛla, yele yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna tarɩ la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa digra kʋlkã'arsɩ la."
40012025	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ. La tẽn-sɛka woo, bɩɩ yi-sɛka woo nẽrba n welge zɛbra la taaba, a wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
40012026	La Asũtãana sãn digra Asũtãana, a welge mɛ zɛbra la a mẽŋa. Bɛla, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
40012027	Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãne pãŋa digra kʋlkã'arsɩ? Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrↄ.
40012028	La de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
40012029	Nẽra ka tã wʋn kẽ pãŋa dãana yire vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ, sãn dagna tɩ a dẽŋɛ lʋ pãŋa dãana la mɛ dee yãŋa vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ la.
40012030	Sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ. La sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ.
40012031	Bɛla n soe tɩ mam yele ya yetɩ, tõon-be'ero wuu, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga wuu tɩ nẽrsaalba ɩtɩ la, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn basɛ ba taalɛ. La sɛka n tↄgɛ pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, a kãn basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
40012032	La nẽr-sɛka n tↄgrɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tↄg-be'ero, a wʋn basɛ ẽ taalɛ. La sɛka n tↄgrɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tↄg-be'ero, Nawẽnnɛ kãn malɩn basɛ ẽ taalɛ dũnia ẽna wã pʋam, la dũni-sɛka n sẽm na pʋam.
40012033	Ya sãn yetɩ, tɩa ãn sõŋa, ya yetɩ a biɛ ãn sõŋa. Bɩɩ ya sãn yetɩ, tɩa de tɩ-be'ego, ya yetɩ a biɛ mẽ de la biɛ be'ero. Se'ere n soe la, tɩa biɛ n botɩ ba bãŋra ẽn de tɩ-sɛka.
40012034	Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, yãma n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ wãna wã, ya wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tↄgɛ tↄg-sõma? Se'ere n soe la, sɛla n zo'oge sũure pʋam na tɩ nõorɛ tↄgrɩ.
40012035	Nẽr-sõŋↄ tↄgrɩ la bõn-sõma tɩ a tarɩ a sũure pʋam. La nẽr-be'ego tↄgrɩ la bõn-be'ero tɩ a tarɩ a sũure pʋam.
40012036	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, nẽrsaalba wʋn ka tↄgɛ yetↄg-yaalsɩ tɩ ba tↄgɛ la wuu yelle Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam.
40012037	La de la fʋ yetↄga pʋam tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bʋʋrↄ, la, la de la fʋ yetↄga pʋam tɩ fʋ wʋn koŋe bʋʋrↄ."
40012038	Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla la, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ la bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ fõn ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am tɩ tɩ yẽ."
40012039	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, dee ka dↄla Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra la, boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlm-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ la.
40012040	Wʋ Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn boe zũn-kãtɛ la pʋʋrʋm dabsa atã wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn bↄna yↄↄgↄ pʋam na dabsa atã, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ.
40012041	Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero. La nẽra n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm.
40012042	La sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pↄka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gↄbga bↄba la, wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã, se'ere n soe la, a daan ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetↄga. La nẽra n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ."
40012043	Azezi le yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pↄgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ka yẽ,
40012044	a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.' La a sãn lebe ka paagɛ yẽ tɩ deego la de la voore, pɩɩsɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa,
40012045	a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa, wa'am wa kẽ bↄna mı̃. La nẽra la toogo wʋn gãnna kʋrʋm toogo la. La mẽ wʋn dɛna la bɛla bↄ zamãan-ẽna wã nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ la."
40012046	Azezi daan ken tↄgra la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ a ma, la a yɩbsɩ daan zɛ yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba tↄgɛ la ẽ.
40012047	Tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n wãna n ze yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba tↄgɛ la fↄ."
40012048	Tɩ Azezi yele sɛka n tↄgrɩ la ẽ na yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam ma, la ãndõma n de mam yɩbsɩ?"
40012049	Dee tẽegɛ a nu'ugo pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ n wãna.
40012050	Nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n boorɩ se'em, ẽŋa n de mam yɩbga, la mam tã, la mam ma."
40013001	Daar-ẽŋa, Azezi yese yire sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
40013002	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam zı̃'ire, dee tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zɛ mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
40013003	Tɩ a makɛ magsa tↄgɛ yɛla zozo'e bↄ ba yetɩ: "Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
40013004	La ẽn lobgrɩ bõnbuuri la, basɛba lui la sore nõorʋm, tɩ niinto wa'am wa di ba.
40013005	Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpı̃a zuo, zẽ'a tɩ tẽntõnnↄ ka zo'oge. Tẽntõnnↄ n ka zo'oge la ı̃yã, ba yese la tↄtↄ.
40013006	Tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkɛ wẽ ba, tɩ ba ki, ba yẽga n ka kẽ tẽŋa la ı̃yã.
40013007	Tɩ basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ gõ'osɩ la yese fʋrɛ ba.
40013008	Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ zẽ'a, wↄm biɛ. Basɛba wↄm na biɛ kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba wↄm pisyoob-yoobɩ, basɛba pitã-tã.
40013009	Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
40013010	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ soke yetɩ: "Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ fõn makra magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba?"
40013011	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ. La a ka botɩ bãma bãŋɛ.
40013012	Sɛka n tarɩ wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ, tɩ la zo'oge. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, baa sɛla tɩ a tarɩ fẽe la, ba wʋn to'oge ẽ.
40013013	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam magsra magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba, se'ere n soe la, ba bɩsrɩ mɛ, dee ka yẽta, wõnna, dee ka bãŋra a võorɛ.
40013014	Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn yele se'em na ɩtɩ la bãma lɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Ya wʋn wõm, la ya kãn bãŋɛ a võorɛ, ya wʋn bɩsɛ, la ya kãn yẽ.
40013015	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-bãna pʋtẽ'era ka like, ba lɩ ba tʋba mɛ, dee mũm ba nini, tɩ ba nini da yẽ, tɩ ba tʋba da wõm, tɩ ba da wõm a võorɛ. Sãn dagɩ nɩ bɛla, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm leme wa'am mam zẽ'am, tɩ m bↄ ba laafɛ.'
40013016	La, la sãn dɛna yãma, ya tarɩ zu-yẽlga, yãma tarɩ la nini n yẽtɩ, dee tara tʋba n wõnnɩ.
40013017	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la nẽr-sõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm."
40013018	"Bɛla, selse-ya sɛka n lobge bõnbuuri la makrɛ la võorɛ.
40013019	Sore la nõorʋm tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la, dee ka bãŋɛ a võorɛ. Tɩ Asũtãana n de tõon-be'ero dãana la wa'am wa yese yetↄga la a sũure pʋam.
40013020	Tãmpı̃a zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm kõ-yẽlga la, to'oge ẽ bilam mẽŋa la sũ-yẽlga.
40013021	La ban ka kẽ a sũure pʋam na ı̃yã, a sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe. La toogo bɩɩ nãmsgↄ sãn paagɛ ẽ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la ı̃yã, a basrɩ mɛ tↄtↄ.
40013022	La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la, tɩ a yɛm yↄↄra la dũnia wã yɛla, tɩ bõntarsõm yɛla pã'asra ẽ, botɩ yetↄga la ka tãna wʋn wↄm biɛ a sũure pʋam.
40013023	La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛka n wõm Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, wõm a võorɛ, wↄnna biɛ. Tɩ basɛba wↄm kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba pitã-tã."
40013024	Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ bʋraa n bʋrɛ si sõma a va'am.
40013025	Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ nẽrba gã gı̃sra, tɩ a bɛ tarɩ kanarsɩ sẽŋɛ ka bʋrɛ lagɩm mı̃.
40013026	Tɩ si la yese bɩ waagɛ. Tɩ kanarsɩ la mẽ waagɛ, tɩ ba yẽ tɩ ba dagɩ si.
40013027	Tɩ tõntõnɩba la sẽŋɛ va'am na dãana zẽ'am ka soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, dagɩ si sõma tɩ fõn daan bʋrɛ fʋ va'am na? La bẽm tɩ kanarsɩ bↄna mı̃ zozo'e?'
40013028	Tɩ a yele yetɩ: 'La de la mam bɛ n ẽŋɛ bɛla.' Tɩ tõntõnɩba la soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka võ kanarsɩ la mɛ bɩɩ?'
40013029	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ayɛɩ, ya sãn võ kanarsɩ la, ya wʋn po võ la si.
40013030	Basɛ-ya tɩ ba wuu bɩ ka paagɛ bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ wakatɛ, tɩ mam wʋn yele sɛba n lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla la tɩ ba dẽŋɛ võ kanarsɩ la, bobe ba yõ bugum, dee yãŋa lagsɛ si la dɩgɛ m bãarɛ pʋam.' "
40013031	Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire tɩ bʋraa bʋrɛ a va'am.
40013032	A ãna pɩka pɩka gãnna bõnbuuri la wuu biɛ, la ba sãn bʋrɛ ẽ, a bɩtɩ mɛ gãnna zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu, ãna wʋ tɩa la, tɩ niinto sẽna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrↄ a wila zuo."
40013033	La a le makɛ la makrɛ ayɩla bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pↄka dɩkɛ ẽŋɛ borborɩ zom la-kãra batã pʋam wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke."
40013034	Bɛla wuu Azezi magsrɩ la magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, a ka tↄgɛ yetↄga bↄ ba, tɩ la sãn dagna magsa.
40013035	A ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ se'em na n ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Mam wʋn makɛ la magsa tↄgɛ bↄ ba, mam wʋn pa'alɛ yel-sɛba n sʋgɛ halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã."
40013036	Azezi daan basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mɛ, dee kule yire. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ tↄ kanarsɩ la makrɛ võorɛ."
40013037	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛka n bʋrɛ si sõma la, de la mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la.
40013038	La va'am na de la dũnia, tɩ si sõma la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm nẽrba. Tɩ kanarsɩ la dɛna Asũtãana nẽrba.
40013039	Tɩ bɛ la n bʋrɛ kanarsɩ la dɛna Asũtãana. Tɩ bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ wakatɛ la dɛna dũnia ba'asgↄ. Tɩ sɛba n lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma.
40013040	Ban lagsɛ kanarsɩ la lobe basɛ bugum pʋam se'em na, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛla mẽ dũnia ba'asgↄ.
40013041	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn tõm na a malɛkadõma tɩ ba lagsɛ sɛba n pã'asɛ nẽrba tɩ ba basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, la tõon-be'ero dõma wuu, yese ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam,
40013042	lobe ba basɛ bugum pʋam. Zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
40013043	La nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ wʋn yẽgra ba Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa la. Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
40013044	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ tɩ ba dɩkɛ sʋgɛ va'am pʋam, tɩ nẽra yẽ ẽ. Tɩ a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a le sʋgɛ ẽ pa'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ka koose ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu, sẽŋɛ ka da va'am na.
40013045	Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm le ãna wʋ lɛɛba n eerɩ kug-sõma n de tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ tɩ a da.
40013046	La a yẽ la ayɩla n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ a ligri zo'oge, tɩ a lebe kule ka koose ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu, sẽŋɛ ka da ẽ."
40013047	"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ken ãna wʋ yʋka tɩ ba lobge ko-kãtɛ pʋam yõgɛ zũma buuri wuu,
40013048	tɩ yʋka la pɩrɛ. Tɩ ba ve'ege ẽ dooge doone, gãsɛ zũn-sɛba n ãn sõŋa ẽŋɛ pɩtↄ pʋam, dee lobe sɛba n ka ãn sõŋa la basɛ.
40013049	La wʋn ãna la bɛla dũnia ba'asgↄ wakatɛ. Malɛkadõma n wʋn wa'am wa gãsɛ nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, nẽr-sõma la pʋam,
40013050	lobe ba basɛ bugum pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
40013051	Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla, dee soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma wõm bɛla wuu võorɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽe."
40013052	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n de lↄↄ karẽnsãama dee zãsʋm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle pa'asɛ, ãn wʋ yidãana n loorɩ bõn-kɛgsɩ, la bõn-paalsɩ a bõntarsõm pʋam bↄ'ↄra nẽrba."
40013053	Azezi daan magsɛ magsa la kɩ'ɩlɩm, dee fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la a mẽŋa tẽŋa.
40013054	La ẽn paagɛ a mẽŋa tẽŋa la, a kẽ la ba wẽndeego pʋam zãsna nẽrba, tɩ a zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A yẽ yɛm ẽna la bɛ? A ẽŋɛ la wãne tõnna tõon-yãlma wã?
40013055	Dagɩ ẽna n de dↄ-wãta la dayʋa la? Dagɩ ẽna ma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amaari la, tɩ a yɩbsɩ dɛna Azakɩ, la Azozɛfʋ, la Asimõ, la Azudi la?
40013056	Dagɩ a tãpa wuu n boe tɩ zẽ'am wã? A yẽ bõn-bãma wuu la bɛ?"
40013057	Bɛla tɩ ba daan ka bↄ ẽ sɩra. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yẽtɩ pẽka mɛ, sãn dagna a mẽŋa tẽŋa, la a yir-dõma tẽŋasʋka mã'a tɩ a ka yẽtɩ pẽka."
40013058	A daan ka tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e bilam, ban ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la ı̃yã.
40014001	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Galile naba A'erↄdɩ daan wõm ban tↄgrɩ Azezi yelle,
40014002	tɩ a yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: "Ẽna de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge. La de la bɛla n soe tɩ a tara pãŋa tõnna tõon-yãlma."
40014003	Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, A'erↄdɩ mẽŋa n daan botɩ ba yõkɛ Azã lʋ tarɩ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem a kẽema Afilipi pↄga A'erodɩadɩ ı̃yã.
40014004	Se'ere n soe la, A'erↄdɩ daan fãagɛ la Afilipi pↄga di, tɩ Azã daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ka masɛ tɩ fʋ fãagɛ ẽ di."
40014005	A'erↄdɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a kʋ Azã mɛ, dee zↄta tẽŋa la nẽrba, se'ere n soe la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ Azã de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
40014006	La A'erↄdɩ daan wa ɩta la a dↄka daarɛ kibsa, tɩ A'erodɩadɩ pↄyʋa wa nẽrba nẽŋam, tɩ A'erↄdɩ sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm halɩ zozo'e,
40014007	tɩ a pↄɩ yele pugla la yetɩ, bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ a wʋn sose, ẽŋa wʋn bↄ ẽ.
40014008	Tɩ a ma botɩ a yele naba A'erↄdɩ yetɩ: "Dɩkɛ Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam bↄ mam kalam."
40014009	Tɩ naba la sũure sã'am, la ẽn pↄɩ la ı̃yã, la sãama la ı̃yã, tɩ a bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ ba bↄ pugla la ẽn boorɩ sɛla la.
40014010	Dee tõm nẽra tɩ a sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem ka wike Azã zuugo.
40014011	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka wike zuugo la ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam tarɩ ka bↄ pugla la, tɩ a to'oge ka bↄ a ma.
40014012	Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wa'am wa dɩkɛ kũm na ka laagɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi.
40014013	Azezi n daan wõm bɛla la, a kẽ la õorŋↄ fõrgɛ wɛ'ɛsa kẽnkɛrŋa, zẽ'a tɩ nẽrba ka boe. Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la bãŋɛ, ze'ele tẽnsɩ pʋam babsɛ ẽ la nãma.
40014014	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ ze'ele õorŋↄ la zuo sige, yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40014015	Tɩ zaanõorɛ paagɛ, tɩ karẽnbiisi la lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zẽ'a wã de la mõom, dee tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ'era, bɛla botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽnsɩ la pʋam ka da dia di."
40014016	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La ka de pẽrgrɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ, ya mẽŋa bↄ ba dia."
40014017	Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a."
40014018	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Tarɩ-ya ba wa'am wa bↄ ma."
40014019	Dee botɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zı̃'ire mõorↄ zuo. Tɩ a dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la, gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ ba.
40014020	Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
40014021	Sɛba n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ daan de wʋ tʋsanuu, tɩ pↄgsɩ la kↄma kãllɛ ka pa'asɛ.
40014022	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi basɛ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ dẽŋɛ ẽ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
40014023	Ẽn daan keese nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a sẽŋɛ la kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a bↄna mı̃.
40014024	La õorŋↄ la daan boe la mõgrɛ la pʋam zãazãarɛ, tɩ ko-mı̃'isi wẽ'era ẽ, tɩ ba nãmsra, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba.
40014025	Tɩ beere yↄna wiire, tɩ Azezi sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa a karẽnbiisi la bↄba.
40014026	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la yẽ tɩ a sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A de la ki-isgne." Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba kaasra tagursi.
40014027	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Keŋe-ya ya sũure, la de la mam, da zoe-ya dabeem."
40014028	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la fõn, bↄ mam nõorɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ko'om na zuo wa'am fʋ zẽ'am."
40014029	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Wa'am." Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese õorŋↄ la pʋam sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa Azezi zẽ'am.
40014030	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ bɩsɛ la kʋsebgo la n vugri zo'oge la, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ẽ. Tɩ a bↄna mı̃ tɩ a mise, kaasɛ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fãagɛ ma."
40014031	Tɩ Azezi darɛ tẽegɛ nu'ugo gʋrɛ ẽ dee yetɩ: "Fʋ ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge, bẽm tɩ fʋ yɛm yↄↄra?"
40014032	Tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge.
40014033	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la n boe õorŋↄ la pʋam na ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam yetɩ: "Fõn sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la."
40014034	Tɩ ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ Zenezarɛtɩ tẽŋa.
40014035	Tɩ zẽ'e-ẽŋa nẽrba bãŋɛ Azezi, tõm nẽrba tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma wuu wa'am a zẽ'am.
40014036	Ba daan sose ẽ yetɩ a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a. La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ.
40015001	Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wa'am wa soke Azezi yetɩ:
40015002	"Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋↄ la? Ba sãn yetɩ ba di, ba ka peerɩ nu'usi wʋ tɩ yaabdõma n ɩtɩ se'em na."
40015003	Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ tɩ yãma mẽ sɩ'ɩsra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la, ya mẽŋa malŋↄ ı̃yã?
40015004	Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' Dee le yetɩ: 'Sɛka n tↄgɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.'
40015005	La yãma yetɩ, nẽra sãn yele a sↄ bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: 'Mam n tarɩ nɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ m sõŋɛ fↄ la, de la Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ', la ka le dɛna tɩ a ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ a sↄ.
40015006	Bɛla, ya basrɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la lebge la zãŋa, dee dↄla ya mẽŋa malŋↄ.
40015007	Pʋlibsum dõma wã, A'ezayi yʋʋn sɩrɩ to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ ya yelle, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
40015008	'Nẽr-bãna wã pẽgrɩ mam na ba nõorɛ yetↄga, la ba sũure zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
40015009	Ban nã'asrɩ mam na, la de la zãŋa. Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ na zãsŋↄ n de nẽrsaalba lↄↄ.' "
40015010	La Azezi wi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba wa'am na a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya sõŋa sõŋa wõm a võorɛ:
40015011	La dagɩ sɛla n kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ, la de la sɛla n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ."
40015012	Bɛla tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mi tɩ Farisi dõma la n wõm fõn tↄgɛ bɛla la, la dõn ba sũure mɛ?"
40015013	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Sɛla woo tɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ ka bʋrɛ, ba wʋn võogɛ ẽ basɛ.
40015014	Basɛ-ya ba, tɩ ba ãn wʋ fↄↄsɩ n ve'erɩ fↄↄsɩ. Fʋa sãn vɛ'ɛra fʋa, bãma bayi wuu wʋn lui la boko pʋam."
40015015	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ tↄ makrɛ la võorɛ."
40015016	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like?
40015017	Yãma ka mi tɩ bõn-sɛka woo n kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm tollɩ la a pʋʋrʋm, tɩ a yẽ'era ba basra?
40015018	La sɛla n yesrɩ nẽrsaala nõorʋm ze'ele la a sũure pʋam, la de la bõn-bãma n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ.
40015019	Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: Nẽr-kʋa, la yalsɩ, la taaba pↄgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nayigum, la põmpↄrŋↄ, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga.
40015020	La de la bãna wã n dẽgrɩ nẽrsaala. La nẽra sãn di dee ka peege nu'usi, bɛla ka dẽgrɩ nẽra."
40015021	Azezi daan fõrgɛ bilam sẽŋɛ la Tiiri, la Sidõ so'olʋm.
40015022	Tɩ Kanaan pↄka ze'ele tẽn-bãma wa'am a zẽ'am wa tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga, mam pↄyʋa tɩ kʋlkã'arga nãmsra ẽ halɩ zozo'e."
40015023	Tɩ Azezi ka lerge ẽ se'ere. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la paagɛ a zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽŋɛ bↄ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ, tɩ a kaasrɩ dↄla tↄ."
40015024	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam na Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n ãn wʋ piisi n bↄɩ la mã'a zẽ'am."
40015025	Tɩ pↄka la paagɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, sõŋɛ ma."
40015026	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kↄma dia bↄ baasɩ."
40015027	Tɩ pↄka la lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la sɩra. La baasɩ diti la di-zõra n luti ba dãana taablɩ tilum."
40015028	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, fʋ bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge mɛ. La wʋn ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn boorɩ se'em na bↄ fↄ." La wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ a pↄyʋa la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40015029	Azezi daan ze'ele bilam sẽŋɛ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, ka zom tãŋa zuo zẽa.
40015030	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e tarɩ kↄↄrnↄ, la fↄↄsɩ, la kobro, la mugro, la bã'adõma basɛba zozo'e wa'am Azezi nẽŋam. Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40015031	La nẽrba la n daan yẽ mugro la n tↄgrɩ, tɩ kobro la yeege, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ na sẽnna, tɩ fↄↄsɩ la yẽta la, la daan di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma Zuudãana la.
40015032	Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi la mɛ yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, la de la dabsa atã n wãna tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am, dee ka tara dia wʋn di. La mam ka boorɩ tɩ m basɛ ba tɩ ba kule la kↄm, ba tã wʋn ka vibe sore mɛ."
40015033	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn yẽ dia la bɛ, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã, bↄ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã wuu tɩ la seke ba?"
40015034	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Bayopↄɩ, la zũn-pɩgsɩ fẽe."
40015035	Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ, ba zı̃'ire tẽŋa.
40015036	Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopↄɩ la, la zũma la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
40015037	Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ ba vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ.
40015038	Sɛba n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsa anaasɩ, tɩ pↄgsɩ la kↄma kãllɛ ka pa'asɛ.
40015039	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tɩ ba kule mɛ, dee kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ Magdala.
40016001	Tɩ Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma basɛba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa bↄↄra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ bõn-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
40016002	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Zaanõorɛ, sawara sãn mõ'ogɛ, yãma yetɩ saaga kãn ni.
40016003	La bulika, sawara sãn mõ'ogɛ sobge, yãma yetɩ saaga n wʋn ni. Yãma bɩsrɩ la sawara mina la ãn se'em, dee ka tãna wʋn bãŋɛ bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã n pa'alɩ sɛla.
40016004	Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba n de nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ, dee ka dↄla Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra la, boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ la bõn-yãlma, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ bõn-yãlma la." La a basɛ ba mɛ dee fõrgɛ.
40016005	Tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yı̃m ka dɩkɛ borborɩ.
40016006	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma dãbɩllɛ la."
40016007	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tẽ'esra yetɩ: "Tõma n ka dɩkɛ borborɩ la ı̃yã tɩ a yele bɛla."
40016008	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "Ya ka bↄ mam sɩra zo'oge. Bẽm tɩ yãma tẽ'esra yetɩ, la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã?
40016009	Yãma nãn ka bãŋɛ a võorɛ? Yãma ka tẽrɩ, borborɩ banuu la tɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu daan di tɩgɛ deege la, yãma daan vaagɛ di-sɛba n daan deege la pɩrɛ la pɩtↄ balɛ?
40016010	La borborɩ bayopↄɩ la, tɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la daan di tɩgɛ deege la, yãma vaagɛ di-sɛba n deege la pɩrɛ la pɩtↄ balɛ?
40016011	Bẽm tɩ ya ka bãŋɛ tɩ la dagɩ borborɩ yelle tɩ mam tↄgrɩ la ya? Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma dãbɩllɛ la yelle."
40016012	Tɩ ba yãŋa bãŋɛ tɩ a ka yele ba tɩ ba guuse ba mẽŋa la dãbɩllɛ sɛba tɩ ba tarɩ gaana borborɩ zom na, la de la Farisi dõma, la Saduse dõma zãsŋↄ la tɩ a tↄgrɩ.
40016013	Azezi daan paagɛ la tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare, soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la de la ãne?"
40016014	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli. Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi, bɩɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la nẽra ayɩla."
40016015	Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?"
40016016	Tɩ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ n de vↄm dãana la Dayʋa."
40016017	Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, Azã dayʋa, fʋ tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽrsaala n pa'alɛ fʋ wãna, la de la mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum na.
40016018	Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ de la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, a võorɛ de la tãmpı̃a, la tãmpı̃-ẽna zuo tɩ mam wʋn vigle m nẽrba lagsgↄ zẽ'a. La kũm pãŋa kãn tã'agɛ ẽ.
40016019	Mam wʋn bↄ fↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kʋlɩnbiɛ. La bõn-sɛka woo tɩ fʋ wʋn lʋ dũnia wã zuo, bõn-ẽŋa wʋn lʋ Nawẽnnɛ yire. La bõn-sɛka woo tɩ fʋ wʋn lorge dũnia wã zuo, bõn-ẽŋa wʋn lorge Nawẽnnɛ yire."
40016020	Azezi yele bɛla dee kã'an a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra tɩ ẽŋa de la Krisi.
40016021	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan pↄsɛ zãsna a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ tẽŋa la kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma ka nãmsɛ mam halɩ zozo'e, la ba wʋn kʋ mam mɛ. La dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge."
40016022	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tarɩ ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, da le tↄgɛ bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn gu fo, la kãn ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛla."
40016023	Tɩ Azezi gelge yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Lebe mam poorʋm, Asũtãana wã. Fõn boorɩ tɩ fʋ botɩ mam lebe la poorʋm. Fʋ tẽ'esgↄ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgↄ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgↄ."
40016024	Dee yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a dↄla mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
40016025	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
40016026	La nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia wã sɛla woo, dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm? Sɛla ka boe tɩ nẽra wʋn dɩkɛ teege vↄm.
40016027	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am mɛ la a Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma. La wakat-ẽŋa a wʋn yↄ nẽra woo masɛ la a tõonɛ.
40016028	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n sẽm, la a na'am."
40017001	Dabsa ayoobɩ n daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la a yɩbga Azã doose ẽ sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo.
40017002	Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam, yẽgra wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa la. Tɩ a futo pelge halɩ wʋ peelem na.
40017003	Tɩ Amoyisi la A'eli puke ba zẽ'am tↄgra la Azezi.
40017004	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Fʋ sãn bↄↄra, mam wʋn tı̃ põnsɩ batã, bↄ fõn ayɩla, bↄ Amoyisi ayɩla, bↄ A'eli ayɩla."
40017005	La ẽn nãn ken bↄna mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ sawatɛ n yẽgrɩ wa'am wa lile ba. Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, a paagɛ la mam yɛm. Selse-ya a yetↄga."
40017006	La a karẽnbiisi la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba zozo'e, tɩ ba lui dɩkɛ nẽnsɩ võglɛ tẽŋa.
40017007	Tɩ Azezi lɛm kalʋm ba yetɩ: "Isge-ya, da zoe-ya dabeem."
40017008	Tɩ ba gorge bɩsɛ, ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a.
40017009	La ban daan ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra la, Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da yele-ya nẽra sɛla tɩ ya yẽ wã, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ dee vo'oge."
40017010	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli wʋn dẽŋɛ Krisi wa'am?"
40017011	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la sɩra tɩ A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa le malgɛ sɛla woo.
40017012	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ ẽ, dee ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em. Ba mẽ wʋn nãmsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la bɛla."
40017013	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yãŋa bãŋɛ tɩ la de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na yelle tɩ a tↄgɛ.
40017014	Ban daan lebe ka paara nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la zẽ'am na, tɩ bʋraa wa'am wa yigle Azezi nẽŋam,
40017015	yele ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, zoe m dayʋa ninbãalga, a luti la kinki'ire tɩ la nãmsra ẽ zozo'e. La sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a luti la bugum pʋam, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam.
40017016	Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am fʋ karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am, la ba ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
40017017	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa. Mam wʋn bↄna la yãma, mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna? Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am."
40017018	La Azezi daan tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la mɛ, tɩ a yese dee basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa.
40017019	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am bãma mã'a, ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma ka yãŋɛ dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese?"
40017020	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Yan ka bↄ sɩra zo'oge la ı̃yã. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma n bↄ mam sɩra la, sãn ãna baa pɩka wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Vurge sẽŋɛ ke', la a wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛla. La sɛla ka boe tɩ ya kãn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ. ((
40017021	La de la pʋ'ʋsgↄ, la nõorlʋa mã'a tɩ ya wʋn yãŋɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽŋa buuri.))"
40017022	Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la lagɩm bↄna Galile, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum,
40017023	tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ." Ẽn yele bɛla la, tɩ ba sũure sã'am zozo'e.
40017024	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan paagɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋa, tɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba sẽŋɛ ka soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Ya karẽnsãama la yↄↄrɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la lampo mɛ bɩɩ?"
40017025	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, a yↄↄra." Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ kule yire, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, fõn tẽ'esrɩ tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma to'osrɩ ba lampo la ãndõma zẽ'am? Tẽŋa dõma zẽ'am bɩɩ, sɛba n de sãama la zẽ'am?"
40017026	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Sãama zẽ'am." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛla, tẽŋa la dõma nẽŋa ka boe mı̃.
40017027	La tõma n ka boorɩ tɩ tɩ sã'am ba sũure la ı̃yã, sẽŋɛ ka lobge zũmbãŋa mõgrɛ pʋam, fõn yõkɛ zũn-sɛka yiɛn na, fʋ ya'agɛ a nõorɛ, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ lag-kõbrɛ, dɩkɛ sẽŋɛ ka yↄ mam, la fõn ı̃yã."
40018001	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ karẽnbiisi la daan lɛm Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n de nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam?"
40018002	Tɩ Azezi wi bi-pɩka ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka,
40018003	dee yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya sãn ka teege yɛm ãna wʋ kↄma la, ya kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40018004	Bɛla, sɛka woo n sike a mẽŋa ãna wʋ bi-pɩka la, a wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40018005	La sɛka n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna, mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa.
40018006	La nẽra sãn botɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bↄ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
40018007	Toogo boe dũnia zuo, nẽrba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la ı̃yã. Dẽnɩ tɩ pã'asgↄ wa'am, la nẽr-sɛka n pã'asrɩ la wʋn yẽ toogo.
40018008	Fʋ nu'ugo bɩɩ fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, wige ba basɛ. Fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋↄ bɩɩ nã'a-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn tarɩ nu'usi bayi, la nãma bayi, dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bugum n ka kı̃ŋri pʋam.
40018009	La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ. Fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn tarɩ nini bayi, dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa."
40018010	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya da pↄ'ↄra kↄm-bãna wã baa ayɩla. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ba malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, boe mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam mɛ wakatɛ woo. ((
40018011	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ la nẽr-sɛba n bↄɩ la.))
40018012	Yãma tẽ'esrɩ la bẽm? Nẽra sãn tara piisi kↄbga, tɩ ayɩla bↄɩ, a kãn basɛ piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la kũnkũnne zuo tɩ ba ↄbra, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayɩla n bↄɩ la?
40018013	La mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a sãn yẽ ẽ, a sũure wʋn ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ la ayɩla la gãnna piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka bↄɩ la.
40018014	Ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ ãn na bɛla, a ka boorɩ tɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna ayɩla bↄɩ."
40018015	Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: "Fʋ sↄbia sãn ẽŋɛ be'em, sẽŋɛ ka yẽ ẽ fõn na ẽŋa mã'a, pa'alɛ ẽ a tuure la. A sãn sakɛ fʋ nõorɛ, fʋ to'oge ẽ basɛ.
40018016	La a sãn zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ la, fʋ doose nẽra ayɩla bɩɩ bayi sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am. Tɩ nẽrba bayi bɩɩ batã dɛna kaset-dõma yelle la mãalgↄ ı̃yã, wʋ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na.
40018017	La a sãn zagsɛ ka selse ba, fʋ yele wẽndeego la nẽrba. La a sãn zagsɛ ka selse wẽndeego la nẽrba, ya bɩsra ẽ wʋ nẽra n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ, bɩɩ tõon-be'ero dãana.
40018018	La mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya wʋn lʋ dũnia wã zuo, wʋn lʋ Nawẽnnɛ yire. La sɛla tɩ ya wʋn lorge dũnia wã zuo, wʋn lorge Nawẽnnɛ yire.
40018019	Mam ken yɛta ya tɩ nẽrba bayi sãn naagɛ nõorɛ dũnia wã zuo sose mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla, a wʋn ẽŋɛ bↄ ba.
40018020	La nẽrba bayi bɩɩ batã sãn lagsɛ taaba mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, mam boe la ba lɛ mɛ."
