40018021	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lɛm Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam sↄbia sãn ẽŋɛ mam be'em, nõorɛ wãne tɩ mam wʋn basɛ ẽ taalɛ? Nõorɛ ayopↄɩ bɩɩ?"
40018022	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka yetɩ nõorɛ ayopↄɩ mã'a, mam yetɩ nõorɛ pisyopↄɩ nõorɛ bʋyopↄɩ.
40018023	La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãna wʋ naba n boorɩ tɩ a tõntõnɩba geele a tõoma pa'alɛ ẽ.
40018024	La ẽn pↄsɛ bↄna mı̃ gɛɛla la, tɩ ba tarɩ nẽra ayɩla n di a sãnnɛ lig-kõba yʋ'ʋrɛ n de talã tʋspia wa'am.
40018025	La a daan ka tarɩ sɛla wʋn yↄ, tɩ a zuudãana la bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba koose ẽ, la a pↄga la a kↄma, la a lↄgrↄ wuu yↄ sãnnɛ na.
40018026	Tɩ tõntõnna la ka dũma tẽŋa a zuudãana la nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ sugri tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ sãnnɛ na wuu.
40018027	Tɩ a zuudãana la zoe a ninbãalga, basɛ sãnnɛ na, dee basɛ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ.
40018028	La tõntõn-ẽŋa n yesrɩ la, a tʋ'ʋsɛ la a tõntõn-tadãana n di a sãnnɛ lig-kõba yʋ'ʋrɛ n de deniye kↄbga, yõkɛ ẽ kẽkɛ a kõnkↄa, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Yↄ ma m sãnnɛ na.'
40018029	Tɩ a tõntõn-tadãana la ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ sugri tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ a sãnnɛ na.
40018030	Tɩ a zagsɛ, dee tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem yetɩ, a sãn ka yↄ ẽŋa a sãnnɛ na, a kãn yese.
40018031	La a tõntõn-taaba la n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ ba sũure sã'am zozo'e. Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ba zuudãana la zẽ'am ka yele ẽ sɛla n ẽŋɛ la wuu.
40018032	Tɩ zuudãana la botɩ ba wi ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Tõntõn-be'ego wã, sãn-sɛka wuu tɩ fõn di la, mam basɛ mɛ tɩ la ba'asɛ, fõn sose mam na ı̃yã.
40018033	La masɛ nɩ mɛ tɩ fʋ mẽ zoe fʋ tadãana la ninbãalga, wʋ mam n zoe fõn ninbãalga se'em na.'
40018034	La a zuudãana la sũure yı̃ige mɛ, tɩ a basɛ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem tɩ ba nãmsɛ ẽ halɩ tɩ a yↄ sãnnɛ na wuu.
40018035	Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ ya la bɛla, ya sãn ka basɛ ya sↄbiisi tõon-be'ero taalɛ la ya sũure wuu."
40019001	Azezi n daan tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yese Galile sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba.
40019002	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e doose ẽ, tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40019003	Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am a zẽ'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ bʋraa lebse a pↄga n wen ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛka woo mɛ bɩɩ?"
40019004	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la? Pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam na bʋraa la pↄka.
40019005	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ a yetɩ, bʋraaga basɛ a sↄ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pↄga, tɩ bãma bayi lebge ayɩla.
40019006	Bɛla, ba ka le dɛna nẽrba bayi, ba yãŋa lebge la ayɩla. Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba."
40019007	Tɩ Farisi dõma la soke ẽ yetɩ: "La bẽm ı̃yã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, bʋraa sãn yetɩ a lebse a pↄga, a bↄ ẽ pↄgdire lebsgo gõŋↄ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse?"
40019008	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algↄ la ı̃yã, tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ ya lebse ya pↄgba. Pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ, la yʋʋn ka ãn wãna.
40019009	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ, bʋraaga sãn lebse a pↄga tɩ la sãn dagna tɩ a gã la bʋraasɩ, a sãn le di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɛ la a tadãana pↄga."
40019010	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraaga la a pↄga yelle sãn dɛna bɛla, bʋraaga sãn ka di pↄka n sõɩ."
40019011	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "La dagɩ nẽrba wuu n wʋn yãŋɛ to'oge yetↄg-ẽna, sãn dagna sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sõŋɛ ba tɩ ba to'oge.
40019012	Nẽrba basɛba n boe tɩ ba dↄgɛ ba tɩ ba ãna wʋ ba fↄ ba mɛ na, ka dita pↄgsɩ. Tɩ nẽrba mẽ fↄ bʋraasɩ basɛba. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ı̃yã, tɩ sɛba mẽ ka dita pↄgsɩ. Sɛka n tã wʋn yãŋɛ to'oge yetↄg-ẽna, a to'oge."
40019013	Tɩ nẽrba tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.
40019014	Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ."
40019015	La a dɩkɛ la a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba, dee fõrgɛ.
40019016	Tɩ bʋraaga wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn tõm na tõon-sõŋↄ kãna yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
40019017	Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fʋ sↄkra ma sɛla n ãn sõŋa yelle? Nawẽnnɛ mã'a n ãn sõŋa. Fʋ sãn bↄↄra tɩ fʋ yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ, fʋ sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ a nõorɛ se'em na."
40019018	Tɩ a soke yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ yetↄg-bãna?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga, da zũ, da tↄgɛ põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto,
40019019	nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fʋ mẽŋa."
40019020	Tɩ budib-polle la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam põn sakra bõn-bãna wuu mɛ, bẽm n deege?"
40019021	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn bↄↄra tɩ fʋ masɛ sɛla woo pʋam, sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ bↄ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dↄla mam."
40019022	Budib-polle la n wõm bɛla la, a fõrgɛ mɛ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
40019023	Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ la tↄ mɛ bↄ bõntarsa tɩ a kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40019024	La mam le yɛta ya tɩ, la de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupı̃im yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
40019025	La a karẽnbiisi la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?"
40019026	Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba, dee yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ."
40019027	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ, dee dↄla fõn. Bẽm tɩ tõma wʋn yẽ?"
40019028	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ wakat-sɛka tɩ sɛla woo wʋn lebge paalsɩ la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n wʋn zı̃'ire a na'am bı̃mbı̃nne zuo la, yãma sɛba n dolɩ mam na mẽ wʋn zı̃'ire na'am bı̃mbı̃na pia la ayi zuto, di Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri pia la ayi la sarɩya.
40019029	La sɛba wuu n basɛ ba yiɛ, bɩɩ ba kẽendõma, la ba yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ ba sↄdõma, bɩɩ ba madõma, bɩɩ ba kↄma, bɩɩ ba vatↄ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, ba wʋn to'oge bãma n basɛ sɛla la nõorɛ kↄbga, dee yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ.
40019030	La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma zozo'e lebge nẽŋam dõma."
40020001	Azezi le yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ yidãana n yese bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ, sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ tõntõnɩba tɩ ba tõm a va'am.
40020002	La a tↄgɛ kʋ la tõntõnɩba la tɩ ẽŋa wʋn yↄ ba lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla daarɛ pʋam, dee tõm ba a va'am na tɩ ba ka tõm.
40020003	Tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa bɩ fẽe, tɩ a le yese yẽ nẽrba basɛba n ze da'am ka tõnna,
40020004	tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ya mẽ sẽŋɛ mam va'am na ka tõm, tɩ mam wʋn yↄ ya lan masɛ se'em.'
40020005	Tɩ ba isge sẽŋɛ va'am na. Tɩ a le yese wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, la wẽngɛlŋa le ẽŋɛ bɛla.
40020006	Tɩ a le yese wẽnnɛ n we'esɩ lua, le yẽ nẽrba basɛba n ze, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: 'Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma zɛ kalam daarɛ la wuu pʋam ka ɩta sɛla sɛla?'
40020007	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: 'Nẽra nẽra ka dɩkɛ tõma tõoma.' Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: 'Ya mẽ sẽŋɛ m va'am na ka tõm.'
40020008	Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ, tɩ va'am na dãana yele sɛka n bɩsrɩ a tõoma la yelle yetɩ: 'Wi tõntõnɩba la tɩ ba wa'am tɩ fʋ yↄ ba. Dẽŋɛ yↄ sɛba n sẽŋɛ poorʋm na ka paagɛ sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la.'
40020009	Tɩ sɛba n sẽŋɛ wẽnnɛ n we'esɩ lua la wuu to'ose lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla.
40020010	Tɩ sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la tẽ'esra tɩ bãma wʋn to'ose gãnna sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na. La ba wuu to'ose la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla wʋ sɛba n sẽŋɛ poorʋm na n to'ose se'em na.
40020011	La sɛba n dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ la n to'ose lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla la, ba yõnnɩ yidãana la mɛ,
40020012	yetɩ: 'Sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na tõm na karf-ayɩla mã'a, la fõn basɛ tɩ ba to'ose zõna la tõma sɛba n tõm halɩ daarɛ la wuu pʋam nãmsɛ la wʋntɛɛŋa la.'
40020013	Tɩ a lebe yele ba nẽra ayɩla yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, mam ka ẽŋɛ fʋ sɛla n ka masɛ. Tɩ tↄgɛ kʋ, tɩ fʋ sakɛ tɩ fõn wʋn to'oge la lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla.
40020014	To'oge fʋ yↄↄrↄ sẽŋɛ fõrgɛ. La de la mam n boorɩ tɩ m yↄ sɛba n wa'am poorʋm na zõna la fõn.
40020015	Mam ka tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ m dɩkɛ m bõnↄ ẽŋɛ sɛla tɩ mam boorɩ? Bɩɩ mam n ẽŋɛ sõŋa la ı̃yã tɩ fõn ɩta sũure?'
40020016	Bɛla, nẽŋam dõma wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma."
40020017	Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm welge a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mã'a, yele ba yetɩ:
40020018	"Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ ka ẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum, tɩ ba wʋn tↄgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ, a masɛ la kũm.
40020019	La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum, tɩ ba la ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa, dee ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ. La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge."
40020020	Tɩ Azebede pↄga daan doose la a dayↄↄsɩ paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam tɩ a sose ẽ tɩ a ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ ẽ.
40020021	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ fↄ?" Tɩ pↄka la lerge yetɩ: "Bↄ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, tɩ m dayↄↄsɩ bayi wã ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ zʋʋgↄ, tɩ ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ gↄbga."
40020022	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla. Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam wʋn nãmsɛ wã?" Tɩ ba yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla."
40020023	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ya wʋn sɩrɩ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam wʋn nãmsɛ la. La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zı̃'ire mam zʋʋgↄ bɩɩ mam gↄbga. Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bↄ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ la."
40020024	La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la ba tadãandõma bayi la.
40020025	Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu yetɩ: "Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
40020026	La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
40020027	La nẽr-sɛka n mẽ boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya yamŋa wʋ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la.
40020028	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bↄ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bↄ, dee dɩkɛ a vↄm bↄ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ."
40020029	Azezi daan ze'ele la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam yɛsra, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e dↄla ẽ.
40020030	Tɩ fↄↄsɩ bayi zẽa sore nõorʋm wõm tɩ Azezi n tollɩ, tɩ ba tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
40020031	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tãsɛ ba yetɩ, ba sı̃na. Tɩ ba malɩn tı̃i tↄgra gãnna bɛla yetɩ: "Zuudãana, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
40020032	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee wi ba, soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ ya?"
40020033	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma boorɩ la tɩ nini yẽta."
40020034	Tɩ Azezi zoe ba ninbãalga, kalʋm ba nini, tɩ ba nini na yẽta bilam mẽŋa, tɩ ba dↄla ẽ.
40021001	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm na Zerizalɛm, paagɛ tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betɩfaazɩ, Oliivi tãŋa sɩa. Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi
40021002	yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ bõŋ-yã'aŋa n lʋ zɛ la a biire, lorge-ya ẽ tarɩ ba wa'am wa bↄ ma.
40021003	Nẽra sãn yele ya se'ere, ya yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana la n boorɩ ba', tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ wa'am tↄtↄ."
40021004	La ẽŋɛ la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la n yʋʋn tↄgɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ.
40021005	A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Yele-ya Siyõ tẽŋa nẽrba yetɩ: 'Ya naba la n wãna n sẽm. A sike a mẽŋa bã la bõŋa, la a biire sẽna.' "
40021006	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi n yele ba se'em na,
40021007	tarɩ bõŋ-yã'aŋa la a biire wa'am, wa dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ ba zuto tɩ Azezi bã.
40021008	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ sɛba kↄ tɩɩsɩ võorↄ yɛrgɛ sore zuo.
40021009	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na wuu tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Ozaana, naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa. Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la. Ozaana! Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
40021010	Ban daan sẽnnɩ kẽ'era Zerizalɛm na, tẽŋa la wuu dãm mɛ, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna?"
40021011	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na."
40021012	Azezi daan kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra sɛba wuu n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ la, tɩ ba yɛsra, dee zã'agɛ sɛba n teerɩ ligri taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
40021013	Dee yele ba yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego.' La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgↄ zẽ'a."
40021014	Tɩ fↄↄsɩ, la wↄbsɩ wa'am a zẽ'am Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
40021015	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n yẽ tõon-yãlma la tɩ Azezi tõnnɩ, la kↄma n malɩn tı̃i tↄgra Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛta tɩ: "Ozaana! Pẽgɛ-ya naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa" la, ba sũure n daan yı̃ige.
40021016	Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn wõm ban yetɩ se'em na?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, mam wõm ya. Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la yetↄg-ẽna n yetɩ: 'Fõn botɩ kↄma, la bilɛɛsɩ n nã'asra fõn.' "
40021017	La Azezi basɛ ba bilam, dee sẽŋɛ la Betani ka gã'arɛ.
40021018	Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ Azezi lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
40021019	Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze sore nõorʋm, sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ, la a paagɛ yẽ la võorↄ mã'a. Tɩ a yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: "Fʋ kãn le malɩn wↄm biɛ." La bilam mẽŋa tɩ kẽnkãŋa la kʋɩ.
40021020	La a karẽnbiisi la n yẽ bɛla la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba yetɩ: "La ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ kẽnkãŋa wã darɛ kʋɩ wãna?"
40021021	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya sãn bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra dee ka sẽ'ena, ya mẽ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ wʋ mam n ẽŋɛ tɩ-ẽna se'em wã, la, la dagɩ bɛla mã'a, ya wʋn tã'agɛ yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam', la a wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla.
40021022	La ya sãn sose Nawẽnnɛ sɛla dee bↄ ẽ sɩra, ya wʋn to'oge."
40021023	Azezi daan kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma wa'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna? La ãne n bↄ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta?"
40021024	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.
40021025	Yele-ya ma, Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba?" Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
40021026	Tɩ mẽ ka tã wʋn yetɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ, dẽnɩ tɩ zↄta nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, ba wuu sakɛ tɩ Azã de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa."
40021027	Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka mi." Tɩ a mẽ yele ba yetɩ: "Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãna."
40021028	Azezi daan le yele ba yetɩ: "Pa'alɛ-ya ma yãma n tẽ'esrɩ se'em: Bʋraa n daan boe tarɩ a dayↄↄsɩ bayi, yele pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yetɩ: 'M dayʋa, sẽŋɛ ka tõm m va'am na zı̃na.'
40021029	Tɩ a dayʋa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Mam kãn sẽŋɛ.' Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ a teege yɛm sẽŋɛ.
40021030	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ a dayʋa bʋyi dãana la zẽ'am ka yele ẽŋa mẽ yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka tõm a va'am na. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, mam wʋn sẽŋɛ.' La a yele bɛla dee ka sẽŋɛ.
40021031	Bãma bayi, ãne n ẽŋɛ a sↄ la n boorɩ se'em na?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Pↄspↄsɩ dãana la." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la pↄg-yalsɩ dõma wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
40021032	Se'ere n soe la, Azã wa'am wa pa'alɛ ya la sore tɩ ya wʋn doose masɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, la ya ka bↄ ẽ sɩra. La lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la pↄg-yalsɩ dõma n bↄ ẽ sɩra. La baa yãma n yẽ bɛla la, ya ken ka teege yɛm bↄ ẽ sɩra."
40021033	Azezi daan le yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya makrɛ ayɩla. Yidãana ayɩla n daan kↄ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zↄnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra va'am na, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
40021034	Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, ka to'oge a viinye la biɛ wa bↄ ẽ.
40021035	Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yõgɛ tõntõnɩba la wẽ ayɩla, kʋ ayɩla, dee lobe ayẽma la kuga kʋ.
40021036	Tɩ a le tõm tõntõnɩba basɛba n zo'oge gãnna pↄspↄsɩ dõma la. Tɩ ba le ẽŋɛ bãma mẽ bɛla.
40021037	Tɩ a yãŋa tõm a mẽŋa dayʋa sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: 'Ẽna n de mam mẽŋa dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.'
40021038	La sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na n yẽ ẽ na, ba yele taaba yetɩ: 'Ẽna n wʋn wa sↄↄgɛ sↄna a sↄ bõntarsõm na. Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, dee tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnↄ.'
40021039	Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ ve'ege yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka kʋ ẽ.
40021040	Bɛla, va'am na dãana sãn wa'am, a wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na la wãne?"
40021041	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A wʋn nãmsɛ nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ bãna mɛ halɩ kʋ ba, dee dɩkɛ va'am na bↄ nẽr-sɛba n wʋn bↄ ẽ a viinye la biɛ ba go'osgo wakatɛ, tɩ ba bɩsra."
40021042	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la n yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa. La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bↄ tõma.'
40021043	Bɛla, mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn to'oge a so'olʋm ya zẽ'am dɩkɛ bↄ buur-sɛba n wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma. ((
40021044	La kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la, nẽr-sɛka woo n lui kug-ẽŋa zuo, a wʋn kↄ kↄ mɛ. La kugre la sãn lui sɛka zuo, a wʋn mẽrgɛ ẽ.))"
40021045	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Farisi dõma n wõm makrɛ la, ba bãŋɛ tɩ a tↄgrɩ la bãma yelle.
40021046	Tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, dee zↄta nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, ba sakɛ tɩ Azezi de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
40022001	Azezi daan le makɛ la makrɛ yele ba yetɩ:
40022002	"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ naba n ẽŋɛ a dayʋa pↄgdire kibsa,
40022003	tõm a tõntõnɩba yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ ka wi nẽr-sɛba tɩ ẽŋa daan wi la. Tɩ nẽrba la ka bↄↄra tɩ ba wa'am.
40022004	Tɩ a le tõm tõntõnɩba basɛba yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele sɛba tɩ mam daan wi la yetɩ, mam mãasʋm sɛla woo mɛ, mam kʋ la lↄlsɩ, la dũnsi n nõbɛ, mãasʋm sɛla woo ze'ele, ba wa'am kibsa la.'
40022005	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka wi ba, tɩ ba zagsɛ, dee sẽŋɛ ba sẽnnɛ. Tɩ ayɩla sẽŋɛ a va'am, tɩ ayẽma sẽŋɛ a koosgo zẽ'am.
40022006	Tɩ basɛba la yõgɛ tõntõnɩba la nãmsɛ ba dee kʋ ba.
40022007	Tɩ naba la sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a tõm a zɛbzɛbrɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka kʋ nẽr-kʋʋrba la, dee yõ ba tẽŋa la.
40022008	La a yele a tõntõnɩba la yetɩ: 'Kibsa la sɛla woo mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ, la mam n daan wi sɛba la ka masɛ tɩ ba di kibsa la.
40022009	Bɛla, sẽŋɛ-ya sorↄ-puursi zuto ka wi nẽr-sɛba wuu tɩ ya wʋn yẽ tɩ ba wa'am pↄgdire kibsa la zẽ'am.'
40022010	Tɩ tõntõnɩba la sẽŋɛ sorↄ-puursi zuto ka wi nẽr-sɛba wuu tɩ ba yẽ, nẽr-sõma la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ. Tɩ nẽrba wa'am wa pɩrɛ kibsa la zẽ'am.
40022011	Tɩ naba la sẽŋɛ tɩ a bɩsɛ nẽrba la, yẽ tɩ nẽra n boe mı̃ ka yɛ pↄgdire kibsa la fuugo.
40022012	Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, la ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ fõn wa'am kibsa la, dee ka yɛ a fuugo?' Tɩ a ka yãŋɛ lerge se'ere.
40022013	Tɩ naba la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ, ba lʋ a nu'usi, la a nãma lobe ẽ basɛ yẽŋa lika pʋam. Bilam tɩ nẽrba wʋn ka kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
40022014	La de la nẽrba pãɩ tɩ ba wi, la fẽe tɩ ba tũ'use."
40022015	Tɩ Farisi dõma sẽŋɛ ka bãm bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em botɩ Azezi tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.
40022016	Bɛla tɩ ba daan tõm ba karẽnbiisi, la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra. Fõn ka fablɩ nẽrba n tↄgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, la fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba.
40022017	Yele to fõn tẽ'esrɩ se'em. Sore boe tɩ tɩ yↄ lampo bↄ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe?"
40022018	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba pʋtẽ'e-be'ero la, yele ba yetɩ: "Pʋlibsum dõma wã, bẽm tɩ ya bẽta mam?
40022019	Pa'alɛ-ya ma lag-sɛka tɩ ba tarɩ yↄↄra lampo la." Tɩ ba dɩkɛ lag-kõbrɛ pa'alɛ ẽ.
40022020	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?"
40022021	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la Rom na-keko la." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, bↄ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka."
40022022	Ban wõm bɛla la, tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
40022023	Daar-ẽŋa tɩ Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ:
40022024	"Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ, bʋraaga sãn ki dee ka tara bia, a sↄbia di pↄkõorɛ la dↄgɛ kↄma bↄ sɛka n ki la.
40022025	Bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n daan boe tõma pʋam dɛna sↄbiisi, tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la di pↄka ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia.
40022026	Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pↄkõorɛ la mẽ ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla, la bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu ẽŋɛ la bɛla.
40022027	Tɩ pↄka la mẽ yãŋa ki.
40022028	Bɛla, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bãma bayopↄɩ la pʋam, ãne n wʋn sↄna pↄka la, bãma wuu n lagɩm di ẽ na?"
40022029	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em võorɛ, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ı̃yã.
40022030	Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pↄgsɩ, la pↄgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba. Ba wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.
40022031	La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n yele ya a gõŋↄ la pʋam se'em yetɩ:
40022032	'Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ Nawẽnnɛ' na? La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vↄa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la nẽr-sɛba n vↄa Nawẽnnɛ."
40022033	Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n daan wõm a zãsŋↄ la, la di'ige ba mɛ.
40022034	Farisi dõma n daan wõm tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma, tɩ ba ka le tã'agɛ ya'agɛ nõorɛ la, tɩ ba lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
40022035	Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla n de lↄↄ karẽnsãama bↄↄra tɩ a di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ:
40022036	"Karẽnsãama, Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ wuu?"
40022037	Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: " 'Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu.'
40022038	Ẽna n de Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la pↄspↄsɩ dãana, ẽŋa n gãnnɩ wuu.
40022039	La bʋyi dãana n ãn wʋ ẽŋa n wãna n yetɩ: 'Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.'
40022040	Amoyisi lↄↄ la wuu, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ sɛla la wuu boe la nõ-bãma bayi pʋam."
40022041	Farisi dõma n lagsɛ taaba la, tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ:
40022042	"Yãma tẽ'esrɩ la bẽm la Krisi yelle: Ãne yɩɩŋa n de ẽ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa."
40022043	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "La ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa daan botɩ Adavidi wi ẽ tɩ Zuudãana yetɩ:
40022044	'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba tɩ ba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.'
40022045	Adavidi sãn wi ẽ yetɩ, Zuudãana, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?"
40022046	Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka yãŋɛ lerge ẽ se'ere. Lan pↄsɛ daar-ẽŋa, nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
40023001	Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ, la a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
40023002	"Lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma n sↄↄgɛ Amoyisi zẽ'a.
40023003	Bɛla, ban zãsnɩ ya se'em na, ya ɩta bɛla, dee da ɩta bãma n ɩtɩ se'em na. Se'ere n soe la, bãma n zãsnɩ se'em na, ba ka ɩtɩ bɛla.
40023004	Ba zãsŋↄ la ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ba lʋ zelge nẽrba, la ba mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ba kalʋm ba la ba nu'ubiire.
40023005	Ba tõnnɩ ba tõoma la wuu tɩ nẽrba n bɩsra ba, bɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ gãna gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga ba pʋam dɩkɛ lʋ ba dı̃a bɩɩ ba kẽnkãnsɩ. Dee pɛ fu-wogro ẽŋɛ bisa tɩ ba wↄgɛ tɩ nẽrba nã'asra ba.
40023006	Ba nõŋɛ la nã'asgↄ zẽ'esɩ dia zẽ'esʋm, la ba wẽndeto pʋam.
40023007	Ba nõŋɛ tɩ nẽrba n pʋ'ʋsra ba da'asɩ pʋam, dee bↄↄra tɩ ba wi'ira ba yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama.'
40023008	La yãma da basɛ tɩ ba wi'ira ya tɩ karẽnsãama. Se'ere n soe la, yãma tarɩ la karẽnsãama ayɩla mã'a, la ya wuu de la sↄbiisi la taaba.
40023009	Da wi'ira-ya nẽra tɩ sↄ dũnia wã zuo Nawẽnnɛ sore la doosgo ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, ya tarɩ la Sↄ ayɩla mã'a n boe saazuum.
40023010	La ya da basɛ tɩ nẽra wi'ira ya tɩ nẽŋadãana. Se'ere n soe la, ya tarɩ la nẽŋadãana ayɩla mã'a n de Krisi.
40023011	Sɛka n de nẽr-keko ya pʋam, a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
40023012	Sɛka n zẽkɛ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ. La sɛka n sike a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ.
40023013	Yãma Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma gu'uri la nẽrba tɩ ba da kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam. Ya ka kẽ'erɩ ya mẽŋa, dee mẽ ka basra nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba kẽ la sore tɩ ba kẽ. ((
40023014	Yãma Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya to'osrɩ la pↄkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ya. Ya wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu.))
40023015	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya kaarɩ la dũnia zẽ'esɩ wuu ɛɛra tɩ ya yẽ nẽra ayɩla tɩ a sakɛ dↄla ya sore la. La ya sãn yẽ nẽra ayɩla, ya basɛ tɩ a lebge la tõon-be'ero dãana gãnna ya mẽŋa nõorɛ ayi, wʋn sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa.
40023016	Yãma sɛba n de nẽŋadõma de la fↄↄsɩ, ya wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, yãma yetɩ, nẽra sãn pↄɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, la de la zãŋa. La sɛka sãn pↄɩ sãlma la n boe Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam na, dẽnɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽn pↄɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em na.
40023017	Yãma ka wõnnɩ sɛla võorɛ, dee ãna wʋ fↄↄsɩ la. Bẽm n gãnnɩ? Sãlma la bɩɩ, Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n botɩ sãlma la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ na n gãnnɩ?
40023018	Ya ken yetɩ, nẽra sãn pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na, la de la zãŋa. La nẽra sãn pↄɩ sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ bı̃ŋe bı̃mbı̃nne na zuo la, dẽnɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ ẽn pↄɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em na.
40023019	Fↄↄsɩ, bẽm n gãnnɩ? Sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ la bɩɩ, kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na n botɩ sɛla tɩ ba dɩkɛ kãabɛ la dɛna Nawẽnnɛ tʋʋlʋm bõnↄ na n gãnnɩ?
40023020	Bɛla, sɛka n pↄɩ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na, a po pↄɩ la sɛla n boe a zuo la wuu.
40023021	La sɛka n pↄɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, a po pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ n boe mı̃ na.
40023022	La sɛka n pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ yire, a pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am bı̃mbı̃nne na, la sɛka n zı̃ a zuo la.
40023023	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma bↄ'ↄrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, dee basra yel-sɛba n de kãŋkãŋɛ lↄↄ la pʋam na, ka ɩta. La de la sɛla n masɛ, la ninbãal-zʋa, la sakrɛ. La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
40023024	Yãma nẽŋadõma de la fↄↄsɩ, yãma yoorɩ ya bõn-yũula mɛ yɛsra lislima basra, dee vↄlla yʋgma.
40023025	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Yãma peerɩ ya laasɩ, la ya wama pↄa mɛ tɩ ba ãna sõŋa, dee tɩ ba pʋam pɩrɛ la nayigum, la be'ero bõnↄ.
40023026	Yãma Farisi dõma, ya de la fↄↄsɩ! Peege-ya ya laasɩ la pʋam pↄspↄsɩ, tɩ ba poore la mẽ wʋn ãna sõŋa.
40023027	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, yãma ãn wʋ yↄↄrↄ tɩ ba takɛ tɩ ba zuum pelge ãna sõŋa sõŋa, dee tɩ ba pʋam pɩrɛ la kõba, la põ'osgↄ wuu.
40023028	Yãma mẽ ãn na bɛla. Yãma botɩ nẽrba bɩsra ya tɩ ya ãna wʋ nẽrba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, dee tɩ ya pʋam pɩrɛ la pʋlibsum, la tõon-be'ero.
40023029	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma, pʋlibsum dõma wã, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Ya mẽtɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yↄↄrↄ, dee malgra nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ yↄↄrↄ tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
40023030	Dee yetɩ, yãma daan sãn boe nɩ yãma yaabdõma wakatɛ la, yãma daan kãn po lagɩm na ba kʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la.
40023031	Ya mẽŋa n bↄ'ↄrɩ ya mẽŋa kaseto tɩ yãma de la sɛba n yʋʋn kʋ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la yɩɩsɩ.
40023032	Tↄ. Ken sẽŋɛ-ya nẽŋa ẽŋɛ ya yaabdõma la n daan ẽŋɛ sɛla la ba'asɛ.
40023033	Bõnsɛ'ɛdõma wã! Kãmpẽesɩ buuri! Yãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne põsɛ sarɩyadia tɩ ba kãn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa?
40023034	Bɛla tɩ mam yɛta ya tɩ mam wʋn tõm m nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la yɛm dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma. La ya wʋn kʋ sɛba, dee ka basɛba dↄ-puursi zuto kʋ, wẽ sɛba la ka'asa ya wẽndeto pʋam, dee dↄla ba nãma tẽŋa tẽŋa nãmsra ba.
40023035	Bɛla tɩ pʋpeelem dõma la wuu tɩ ba kʋ dũnia zuo la taalɛ wʋn bↄna ya zuto, lan pↄsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa halɩ wa paagɛ Abarakɩ dayʋa Azakari tɩ ya kʋ Wẽnde-kãtɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ, la kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne na tẽŋasʋka la.
40023036	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna taalɛ wʋn bↄna zamãan-ẽna nẽrba wuu zuto."
40023037	Azezi daan yetɩ: "Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, dee lↄbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am na kuga kʋʋra. Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kↄma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bↄↄra.
40023038	Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa la tɩ a lebge la daboto.
40023039	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le malɩn yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: 'Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.' "
40024001	Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam yese fõrgra. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lɛm ẽ pa'alɛ ẽ tɩ a bɩsɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la n mẽ sõŋa se'em.
40024002	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma yẽ bõn-bãna wã wuu? Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam, tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo."
40024003	La a daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la mã'a sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yele to wakat-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ, la sɛla n wʋn pa'alɛ fõn lemŋo, la dũnia ba'asgↄ wakatɛ."
40024004	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
40024005	Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: 'Mam n de Krisi la.' La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
40024006	Ya wʋn wa wõm zɛbrɛ yelle, la zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ. La da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem tarɩ ya. Dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ, la, la nãn dagɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ.
40024007	Buuri ayɩla nẽrba wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma nẽrba, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma, la kↄm, la tẽn-mı̃iŋo wʋn bↄna zẽ'esɩ zozo'e.
40024008	La bõn-bãma nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pↄka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.
40024009	Ba wʋn yõgɛ ya mɛ tarɩ ka bↄ tɩ ba nãmsɛ ya, kʋ ya, la buuri wuu wʋn sisra ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã.
40024010	Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn basɛ sɩra sore, dee ɩta taaba zãmↄ, dee sisra taaba.
40024011	La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn isge parɩm yetɩ bãma de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba pã'asɛ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba tuuge.
40024012	Tõon-be'ero wʋn wa pa'asɛ mɛ halɩ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e nõŋrɛ ba'asɛ.
40024013	La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
40024014	Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga wʋn mõolɛ dũnia wuu mɛ, tɩ buuri wuu wõm, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ yãŋa paagɛ.
40024015	Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Adanɩyɛlɩ yʋʋn tↄgɛ a yelle la, tɩ a boe Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la." Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.
40024016	"Ya sãn wa yẽ bɛla, nẽr-sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuto.
40024017	La nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ da sige bↄↄra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
40024018	La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
40024019	Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bↄ pↄg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa, la sɛba n tarɩ kↄma tɩ ba mõgra la.
40024020	Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ ya zʋa la wakatɛ da dɛna ↄↄrↄ wakatɛ, bɩɩ vo'osgo daarɛ.
40024021	Se'ere n soe la, wakat-ẽŋa, la wʋn dɛna la toogo halɩ zozo'e tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ dũnia n pı̃'ilum wa paam wakat-ẽŋa, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
40024022	Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra nẽra ka boe n wʋn põsɛ. La nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la ı̃yã tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
40024023	La nẽr-sɛka sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi la boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', ya da sakɛ.
40024024	Nẽrba wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tõnna tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bↄↄra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge.
40024025	Mam dẽŋɛ yele ya mɛ tɩ la nãn ka paam.
40024026	Bɛla, ba sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la weem', da sẽŋɛ-ya. Bɩɩ, ba sãn yetɩ: 'A boe la deem', ya da sakɛ.
40024027	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ dapoore bↄba nẽegɛ ka paagɛ zanõa bↄba la.
40024028	Bõn-kɩ'ɩsɩ n boe zẽ'e-sɛka la, zõa lagsrɩ taaba la bilam."
40024029	"Toogo dabsa la poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem, tɩ wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui. La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mı̃im mɛ.
40024030	La sɛla n pa'alɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo la wʋn puke saazuum. Tɩ dũnia nẽrba buuri wuu wʋn kaasra fabla. La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãŋa, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ zozo'e.
40024031	La a wʋn tõm na a malɛkadõma, tɩ benkonne peebe, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia zʋʋgↄ, la gↄbga, la dapoore, la zanõrɛ ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la, halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu.
40024032	Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋↄ la võorɛ. Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võ-paala, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
40024033	Bɛla, ya mẽ sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
40024034	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wuu wʋn ɩta mɛ, dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
40024035	Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetↄga la kãn malɩn tole.
40024036	Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am, baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
40024037	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ n yʋʋn ãn se'em na.
40024038	Se'ere n soe la, lan dẽŋɛ sã'aŋↄ sa-kãtɛ la, nẽrba yʋʋn diti mɛ dee yũura, tɩ bʋraasɩ dita pↄgsɩ, tɩ pↄgsɩ ɛlla sɩrba, dee tara ba pↄyↄↄsɩ sɩɩra, halɩ wa paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Anoe kẽ õorŋ-kãtɛ la pʋam na.
40024039	Ba yʋʋn ka bãŋɛ tɩ yelle boe, halɩ tɩ saaga wa ni, tɩ ko'om pe'ege nẽrba la wuu. La mẽ wʋn ãna la bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo wakatɛ.
40024040	Daar-ẽŋa bʋraasɩ bayi wʋn bↄna va'am, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
40024041	Tɩ pↄgsɩ bayi wʋn bↄna nẽerʋm, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
40024042	Bɛla, guuse ya mẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi daar-sɛka tɩ ya Zuudãana la wʋn leme wa'am.
40024043	Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina nayiga n wʋn wa'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ wakat-sɛka wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ, a kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
40024044	Bɛla, mãasʋm-ya gu'ura, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ ya ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na."
40024045	Azezi le yetɩ: "Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋↄ n tarɩ yɛm? La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bↄ'ↄra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
40024046	Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele ẽ se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
40024047	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bↄ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
40024048	La a sãn dɛna tõntõn-be'ego, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna,
40024049	yãŋa wẽ'era a tõntõn-taaba la, dita dee yũura la dã-yũuriba,
40024050	a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ.
40024051	La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na pʋlibsum dõma yẽ sɩbgrɛ. Zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm."
40025001	Azezi ken yetɩ: "Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wʋn ãna wʋ pug-sarsɩ pia n dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma yese sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka tʋ'ʋsɛ pↄgdita.
40025002	Banuu ka tarɩ yɛm, dee tɩ banuu dɛna yɛm dõma.
40025003	Tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ yɛm na dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma, dee ka dɩkɛ kaam pa'asɛ.
40025004	La sɛba n tarɩ yɛm na dɩkɛ ba fɩtladõma mɛ, dee dɩkɛ kaam pa'asɛ.
40025005	Tɩ pↄgdita la yuuge ka sẽna, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba wuu gı̃se.
40025006	Tɩ sõnsʋa, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagurga yetɩ: 'Pↄgdita la sẽm mɛ, isge-ya yese tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.'
40025007	Tɩ pug-sarsɩ la wuu nẽegɛ malgɛ ba fɩtladõma.
40025008	Tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ yɛm na, yele yɛm dõma la yetɩ: 'Pʋrgɛ-ya ya kaam na bↄ tↄ, tɩ tõma fɩtladõma la kı̃ŋri mɛ.'
40025009	Tɩ yɛm dõma la lerge yetɩ: 'Ayɛɩ, tõma sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, kaam na kãn seke tõma, la yãma. Sẽŋɛ-ya ka-kↄↄsrɩba la zẽ'am ka da ya mẽŋa bõnↄ.'
40025010	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka da, dee tɩ pↄgdita la paam, tɩ banuu la n mãasʋm kɩ'ɩlɩm na doose pↄgdita la kẽ pↄgdire la zẽ'am, dee tɩ ba yʋ zanõrɛ.
40025011	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pug-sarsɩ banuu la n weege la wa'am wa wi'ira yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, zuudãana, yo'oge bↄ tↄ.'
40025012	Tɩ pↄgdita la lerge yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam ka mi ya.'
40025013	Bɛla, guuse ya mẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi daar-sɛka bɩɩ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am."
40025014	"Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ken ãna wʋ bʋraaga n boorɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ sore, wi a tõntõnɩba dɩkɛ a bõntarsõm pʋɩ ba tɩ ba bɩsra.
40025015	A bↄ tõntõnna ayɩla la talã banuu, bↄ ayɩla talã bayi, dee bↄ ayɩla talã ayɩla. A bↄ nẽra woo masɛ la ẽn wʋn tã'agɛ se'em tõm, dee sẽŋɛ.
40025016	Tɩ nẽr-sɛka n to'oge talã banuu la darɛ tõm yẽ yõorↄ talã banuu pa'asɛ.
40025017	Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã bayi la mẽ tõm yẽ talã bayi pa'asɛ.
40025018	La sɛka n to'oge talã ayɩla la sẽŋɛ ka tũ la boko pı̃ a zuudãana ligri la.
40025019	Tɩ la yuuge, tɩ tõntõnɩba la zuudãana la leme kulum, wa yele ba tɩ ba geele bãma n tõm se'em.
40025020	Tɩ sɛka n daan to'oge talã banuu la, tarɩ talã banuu la tɩ a yẽ pa'asɛ la wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn daan bↄ mam na talã banuu, mam tõm yẽ la talã banuu pa'asɛ, ban wãna.'
40025021	Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'La ãn sõŋa. Fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋↄ n de sɩra dãana. Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la sɛla fẽe tɩ mam bↄ fʋ la ı̃yã, mam wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna bõnↄ zozo'e bɩsra. Wa'am wa naagɛ la mam ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
40025022	Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã bayi la mẽ wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn daan bↄ mam na talã bayi, mam tõm yẽ la talã bayi pa'asɛ, ban wãna.'
40025023	Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'La ãn sõŋa. Fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋↄ n de sɩra dãana. Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la sɛla fẽe tɩ mam bↄ fʋ la ı̃yã, mam wʋn basɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna bõnↄ zozo'e bɩsra. Wa'am wa naagɛ la mam ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
40025024	Tɩ sɛka n to'oge talã ayɩla la wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, mam mi tɩ fõn de la nẽra yelle n tↄɩ. Fõn lagsrɩ la bõnkↄↄla sɛba tɩ fõn ka bʋrɛ, dee vaara bõn-sɛba tɩ fõn ka yɛrgɛ.
40025025	Bɛla tɩ mam zoe dabeem dɩkɛ fʋ ligri la sẽŋɛ ka tũ boko pı̃. Fʋ bõnↄ n wãna, to'oge.'
40025026	Tɩ a zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Tõntõn-be'ego wã, fʋ de la zẽyãka. Fõn mi tɩ mam lagsrɩ la bõnkↄↄla sɛba tɩ mam ka bʋrɛ, dee vaara bõn-sɛba tɩ mam ka yɛrgɛ la,
40025027	bɛla, la de nɩ na fʋ dɩkɛ m ligri la bı̃ŋe bãnkɩ pʋam, tɩ mam sãn leme wa'am, m to'oge m ligri la, la yõorↄ.'
40025028	A yele bɛla dee yetɩ: 'To'oge-ya a talã la bↄ sɛka n tarɩ talã pia la.
40025029	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ, a wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ tɩ la zo'oge. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, baa sɛla fẽe tɩ a tarɩ la, ba wʋn to'oge ẽ.
40025030	La tõntõn-sɛka n ka tarɩ yõorↄ la, lobe-ya ẽ basɛ yẽŋa lika pʋam. Zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn kɛlla, dee dɩkɛ ba nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.' "
40025031	"Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sãn leme wa'am la a na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma wuu, a wʋn zı̃'ire la a na'am bı̃mbı̃nne zuo.
40025032	Tɩ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nẽrba wʋn lagsɛ a nẽŋam, tɩ a welge nẽrba la yẽma yẽma wʋ dũnsı̃ina n welgrɩ a piisi, la a bʋʋsɩ se'em na.
40025033	La a wʋn ze'ele piisi la a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, dee ze'ele bʋʋsɩ a gↄbga bↄba.
40025034	Tɩ naba la wʋn yele sɛba n boe a zʋʋgↄ la yetɩ: 'Wa'am-ya, yãma sɛba n tarɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ na. To'oge-ya so'olʋm na tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan põn mãasʋm tɩ a bↄ ya halɩ lan dẽŋɛ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo la.
40025035	Se'ere n soe la, mam kↄm daan dõnnɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma bↄ mam dia. Koyũuro daan tarɩ mam mɛ, tɩ yãma bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam yũ. Mam daan de la sãana, tɩ yãma to'oge mam.
40025036	Mam daan de la beele, tɩ yãma bↄ mam futo tɩ mam yɛ. Mam daan bẽ'erɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma wa'am wa bɩsɛ mam, la mam daan boe la yʋ'a deem, tɩ yãma wa'am mam zẽ'am.'
40025037	La nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ la wʋn lerge yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, la de la wakat-kãna tɩ tõma yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn kↄm dõnnɩ, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn dia? Bɩɩ koyũuro tarɩ fõn, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn ko'om?
40025038	La wakat-kãna tɩ tõma yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn dɛna sãana, tɩ tõma to'oge fõn? Bɩɩ fõn de beele, tɩ tõma bↄ fõn futo tɩ fõn yɛ?
40025039	La wakat-kãna tɩ fõn bẽ'erɩ, tɩ tõma wa'am wa bɩsɛ fõn, bɩɩ fõn boe yʋ'a deem, tɩ tõma wa'am fõn zẽ'am?'
40025040	Tɩ naba la wʋn lerge ba yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma n daan ẽŋɛ sɛla wuu bↄ mam nẽrba la, baa la sãn dɛna la nẽr-pɩka ayɩla tɩ ya ẽŋɛ bↄ, la de la mam tɩ ya bↄ.'
40025041	La a wʋn yele sɛba n boe a gↄbga bↄba la yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya fõrgɛ, Nawẽnnɛ kã'a-be'ego boe ya zuo. Sẽŋɛ-ya ka kẽ bugum n ka kı̃ŋri tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm tɩ a kẽ'esɛ Asũtãana, la a malɛkadõma la pʋam.
40025042	Se'ere n soe la, mam kↄm daan dõnnɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam dia. Tɩ koyũuro daan tara mam, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam yũ.
40025043	Mam daan de la sãana, tɩ yãma ka to'oge mam. Mam daan de la beele, tɩ yãma ka bↄ mam futo tɩ mam yɛ. Mam daan bẽ'erɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma ka wa'am wa bɩsɛ mam. Mam daan boe la yʋ'a deem, tɩ yãma ka wa'am mam zẽ'am.'
40025044	La ba wʋn lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, la de la wakat-kãna tɩ tõma daan yẽ fõn, tɩ fõn kↄm dõnnɩ, bɩɩ koyũuro tarɩ fõn, bɩɩ fõn de sãana, bɩɩ beele, bɩɩ fõn bẽ'erɩ, bɩɩ fõn boe yʋ'a deem, dee tɩ tõma ka sõŋɛ fõn?'
40025045	Tɩ a wʋn lerge ba yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma n daan ka ɩtɩ bɛla bↄ'ↄra mam nẽrba la, baa la sãn dɛna la nẽr-pɩka ayɩla tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ bↄ ẽ, la de la mam tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ bↄ.'
40025046	La bãma wʋn sẽŋɛ ka kẽ nãmsgↄ n ka ba'asrɩ pʋam. La sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ la wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ."
40026001	Azezi n daan tↄgɛ yetↄg-bãma wuu kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
40026002	"Yãma mi tɩ la deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa paagɛ, tɩ ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka bↄ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ."
40026003	Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ la taaba Akayifu yire. Akayifu daan de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la nẽŋadãana.
40026004	Ba daan tↄgɛ la taaba kʋ yetɩ, ba ẽŋɛ yɛm yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
40026005	La ba yetɩ: "Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa la pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ."
40026006	Azezi daan boe la Betani tẽŋa, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne na yire.
40026007	Tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ dita, tɩ pↄka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge, wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
40026008	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yẽ bɛla, tɩ ba sũure sã'am. Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ a sã'am kaam na wãna?
40026009	Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose kaam wã ligri zo'oge mɛ, dɩkɛ bↄ nasdõma."
40026010	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgↄ la, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ tɩ ya tↄgra pↄka la tɩ a sũure sã'am? Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ mam na de la tõon-sõŋↄ.
40026011	Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, la mam kãn bↄna la ya wakatɛ wuu.
40026012	Ẽŋa n ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ mam zuo la, a ẽŋɛ la ba wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
40026013	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tↄgɛ pↄka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle."
40026014	Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, daan sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am
40026015	ka yele ba yetɩ: "Ya wʋn bↄ mam na bẽm, tɩ m pa'alɛ ya sore tɩ ya yõkɛ Azezi?" Tɩ ba bↄ ẽ lig-kõba pitã.
40026016	La pↄsɛ la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a ɛɛra sore tɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
40026017	Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pↄspↄsɩ daarɛ, tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?"
40026018	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam Abõnↄ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, ẽŋa wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, la de la fõn yire tɩ ẽŋa wʋn di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la, la a karẽnbiisi.' "
40026019	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la ẽŋɛ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la.
40026020	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ yire la pʋam ka zẽa dita.
40026021	Ban daan dita la, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam."
40026022	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sũure sã'am halɩ, tɩ ba sↄkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la mam bɩɩ?"
40026023	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na, la de la ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam.
40026024	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ la yʋʋn põn gʋlsɛ a yelle se'em Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo. Nẽr-ẽŋa ma daan sãn ka dↄgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ."
40026025	Tɩ Azudaasɩ n de nẽr-sɛka n daan wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, la de la mam bɩɩ?" Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yele la bɛla."
40026026	Ban daan boe mı̃ dita la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "To'oge-ya di. Ẽna de la mam ı̃yã."
40026027	Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bↄ ba yetɩ: "To'oge-ya ya wuu yũ.
40026028	Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ı̃yã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ la ba tɩ a basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
40026029	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ, mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le naagɛ la ya yũ ba mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
40026030	Tɩ ba daan yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
40026031	Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam zı̃na yʋ'ʋŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsı̃ina, dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.' "
40026032	La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile."
40026033	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Baa bãna wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn malɩn basɛ fõn."
40026034	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zı̃na yʋ'ʋŋↄ wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam."
40026035	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele yetɩ: "Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn." Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
40026036	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Getsemane, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Zı̃'ire-ya kalam, dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ nẽŋa ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ."
40026037	La Azezi tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ bayi la sẽŋɛ. Tɩ a sũure sã'am halɩ zozo'e, tɩ a palẽŋa ẽgra.
40026038	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-sã'aŋↄ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ la ãna wʋ mam yetɩ m ki mɛ na. Weege-ya kalam gu'ura mam, da gı̃se-ya."
40026039	La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe ka võglɛ a nẽŋa tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "M Sↄ, la sãn tãna, fʋ basɛ tɩ nãmsgↄ ẽna tole dee basɛ ma. La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em."
40026040	La a lebe a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am ka yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ. Tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Yãma ka tã'agɛ naagɛ la mam gu karf-ayɩla mã'a ka gı̃se?
40026041	Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui. Ya sɩa boorɩ mɛ, la ya ı̃yã la ka tarɩ pãŋa."
40026042	La a daan le lebe mɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ yetɩ: "M Sↄ, nãmsgↄ wã sãn ka tãna wʋn tole dee basɛ mam, la sãn dɛna tɩ mam nãmsɛ, basɛ tɩ fõn boorɩ se'em ẽŋɛ."
40026043	La a le lebe a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am ka yẽ tɩ ba le gı̃sra mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n daan ba tara ba.
40026044	Tɩ a basɛ ba, dee le lebe nõorɛ atã pʋam ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tↄgɛ yetↄg-bãma mẽŋa.
40026045	Dee leme wa'am a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am wa soke ba yetɩ: "Ya gı̃sri mɛ dee vↄ'ↄsra? Wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
40026046	Isge-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ. Sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna n sẽm."
40026047	Azezi n daan ken tↄgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e sẽŋɛ paam. Ba daan tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ la dↄa. La de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n daan tõm ba.
40026048	La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn pa'alɛ ba mɛ yetɩ: "Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kↄkɛ ẽ na, la de la ẽŋa, yõkɛ-ya ẽ."
40026049	La ẽn paam na, a sẽŋɛ mɛ tↄtↄ lɛm Azezi, pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, zaanõorɛ", dee kↄkɛ ẽ.
40026050	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "M sɩrɛ, ẽŋɛ fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ se'em na." Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ Azezi.
40026051	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe la Azezi la, nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkↄbgↄ sɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
40026052	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lebse sũm fʋ sʋ'a la a fʋʋgↄ pʋam, se'ere n soe la, sɛba n zɛbrɩ la sʋ'ʋsɩ, sʋ'ʋsɩ n wʋn kʋ ba.
40026053	Fõn ka mi tɩ mam tã wʋn sose m Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a tõm malɛkadõma n gãnnɩ tʋsa tʋsa pia la ayi?
40026054	La mam sãn ẽŋɛ nɩ bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yetɩ la wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em na, wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne ẽŋɛ?"
40026055	A tↄgɛ bɛla, dee soke nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Yãma sẽm na sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la? Mam daan boe la yãma mɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ yãma ka yõkɛ mam.
40026056	La bõn-bãna wuu ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn yele se'em Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na n ẽŋɛ." Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
40026057	Sɛba n daan yõkɛ Azezi la, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana Akayifu yire. Bilam tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan lagsɛ.
40026058	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bↄna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dↄla ka paagɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, kẽ naagɛ la tõntõnɩba zẽa tɩ a bɩsɛ yelle la n wʋn ba'asɛ se'em.
40026059	Kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba parɩm bↄ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
40026060	La ba ka yẽ, baa la nẽrba zozo'e n parɩm põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto bↄ ẽ na. Tɩ nẽrba bayi yãŋa isge
40026061	yetɩ: "Bʋraa wã daan yetɩ, ẽŋa tã wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam."
40026062	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ban tↄgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
40026063	Tɩ Azezi ka lerge se'ere. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄɩ la Nawẽnnɛ n de vↄm dãana la yʋ'ʋrɛ, fʋ sãn dɛna la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la, yele to."
40026064	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, tɩ a zı̃ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna."
40026065	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: "A tʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ ka le ɛɛra tɩ nẽra le bↄ kaseto. Ya wõm ẽn tʋʋrɩ Nawẽnnɛ se'em.
40026066	Yãma tẽ'esɛ la bẽm?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "A masɛ la kũm."
40026067	Tɩ ba tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ a nẽŋa, dee wẽ ẽ na kũnkũra. Tɩ basɛba wẽ a pɛgsɩ,
40026068	dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Krisi, bãŋɛ sɛka n wẽ fõn tↄgɛ pa'alɛ tↄ."
40026069	Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan zı̃ la yire la zẽnzakam, tɩ tõntõn-pↄka lɛm ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mẽ daan boe la Azezi n de Galile nẽra la lɛ."
40026070	Tɩ a sɩ'ɩsɛ ba wuu nẽŋam yetɩ: "Mam ka bãŋɛ fõn boorɩ tɩ fʋ yele se'em."
40026071	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yaŋa nõorʋm, tɩ tõntõn-pↄka ayẽma yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mı̃ na yetɩ: "Ẽna mẽ daan boe la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la lɛ."
40026072	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ pↄɩ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraaga wã."
40026073	Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ sɛba n ze mı̃ na, lɛm Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yetↄga n pa'alɛ fõn ze'ele zẽ'a."
40026074	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pↄɩ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraaga wã, mam sãn parɩm mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgɛ ma." Wakat-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ.
40026075	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yãŋa tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam" na. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yẽŋa ka kɛlla la sũ-sã'aŋↄ zozo'e.
40027001	Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la wuu lagsɛ tↄgɛ kʋ yetɩ ba kʋ Azezi.
40027002	Tɩ ba lʋ ẽ tarɩ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ n de gↄmna zẽ'am ka bↄ ẽ.
40027003	Azudaasɩ n de sɛka n daan pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la, n yẽ tɩ ba tↄgɛ Azezi yelle kʋ yetɩ ba kʋ ẽ na, a sũure sã'am mɛ. Tɩ a tarɩ lig-kõba pitã la sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka lebse kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la,
40027004	dee yetɩ: "Mam ẽŋɛ la be'em, mam n pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ sɛka n ka ẽŋɛ be'em tɩ ba kʋ ẽ na." Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "La ka pakɛ tõma. La de la fõn yelle."
40027005	Tɩ Azudaasɩ dɩkɛ ligri la lobge Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam, dee sẽŋɛ ka pire mı̃'isi ki.
40027006	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma la dɩkɛ ligri la yetɩ: "Ba de la zɩɩm ligri, la ka masɛ tɩ tɩ dɩkɛ ba naagɛ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la ligri."
40027007	Tɩ ba bãm, dɩkɛ ligri la da yagba va'am tɩ a dɛna sãama laarɛ zẽ'am.
40027008	Bɛla n soe tɩ ba ken wi'ira zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zɩɩm va'am, halɩ wa paam zı̃na.
40027009	La de la bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azeremi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Ba dɩkɛ la lig-kõba pitã, lig-sɛba tɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sakɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ da ẽ na,
40027010	ba dɩkɛ la bãma da yagba va'am wʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n yele mam se'em na."
40027011	Ban daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ gↄmna la zẽ'am na, tɩ a soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na."
40027012	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan dõrɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a ka lerge se'ere.
40027013	Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn ka wõm ban tↄgrɩ se'em wuu dõta fↄ?"
40027014	Tɩ Azezi ka lerge yetↄga la baa ayɩla, tɩ la di'ige gↄmna la halɩ zozo'e.
40027015	La Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa wakatɛ woo gↄmna la ẽn yese la nẽra ayɩla yʋ'a deem basɛ, nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la boorɩ.
40027016	La wakat-ẽŋa bibɛ'a ayɩla n daan boe yʋ'a deem, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Abarabasɩ, tɩ nẽrba wuu mina a yelle.
40027017	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n lagsɛ la, tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne tɩ yãma boorɩ tɩ m yese basɛ bↄ ya, Abarabasɩ bɩɩ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Krisi la?"
40027018	Apilatɩ daan mi tɩ la de la sũure ı̃yã tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bↄ ẽŋa.
40027019	La Apilatɩ n daan zı̃ sarɩyadia zẽ'am na, tɩ a pↄga tõm tɩ ba wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yese fʋ nu'ugo pʋpeelem dãana la yelle pʋam, se'ere n soe la, mam zãasʋm mɛ a yelle yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ la nãmsɛ mam zozo'e."
40027020	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma daan yele nẽrba la mɛ tɩ ba sose Apilatɩ tɩ a basɛ Abarabasɩ bↄ ba, dee kʋ Azezi.
40027021	Tɩ gↄmna la le soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-bãna bayi wã, yãma boorɩ tɩ m basɛ la ãne bↄ ya?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Abarabasɩ."
40027022	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bɛla, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ Azezi tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Krisi la, la wãne?" Tɩ ba wuu lerge yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
40027023	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?" Tɩ ba malɩn tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
40027024	La Apilatɩ n yẽ tɩ ẽŋa kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ sɛla, dee tɩ nẽrba la gita pa'asra la, tɩ a dɩkɛ ko'om peege a nu'usi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu nẽŋam, dee yele yetɩ: "Mam nẽŋa ka boe ẽna wã kʋa pʋam. La de la yãma yelle."
40027025	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu lerge yetɩ: "A kʋa la taalɛ bↄna tõma la tɩ kↄma zuto."
40027026	Tɩ Apilatɩ basɛ Abarabasɩ bↄ ba, dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ tɩ ba ka ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
40027027	Tɩ gↄmna la sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gↄmna la yire, tɩ sʋdaasɩ wuu lagsɛ kaagɛ ẽ.
40027028	Tɩ ba yɛɛsɛ Azezi futo, dee yɛ ẽ fuugo n de gomusga,
40027029	dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ, dɩkɛ dasaarɛ zãntɛ a zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo, yãŋa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam la'ara ẽ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba, naa!"
40027030	La ba daan tʋbsrɩ la nõtõorʋm ɩta ẽ, dee tↄ'ↄsra dasaarɛ la wẽ'era a zuugo.
40027031	La ban la ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee dɩkɛ a mẽŋa fuugo la lebe yɛ ẽ, tara ẽ wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
40027032	Ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa pʋam yɛsra la, ba tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, tɩ ba pẽrgɛ ẽ tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dↄ-puurŋa la buke.
40027033	Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a,
40027034	dɩkɛ dãam n gaam na tɩɩm n ãn toogo bↄ Azezi tɩ a yũ. Tɩ a leme ba, zagsɛ ka yũ.
40027035	Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ la taaba, pↄsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge sɛka.
40027036	Dee yãŋa zẽa gu'ura ẽ.
40027037	Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgↄ pa'alɛ se'ere n soe tɩ ba kʋ ẽ, lablɛ a zuum dↄ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ẽna de la Azezi n de Zifdõma naba la."
40027038	Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla Azezi zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ayẽma a gↄbga bↄba.
40027039	Tɩ sɛba n dolɩ bilam tↄlla la, lↄbra ba zuto dee tʋʋra ẽ
40027040	yetɩ: "Dagɩ fõn daan yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la, dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam? Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige."
40027041	Kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma mẽ daan tʋʋrɩ ẽ mɛ yetɩ:
40027042	"A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa. A sãn dɛna Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba, a ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã, tɩ tõma wʋn bↄ ẽ sɩra.
40027043	A te'ege Nawẽnnɛ mɛ yetɩ ẽŋa de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, Nawẽnnɛ sãn nõŋɛ ẽ, a fãagɛ ẽ lɛɛlɛ wã."
40027044	Tɩ fãarba la tɩ ba ka dↄ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tↄgra ẽ be'em.
40027045	La daan pↄsɛ la wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika tarɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
40027046	Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani." La võorɛ de la: "Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm tɩ fõn basɛ mam?"
40027047	Tɩ sɛba n ze lɛm bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "A wi'iri la A'eli."
40027048	Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla zoe sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mı̃'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dↄↄgↄ bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ.
40027049	Tɩ sɛba yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa'am wa fãagɛ ẽ."
40027050	Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em, dee ki.
40027051	Tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum halɩ ka paagɛ tẽŋa. Tɩ tẽŋa mı̃im, tɩ tãmpı̃isi wõrɛ.
40027052	Tɩ yↄↄrↄ be'ese, tɩ pʋpeelem dõma zozo'e n yʋʋn ki vo'oge.
40027053	Tɩ Azezi n wa vo'oge la, tɩ ba ze'ele yↄↄrↄ pʋam yese kẽ Zerizalɛm, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ ba.
40027054	La Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma, la sʋdaasɩ la n ze gu'ura Azezi la n yẽ tẽŋa la n mı̃im, la bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ la, dabeem n yõkɛ ba zozo'e, tɩ ba yetɩ: "A sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
40027055	La pↄgsɩ zozo'e n daan ze zãazãarɛ dee bɩsra, ba daan ze'ele la Galile doose Azezi tɩ ba sõŋra ẽ.
40027056	Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ la Azozɛfʋ ma, la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ la ma n daan boe pↄg-bãma pʋam.
40027057	Bʋraaga ayɩla n daan de bõntarsa, n ze'ele Arimate, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azozɛfʋ. A de la Azezi karẽnbia.
40027058	Wẽnnɛ n daan mã'agɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ tɩ a basɛ tɩ a dɩkɛ Azezi kũm na sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ. Tɩ Apilatɩ bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba bↄ ẽ.
40027059	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ dɩkɛ kũm na, dɩkɛ tãn-paalɛ n ãn sõŋa vile ẽ,
40027060	tarɩ ẽ ka laagɛ yↄ-paalɛ pʋam tɩ a botɩ ba tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã, a mẽŋa ı̃yã. Tɩ ba bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ dee fõrgɛ.
40027061	Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari ayẽma la daan zı̃ mɛ tɩ ba nẽŋa tↄ yↄↄgↄ la.
40027062	Daar-sɛka tɩ Zifdõma mãasnɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ la n tole tɩ beere wiige, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Farisi dõma lagsɛ taaba sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am,
40027063	ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma tẽrɩ tɩ põmpã'asʋm dãana wã, ẽn daan nãn vↄa la, a daan yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ.'
40027064	Bɛla, bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba gu'ura yↄↄgↄ la sõŋa sõŋa ka paagɛ dabsa atã daarɛ, la sãn dagna bɛla, a karẽnbiisi la wʋn wa zũ kũm na mɛ dee yele nẽrba tɩ a vo'oge mɛ. Pã'asgↄ ẽna wã yãŋa wʋn dɛna be'em gãnna pↄspↄsɩ la."
40027065	Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ba yetɩ: "Tarɩ-ya gu'urba sẽŋɛ ka basɛ tɩ ba gu'ura yↄↄgↄ la wʋ yãma n boorɩ se'em na."
40027066	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bɩ yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ dee basɛ tɩ gu'urba gu'ura ẽ.
40028001	Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ beere wiige Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari ayẽma isge sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ yↄↄgↄ la.
40028002	Tɩ tẽŋa daan mı̃im zozo'e, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ malɛka ze'ele saazuum sigum wa bilge kugre la bı̃ŋe kẽnkɛrŋa zẽa a zuo.
40028003	A nẽŋa daan yẽgrɩ wʋ sa-yãka. Tɩ a futo pelge ãna yɩlɩ yɩlɩ.
40028004	Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n gu'uri yↄↄgↄ la. Tɩ ba gõgra dee ãna wʋ ba ki mɛ na.
40028005	Tɩ malɛka la yele pↄgsɩ la yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi tɩ ba ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la.
40028006	A ka boe kalam. A vo'oge mɛ wʋ ẽn daan yele se'em na. Wa'am-ya wa bɩsɛ ban daan bı̃ŋe ẽ zẽ'e-sɛka la,
40028007	dee sẽŋɛ-ya tↄtↄ ka yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, a vo'oge mɛ. La a wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn ka yẽ ẽ. Sɛla tɩ mam tarɩ tɩ m yele ya n bɛla."
40028008	Tɩ pↄgsɩ la fõrgɛ yↄↄm na tↄtↄ la dabeem, dee tara sũ-yẽlga zozo'e, zↄta wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka yele Azezi karẽnbiisi la sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
40028009	Tɩ Azezi darɛ tʋ'ʋsɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ ba. Tɩ ba lɛm ẽ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam gʋrɛ a nãma nã'asɛ ẽ.
40028010	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele m sↄbiisi la yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ Galile, tɩ la de la bilam tɩ ba wʋn yẽ mam."
40028011	Pↄgsɩ la n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ sɛba n gu'uri yↄↄgↄ la nẽrba basɛba sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma bõn-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ la.
40028012	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma la lagsɛ kʋ nõorɛ ayɩla, bↄ sʋdaasɩ la ligri zozo'e,
40028013	dee yele ba yetɩ: "Yele-ya nẽrba la yetɩ, yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ yãma gã gı̃sra dee tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la wa'am wa zũ kũm na.
40028014	La gↄmna la sãn wõm bɛla, tõma wʋn tↄgɛ la ẽ lɛ, yese ya yelle la pʋam."
40028015	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la to'oge ligri la, dee ẽŋɛ wʋ ban yele ba se'em na. Tɩ yetↄg-ẽŋa saagɛ Zifdõma la tẽŋasʋka halɩ wa paam zı̃na.
40028016	Karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan sẽŋɛ la Galile, ka zom tãn-sɛka tɩ Azezi bↄ ba nõorɛ yetɩ ba sẽŋɛ la zuo.
40028017	La ba yẽ ẽ mɛ, ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asɛ ẽ, la basɛba daan sẽ'enɩ mɛ.
40028018	Tɩ Azezi lɛm ba, yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ bↄ mam pãŋa wuu n boe saazuum, la tẽŋa wã zuo mɛ.
40028019	Bɛla, sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia wuu ka botɩ nẽrba buuri wuu lebge mam karẽnbiisi. Mise-ya ba ko'om pʋam, la Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ, la a Dayʋa, la a Sɩa yʋ'ʋrɛ.
40028020	La ya zãsʋm ba tɩ ba sakɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ mam bↄ ya nõorɛ tɩ ya ɩta la. La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam boe la ya mɛ wakatɛ wuu, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ dũnia ba'asgↄ."
41001001	Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa Azezi-krisi kõ-yẽlga n pↄsɛ se'em n wãna:
41001002	La ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn põn gʋlsɛ se'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, mam wʋn tõm m tõntõnna tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa ka malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.
41001003	La de la sɛka n mõolɩ weem tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: 'Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana. Malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.' "
41001004	Bɛla tɩ Azã daan bↄna weem misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam, dee mõola yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, dee botɩ ba mise ya ko'om pʋam, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ."
41001005	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ze'ele Zude so'olʋm wuu, la Zerizalɛm wuu sẽnna Azã zẽ'am tↄgra ba tõon-be'ero pa'ala ẽ. Tɩ Azã misra ba kʋlaa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zʋrdẽ pʋam.
41001006	Azã daan yɛ la fuugo n de yʋgma kõbrↄ, dee dɩkɛ sagãnnɛ lʋ a sɩa. A daan diti la seero la saniiro.
41001007	A daan mõolɩ yetɩ: "Nẽra n boe mam poorʋm sẽna, ẽŋa tarɩ pãŋa gãnna mam mɛ. Mam ka masɛ tɩ m dõbrɛ a nẽŋam pirge a tagra.
41001008	Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la ẽŋa wʋn mise ya la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa."
41001009	Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi ze'ele la Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm wa'am Azã zẽ'am, tɩ a mise ẽ Zʋrdẽ ko'om na pʋam.
41001010	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele ko'om na pʋam dↄↄra, yẽ tɩ saazuum darɛ yo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa ãna wʋ na'adawenne na sige a zuo,
41001011	tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu, fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm."
41001012	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ weem.
41001013	A daan boe weem na dabsa pinaasɩ, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ. A daan boe la we-dũnsi lɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma sõŋra ẽ.
41001014	Ba daan yõkɛ Azã yʋ la yʋ'a deego pʋam. Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Galile ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga yetɩ:
41001015	"Wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm lɛm mɛ. Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero dee sakɛ kõ-yẽlga la."
41001016	Azezi daan dolɩ la Galile mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, yẽ Asimõ la a yɩbga A'ãndre n boe mı̃ lↄbra yʋka mõgrɛ la pʋam, ba daan de la zũn-yõgrɩba.
41001017	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Dↄla-ya mam, tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ya ɛɛra nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
41001018	Tɩ ba basɛ ba yʋgsɩ la bilam mẽŋa, dee dↄla ẽ.
41001019	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ fẽe yẽ Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã n boe õorŋↄ pʋam malgra ba yʋgsɩ.
41001020	Tɩ a darɛ wi ba, tɩ ba basɛ ba sↄ Azebede la a tõntõnɩba õorŋↄ la pʋam, dee dↄla ẽ.
41001021	Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi sẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ paagɛ, tɩ Azezi kẽ ba wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba.
41001022	La zãsŋↄ la di'ige nẽrba la mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la daan tarɩ la pãŋa, la ka ãn wʋ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zãsnɩ se'em na.
41001023	Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ bʋraa la kaasɛ yetɩ:
41001024	"Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma? Mam mi fõn de sɛka. Fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
41001025	Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Go'oge, yese dee basɛ ẽ."
41001026	Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la bigse bʋraa la tɩ a gõgra, dee kaasɛ tagurga yese dee basɛ ẽ.
41001027	Tɩ ba wuu zɛ yɛrɩ, sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Wãna de la bẽm? La de la zãsŋↄ paalga n tarɩ pãŋa. A tↄgrɩ la kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ."
41001028	Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ darɛ saagɛ Galile so'olʋm zẽ'a woo.
41001029	Tɩ Azezi la a nẽrba daan yese Zifdõma wẽndeem na, tɩ Azakɩ la Azã doose ba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Asimõ la A'ãndre dõma yire.
41001030	Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pↄka ı̃yã ba tʋlgɛ, tɩ a gã. Tɩ Azezi paagɛ, tɩ ba darɛ tↄgɛ pↄka la yelle bↄ ẽ.
41001031	Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ lɛm ẽ, gʋrɛ a nu'ugo botɩ a isge. Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ, tɩ a ẽŋɛ ba sãanↄ.
41001032	Tɩ wẽnnɛ wa lui sobe, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma wuu, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ tarɩ ba wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
41001033	Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu lagsɛ taaba yire la zanõrʋm.
41001034	Tɩ Azezi botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba yese. La a ka sakɛ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la tↄgɛ, se'ere n soe la, ba põn mina ẽ mɛ.
41001035	Azezi daan isge la bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'a tɩ nẽrba ka boe, tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
41001036	Tɩ Asimõ la nẽr-sɛba n daan boe la ẽ na yese ɛɛra ẽ.
41001037	La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽrba wuu eerɩ fʋ mɛ."
41001038	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na tɩ m ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bilam mẽ, tɩ la de la bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam wa'am."
41001039	Tɩ a kaagɛ Galile so'olʋm wuu mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yese dee basɛ nẽrba.
41001040	Bʋraa ayɩla n de kõnkonne n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
41001041	Tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa."
41001042	Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a le ãna sõŋa.
41001043	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ a fõrgɛ, dee kã'an ẽ yetɩ:
41001044	"Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fↄ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ ẽ bõn-sɛba tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
41001045	La bʋraa la fõrgɛ mɛ ka dɩkɛ yelle la mõolɛ pa'alɛ la ẽŋɛ se'em. Bɛla tɩ Azezi daan ka le tãna wʋn kẽ tẽŋa pʋam, sãn dagna tɩ a li'ise mɛ kẽ. A daan boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ nẽrba ka boe mı̃ na, tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ'ɛta zẽ'a woo sẽnna a zẽ'am.
41002001	Bɛla poorʋm, dabsa fẽe n tole, tɩ Azezi lebe Kapɛrnaʋm. Tɩ nẽrba wõm tɩ a boe yire,
41002002	lagsɛ halɩ zozo'e tɩ zẽ'a ka bↄna, baa deego la nõorʋm. Tɩ a tↄgra Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ'ↄra ba.
41002003	Tɩ nẽrba banaasɩ zɛ kↄↄrŋↄ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
41002004	La nẽrba la n zo'oge la, ba ka tã wʋn zɛ ẽ paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba zom gↄsgↄ ka lakɛ gↄsgↄ la bↄbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike kↄↄrŋↄ la, la a bõn-gã'ala deego la pʋam Azezi nẽŋam.
41002005	Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M bia, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
41002006	La lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n daan boe mı̃, daan zẽa tẽ'esra ba sũurum yetɩ:
41002007	"Bẽm tɩ ẽna tↄgra bɛla? A tↄgrɩ pↄ'ↄra la Nawẽnnɛ. Ãn tã wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?"
41002008	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em ba sũurum na, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna ya sũurum?
41002009	Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala sẽnna n de nãana?
41002010	Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia wã zuo mɛ, wʋn basɛ tõon-be'ero taalɛ." Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ:
41002011	"Isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala kule."
41002012	Tɩ kↄↄrŋↄ la isge kalam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la ba wuu nifum yese. Tɩ ba wuu zɛ yɛrɩ, pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Tõma nãn ka yẽ wãna."
41002013	Azezi le sẽŋɛ la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba.
41002014	La Azezi sẽnnɩ tↄlla mɛ yẽ Alfe dayʋa Alevi tɩ a zı̃ lampo to'osgo deem tↄ'ↄsra lampo, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam." Tɩ a isge dↄla ẽ.
41002015	Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka zẽa Alevi yire dita, tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e lagɩm na Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la dita, se'ere n soe la, nẽr-bãma buuri n daan zo'oge dↄla ẽ.
41002016	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n de Farisi dõma la yẽ Azezi n diti la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma la, tɩ ba soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ a lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?"
41002017	Tɩ Azezi wõm bɛla, yele ba yetɩ: "Sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba, sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba. Mam ka wa'am tɩ m wi sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ mɛ na, mam wa'am na tõon-be'ero dõma ı̃yã."
41002018	Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma daan lʋtɩ la nõorɛ. Tɩ ba wa'am wa soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi la lʋta nõorɛ dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka lʋta nõorɛ?"
41002019	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pↄgdire kibsa wi a sɩrdõma tɩ ba wa'am, ba tã wʋn lʋ nõorɛ mɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna ba zẽ'am na bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, pↄgdita la sãn ken bↄna ba zẽ'am, ba kãn tã'agɛ lʋ nõorɛ.
41002020	Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.
41002021	Nẽra kãn dɩkɛ tãn-paalɛ lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, tãn-paalga la wʋn botɩ fu-kɛka la ãagɛ mɛ gãnna kʋrʋm na.
41002022	La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ, tɩ dãam na, la wↄↄsɩ la wuu sã'am. La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam."
41002023	Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan dↄla vatↄ pʋam tↄlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
41002024	Tɩ Farisi dõma yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, bẽm tɩ ba ɩta sɛla n sisri vo'osgo daarɛ?"
41002025	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ ba bↄↄra dia tɩ ba di, tɩ Adavidi yʋʋn ẽŋɛ se'em,
41002026	wakat-sɛka tɩ Abiata de Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la? A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego la pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma mã'a. La Adavidi yʋʋn obe ba mɛ, dee bↄ nẽr-sɛba n boe a zẽ'am na."
41002027	Azezi yele bɛla dee le yele ba yetɩ: "La de la nẽrsaala ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ vo'osgo daarɛ, a ka ẽŋɛ nẽrsaala vo'osgo daarɛ ı̃yã.
41002028	Bɛla, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe sɛla woo, baa la vo'osgo daarɛ."
41003001	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi le kẽ la Zifdõma wẽndeem. Tɩ bʋraa bↄna mı̃ tɩ a nu'ugo ki.
41003002	Tɩ ba bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ bʋraa la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Ba daan eerɩ la ba doose bilam dõrɛ ẽ.
41003003	Tɩ Azezi yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: "Isge ze'ele tẽŋasʋka."
41003004	Dee soke sɛba n bɩsrɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em? Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?" Tɩ ba sı̃na.
41003005	Tɩ Azezi sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a bɩsɛ nẽrba la kaagɛ, tɩ a sũure sã'am, ba sũure n kɛ la ı̃yã. La a yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ, tɩ nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
41003006	Tɩ Farisi dõma yese tↄtↄ ka bãm la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi.
41003007	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ la Galile mõgrʋm bↄba. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ze'ele Galile, la Zude,
41003008	la Zerizalɛm, la Idume, la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa doone, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm Tiiri la Sidõ doose ẽ. Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la daan wõm na ẽn ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am.
41003009	Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba vuta õorŋↄ lɛm na tɩ nẽrba la da wa mike ẽ.
41003010	A daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, bɛla tɩ bã'adõma wuu daan mikra taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba paagɛ kalʋm ẽ.
41003011	La kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ nẽr-sɛba la sãn ẽn yẽ ẽ, ba luti la a nẽŋam kaasra tagursi yɛta tɩ: "Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
41003012	Tɩ Azezi daan zɛbɛ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yetɩ, ba da botɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n de nẽr-sɛka.
41003013	La bɛla poorʋm Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom na tãŋa zuo, dee wi nẽr-sɛba tɩ a boorɩ la tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am.
41003014	Tɩ a looge nẽrba pia la ayi tɩ ba bↄna la ẽ, tɩ a tõnna ba tɩ ba sẽnna mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga,
41003015	dee bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra.
41003016	Sɛba tɩ a looge la daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ,
41003017	la Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã, tɩ a sɩ ba yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Bʋanɛrgɛsɩ. A võorɛ de la nẽrba n ãn wʋ sa-dãmŋↄ.
41003018	La A'ãndre, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Amatie, la Atoma, la Alfe dayʋa Azakɩ, la Atade, la Asimõ sɛka n de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la,
41003019	la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la.
41003020	La Azezi daan kule la yire, tɩ nẽrba le lagsɛ zozo'e. Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ka yẽ folle wʋn di.
41003021	Tɩ ba daan yetɩ Azezi yirsri mɛ, tɩ a yir-dõma wõm bɛla sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka yõkɛ ẽ.
41003022	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wa'am wa yetɩ: "Abelzebuli n dolɩ ẽ, la de la ẽŋa n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra."
41003023	Tɩ Azezi wi ba, makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Asũtãana wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne dige Asũtãana?
41003024	So'olʋm ayɩla nẽrba sãn welge zɛbra taaba, so'olʋm ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
41003025	La yire ayɩla dõma sãn welge zɛbra taaba, yi-ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
41003026	La Asũtãana sãn isge zɛbɛ la a mẽŋa welge, a pãŋa la ba'asɛ mɛ, a kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
41003027	La nẽra ka tã wʋn kẽ pãŋa dãana yire ka vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ, sãn dagna tɩ a dẽŋɛ lʋ pãŋa dãana la mɛ, dee vaagɛ a lↄgrↄ la.
41003028	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn basɛ nẽrsaalba tõon-be'ero la wuu tɩ ba ɩtɩ la, la ba pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga la wuu taalɛ.
41003029	La nẽra sãn pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn malɩn basɛ ẽ taalɛ. Tõon-be'e-ẽna taalɛ boe la a dãana zuo wakatɛ wuu."
41003030	Ban yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ na ı̃yã, tɩ a yele bɛla.
41003031	Tɩ Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ wa'am wa zɛ yẽŋa dee tõm yetɩ, ba wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am.
41003032	La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n daan zı̃ kaagɛ ẽ, tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n wãna n boe yẽŋa ɛɛra fↄ."
41003033	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam ma, la ãndõma n de mam yɩbsɩ?"
41003034	Dee bɩsɛ nẽr-sɛba n zı̃ kaagɛ ẽ na, yetɩ: "Mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ n wãna.
41003035	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na n de mam yɩbga, la mam tã, la mam ma."
41004001	Azezi le bↄna la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm zãsna nẽrba. Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am. Bɛla tɩ a kẽ õorŋↄ la n boe mõgrɛ la pʋam na zı̃'ire, dee tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu bↄna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
41004002	Tɩ a makɛ magsa zãsʋm ba yɛla zozo'e. A zãsŋↄ la pʋam a yele ba yetɩ:
41004003	"Selse-ya, kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
41004004	La ẽn sẽŋɛ ka lↄbgra bõnbuuri la, basɛba lui la sore zuo, tɩ niinto wa'am wa di ba.
41004005	Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'a n de tãmpı̃isi tɩ tẽntõnnↄ ka zo'oge mı̃. Tẽntõnnↄ n ka zo'oge mı̃ na ı̃yã, tɩ ba bule tↄtↄ yese,
41004006	tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkɛ wẽ ba tɩ ba ki, ba yẽga n ka kẽ tẽŋa la ı̃yã.
41004007	Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a. Tɩ gõ'osɩ la yese fʋrɛ ba, tɩ ba ka wↄm biɛ.
41004008	Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ pʋam bule yese, bɩ wↄm biɛ. Basɛba wↄm na biɛ pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba wↄm pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba wↄm kↄbga kↄbga."
41004009	A yele bɛla dee yetɩ: "Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
41004010	La Azezi yese la kẽnkɛrŋa tɩ sɛba n kaagɛ ẽ na, la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la soke ẽ magsa la võorɛ.
41004011	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ. La sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, yɛla wuu de la magsa bↄ ba.
41004012	'Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsɛ yẽ dee kãn bãŋɛ. Ba wʋn wõm dee kãn bãŋɛ a võorɛ. Sãn dagɩ nɩ bɛla, ba wʋn leme wa'am Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, tɩ a basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.' "
41004013	La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma sãn ka bãŋɛ makrɛ ẽna wã võorɛ, yãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne bãŋɛ magsa la wuu võorɛ?
41004014	Bõnbuuri la tɩ kaara la lobge la, de la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
41004015	Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am tↄtↄ wa yese yetↄga la ba sũure pʋam.
41004016	La tãmpı̃a la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la dee sakɛ to'oge ba tↄtↄ la sũ-yẽlga.
41004017	La yetↄga la n ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam na ı̃yã, ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, la toogo bɩɩ nãmsgↄ sãn paagɛ ba yetↄga la ı̃yã, ba basrɩ mɛ tↄtↄ.
41004018	La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la,
41004019	tɩ ba yɛm yↄↄra la dũnia wã yɛla, tɩ bõntarsõm yɛla pã'asra ba, tɩ yɛla basɛba yɛmleego tara ba, botɩ yetↄga la ka tãna wʋn wↄm biɛ ba sũure pʋam.
41004020	La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ kõ-yẽlga la sakra, wↄm biɛ. Tɩ basɛba wↄm pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba kↄbga kↄbga."
41004021	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Ba yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgↄ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ ze'ele gↄrgↄ tilum? Ayɛɩ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo.
41004022	Bɛla, bõn-sɛka n sʋgɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a puke. La bõn-sɛka wuu n lile wʋn lilge.
41004023	Nẽr-sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
41004024	A le yele ba yetɩ: "Mõrgɛ-ya wõm yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ. Bõn-sɛka tɩ ya dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ nẽrba la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn makɛ la bɛla lebse ya, le makɛ pa'asɛ.
41004025	Se'ere n soe la, sɛka n tarɩ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ pa'asɛ. La sɛka n ka tarɩ, bõn-sɛka tɩ a tarɩ la, a wʋn to'oge ẽ."
41004026	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ nẽra n bʋrɛ a bõnbuuri va'am pʋam.
41004027	A sãn gı̃sra mɛ bɩɩ a sãn piga mɛ, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ, bõnbuuri la bulli mɛ yɛsra bɩta, tɩ a ka mina lan ɩtɩ se'em.
41004028	Tẽntõnnↄ n botɩ bõnbuuri la yɛsra ba mẽŋa, dẽŋɛ puse võorↄ, yãŋa yõgɛ pʋa, wↄm biɛ, tɩ ba bɩ.
41004029	La biɛ la sãn bɩ, kaara la sɛ'ɛrɩ ba mɛ, se'ere n soe la, bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ paagɛ mɛ."
41004030	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, bɩɩ tɩ wʋn yetɩ a wõn na bẽm?
41004031	A ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire n ãn pɩka pɩka gãnna bõnbuuri wuu n boe dũnia zuo.
41004032	La ba sãn bʋrɛ ẽ, a bɩtɩ mɛ puse wil-kãra gãnna zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu. Tɩ niinto tãna wʋn tɛ ba tʋgrↄ a zuo a mã'asʋm pʋam."
41004033	Azezi daan dɩkɛ la magsa zozo'e n ãn wʋ bãna tↄgɛ bↄ ba, masɛ wʋ ban wʋn tã'agɛ wõm se'em na.
41004034	A ka tↄgɛ bↄ ba tɩ la sãn dagna magsa. La a sãn yese la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a kẽnkɛrŋa, tɩ a pa'alɩ ba yɛla la wuu võorɛ.
41004035	Daar-ẽŋa mẽŋa zaanõorɛ, tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Tɩ dooge-ya mõgrɛ la ke bↄba."
41004036	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ õorŋↄ la tɩ Azezi boe mı̃ na pʋam, dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa. La õornↄ basɛba n daan mẽ boe ba zẽ'am.
41004037	Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa vugra ke'enke'em, tɩ ko-mı̃'isi wẽ'era kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam deege la ba pɩrɛ ẽ.
41004038	La Azezi gã la õorŋↄ la poorʋm kʋkɛ dafeere gı̃sra. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la nẽegɛ ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma n yetɩ ki wã, la ka pakɛ fõn?"
41004039	Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo la, dee yele ko-mı̃'isi la yetɩ: "Go'oge-ya, ãna-ya sı̃m." Tɩ kʋsebgo, la ko-mı̃'isi la go'oge ãna sı̃m.
41004040	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya zↄta dabeem bɛla? Bẽm tɩ ya ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra?"
41004041	Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba. Tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna tɩ kʋsebgo la ko'om sakra a nõorɛ?"
41005001	La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la dooge paagɛ la mõgrɛ la doone Geraza dõma tẽŋa pʋam.
41005002	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋↄ la pʋam sige. Tɩ bʋraa tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ darɛ ze'ele yↄↄrʋm sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ.
41005003	Bʋraa la daan kẽ'erɩ la yↄↄrↄ la tẽŋasʋka. Tɩ ba daan ka le tãna wʋn ba ẽ na bãnsɩ.
41005004	Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ẽn ba la a nãma la a nu'usi la bãnsɩ, tɩ a ẽn kↄ ba basɛ. Tɩ nẽra nẽra daan ka tãna wʋn yãŋɛ ẽ.
41005005	Wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ a ẽn ɛɛra la yↄↄrʋm, la tãnsɩ tẽŋasʋka kaasra tagursi, dee wẽ'era a mẽŋa la kuga pↄgna.
41005006	Tɩ a yẽ Azezi zãazãarɛ, zoe sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
41005007	dee tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm n boe mam na fõn tẽŋasʋka? Mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ ı̃yã, da nãmsɛ ma."
