41005008	Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ yetɩ a yese dee basɛ ẽ. Bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
41005009	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa, se'ere n soe la, tõma zo'oge mɛ."
41005010	Tɩ a belem Azezi yetɩ, a da dige bãma tɩ ba yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
41005011	La kurkurdõma zozo'e n daan boe tãŋa zuo ↄbra.
41005012	Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ: "Bↄ tɩ nõorɛ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la."
41005013	Tɩ a sakɛ ban yele se'em na. Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki. Ba kãllɛ daan de wʋ tʋsayi.
41005014	Tɩ sɛba n daan gu'uri kurkurdõma la zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ la wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la. Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em.
41005015	La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la daan dolɩ ẽ na n zı̃ mı̃, yɛ futo, tɩ a yɛm bↄna sõŋa sõŋa. Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
41005016	Tɩ sɛba n yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ba bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bʋraa la, la bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ kurkurdõma la.
41005017	Tɩ ba belem Azezi yetɩ a fõrgɛ bãma tẽŋa.
41005018	Tɩ Azezi daan kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ daan dolɩ ẽ na belem Azezi yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ a dↄla ẽ.
41005019	Tɩ Azezi ka sakɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Kule ya yire ka yele fʋ yir-dõma Zuudãana n zoe fʋ ninbãalga se'em, la ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla wuu bↄ fʋ la."
41005020	Tɩ bʋraa la sẽŋɛ Dekapↄlɩ so'olʋm ka mõola Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bↄ ẽŋa. Tɩ la daan di'ige ba wuu.
41005021	Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba la õorŋↄ la, daan bↄna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
41005022	Tɩ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadõma nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azayirusi wa'am mı̃ wa yẽ Azezi, ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
41005023	belem ẽ na a sũure wuu yetɩ: "Mam pↄyʋa n bẽ'erɩ deege la a ki, wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ nu'usi paglɛ a zuo tɩ a põsɛ da ki."
41005024	Tɩ Azezi dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ dↄla ẽ mikra ẽ.
41005025	La pↄka n daan boe nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi, tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra.
41005026	A daan nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e tɩbdõma zẽ'am, dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu sã'am, dee tɩ la ka sõna, la malɩn gãnna la bɛla.
41005027	Tɩ pↄka la daan wõm Azezi yelle, wa'am wa fɩrgɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka paagɛ Azezi poorʋm kalʋm a fuugo.
41005028	A daan yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: "Mam sãn kalʋm a fuugo mã'a, mam wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
41005029	La ẽn kalʋm fuugo la, a zɩɩm na n yesrɩ la ze'ele mɛ ka le yɛsra, tɩ a bãŋɛ a ı̃yã pʋam tɩ ẽŋa yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
41005030	La bilam mẽŋa tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese ẽŋa pʋam ẽŋɛ sɛla, tɩ a gelge soke nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Ãn kalʋm mam fuugo?"
41005031	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n mikri fõn wãna, dee sↄkra tɩ ãn kalʋm fõn."
41005032	Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ kaagɛ tɩ a bãŋɛ nẽr-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bɛla.
41005033	Tɩ dabeem tara pↄka la, tɩ a gõgra. La ẽn bãŋɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ ẽ na, a wa'am mɛ wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam tↄgɛ ẽ a sɩra wuu.
41005034	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm, fʋ bã'a la basɛ ya."
41005035	La Azezi n ken bↄna mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ nẽrba ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ pↄyʋa la ki mɛ. Da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama."
41005036	Tɩ Azezi wõm ban yele se'em na, dee yele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, wen bↄ mam sɩra."
41005037	La Azezi daan ka basɛ tɩ nẽra nẽra kↄlgɛ ẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la a yɩbga Azã mã'a.
41005038	La ban sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana yire la, tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n voolɩ, kaasra dee fabla zozo'e.
41005039	Tɩ a kẽ yire la yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya vↄↄla dee kɛlla? Bia la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ."
41005040	Tɩ ba la'ara ẽ. Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la wuu yese yẽŋa, dee doose bia la sↄ, la a ma, la a karẽnbiisi batã la kẽ bia la n boe zẽ'a na,
41005041	gʋrɛ a nu'ugo dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Talita kumi." A võorɛ de la: "Pugla, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge."
41005042	Tɩ pugla la daan darɛ isge sẽnna. Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ. Pugla la daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi.
41005043	Tɩ Azezi daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da kãn botɩ nẽra nẽra bãŋɛ bõn-ẽŋa. Dee yetɩ, ba bↄ pugla la dia tɩ a di.
41006001	Azezi daan basɛ tẽn-ẽŋa dee sẽŋɛ la a mẽŋa tẽŋam, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
41006002	Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba. Tɩ nẽrba pãɩ wõm a zãsŋↄ la, tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna yẽ zãsŋↄ ẽna la bɛ? Ãne bↄ ẽ yɛm ẽna? A ẽŋɛ la wãne ɩta bõn-yãlma bɛla?
41006003	Dagɩ ẽna n de dↄ-wãta la? Dagɩ ẽna n de Amaari dayʋa, tɩ a yɩbsɩ dɛna Azakɩ, la Azoze, la Azudi, la Asimõ la? Dagɩ a tãpa n boe tõma zẽ'am kalam wã?" Bɛla tɩ ba zagsɛ ka bↄ Azezi sɩra.
41006004	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa yẽtɩ pẽka mɛ, sãn dagna a mẽŋa tẽŋa, la a buuri, la a yir-dõma tẽŋasʋka mã'a tɩ a ka yẽtɩ pẽka."
41006005	La a daan ka yãŋɛ tõm tõon-yãlma bilam, sãn dagna bã'adõma fẽe tɩ a daan dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
41006006	La ban daan ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Azezi daan kaarɩ la tẽnsɩ la n boe bilam na zãsna nẽrba,
41006007	daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi, dee bↄ ba pãŋa tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ.
41006008	Dee daan yele ba yetɩ: "Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sore la sẽnnɛ ı̃yã, dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ mã'a, da tara-ya dia, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, bɩɩ ligri sũm sẽŋɛ.
41006009	La pire-ya tagra, dee da yɛ-ya futo bayi bayi."
41006010	A le yele ba yetɩ: "Yan sẽŋɛ ka sige yi-sɛka, kẽ'era-ya bilam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn yese fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
41006011	La tẽn-sɛka nẽrba n ka to'oge ya, bɩɩ ka selse ya yetↄga, ya yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ mı̃. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa."
41006012	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
41006013	Dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ zozo'e tɩ ba yese, dee ẽŋɛ kaam ẽŋɛ bã'adõma zozo'e zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
41006014	Tɩ naba A'erↄdɩ wõm Azezi yelle, se'ere n soe la, Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ daan yese la zẽ'a woo. Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan yɛta tɩ: "A de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge, bɛla n soe tɩ a tara pãŋa tõnna tõon-yãlma."
41006015	Tɩ basɛba yetɩ: "A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n leme wa'am." Tɩ sɛba yetɩ: "A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba basɛba n daan boe la."
41006016	Tɩ naba A'erↄdɩ daan wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "A de la Azã sɛka tɩ mam daan botɩ ba wike a zuugo la n vo'oge."
41006017	Se'ere n soe la, A'erↄdɩ mẽŋa n daan botɩ ba yõkɛ Azã lʋ tarɩ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem, a kẽema Afilipi pↄga A'erodɩadɩ ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pↄga di.
41006018	Tɩ Azã daan yele ẽ yetɩ, la ka masɛ tɩ a fãagɛ a kẽema pↄga di.
41006019	Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ sũure yı̃ige la Azã, tɩ a zɩgra tɩ a kʋ ẽ, la A'erↄdɩ ı̃yã a ka tã'agɛ kʋ ẽ.
41006020	A'erↄdɩ daan zotɩ Azã mɛ, a daan mi tɩ a de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, dee dɛna pʋpeelem dãana, bɛla ı̃yã tɩ a gu'ura ẽ tɩ sɛla da ẽŋɛ ẽ. A daan sãn ẽn sɛlsra Azã yetↄga, la dãanɩ ẽ mɛ zozo'e, la baa bɛla, a ẽn sɛlsra ẽ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
41006021	La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ A'erↄdɩ ẽŋɛ a dↄka daarɛ kibsa, wi a tẽŋa nẽrzuto, la sʋda-kɛ'ɛndõma, la Galile nẽŋadõma. Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ yẽ sore ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ se'em na.
41006022	A'erodɩadɩ pↄyʋa n daan kẽ ka wa, tɩ A'erↄdɩ, la sãama la sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm. Tɩ naba la yele pugla la yetɩ: "Sose mam fõn boorɩ sɛla tɩ m bↄ fↄ."
41006023	Dee pↄɩ yetɩ: "Bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sose mam, baa la sãn dɛna mam so'olʋm pʋsʋka, mam wʋn bↄ fↄ."
41006024	Tɩ pugla la yese ka soke a ma yetɩ: "M sose bẽm?" Tɩ a ma lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Sose Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo."
41006025	Tɩ pugla la lebe naba la zẽ'am tↄtↄ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam boorɩ tɩ fʋ dɩkɛ la Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam bↄ ma lɛɛlɛ wã."
41006026	Tɩ naba la sũure sã'am halɩ, la ẽn pↄɩ nẽrba la zẽ'am na ı̃yã, a ka boorɩ tɩ a mõŋɛ ẽ.
41006027	Tɩ a tõm a sʋdaaga tↄtↄ yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka wike Azã zuugo tarɩ wa'am. Tɩ a yese sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem na ka wike Azã zuugo,
41006028	dɩkɛ ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam tarɩ wa'am wa bↄ pugla la. Tɩ pugla la dɩkɛ zuugo la bↄ a ma.
41006029	Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wõm, sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ kũm na laagɛ.
41006030	Azezi n tõm sɛba la leme mɛ wa lagsɛ taaba a zẽ'am tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ sɛla, la bãma n zãsʋm se'em wuu.
41006031	La nẽrba zozo'e n daan sẽnnɩ mı̃ dee fõrgra, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan ka yẽ folle wʋn di. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Wa'am-ya tɩ tɩ yese kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe mı̃ na, tɩ ya ka vo'ose fẽe."
41006032	Tɩ ba kẽ õorŋↄ wɛ'ɛsa kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe.
41006033	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan yẽ ban we'esɩ la bãŋɛ ba, daan yese tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam lagɩm sẽŋɛ tↄtↄ dẽŋɛ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba we'esɩ la.
41006034	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ ze'ele õorŋↄ la zuo sige, yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, tɩ ba ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, ba ãn wʋ piisi n ka tarɩ dũnsı̃ina. Tɩ a daan zãsna ba yɛla zozo'e.
41006035	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan kẽ'era, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Kalam zẽ'a de la mõom dee tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ'era,
41006036	basɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba sẽŋɛ yiɛ, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ la ka da dia di."
41006037	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma mẽŋa bↄ ba dia tɩ ba di." Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn sẽŋɛ ka da borborɩ lig-kõba kↄbsyi tarɩ wa'am wa bↄ ba tɩ ba di?"
41006038	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ? Sẽŋɛ-ya ka bɩsɛ." Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ, dee leme wa yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu la zũma bayi."
41006039	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ, ba basɛ tɩ nẽrba la welse sill-sille zı̃'ire mõ-mã'asa la zuo.
41006040	Tɩ ba daan zı̃'ire kↄbga kↄbga, tɩ basɛba zı̃'ire pinu-nu.
41006041	Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba pʋɩ nẽrba la, dee dɩkɛ zũma bayi la fiise bↄ ba wuu.
41006042	Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ.
41006043	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ borbor-gito, la zũn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
41006044	Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsanuu.
41006045	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi darɛ basɛ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋↄ dẽŋɛ ẽ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba, Betisayida tẽŋa bↄba. Dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽrba la.
41006046	La ẽn keese ba la, a sẽŋɛ la tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
41006047	Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ tɩ õorŋↄ la bↄna ko-kãtɛ la tẽŋasʋka, dee tɩ Azezi bↄna doone ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.
41006048	Tɩ Azezi yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n mõnnɩ õorŋↄ la nãmsrɩ mɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba. Tɩ beere yↄna wiire, tɩ a sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa ba bↄba, bↄↄra tɩ a gãŋɛ ba tole.
41006049	La ban yẽ ẽn sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ a de la ki-isgne, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagursi.
41006050	Ba wuu yẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ a darɛ yele ba yetɩ: "La de la mam, keŋe-ya ya sũure, da zoe-ya dabeem!"
41006051	Dee zom ba zẽ'am õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge. Tɩ karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, se'ere n soe la,
41006052	ba ka bãŋɛ borborɩ bõn-yãlma la võorɛ, ba pʋtẽ'era ka like.
41006053	Ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ la Zenezarɛtɩ, ze'ele mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
41006054	La ban daan ze'ele õorŋↄ la pʋam dooge la, tɩ nẽrba la bãŋɛ Azezi tↄtↄ.
41006055	Tɩ ba zoe kẽ so'olʋm na wuu, tɩ ba zɛ bã'adõma ba bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am, bãma n wõm tɩ Azezi boe zẽ'e-sɛka la.
41006056	La Azezi daan sãn ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka woo, tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n boe kẽnkɛrsɩ la, ba tarɩ la bã'adõma sẽnna gã'ata da'asɩ pʋam, dee bɛlna ẽ yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a. La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ.
41007001	Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n ze'ele Zerizalɛm daan wa'am wa lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am,
41007002	yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛba diti la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa, la boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ ba ka peege nu'usi wʋ Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na.
41007003	Farisi dõma, la Zifdõma wuu sãn ka wobse nu'usi wʋ ba yaabdõma malŋↄ la, ba ka diti.
41007004	Ba sãn ze'ele da'am wa'am, ba wʋn peege ba mẽŋa mɛ dee di. La malŋↄ basɛba zozo'e tɩ ba ɩtɩ, la de la wama, la yↄa, la kuto laasɩ peere.
41007005	Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋↄ la, dita dia la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa?"
41007006	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "A'ezayi n yʋʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la tↄgɛ ya yelle la, a tarɩ bʋʋrↄ, yãma de la pʋlibsum dõma wʋ lan gʋlsɛ se'em na. La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Nẽr-bãna pẽgrɩ mam na nõorɛ yetↄga, la ba sũure la zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
41007007	Ban nã'asrɩ mam na, la de la zãŋa. Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ la zãsŋↄ n de nẽrsaalba nõorɛ.'
41007008	Ya basɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ mɛ dee dↄla nẽrsaalba malŋↄ."
41007009	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sɩrɩ zagsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ mɛ, dee tɩ ya dↄla ya mẽŋa malŋↄ.
41007010	Amoyisi yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' Dee le yetɩ: 'Nẽr-sɛka sãn tↄgɛ a sↄ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.'
41007011	La yãma yetɩ: 'Nẽra sãn yele a sↄ, bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: "Mam n tarɩ bõn-sɛba tɩ m sõŋɛ fʋ la de la 'Kↄrbã', (a võorɛ de la 'Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ')",
41007012	la ka le masɛ tɩ a ɩta sɛla bↄ'ↄra a sↄ, la a ma.'
41007013	Yãma mẽŋa malŋↄ la tɩ ya zãsnɩ nẽrba la, botɩ ya basɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la dɛna la zãŋa. La bõnↄ zozo'e n wõm na bɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ."
41007014	La Azezi le wi la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma wuu, selse-ya mam sõŋa wõm a võorɛ.
41007015	Sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ. Bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ. ((
41007016	Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.))"
41007017	La a daan ze'ele nẽrba la zẽ'am kẽ la deem. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
41007018	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like? Yãma ka bãŋɛ tɩ sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'era nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ?
41007019	Se'ere n soe la, bõn-bãma ka kẽ'erɩ sũure pʋam, ba kẽ'erɩ la pʋʋrɛ pʋam tɩ ba yẽ'era ba basra." (Azezi n daan yele bɛla la, a boorɩ tɩ a yetɩ dia ka bↄ'ↄrɩ dẽgrↄ, nẽra tã wʋn di dia wuu mɛ.)
41007020	Dee daan le yetɩ: "La de la bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ.
41007021	Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: yalsɩ, la nayigum, la nẽr-kʋa,
41007022	la taaba pↄgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nẽra n nõŋɛ bõnↄ, la pʋtʋʋlgↄ, la yɛmkẽgsɩga, la tõon-dẽgrↄ, la nẽra n ɩtɩ sũure la a tadãana bõnↄ, la pↄ'ↄrɛ yetↄga, la pa'al-m-mẽŋa, la yalm-tõoma.
41007023	Bõn-be'ero bãna wuu ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a dɛna dẽgrↄ."
41007024	Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Tiiri so'olʋm ka kẽ yire pʋam, dee ka bↄↄra tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ tɩ ẽŋa boe bilam. La a daan ka tã'agɛ sʋgɛ.
41007025	Tɩ pↄka ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga daan dolɩ a pↄyʋa, wõm Azezi yelle, sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
41007026	sose ẽ yetɩ, a dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese dee basɛ a pↄyʋa la. Pↄka la daan de la Grɛkɩ, ba dↄgɛ ẽ na Fenisi tẽŋa n boe Siiri so'olʋm pʋam.
41007027	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ kↄma dẽŋɛ di tɩgɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kↄma dia bↄ baasɩ."
41007028	Tɩ pↄka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, la de la sɩra, la baasɩ n boe ba dãana taablɩ tilum diti la kↄma di-zõra n luti la."
41007029	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn lerge se'em wã ı̃yã, kule, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ fʋ pↄyʋa la."
41007030	Tɩ pↄka la daan lebe kule, la ẽn paagɛ yire la, a yẽ tɩ a pↄyʋa la gã la bõn-gã'ala pʋam, la kʋlkã'arga la sɩrɩ yese dee basɛ ẽ mɛ.
41007031	Azezi le ze'ele Tiiri so'olʋm doose la Sidõ, doose Dekapↄlɩ tẽnsɩ pʋam lebe Galile mõgrɛ la bↄba.
41007032	Tɩ ba tarɩ bʋraa n de waŋa, dee ka tãna tↄgra sõŋa wa'am a zẽ'am, wa belem ẽ yetɩ, a dɩkɛ a nu'ugo paglɛ waŋa la zuo.
41007033	Tɩ Azezi tarɩ ẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa dɩkɛ a nu'ubiɛ tũm a tʋba pʋam, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm kalʋm bʋraa la zɩlɩŋa.
41007034	Dee gorge saazuo sı̃'im vo'ose fõo, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Efata", a võorɛ de la "yo'oge!"
41007035	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bʋraa la tʋba yo'oge, tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tↄgra sõŋa sõŋa.
41007036	Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ bↄ nẽra nẽra. La ẽn daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ bↄ nẽra nẽra la, ba daan tõn tↄgra mɛ zozo'e.
41007037	Tɩ la di'ige ba zozo'e halɩ tɩ ba yɛta tɩ: "A ẽŋɛ sɛla woo la sõŋa, botɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ mugro tↄgra."
41008001	Dabs-bãma pʋam nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n daan le lagsɛ, tɩ dia ka bↄna tɩ ba wʋn di. Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ:
41008002	"Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, dabsa atã tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am dee ka tara dia wʋn di.
41008003	Mam sãn basɛ ba tɩ ba kule ba yiɛ la kↄm, ba wʋn ka vibe mɛ sore, se'ere n soe la, basɛba ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am."
41008004	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tã'agɛ yẽ dia tɩ la seke nẽr-bãna wuu, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã?"
41008005	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Bayopↄɩ."
41008006	Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la zı̃'ire tẽŋa. Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopↄɩ la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽrba la. Tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la.
41008007	La ba daan tarɩ la zũn-pɩgsɩ mẽ fẽe. Tɩ Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ zũma la ı̃yã, dee botɩ a karẽnbiisi la dɩkɛ pʋɩ nẽrba la.
41008008	Tɩ nẽrba la daan di tɩgɛ. Dee tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ dia n weege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ.
41008009	Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de wʋ tʋsanaasɩ. Tɩ Azezi daan botɩ ba kule,
41008010	dee tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ Dalmanuta so'olʋm.
41008011	Tɩ Farisi dõma daan wa'am wa wẽ'era nõke'ene la Azezi, yetɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a botɩ bõn-yãlma ze'ele saazuo ẽŋɛ n pa'alɩ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
41008012	Tɩ Azezi sı̃'im vo'ose fõo, dee soke yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ zamãana ẽna nẽrba ɛɛra bõn-yãlma? Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam kãn botɩ bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ bɛla ẽŋɛ tɩ zamãana ẽna yẽ."
41008013	La Azezi basɛ ba mɛ dee le kẽ õorŋↄ dↄↄra mõgrɛ la doone ke bↄba.
41008014	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la daan yı̃m ka dɩkɛ borborɩ, sãn dagna borborɩ ayɩla mã'a tɩ ba tarɩ õorŋↄ la pʋam.
41008015	Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la naba A'erↄdɩ dãbɩllɛ la."
41008016	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tↄgra la taaba yetɩ: "Tõma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã tɩ a yele bɛla."
41008017	Tɩ Azezi daan bãŋɛ, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tↄgra la taaba tɩ la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ı̃yã? Yãma ka wõm a võorɛ? Yãma yɛm ka like?
41008018	Yãma tarɩ la nini dee ka yẽta? Ya tarɩ la tʋba dee ka wõnna? Yãma ka tẽrɩ?
41008019	Mam n daan fiise borborɩ banuu la bↄ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu tɩ ba di la, borborɩ gito n deege la, pɩtↄ balɛ tɩ yãma daan vaagɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩtↄ pia la ayi." Tɩ a le soke ba yetɩ:
41008020	"La mam n daan fiise borborɩ bayopↄɩ la pʋɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la, yãma daan vaagɛ sɛba n deege la pɩtↄ balɛ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Pɩtↄ bayopↄɩ."
41008021	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma nãn ka wõm a võorɛ?"
41008022	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ la Betisayida. Tɩ ba tarɩ fʋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa belem ẽ yetɩ a kalʋm ẽ.
41008023	Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ fʋa la nu'ugo ve'ege ẽ tẽŋa la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm ẽŋɛ a nini, dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ a zuo, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽtɩ sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?"
41008024	Tɩ bʋraa la dↄ'ↄgɛ zuugo bɩsɛ, yetɩ: "Mam yẽtɩ nẽrba tɩ ba ãna wʋ tɩɩsɩ la, la ba sẽnnɩ mɛ."
41008025	Tɩ Azezi le dɩkɛ a nu'usi kalʋm fʋa la nini. Tɩ a nini pike yɩlɩŋɛ, tɩ a yẽta sɛla woo sõŋa sõŋa.
41008026	Tɩ Azezi basɛ ẽ yetɩ a kule, a da le kẽ tẽŋa la pʋam.
41008027	La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan we'esɩ la tẽnsɩ n lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare. La ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?"
41008028	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli. Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn boe la nẽra ayɩla."
41008029	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?" Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na."
41008030	Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tↄgɛ ẽŋa yelle bↄ nẽra nẽra.
41008031	Tɩ Azezi yãŋa zãsna a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
41008032	A daan tↄgɛ ba la vẽelga vẽelga. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wi ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ, a da le tↄgɛ bɛla.
41008033	Tɩ Azezi gelge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la, dee tãsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asũtãana, sẽŋɛ lebe mam poorʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ tẽ'esgↄ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgↄ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgↄ."
41008034	Dee wi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, la a karẽnbiisi la a zẽ'am, yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
41008035	Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, la kõ-yẽlga la ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
41008036	Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm?
41008037	Bẽm tɩ nẽrsaala wʋn dɩkɛ teege vↄm? Sɛla kaɩ.
41008038	Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ı̃yã, la mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, zamãana ẽna wã n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra, dee dɛna tõon-be'ero dõma wã tẽŋasʋka, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ na ẽ, wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn leme wa'am la a Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma la."
41009001	La a le yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã, basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n sẽm na pãŋa."
41009002	Tɩ dabsa ayoobɩ daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã mã'a doose ẽ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo. Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam.
41009003	Tɩ a futo pelge yɩlɩ yɩlɩ yẽgra halɩ, tɩ nẽra ka bↄna dũnia wã zuo tãna wʋn peege tɩ ba pelge bɛla.
41009004	Tɩ A'eli, la Amoyisi puke ba zẽ'am tↄgra la Azezi.
41009005	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tı̃ põnsɩ batã, bↄ fõn ayɩla, bↄ Amoyisi ayɩla, bↄ A'eli ayɩla."
41009006	A daan ka mi ẽŋa n tↄgɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n daan kẽ ba.
41009007	Tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ. Selse-ya a yetↄga."
41009008	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba bɩsɛ kaagɛ ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a n boe ba zẽ'am.
41009009	Tɩ ba ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra, tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: "Da tↄgɛ-ya pa'alɛ nẽra nẽra yãma n yẽ sɛla la, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ, dee vo'oge."
41009010	Tɩ ba to'oge ẽn yele se'em na, dee sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Kũm vo'ore võorɛ de la bẽm?"
41009011	Tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli dẽŋɛ wa'am, tɩ Krisi yãŋa wa'am poorʋm?"
41009012	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Asɩra, A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa malgɛ sɛla woo. La bẽm tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle yetɩ, a wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e dee yẽ pↄ'ↄrɛ?
41009013	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ nẽrba ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em, wʋ lan gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na."
41009014	Ban lebe ka lɛm karẽnbiisi basɛba la zẽ'am na, ba yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e n kaagɛ ba, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba wẽ'era nõkɛ'ɛma la ba.
41009015	La nẽrba la n daan yẽ Azezi la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba zoe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
41009016	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'era nõke'ene la ba?"
41009017	Tɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka yele yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam tarɩ la m dayʋa wa'am fõn zẽ'am, kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ botɩ a dɛna muko.
41009018	La kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a lʋbrɩ ẽ mɛ tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra, tɩ a ↄbra yẽna dee gorŋe. Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am wa sose fʋ karẽnbiisi la yetɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ."
41009019	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, mam wʋn bↄna la yãma mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna? Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am."
41009020	Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am a zẽ'am. La kʋlkã'arga la n yẽ Azezi la, bilam mẽŋa a dãan bia la mɛ, tɩ a lui tẽŋa bilna, tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra a nõorʋm.
41009021	Tɩ Azezi soke bia la sↄ yetɩ: "Wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽna ẽŋɛ ẽ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "A bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm.
41009022	La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn lʋbɛ ẽ na bugum, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam, bↄↄra tɩ a kʋ ẽ. Fʋ sãn tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla, zoe tɩ ninbãalga sõŋɛ tↄ."
41009023	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fʋ yetɩ, fõn sãn tãna? Nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra, a tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo bↄ ẽ mɛ."
41009024	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bia la sↄ tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Mam bↄ sɩra, la sõŋɛ mam tɩ m bↄ sɩra pa'asɛ."
41009025	La Azezi daan yẽ tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n zotɩ sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga n botɩ nẽra dɛna muko la waŋa, mam yetɩ fʋ yese dee basɛ ẽ, da le doose ẽ."
41009026	Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la kaasɛ tagurga, dee bigse bia la ke'enke'em, dee yese. Tɩ bia la ãna wʋ kũm na. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yetɩ a ki mɛ.
41009027	Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ a nu'ugo zẽkɛ ẽ, tɩ a isge ze'ele saazuo.
41009028	La Azezi daan kẽ la deem, ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a, tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ tõma ka tã'agɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna?"
41009029	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sãn dagna pʋ'ʋsgↄ, sɛla sɛla ka boe n tã wʋn dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna buuri."
41009030	La ba daan yese bilam doose la Galile tẽŋa tole. La Azezi daan ka boorɩ tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boe zẽ'a.
41009031	A daan zãsʋm a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. La ba sãn kʋ ẽ, dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
41009032	Tɩ ba daan ka bãŋɛ yetↄga la võorɛ, dee zↄta ka soke ẽ.
41009033	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Kapɛrnaʋm kẽ deem. Tɩ Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'erɩ nɩ nõke'ene sore zuo la?"
41009034	Tɩ ba sı̃na, se'ere n soe la, ba wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ sɛka n de nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
41009035	Tɩ Azezi zı̃'ire, wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dɛna poorʋm dãana, la nẽrba wuu tõntõnna."
41009036	Azezi yele bɛla dee tarɩ la bi-pɩka wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka, dɩkɛ a nu'usi kↄkɛ bia la, dee yele ba yetɩ:
41009037	"Nẽra sãn to'oge bi-pɩka ẽna tadãana mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa, la nẽra sãn to'oge mam mẽŋa, la dagɩ mam tɩ a to'oge, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na."
41009038	Tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma daan yẽ la bʋraa n tarɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ı̃yã tɩ tõma gu ẽ."
41009039	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da gu-ya ẽ, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka boe wʋn tõm tõon-yãlma la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ, dee tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe tɩ a le tã'agɛ tↄgɛ mam be'em.
41009040	Nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri tõma, a de la tõma nẽra.
41009041	Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn bↄ ya ko'om tɩ ya yũ, yãma n de mam n de Krisi nẽrba la ı̃yã, ẽŋa dãana kãn koŋe a yↄↄrↄ.
41009042	La nẽra sãn botɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bↄ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
41009043	La fʋ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nu'usi bayi dee kẽ bug-tẽŋa, ((
41009044	zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.))
41009045	La fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nã'a-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nãma bayi dee tɩ ba dɩkɛ fʋ lobe basɛ bug-tẽŋa, ((
41009046	zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.))
41009047	La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋↄ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nini bayi dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa,
41009048	zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mı̃ dita nẽrba ı̃yã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kı̃ŋra.
41009049	Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la bugum makɛ nẽrba wuu wʋ ban dɩkɛ yaarʋm yugse sɛla.
41009050	Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm? Ãna-ya wʋ yaarʋm n tarɩ yẽlʋm se'em na, dee tara sũ-mã'asʋm la taaba."
41010001	La Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e le lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba wʋ ẽŋa n ẽn ɩta se'em na.
41010002	Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ a lebse a pↄga mɛ bɩɩ?"
41010003	Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: "Amoyisi yʋʋn bↄ ya nõorɛ yetɩ bẽm?"
41010004	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ tɩ gʋlsɛ la pↄgdire lebsgo gõŋↄ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse."
41010005	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algↄ la ı̃yã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ nõor-ẽŋa bↄ ya.
41010006	La halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo, Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam la bʋraa la pↄka.
41010007	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ bʋraa wʋn basɛ a sↄ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pↄga.
41010008	La ba ka le dɛna bayi, ba lebge la ayɩla.
41010009	Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba."
41010010	La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ la deem, tɩ ba le soke ẽ yelle ẽŋa võorɛ.
41010011	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa sãn lebse a pↄga dee di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pↄga.
41010012	La pↄka mẽ sãn basɛ a sɩra dee ele bʋraa ayẽma, a mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ a gã'arɛ la bʋraa n dagɩ a sɩra."
41010013	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.
41010014	La Azezi n yẽ bɛla la, la ka ẽŋɛ a sũure yẽlʋm, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ.
41010015	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sↄna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
41010016	A yele bɛla, dee to'ose kↄma la mɛ, dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto kã kã'a-sõma bↄ ba.
41010017	Azezi daan basɛ bilam dee le dɩkɛ la sore sẽnna. Tɩ bʋraa zoe wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma a nẽŋam soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
41010018	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn wi'ira mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋↄ? Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
41010019	Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em: 'Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga, da zũ, da tↄgɛ põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto, da wẽgɛ nẽra, nanna fʋ sↄ, la fʋ ma.' "
41010020	Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu."
41010021	Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ nõŋɛ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dↄla mam."
41010022	La ẽn wõm wãna la, tɩ a nẽŋa zũŋe tɩ a fõrgɛ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
41010023	Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la kaagɛ, dee yele ba yetɩ: "La tↄ mɛ bↄ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
41010024	Tɩ a yetↄga la di'ige a karẽnbiisi la. Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "M kↄma, la tↄ mɛ tɩ nẽra kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
41010025	La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupı̃im yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
41010026	Tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?"
41010027	Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba dee yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ."
41010028	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ dee dↄla fõn."
41010029	Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ a ma, bɩɩ a sↄ, bɩɩ a kↄma, bɩɩ a vatↄ mam ı̃yã, la Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la ı̃yã,
41010030	dũnia wã zuo a wʋn to'oge yiɛ, la kẽendõma, la yɩbsɩ, la madõma, la kↄma, la vatↄ nõor-kↄbga, la a wʋn yẽ nãmsgↄ. La wakatɛ n sẽm, a wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ.
41010031	La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma."
41010032	Ba daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi bↄna ba nẽŋa. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽgra, dee tɩ dabeem tara nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ba la. Tɩ Azezi le tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ ka tↄgra pa'ala ba bõn-sɛba n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ ẽŋa,
41010033	yetɩ: "Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum. Tɩ ba wʋn tↄgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ a masɛ la kũm, dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum,
41010034	tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee kʋ ẽ. La a wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ."
41010035	Tɩ Azebede kↄma Azakɩ la Azã sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ la tõma n wʋn sose fõn bõn-sɛka la, fʋ ẽŋɛ bↄ tↄ."
41010036	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ ya?"
41010037	Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, botɩ tõma nẽra ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ zʋʋgↄ, tɩ ayɩla zı̃'ire fʋ gↄbga."
41010038	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla. Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã, bɩɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ wʋ mam n sakɛ tɩ m nãmsɛ se'em na halɩ ka ki?"
41010039	Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla." Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ba yetɩ: "Asɩra, ya wʋn nãmsɛ nãmsgↄ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã halɩ ka ki.
41010040	La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zı̃'ire mam zʋʋgↄ bɩɩ mam gↄbga. Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bↄ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ la."
41010041	La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la Azakɩ la Azã.
41010042	Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu, yele ba yetɩ: "Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
41010043	La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Nẽr-sɛka n boe ya pʋam bↄↄra tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
41010044	La nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya wuu yamŋa.
41010045	Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bↄ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bↄ, dee dɩkɛ a vↄm bↄ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ."
41010046	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ dↄla la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tↄlla, la ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa la pʋam yɛsra la, nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n dolɩ ba. Tɩ fʋa zẽa sore nõorʋm sↄsra, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Abartime, a de la Atime dayʋa.
41010047	La ẽn wõm tɩ ba tↄgrɩ tɩ la de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, tɩ a tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Azezi, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga."
41010048	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Go'oge fʋ yetↄga la." Tɩ a malɩn tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga."
41010049	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee yetɩ: "Wi-ya ẽ tɩ a wa'am." Tɩ ba wi ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Keŋe fʋ sũure, isge tɩ a wi'iri fo."
41010050	Tɩ a lobe a fugↄbga basɛ, dee vaa isge sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am.
41010051	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ fↄ?" Tɩ a yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ."
41010052	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã tɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ." Tɩ fʋa la yẽta bilam mẽŋa, dↄla Azezi sore la zuo.
41011001	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka yↄna la Zerizalɛm, lɛm Betɩfaazɩ la Betani, Oliivi tãŋa la zẽ'am. Tɩ a tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi,
41011002	yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam. Ya sãn paagɛ mı̃, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ. Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
41011003	La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: 'Wãne tɩ ya lↄrgra ẽ?', ya lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ', tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am tↄtↄ."
41011004	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ bõn-biire la n lʋ zanõrʋm sore nõorʋm, tɩ ba lorge ẽ.
41011005	La nẽrba basɛba n daan ze bilam soke ba yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ yãma lↄrgra bõn-biire la?"
41011006	Tɩ ba lerge wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ nẽrba la basɛ ba.
41011007	Tɩ ba tarɩ bõn-biire la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
41011008	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ basɛba sẽŋɛ va'am ka kↄ võorↄ wa yɛrgɛ sore zuo.
41011009	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na daan tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Ozaana! Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.
41011010	Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm tɩ a di tɩ yaaba Adavidi na'am na. Ozaana! Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
41011011	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zerizalɛm kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bɩsɛ sɛla woo kaagɛ. Tɩ wẽnnɛ mã'agɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yese sẽŋɛ Betani.
41011012	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ ba ze'ele Betani lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kↄm dõnna.
41011013	Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze zãazãarɛ tara võorↄ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ a na'an wʋn yẽ sɛla kẽnkãŋa la zuo. La ẽn paagɛ la, a ka yẽ sɛla a zuo, a yẽ la võorↄ mã'a. Se'ere n soe la, kẽnkãma wakatɛ daan nãn ka paagɛ.
41011014	Tɩ Azezi yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: "Nẽra kãn le malɩn di fʋ biɛ." Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wõm.
41011015	Tɩ ba paagɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra nẽr-sɛba n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ Wẽndeem na tɩ ba yɛsra. Dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
41011016	La a daan ka sakɛ tɩ nẽra zɛɛra sɛla dↄla Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam.
41011017	Dee daan zãsna nẽrba la yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego buuri wuu ı̃yã.' La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgↄ zẽ'a."
41011018	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma wõm bɛla, ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ ẽ, la ba zotɩ ẽ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋↄ la daan kẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sũure mɛ zozo'e.
41011019	Tɩ zaanõorɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
41011020	Tɩ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ ba dↄla sore la, yẽ kẽnkãŋa la n kʋɩ la yẽga wuu.
41011021	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, yele Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ, kẽnkãŋa la tɩ fʋ kã be'em bↄ ẽ na kʋɩ mɛ."
41011022	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra.
41011023	Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: 'Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam', dee bↄ sɩra a sũure pʋam tɩ ẽŋa n yele se'em na wʋn ẽŋɛ, dee ka sẽ'ena, la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ.
41011024	Bɛla tɩ mam yetɩ, ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ sↄsra sɛla, bↄ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra tɩ ya to'oge ya, tɩ ya wʋn sɩrɩ to'oge.
41011025	La ya sãn bↄna mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya sãn tara yelle la nẽra, basɛ-ya ẽ taalɛ, tɩ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ. ((
41011026	Yãma sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ kãn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.))"
41011027	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la le sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na ɛɛra. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am,
41011028	ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna? Bɩɩ ãne n bↄ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta bõn-bãna?"
41011029	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.
41011030	Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba? Lerge-ya ma."
41011031	Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ sãn lerge yetɩ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
41011032	Tɩ mẽ kãn tã'agɛ yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ." Ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan sakɛ tɩ Azã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
41011033	Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka mi." Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãma."
41012001	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi daan magsrɩ la magsa tↄgra bↄ'ↄra ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa ayɩla n daan kↄ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, dee tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zↄnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ va'am na bↄ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
41012002	Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bↄ ẽ.
41012003	Tɩ ba yõkɛ tõntõnna la wẽ, botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
41012004	Tɩ va'am na dãana le tõm nẽra ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ a zuugo ãagɛ, dee yaalɛ ẽ.
41012005	Tɩ a le malɩn tõm nẽra ayɩla, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. Tɩ a tõm nẽrba zozo'e, tɩ ba wẽ basɛba, dee kʋ basɛba.
41012006	La nẽra ayɩla mã'a n daan deege tɩ a tãna wʋn tõm, la de la a bi-nõŋrɛ. Tɩ a daan tõm ẽ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: 'Ẽna n de mam dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.'
41012007	Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yele taaba yetɩ: 'Ẽna n wʋn wa sↄↄgɛ sↄna a sↄ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnↄ.'
41012008	Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ kʋ, tarɩ ẽ yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka basɛ.
41012009	Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bↄ basɛba.
41012010	Yãma põn karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ zẽ'e-sɛka n gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa.
41012011	La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bↄ tõma.' "
41012012	Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma la daan ɛɛra tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi, se'ere n soe la, ba mi tɩ la de la bãma ı̃yã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ ẽŋa, la ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
41012013	Tɩ ba tõm Farisi dõma basɛba, la naba A'erↄdɩ nẽrba basɛba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi sokre tɩ a tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.
41012014	Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee ka fabla nẽrba n tↄgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, la fõn zãsnɩ nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra. Tõma yetɩ tɩ soke bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ tɩ yↄ lampo bↄ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe? Tɩ yↄ bɩɩ tɩ da yↄ?"
41012015	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ ba boorɩ tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽŋa mɛ, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya bẽta ma? Tarɩ-ya lagfↄ wa'am tɩ m bɩsɛ."
41012016	Tɩ ba tarɩ lagfↄ la wa'am wa bↄ ẽ. Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la Rom na-keko la."
41012017	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka." Tɩ Azezi yetↄga la di'ige ba.
41012018	Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ:
41012019	"Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ bↄ tõma yetɩ: 'Nẽra sↄbia sãn ki deege a pↄga dee ka tara bia, a di pↄkõorɛ la dↄgɛ kↄma bↄ sɛka n ki la.'
41012020	La bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n daan boe dɛna sↄbiisi. Tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la di pↄga, ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia.
41012021	Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pↄkõorɛ la, mẽ ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
41012022	La bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu lagɩm di pↄka la mɛ, ki dee ka dↄgɛ bia. Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pↄka la mẽ ki.
41012023	Bãma bayopↄɩ wuu n lagɩm di pↄka la dee ki la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sↄna pↄka la?"
41012024	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yele se'em, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ı̃yã.
41012025	Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pↄgba, la pↄgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba, ba wuu wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.
41012026	La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Amoyisi gõŋↄ la pʋam Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn ze'ele tũntuugo la pʋam tↄgɛ la ẽ se'em na? A yʋʋn yele yetɩ: 'Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.'
41012027	La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vↄa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la sɛba n vↄa Nawẽnnɛ. Ya tuuge mɛ zozo'e."
41012028	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nẽra ayɩla wõm ban tↄgrɩ la taaba, dee bãŋɛ tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma la sõŋa, tɩ a lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na wuu pʋam, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ?"
41012029	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛka n gãnnɩ wuu n wãna: 'Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, selse-ya. Zuudãana n de tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na, de la Zuudãana ayɩla.
41012030	Nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de fʋ Zuudãana la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu.'
41012031	La bʋyi dãana n wãna: 'Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.' Nõorɛ ayẽma ka boe n gãnnɩ bãna."
41012032	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn yele se'em na ãn sõŋa, la de la sɩra, Nawẽnnɛ de la ayɩla, ayẽma ka boe sãn dagna ẽŋa mã'a.
41012033	Fʋ nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na, ãn sõŋa mɛ gãnna kãabgↄ buuri wuu."
41012034	Tɩ Azezi yẽ ẽn lerge la yɛm na, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ ka zãagɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm." Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
41012035	Azezi n daan zãsnɩ nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, a soke ba yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ Krisi de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
41012036	Dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yʋʋn botɩ Adavidi mẽŋa tↄgɛ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.'
41012037	Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana', la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?" Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sɛlsra a yetↄga la sũ-yẽlʋm.
41012038	Azezi n zãsnɩ nẽrba la, a yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ kaara la fu-wogro bↄↄra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm,
41012039	dee bↄↄra nã'asgↄ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
41012040	Ba to'osrɩ la pↄkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba. Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu."
41012041	Azezi daan zı̃ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm ligri daka la zẽ'am dee bɩsra nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n sẽnnɩ ɩta ligri daka la pʋam. Tɩ bõntatba zozo'e ɩta ligri pãɩ.
41012042	Tɩ pↄkõorɛ n de nasa wa'am wa dɩkɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a ẽŋɛ mı̃.
41012043	Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ pↄkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ ligri daka la pʋam zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
41012044	Se'ere n soe la, bãma wuu looge la bãma n tarɩ sɛla pãɩ la pʋam wa ẽŋɛ mı̃. La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mı̃."
41013001	Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛsra, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ kuga n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ ba dɩkɛ mẽ de-kãra se'em."
41013002	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ de-kãra wã, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo."
41013003	La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo tɩ a nẽŋa bɩsra Wẽnde-kãtɛ la. La Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la A'ãndre mã'a n daan boe a zẽ'am,
41013004	soke ẽ yetɩ: "Yele to, wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ, la bẽm n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ mɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ?"
41013005	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
41013006	Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: 'Mam n de Krisi la.' La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
41013007	Ya sãn wa wõm zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ, la zɛbrɛ yelle, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem kẽ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ. La, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgↄ.
41013008	Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma. La tẽŋa wʋn tı̃i mı̃im mɛ zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la kↄm wʋn bↄna. Bɛla wuu nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pↄka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.
41013009	Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba wʋn tarɩ ya mɛ sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, tɩ ba wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam. La ba wʋn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ gↄmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam mam ı̃yã. La ya wʋn tↄgɛ mam yɛla pa'alɛ ba.
41013010	La dẽnɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la dẽŋɛ mõolɛ bↄ buuri wuu, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgↄ paagɛ.
41013011	La ba sãn wa yõgɛ ya tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka sãm sarɩyadia zẽ'am, ya da fabla yãma n wʋn tↄgɛ se'em, wakatɛ sãn wa paagɛ, tↄgɛ-ya yetↄg-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ ya mẽŋa n wʋn tↄgɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn sõŋɛ ya.
41013012	Sↄbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ sↄbia kʋ, tɩ sↄ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ a bia bɛla, la kↄma wʋn zɛbra la ba sↄdõma, la ba madõma botɩ ba kʋ ba.
41013013	Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgↄ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
41013014	Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, tɩ a boe zẽ'e-sɛka n ka masɛ tɩ a bↄna la." (Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ la mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.) "Ya sãn yẽ bɛla, sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuo.
41013015	La nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ da sige bↄↄra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
41013016	La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
41013017	Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bↄ pↄg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa la, la sɛba n tarɩ kↄma tɩ ba mõgra la.
41013018	Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yel-bãma da wa dɛna ↄↄrↄ wakatɛ.
41013019	Se'ere n soe la, dabs-bãma wʋn dɛna la toogo zozo'e, tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ pı̃'iluŋo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nãam dũnia wa paam zı̃na, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
41013020	Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra ka boe nɩ n wʋn põsɛ. La Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa nẽrba tɩ a looge la ı̃yã, tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
41013021	La nẽra sãn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', ya da sakɛ.
41013022	Nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tõm tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bↄↄra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge doose ba.
41013023	Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ya sɛla woo mɛ."
41013024	Azezi le yele yetɩ: "Toogo la dabsa poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem.
41013025	La wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui. La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mı̃im mɛ.
41013026	La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
41013027	La a wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma mɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia gↄbga la zʋʋgↄ, la dapoore la zanõrɛ, ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu."
41013028	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋↄ la võorɛ. Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võorↄ, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
41013029	Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
41013030	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
41013031	Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetↄga kãn malɩn tole.
41013032	Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am. Baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
41013033	Guuse ya mẽŋa sõŋa, la ya mãasʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakatɛ la.
41013034	La wʋn ãna wʋ bʋraa n we'esɩ sore dee dɩkɛ a yire gu'ule a tõntõnɩba, bↄ tõntõnna woo a tõonɛ, dee yele zanõr-gu'ura tɩ a gu'ura.
41013035	Bɛla ı̃yã gu'ura-ya, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakat-sɛka tɩ yidãana la wʋn leme wa'am. A tã wʋn leme wa'am zaanõorɛ mɛ, bɩɩ sõnsʋa, bɩɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasga wakatɛ, bɩɩ bulika.
41013036	Guuse-ya tɩ yidãana la da wa'am wa di'ige ya, tɩ ya gı̃sri mɛ.
41013037	Mam n yetɩ ya se'em na, mam yetɩ nẽrba wuu la bɛla, gu'ura-ya."
41014001	La daan deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa tɩ ba obrɩ borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ dabsa paagɛ. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma ɛɛra sore tɩ ba sʋgɛ yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
41014002	Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa wã pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ."
41014003	Azezi daan boe la Betani, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne yire, tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ dita. Tɩ pↄka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ naarɩ, wa'am wa vuke dugla la, ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
41014004	Tɩ nẽrba basɛba n boe bilam na sũure sã'am, tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ pↄka la sã'am ka-sõma la wãna?
41014005	Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose ba gãŋɛ lig-kõba kↄbstã mɛ, dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma." Tɩ ba zɛrgɛ pↄka la.
41014006	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya pↄka la bãalam, bẽm tɩ ya tↄgra ẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am? Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bↄ mam na de la tõon-sõŋↄ.
41014007	Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa mɛ yan boorɩ wakat-sɛka, la mam kãn bↄna la ya lɛ wakatɛ wuu.
41014008	Ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la, tɩ a ẽŋɛ. Ẽn ka'agɛ ka-sõma la ẽŋɛ mam ı̃yã la, a dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ la ban wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
41014009	Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn wa mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tↄgɛ pↄka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle."
41014010	Tɩ Azudaasɩ Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba tɩ ẽŋa wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
41014011	La ban daan wõm ẽn yele se'em na, tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bↄ ẽ ligri. Tɩ Azudaasɩ yãŋa ɛɛra so-sɛka tɩ a wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yãŋɛ yõkɛ ẽ na.
41014012	Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pↄspↄsɩ daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ. Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?"
41014013	Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ
41014014	sẽŋɛ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la, ka yele yidãana la yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, deego boe la bɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi wʋn di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la?'
41014015	A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ sɛla woo mãasʋm bↄna mı̃. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn mãasʋm tɩ tɩ di kibsa la."
41014016	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la pʋam ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na. Tɩ ba mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la bilam.
41014017	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am,
41014018	wa zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n diti la mam kalam n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam."
41014019	Tɩ la daan sã'am ba sũure. Tɩ ba sↄkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: "La de la mam?"
41014020	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "La de la ya nẽrba pia la ayi la nẽr-sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na.
41014021	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ lan põn gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na. La sɛka n yetɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo. Nẽr-ẽŋa ma sãn ka dↄgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ."
41014022	La ban daan diti la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "To'oge-ya di, ẽna wã de la mam ı̃yã."
41014023	Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bↄ ba, tɩ ba wuu yũ.
41014024	Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ı̃yã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ la ba.
41014025	Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le yũ ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
41014026	Tɩ ba yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
41014027	Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsı̃ina dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.' "
41014028	La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya sẽŋɛ Galile."
41014029	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Baa ba wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn basɛ fõn."
41014030	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zı̃na, yʋ'ʋŋↄ ẽna wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam."
41014031	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn." Tɩ karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
41014032	Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'e-sɛka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Getsemane la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Zı̃'ire-ya kalam dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ."
41014033	La a tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã sẽŋɛ. Tɩ a sũure sã'am zozo'e, tɩ la dãan ẽ.
41014034	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-sã'aŋↄ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ mam ãna wʋ m yetɩ m ki mɛ na. Weege-ya kalam gu'ura, da gı̃se-ya."
41014035	La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe, ka võglɛ tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, la sãn tãna, toogo la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
41014036	Dee yetɩ: "M Sↄ, fõn tã sɛla woo ɩta, basɛ tɩ nãmsgↄ ẽna fõrgɛ dee basɛ ma. La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em."
41014037	La a leme a karẽnbiisi batã la zẽ'am wa yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ, tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asimõ, fõn gı̃sri mɛ? Fõn ka tã wʋn gu karf-ayɩla ka gı̃se?"
41014038	Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui. Ya sɩa la boorɩ mɛ, la ya ı̃yã ka tara pãŋa."
41014039	La a daan le lebe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ se'em na.
41014040	Dee le leme wa yẽ tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n ba tarɩ ba. Tɩ ba ka mina ban wʋn yele ẽ se'em.
41014041	A daan le sẽŋɛ mɛ, dee leme wa'am nõorɛ atã pʋam wa soke ba yetɩ: "Ya ken vↄ'ↄsra mɛ dee gı̃sra? La ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ mɛ, wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
41014042	Isge-ya tɩ sẽŋɛ, tɩ sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna sẽm."
41014043	Azezi n daan ken tↄgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla, doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ sẽŋɛ paam. La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la daan tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa dↄla ẽ. La de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n tõm ba.
41014044	La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn tↄgɛ mɛ pa'alɛ ba yetɩ: "Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kↄkɛ ẽ na, ẽŋa n bɛla, yõkɛ-ya ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sõŋa fõrgɛ."
41014045	La Azudaasɩ n paam na, a sẽŋɛ lɛm na Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama." Dee kↄkɛ ẽ.
41014046	Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ ẽ.
41014047	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe mı̃ na nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkↄbgↄ sɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
41014048	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la dↄa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
41014049	Mam daan boe la yãma lɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam. La, la de la tɩ bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na ẽŋɛ."
41014050	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
41014051	La budib-polle ayɩla n daan lobe fugↄbga mã'a dↄla Azezi. Tɩ ba daan zɛ ẽ tɩ ba yõkɛ,
41014052	tɩ a basɛ a fugↄbga la dee zoe beele fõrgɛ.
41014053	Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, bilam tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wuu tigse.
41014054	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bↄna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dↄla, ka paagɛ kẽ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire zẽnzakam, zẽa la tõntõnɩba ↄↄsra bugum.
41014055	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ, la ba ka yẽ.
41014056	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan parɩm bↄ Azezi, la ba yetↄga la ka doose taaba.
41014057	Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan isge parɩm bↄ ẽ yetɩ:
41014058	"Tõma wõm tɩ a yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la tɩ nẽrsaalba mẽ la, dee le mẽ ayẽma dabsa atã pʋam n dagɩ nẽrsaalba mẽa.' "
41014059	Baa bõn-ẽŋa pʋam ba yetↄga la ka doose taaba.
41014060	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge ze'ele ba wuu nẽŋam soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ban tↄgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
41014061	Tɩ Azezi daan sı̃na ka lerge se'ere. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tõma pẽgrɩ la Dayʋa la?"
41014062	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe, mam de la ẽŋa. La ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tɩ a zı̃ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna."
41014063	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: "Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma?
41014064	Ya wõm ẽn sã'am Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ. Yãma tẽ'esɛ la wãne?" Tɩ ba wuu yetɩ: "A masɛ la kũm."
41014065	Tɩ ba nẽrba basɛba daan sẽŋɛ tʋbsra nõtõorʋm ɩta Azezi, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ pı̃ a nini, mũm kũnkũra wẽ ẽ, dee yɛta ẽ tɩ: "Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tↄ nẽr-sɛka n wẽ fↄ?" Tɩ gu'urba la to'oge ẽ, wẽ a pɛgsɩ.
41014066	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan ken bↄna la zẽnzakam na, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõn-pↄka wa'am mı̃,
41014067	wa yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n ↄↄsrɩ bugum na, tɩ a bɩsra ẽ, dee yetɩ: "Fõn mẽ daan po bↄna la Nazarɛtɩ bʋraa Azezi lɛ."
41014068	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn yele se'em na võorɛ." Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla dee yese ka zɛ la zanõrʋm, tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ.
41014069	Tɩ tõntõn-pↄka la le yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mı̃ na yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna de la Azezi nẽra ayɩla."
41014070	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze mı̃ na le yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla. Fõn de la Galile nẽra."
41014071	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pↄɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋra-sɛka tɩ ya tↄgrɩ a yelle wã."
41014072	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ le kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi pʋam. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: "Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rↄↄgↄ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam" na. Tɩ a sũure sã'am, tɩ a kɛlla.
41015001	Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, bãma wuu n de sarɩyaditba la daan lagsɛ mɛ tↄgɛ kʋ, botɩ ba lʋ Azezi tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am.
41015002	Tɩ Apilatɩ soke Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na."
41015003	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la dõrɛ ẽ yɛla zozo'e.
41015004	Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn wõm yetↄg-sɛba wuu tɩ ba tↄgɛ bↄ fʋ wã, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?"
41015005	Tɩ Azezi ka le lerge se'ere, tɩ la di'ige Apilatɩ.
41015006	Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa woo Apilatɩ daan ẽn botɩ ba yese la nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ la yʋ'a deem basɛ.
41015007	La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Abarabasɩ, ẽŋa la nẽrba basɛba n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra tɩ ba yõgɛ ba yʋ.
41015008	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n ɩtɩ se'em na bↄ ba.
41015009	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Ya boorɩ tɩ m yese la Zifdõma naba la basɛ bↄ ya?"
41015010	Se'ere n soe la, a bãŋɛ tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ẽŋɛ la sũure botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bↄ ẽ.
41015011	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la daan sa'asɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mɛ, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka sose Apilatɩ tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bↄ ba.
41015012	Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke ba yetɩ: "Bɛla, sɛka tɩ ya wi'iri tɩ Zifdõma naba la, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ ẽ na wãne?"
41015013	Tɩ ba tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
41015014	Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: "A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?" Tɩ ba malɩn tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
41015015	La Apilatɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ tɩ nẽrba la sũure n ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bↄ ba. Dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
41015016	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gↄmna la yire zẽnzakam, dee wi sʋdaasɩ la wuu, tɩ ba lagsɛ.
41015017	Tɩ ba dɩkɛ fuugo n de gomusga yɛ Azezi, dee dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ.
41015018	Dee yãŋa pʋ'ʋsra ẽ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba, naa!"
41015019	Dee dɩkɛ dasaarɛ wẽ a zuugo, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ ẽ, dee ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asra ẽ.
41015020	Ban yaalɛ ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee le yɛ ẽ a futo, tarɩ ẽ yese tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.
41015021	Ban daan tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba daan tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, a de la Alɛgsãndrɩ la Arufusi sↄ. A daan ze'ele la va'am lɛmna. Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la pẽrgɛ ẽ, tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dↄ-puurŋa la buke.
41015022	Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a.
41015023	Ba daan dɩkɛ la dãam n gaam na tɩɩm yʋ'ʋrɛ n de miiri bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ, tɩ a zagsɛ ka yũ.
41015024	Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pↄsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge se'em.
41015025	La daan de la bulika karf-awɛɩ wakatɛ tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo.
41015026	Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgↄ pa'alɛ bõn-sɛka n botɩ ba ka ẽ lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Zifdõma naba."
41015027	Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ayẽma a gↄbga bↄba. ((
41015028	La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ. La gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ba geele ẽ pa'asɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma pʋam."))
41015029	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ bilam tↄlla la lↄbra ba zuto, dee tʋʋra ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽhẽe, faa! Dagɩ fõn yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?
41015030	Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige."
41015031	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la mẽ la'ara ẽ yɛta taaba yetɩ: "A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa.
41015032	A sãn dɛna Krisi, Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba la, a ze'ele dↄ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã tɩ tɩ yẽ dee sakɛ." Tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba ka dↄ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tↄgɛ ẽ be'em.
41015033	Wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka n daan paagɛ, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
41015034	Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani." La võorɛ de la: "Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm n soe tɩ fõn basɛ mam?"
41015035	Tɩ sɛba n ze bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: "Selse-ya, a wi'iri la A'eli."
41015036	Tɩ nẽra ayẽma zoe ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mı̃'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dↄↄgↄ bↄ ẽ tɩ a yũ, dee yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa sike ẽ dↄ-puurŋa la zuo."
41015037	Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em dee yãŋa ki.
41015038	Wakat-ẽŋa, tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum ka paagɛ tẽŋa.
41015039	Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma daan zɛ Azezi nẽŋam yẽ ẽn ki se'em, tɩ a yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
41015040	La pↄgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan boe mı̃ zɛ kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra. Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ pɩka la Azoze ma, la Asalome n daan boe ba pʋam.
41015041	Azezi n daan boe Galile la, ba daan dolɩ ẽ mɛ dee sõŋra ẽ. La pↄgsɩ basɛba zozo'e n daan lagɩm doose ẽ wa'am Zerizalɛm n boe mı̃.
41015042	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bↄna mı̃ kẽ'era, la daan de la beere n wʋn wiige Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ ba daan bↄna mı̃ mãasna.
41015043	Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ, a ze'ele la Arimate, a de la sarɩyaditba la nẽra ayɩla tɩ ba nannɩ. A mẽ daan gu'uri la Nawẽnnɛ n wʋn wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka. Lan daan de beere n wʋn wiige vo'osgo daarɛ la ı̃yã, tɩ a kɛ'ɛm sũure sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na.
41015044	La Apilatɩ n wõm tɩ Azezi darɛ ki mɛ na, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Tɩ a botɩ ba wi sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la, tɩ a soke bãŋɛ Azezi ki yuuge mɛ?
41015045	La Apilatɩ n wõm sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lergre la, tɩ a bↄ Azozɛfʋ sore tɩ a sike kũm na.
41015046	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ da tãnnɛ sike kũm na dↄ-puurŋa la zuo, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ la vile ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ yↄↄgↄ tɩ ba daan tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã, yãŋa bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ.
41015047	Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azoze ma Amaari daan ze mɛ bɩsra zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba bı̃ŋe ẽ na.
41016001	Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la Asalome da tɩdarɛ yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa tɩ ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi ı̃yã.
41016002	Tɩ Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika wẽnnɛ n doorɩ se'em mã'a la, tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa yↄↄm na,
41016003	dee tↄgra la taaba sore yetɩ: "Ãne n wʋn bilge kugre la yↄↄgↄ la nõorʋm bↄ tↄ?"
41016004	La ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la n ba ãna kãtɛ la põn bilge mɛ gã.
41016005	Tɩ ba kẽ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam, yẽ budib-polle n yɛ fu-pɛɛlga zẽa zʋʋgↄ bↄba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ.
41016006	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Da basɛ-ya tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽgra, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ ba ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la. A vo'oge mɛ, a ka boe kalam. Bɩsɛ-ya zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan bı̃ŋe ẽ na n wãna.
41016007	Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a karẽnbiisi basɛba la yetɩ: 'A wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn yẽ ẽ, wʋ ẽn daan yele ya se'em na.' "
41016008	Tɩ ba yɛm bↄɩ, tɩ ba ı̃yã gõgra, tɩ ba yese yↄↄgↄ la pʋam zoe, la ba daan ka yele nẽra nẽra sɛla, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n tarɩ ba. ((
41016009	Azezi n daan vo'oge Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, a dẽŋɛ dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala. La de la ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ daan dolɩ ẽ tɩ Azezi dige ba, tɩ ba yese la.
41016010	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ Azezi la. Ba daan zı̃ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ la nintãm.
41016011	La ban daan wõm tɩ Azezi vo'oge mɛ tɩ Amaari yẽ ẽ na, ba daan ka sakɛ.
41016012	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi le teege nẽŋa ayẽma dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi bayi n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa tẽn-pɩka ayɩla.
41016013	Tɩ ba lebe ka yele ba taaba la, tɩ ba ka sakɛ.
41016014	La bɛla poorʋm, tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ba. Dee zɛbɛ ba, ban daan ka bↄ sɩra, la ba sũure n kɛ la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ka sakɛ sɛba n daan yẽ ẽ yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ na yetↄga.
41016015	A yele bɛla, dee yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia zẽ'a woo ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la bↄ nẽrba wuu.
41016016	Sɛka woo n bↄ sɩra, botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ. La sɛka woo n ka bↄ sɩra, ba wʋn di a sarɩya sɩbgɛ ẽ.
41016017	La sɛba n wʋn bↄ mam sɩra la, wʋn ɩta la bõn-yãlma bãna pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa: Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee tↄgra yetↄg-zãŋsɩ.
41016018	La ba sãn yõgɛ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, bɩɩ yũ yabga, la kãn ẽŋɛ ba sɛla. La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ bã'adõma zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
41016019	Zuudãana Azezi n daan tↄgɛ la ba kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a zẽkɛ mɛ zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, ka zı̃'ire Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgↄ.
41016020	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la zẽ'esɩ wuu. Tɩ Zuudãana la sõŋɛ ba, botɩ ba tõm tõon-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ba kõa la mõolgↄ de la sɩra.))
42001001	Mam sɩr-sõŋↄ Ateofili, nẽrba zozo'e n mõrgɛ gʋlsɛ yel-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ tõma zẽ'am na.
42001002	Ba gʋlsɛ yel-bãma wuu wʋ nẽrba basɛba n daan yẽ yɛla la wuu halɩ ba pı̃'iluŋo, dee mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la tↄgɛ pa'alɛ tɩ tõma wõm se'em na.
42001003	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam mã'agɛ m mẽŋa doose yel-bãma nãma sõŋa sõŋa halɩ ba pı̃'iluŋo pʋam, tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ la ãn sõŋa tɩ m gʋlsɛ yɛla la n doose taaba se'em na bↄ fↄ.
42001004	Mam gʋlsrɩ wãna tɩ fʋ bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ yel-bãna wuu tɩ ba pa'alɛ fʋ la de la sɩra.
42001005	Se'emwẽnʋm tɩ A'erↄdɩ daan de Zude tẽŋa naba la, bʋraa n daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azakari. A daan de la Zifdõma kãabgↄ kẽema, a de la Abiya buuri nẽra. Tɩ a pↄga yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'elizabɛtɩ, ẽŋa mẽ daan de la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana Aarõ buuri.
42001006	Bãma bayi daan de la nẽrba n ɩtɩ sõŋa Nawẽnnɛ nifum, dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ, la a lↄↄ la wuu sõŋa.
42001007	La ba daan ka tarɩ bia, se'ere n soe la, A'elizabɛtɩ daan de la kõndↄgrɛ, la bãma bayi la wuu mẽ kʋrgɛ mɛ.
42001008	La wakatɛ n daan paagɛ tɩ Abiya buuri kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam tɩ ba tõm. Tɩ Azakari mẽ kẽ tɩ a tõm.
42001009	Kãabgↄ kẽma la malŋↄ daan de la ba pↄsɛ looge nẽr-sɛka n wʋn kẽ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ pʋam yõ tɩdarɛ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ ba daan pↄsɛ, tɩ la yõkɛ Azakari. Tɩ Azakari kẽ tɩ a yõ.
42001010	La tɩdarɛ la yõ'a wakatɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu boe la yẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
42001011	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka darɛ wa'am Azakari zẽ'am wa zɛ tɩdarɛ yõ'a bı̃mbı̃nne na zʋʋgↄ bↄba.
42001012	La Azakari n yẽ ẽ na, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ halɩ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ẽ.
42001013	Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azakari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wõm fʋ pʋ'ʋsgↄ mɛ. Fʋ pↄga A'elizabɛtɩ wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azã.
42001014	La fʋ wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm. La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga bia la dↄka ı̃yã.
42001015	A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ nifum, la a kãn yũ dãam bɩɩ bõn-yũula n bugri. Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bↄna la ẽ halɩ lan pↄsɛ ẽn boe a ma pʋʋrʋm, la wakatɛ wuu.
42001016	A wʋn botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba zozo'e lebe sakɛ ba Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ.
42001017	La a wʋn dẽŋɛ Zuudãana nẽŋam tara Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n daan tarɩ se'em na. La a wʋn naagɛ sↄdõma la ba kↄma yɛla, dee wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n sɩ'ɩsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la tara yɛm ɩta wʋ sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ la. A wʋn botɩ nẽrba mãasʋm sõŋa gu'ura tɩ Zuudãana."
42001018	Tɩ Azakari soke malɛka la yetɩ: "Bẽm n wʋn botɩ mam bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-ẽna de la sɩra? Se'ere n soe la, mam de la bʋra-yã'aŋa dee tɩ mam pↄga mẽ kʋrgɛ."
42001019	Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Agabrɩyɛlɩ, mam ze la Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam. Ẽŋa n tõm mam yetɩ, m wa'am yele fʋ yetↄg-yẽlga wã.
42001020	La fõn ka sakɛ mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, fʋ nõorɛ n wʋn mãam. La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, bõn-sɛba tɩ mam yele fʋ la wʋn ẽŋɛ. La fʋ kãn le tãna tↄgra, halɩ tɩ la paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la."
42001021	Wakat-ẽŋa, nẽrba la daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Azakari yese. La ẽn daan boe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la pʋam yuura la, ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
42001022	La ẽn yãŋa wa yese la, a ka tã'agɛ tↄgɛ la nẽrba la. A nõorʋm n mãam tɩ a tara nu'usi magra pa'ala ba. Bɛla tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a yẽ la bõn-yãlma zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la pʋam.
42001023	Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azakari daan wʋn tõm Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam n ba'asɛ la, a daan lebe kule la a yire.
42001024	Dabs-bãna poorʋm, tɩ a pↄga A'elizabɛtɩ yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ bↄna yire wõr-sɩnuu.
42001025	Dee yetɩ: "Wãna de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõoma. Wakat-ẽna ẽŋa n yãŋa bɩsɛ mam yelle, dee yese bõn-ẽna n de nɩ yãnnɛ bↄ mam nẽrba tẽŋasʋka."
42001026	Pugla ayɩla n daan boe Galile tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. A daan nãn ka mi bʋraa. La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ n yetɩ a di ẽ. Azozɛfʋ de la naba Adavidi buuri nẽra. La wakat-sɛka tɩ A'elizabɛtɩ daan tarɩ pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ pʋam na, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm a malɛka Agabrɩyɛlɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am.
42001028	Tɩ malɛka la sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ tõoma. Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ boe la fʋ mɛ, a ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ."
42001029	La Amaari n daan wõm malɛka yetↄga la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, tɩ a tẽ'esra malɛka la n yele se'em na võorɛ n de sɛla.
42001030	Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Amaari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
42001031	Fʋ wʋn yõkɛ la pʋʋrɛ dↄgɛ budibla, sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
42001032	A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko. La ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Bia. La Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ẽ a yaaba Adavidi na'am,
42001033	tɩ a dɛna Azakↄbɩ buuri naba wakatɛ wuu, a na'am na kãn malɩn ba'asɛ."
42001034	Tɩ Amaari soke malɛka la yetɩ: "Mam ka mi bʋraa, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ mam yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ?"
42001035	Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu Sɩa wʋn sige fʋ zuo, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa wʋn bↄna la fↄ, bɛla bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dↄgɛ la wʋn welge la to'ore, ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.
42001036	Bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõogↄ A'elizabɛtɩ tɩ ba yetɩ a de la kõndↄgrɛ la, a tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ n wãna. Baa la ẽn kʋrgɛ la, a wʋn dↄgɛ la budibla.
42001037	Se'ere n soe la, sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ka tã ɩta."
42001038	Tɩ Amaari lerge yetɩ: "Mam de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõntõn-pↄka. Nawẽnnɛ botɩ la ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn yele se'em na." Tɩ malɛka la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
42001039	La dabsa bãma pʋam, tɩ Amaari isge sẽŋɛ tↄtↄ paagɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽŋa ayɩla tɩ tãnsɩ boe mı̃.
42001040	La ẽn paagɛ la, a kẽ la Azakari yire pʋ'ʋsɛ A'elizabɛtɩ.
42001041	La A'elizabɛtɩ n wõm a pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, bia la wẽrgɛ mɛ a pʋʋrʋm. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wa'am A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am la pãŋa,
42001042	tɩ a tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ la fõn yel-sõnnɛ gãnna pↄgsɩ la wuu. La bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dↄgɛ la, tarɩ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
42001043	Mam de la ãne tɩ mam Zuudãana ma sẽna mam zẽ'am?
42001044	Se'ere n soe la, mam wõm fõn pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, bia la n boe mam pʋʋrʋm na wẽrgɛ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
42001045	Fõn sakɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tɩ a tↄgɛ bↄ fʋ la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ la, fʋ yẽ zu-yẽlga."
42001046	Tɩ Amaari yele yetɩ: "Mam pẽgrɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la m sũure wuu.
42001047	Mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n de mam Fãagra la ı̃yã,
42001048	se'ere n soe la, a bɩsɛ mam n de a tõntõn-pↄg-tarma la yelle mɛ. Bɛla lan pↄsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, zamãana wuu nẽrba wʋn wi'ira mam tɩ zu-yẽlga dãana.
42001049	Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ n tã wuu la n ẽŋɛ bõn-kãra bↄ mam. A de la pʋpeelem dãana.
42001050	La nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ ẽ na, a zotɩ ba ninbãalga mɛ zamãana wuu.
42001051	A dɩkɛ la a nu'ugo tõm tõon-kãra, dee botɩ zẽk-m-mẽŋa dõma la zoe wɩrgɛ la ba zẽk-m-mẽŋa pʋtẽ'era la.
42001052	La sãn dɛna pãnsɩ dõma, a sikri ba mɛ ba na'am pʋam, dee zẽkra sik-m-mẽŋa dõma.
42001053	La sɛba n ka tarɩ sɛla la, a bↄ'ↄrɩ ba bõntarsõm zↄ'ↄra mɛ, dee botɩ bõntatba lebe fõrgɛ dee ka to'oge sɛla sɛla.
42001054	A tẽerɩ zↄta tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba n de a tõntõnɩba la ninbãalga mɛ, dee sõŋra tõma,
42001055	wʋ ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la tõma yaaba Abraham, la tõma sↄ-yaabdõma, la ba yɩɩsɩ la wuu tɩ a wʋn sõŋra tõma wakatɛ wuu se'em na."
42001056	La Amaari daan weege A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am ẽŋɛ wʋ wõr-sɩtã, dee yãŋa lebe kule.
42001057	A'elizabɛtɩ dↄka wakatɛ n daan paagɛ la, a dↄgɛ la budibla.
42001058	Tɩ a sawiiba, la a yir-dõma wõm tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ zoe a ninbãalga zo'oge, tɩ ba wuu lagɩm ɩta sũ-yẽlga la ẽ.
42001059	Bia la dↄka dabsa anii daarɛ tɩ ba wa'am tɩ ba wã ẽ, daan bↄↄra tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ a sↄ Azakari yʋ'ʋrɛ.
42001060	La a ma ka sakɛ, yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ, a yʋ'ʋrɛ wʋn dɛna la Azã."
42001061	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Ya yir-dõma la pʋam nẽra ka boe mı̃ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azã."
42001062	Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ la nu'usi soke bia la sↄ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ ba sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ se'em.
42001063	Tɩ a botɩ ba bↄ ẽ dↄ-palaka, tɩ a to'oge gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "A yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã." Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la waa wuu.
42001064	La ẽn gʋlsɛ yele bɛla la, bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tã'agɛ tↄgra pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
42001065	Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n lɛm bilam na wuu. Tɩ kõ-ẽŋa saagɛ Zude tẽn-sɛba tɩ tãnsɩ boe mı̃ na wuu.
42001066	Bãma wuu n daan wõm yɛla la, ba daan tẽ'esrɩ mɛ dee sↄkra yetɩ: "Bi-ẽna yetɩ a wa ãna la wãne?" Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa boe la ẽ mɛ.
42001067	Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wa'am bia la sↄ Azakari zẽ'am la pãŋa. Tɩ a to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga tↄgɛ yetɩ:
42001068	"Basɛ-ya tɩ pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ Zuudãana la, se'ere n soe la, a wa'am mɛ wa bɩsɛ a nẽrba yelle, fãagɛ ba basɛ.
42001069	A bↄ tõma la Fãagra n tarɩ pãŋa n wʋn yese a tõntõnna Adavidi buuri la pʋam,
42001070	wʋ ẽŋa n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tↄgra kʋrʋm se'em na.
42001071	A yetɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tↄ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, la nẽr-sɛba n sisri tõma la nu'usum.
42001072	Bɛla, a zoe tɩ yaabdõma ninbãalga mɛ, dee tẽegɛ ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la ba la yelle.
42001073	Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ mɛ la tɩ yaaba Abraham
42001074	tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tↄ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, dee wʋn botɩ tɩ tõm a tõoma, tɩ dabeem kana.
42001075	Dee dↄla ẽ la pʋpeelem, dee ɩta tɩ la masra ẽn boorɩ se'em ka paagɛ tɩ vↄm tɛka.
42001076	La fõn, m bia, ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu nõtↄ'ↄsa. Bɛla ı̃yã, fõn wʋn dẽŋɛ tɩ Zuudãana la nẽŋam malgɛ sore bↄ ẽ,
42001077	dee yele Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ ba basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
42001078	La de la Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ tõma ninbãalga la ı̃yã tɩ a wʋn botɩ a peelem n ãn wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa n yẽkɛ bulika la,
42001079	nẽegɛ bↄ nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam, la nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ kũm dabeem na, dee pa'alɛ tɩ so-sɛka tɩ tɩ wʋn doose yẽ sũ-mã'asʋm."
42001080	Tɩ bia la daan bɩta, tɩ a pʋtẽ'erɛ pa'asra. A daan boe la weem ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ a wa'am Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la zẽ'am tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
42002001	Ban daan dↄgɛ Azã la, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ na-keko A'ogisti daan bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba kãalɛ a tẽŋa la wuu nẽrba.
42002002	La daan de la pↄspↄsɩ n bɛla tɩ ba kãalɛ nẽrba la, wakat-sɛka tɩ Akirinusi daan de Siiri tẽnsɩ gↄmna la.
42002003	Tɩ nẽrba wuu kule ba mẽnsɩ tẽnsʋm tɩ ba kãalɛ ba.
42002004	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ mẽ yese Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba yʋʋn dↄgɛ naba Adavidi. Se'ere n soe tɩ a sẽŋɛ bilam na, a de la naba Adavidi buuri.
42002005	Ẽŋa la Amaari n de pↄg-sɛka n yetɩ a ele ẽ na sẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ ba kãalɛ ba, wakat-ẽŋa Amaari tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ.
42002006	La ban nãn boe Bɛtelɛm la, tɩ a dↄka daarɛ paagɛ.
42002007	Tɩ a dↄgɛ a budib-kẽema, vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam. Se'ere n soe la, zẽ'a n ka boe sãama yire la pʋam tɩ ba wʋn gã'arɛ.
42002008	La tẽn-ẽŋa dũnsı̃ima daan boe la sẽkam gu'ura ba dũnsi yʋ'ʋŋↄ.
42002009	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka sige ba zẽ'am. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ gilge ba. Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba halɩ.
42002010	Tɩ malɛka la yele ba yetɩ: "Da zoe-ya dabeem, tɩ mam tarɩ la kõ-yẽlga tɩ m yele ya, n wʋn basɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm.
42002011	La de la yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna tɩ ba dↄgɛ ya Fãagra la Adavidi tẽŋa pʋam, ẽŋa n de Zuudãana Krisi la.
42002012	La bõn-ẽna n wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ la de la sɩra, ya wʋn yẽ bilɩa tɩ ba vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam."
42002013	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma kʋʋŋ-kʋʋŋↄ darɛ wa'am wa naagɛ la ayɩla la. Tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
42002014	"Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n soe pẽka, la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a nõŋɛ la tarɩ sũ-mã'asʋm dũnia zuo."
42002015	La malɛkadõma la lebe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee tɩ dũnsı̃ima la yele taaba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm ka bɩsɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele tɩ la."
