42002016	La ba isge mɛ tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ yẽ Amaari, la Azozɛfʋ, la bilɩa la tɩ a gã dũnsi yↄnnↄ daka pʋam.
42002017	La dũnsı̃ima la n yẽ ẽ na, ba tↄgɛ bia la yelle wʋ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
42002018	Tɩ sɛba wuu n wõm dũnsı̃ima la n yele se'em na, la di'ige ba mɛ.
42002019	La Amaari tẽ'esrɩ yɛla wã wuu mɛ a sũure pʋam.
42002020	Dee tɩ dũnsı̃ima la daan lɛbra dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, ba wõm dee yẽ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
42002021	La dabsa anii la daarɛ n daan paagɛ, tɩ ba botɩ ba wã bia la wʋ Amoyisi gõŋↄ n pa'alɛ tɩ ba wã ba budimto se'em na. Tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, yʋ'ʋr-sɛka tɩ malɛka daan yele ba tɩ ba sɩ ẽ na, wakat-sɛka tɩ Amaari daan nãn ka yõkɛ a pʋʋrɛ la.
42002022	La wakatɛ la n paagɛ tɩ Amaari malgɛ a mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wʋ Amoyisi lↄↄ gõŋↄ n yele se'em na. Tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari tarɩ bia la sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm Wẽnde-kãtʋm tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ.
42002023	Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam tɩ budib-kẽema woo wʋn dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ.
42002024	Ba daan sẽŋɛ tɩ ba kãabɛ la sɛla bↄ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la n yele se'em na. La yetɩ, ba bↄ mõom dawɛma bayi bɩɩ na'adawen-biɛ bayi.
42002025	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ bʋraa daan boe Zerizalɛm tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asimeyõ. A de la nẽr-sõŋↄ dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ sõŋa, dee gu'ura Ɩsrayɛlɩ Fãagra la n sẽm na. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la ẽ.
42002026	La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan põn yele ẽ tɩ a kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ a yẽ la Krisi tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm tɩ a wa'am na.
42002027	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la botɩ a sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi sↄ, la a ma daan tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ n yele se'em na.
42002028	Tɩ Asimeyõ to'oge bia la a nu'usum, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
42002029	"Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã, fõn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ mɛ. Fʋ yãŋa tã basɛ mam n de fõn tõntõnna sore tɩ m basɛ dũnia dee wa'am fõn yire la sũ-mã'asʋm.
42002030	Se'ere n soe la, m nini yẽ Fãagra la tɩ fʋ tõm na,
42002031	ẽŋa tɩ fʋ mãasʋm bↄ tɩ dũnia nẽrba wuu yẽ.
42002032	Ẽŋa n de peelem n wʋn botɩ la nẽegɛ bↄ buuri wuu tɩ ba bãŋɛ fõn, dee wʋn botɩ tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de fõn nẽrba yẽ pẽka."
42002033	La Asimeyõ n tↄgɛ bia la yɛla la, la daan di'ige bia la sↄ, la a ma mɛ.
42002034	Tɩ Asimeyõ kã kã'a-sõma bↄ ba, dee yele bia la ma Amaari tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge bi-ẽna tɩ a botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma zozo'e lui mɛ, dee tɩ zozo'e mẽ isge. Ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ tõoma, dee tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn zagsɛ ẽ.
42002035	Ẽŋa n wʋn nẽegɛ pa'alɛ sɛla n sʋgɛ ba pʋtẽ'era pʋam na. Dee yetɩ, Amaari mẽŋa wʋn yẽ sũ-sã'aŋↄ wʋ sʋ'a tɩ ba sɩɩsɛ lʋ nẽra sũure la.
42002036	Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-pↄka n mẽ daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'annɩ. Tɩ a sↄ yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Afanuyɛlɩ, a de la Azɛɛrɩ buuri nẽra. Ẽŋa daan de la pug-sa'arɛ dee ele sɩra paagɛ yʋʋma ayopↄɩ tɩ a sɩra la ki.
42002037	La a sɩra la n ki la, a yãŋa de la pↄkõorɛ kʋrgɛ halɩ ka paagɛ yʋʋma pinii la anaasɩ. A daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wakatɛ wuu, tõnna bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ wuu ka basra, dee lʋta nõorɛ sↄsra Nawẽnnɛ.
42002038	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a paagɛ ba zẽ'am, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ, dee tↄgra bia la yelle bↄ'ↄra sɛba wuu n gu'uri wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn le fãagɛ Zerizalɛm nẽrba la basɛ.
42002039	La ban ẽŋɛ sɛla woo ba'asɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la n yele se'em na, tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari lebe kule Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na.
42002040	Tɩ bia la bɩta tara pãŋa la yɛm, dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ bↄna la ẽ.
42002041	Yʋʋnɛ woo Azezi sↄ, la a ma sẽnnɩ la Zerizalɛm dita Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa.
42002042	La Azezi daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi, dee tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kibsa la wʋ ban ẽn ɩta se'em na.
42002043	La kibsa la dabsa n ba'asɛ la, tɩ ba lebe kulla. Dee tɩ Azezi weege Zerizalɛm, tɩ a sↄ la a ma daan ka bãŋɛ tɩ a weege ya.
42002044	Ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ a dolɩ la ba tẽŋa dõma, dee sẽŋɛ dabsrɛ mõonɛ sẽnnɛ. La ban ɛ ẽ ba nẽrba la, la ba sɩrdõma zẽ'am dee ka yẽ ẽ na,
42002045	ba daan lebe la Zerizalɛm ka ɛɛra ẽ.
42002046	La dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ ba yẽ ẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a zı̃ la karẽnsãandõma sɛlsra, dee sↄkra ba sokrɩsɩ.
42002047	Azezi n daan tarɩ yɛm la ẽn lergrɩ se'em na, di'ige sɛba wuu n daan wõm na mɛ.
42002048	La a dↄgrɩba la n yẽ ẽ na, la ba di'ige ba mɛ. Tɩ a ma soke ẽ yetɩ: "M bia, bẽm tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ tɩ wãna? Mam la fʋ sↄ ɛ fʋ mɛ halɩ la sũ-sã'aŋↄ."
42002049	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya ɛɛra ma? Yãma ka mi tɩ la masɛ mɛ tɩ mam bↄna m Sↄ yire wã bɩɩ?"
42002050	Tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ Azezi yetↄga la võorɛ.
42002051	Tɩ Azezi doose ba kule Nazarɛtɩ, dee sakɛ ba nõorɛ. Tɩ a ma tẽ'esra yel-bãma wuu a sũurum.
42002052	Tɩ Azezi bɩta, tɩ a yɛm pa'asra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba nõŋɛ ẽ.
42003001	Na-keko Atibɛɛrɩ n daan di na'am na, a yʋʋma pia la anuu yʋʋnɛ, tɩ Apõnsɩ-pilatɩ de Zude gↄmna, dee tɩ A'erↄdɩ dɛna Galile naba, tɩ a sↄbia Afilipi mẽ dɛna Itiire la Trakoniti naba. Tɩ Alisaniyasɩ dɛna Abilɛnɩ naba.
42003002	La A'annɩ, la Akayifu de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma. Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azakari bia Azã daan boe mõom tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tↄgɛ bↄ ẽ.
42003003	Bɛla tɩ Azã sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n boe Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa nõorʋm la wuu ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
42003004	Azã n mõolɩ se'em na ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ gõŋↄ pʋam se'em na. A yʋʋn yetɩ: "Nẽra n mõolɩ weem tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana, malgɛ-ya sↄa la tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ bↄ ẽ.
42003005	Palɛ-ya bↄgsɩ la wuu, sirge-ya tãnsɩ la kũnkũma la wuu, mãalɛ-ya so-gↄlma tɩ ba tↄ tẽntẽesɩ, palɛ-ya sorↄↄrↄ bogro tɩ ba naagɛ taaba.
42003006	Bɛla nẽrsaalba wuu wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em fãagra nẽrba basra."
42003007	La nẽrba zozo'e n sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam. Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n yele yãma yetɩ, ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?
42003008	Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero. Da kãn tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ Abraham n de yãma yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ mɛ. Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ.
42003009	Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ. Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma la, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam tɩ bugum di ẽ."
42003010	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?"
42003011	Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ, sɛka n tarɩ futo bayi, a looge bↄ sɛka n ka tarɩ. Tɩ sɛka n tarɩ dia, mẽ ẽŋɛ bↄ sɛka n ka tarɩ.
42003012	Tɩ lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba mẽ wa'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?"
42003013	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Da to'oge-ya ligri gãŋɛ ban yele ya se'em na."
42003014	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ mẽ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Dee tõma, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?" Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Da to'oge-ya nẽra bõnↄ la pãŋa bɩɩ dõrɛ nẽrba to'oge sɛla. Basɛ-ya tɩ ya yↄↄrↄ la seke ya."
42003015	Tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ gu'ura tɩ Nawẽnnɛ fãagɛ ba, la ba wuu daan sokrɩ la ba mẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ, Azã na'an dɛna Krisi tɩ ba gu'ura la bɩɩ?
42003016	La ban tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Azã yele ba yetɩ: "Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra n boe tara pãŋa gãnna mam sẽna, la mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra bↄ ẽ. Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
42003017	A wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgↄ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam, dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kı̃ŋri."
42003018	Yetↄg-bãna, la yetↄga basɛba zozo'e tɩ Azã daan dɩkɛ zãsʋm nẽrba la pa'alɛ ba Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la.
42003019	La Azã daan zɛrgɛ naba A'erↄdɩ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pↄga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de A'erodɩadɩ di, dee tõm tõon-be'ero basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ, tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ la ka ãn sõŋa.
42003020	La A'erↄdɩ daan yõkɛ Azã ka pagɛ mɛ, bɛla A'erↄdɩ malɩn tõm la tõon-be'ero pa'asɛ.
42003021	Azã n daan misri nẽrba wuu ko'om pʋam na, a daan mẽ mise Azezi mɛ. La Azezi daan pʋ'ʋsrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ saazuum yo'oge,
42003022	tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige a zuo, tɩ ba yẽ ẽ tɩ a wõn na na'adawenne. Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: "Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu. Fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm."
42003023	La Azezi n daan pı̃'ilum a tõoma la, a daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pitã, tɩ nẽrba daan tẽ'esra tɩ a de la Azozɛfʋ bia. Azozɛfʋ sↄ daan de la Aheli,
42003024	tɩ Aheli sↄ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sↄ dɛna Alevi, tɩ Alevi sↄ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sↄ dɛna Azanayi, tɩ Azanayi sↄ dɛna Azozɛfʋ,
42003025	tɩ Azozɛfʋ sↄ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sↄ dɛna Amõsɩ, tɩ Amõsɩ sↄ dɛna Anahum, tɩ Anahum sↄ dɛna A'esli, tɩ A'esli sↄ dɛna Anagayi,
42003026	tɩ Anagayi sↄ dɛna Amatɩ, tɩ Amatɩ sↄ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sↄ dɛna Asemeyẽ, tɩ Asemeyẽ sↄ dɛna Azozɛkɩ, tɩ Azozɛkɩ sↄ dɛna Azoda,
42003027	tɩ Azoda sↄ dɛna Azoanã, tɩ Azoanã sↄ dɛna Areza, tɩ Areza sↄ dɛna Azorobabɛlɩ, tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Asalatɩyɛlɩ, tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Aneri,
42003028	tɩ Aneri sↄ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sↄ dɛna Adi, tɩ Adi sↄ dɛna Akozam, tɩ Akozam sↄ dɛna A'elmadam, tɩ A'elmadam sↄ dɛna A'eri,
42003029	tɩ A'eri sↄ dɛna Azoze, tɩ Azoze sↄ dɛna A'eliezɛɛrɩ, tɩ A'eliezɛɛrɩ sↄ dɛna Azorim, tɩ Azorim sↄ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sↄ dɛna Alevi,
42003030	tɩ Alevi sↄ dɛna Asimeyõ, tɩ Asimeyõ sↄ dɛna Azuda, tɩ Azuda sↄ dɛna Azozɛfʋ, tɩ Azozɛfʋ sↄ dɛna Azonam, tɩ Azonam sↄ dɛna A'eliakim,
42003031	tɩ A'eliakim sↄ dɛna Ameleya, tɩ Ameleya sↄ dɛna Amena, tɩ Amena sↄ dɛna Amatata, tɩ Amatata sↄ dɛna Anatã, tɩ Anatã sↄ dɛna Adavidi,
42003032	tɩ Adavidi sↄ dɛna Azese, tɩ Azese sↄ dɛna A'obɛɛdɩ, tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ sↄ dɛna Aboozɩ, tɩ Aboozɩ sↄ dɛna Asala, tɩ Asala sↄ dɛna Anaasõ,
42003033	tɩ Anaasõ sↄ dɛna Aminadabɩ, tɩ Aminadabɩ sↄ dɛna Admẽ, tɩ Admẽ sↄ dɛna Arni, tɩ Arni sↄ dɛna A'ɛsrↄm, tɩ A'ɛsrↄm sↄ dɛna Afarɛsɩ, tɩ Afarɛsɩ sↄ dɛna Azuda,
42003034	tɩ Azuda sↄ dɛna Azakↄbɩ, tɩ Azakↄbɩ sↄ dɛna A'izakɩ, tɩ A'izakɩ sↄ dɛna Abraham, tɩ Abraham sↄ dɛna Atara, tɩ Atara sↄ dɛna Anakↄↄrɩ,
42003035	tɩ Anakↄↄrɩ sↄ dɛna Aseruki, tɩ Aseruki sↄ dɛna Arago, tɩ Arago sↄ dɛna Afalɛkɩ, tɩ Afalɛkɩ sↄ dɛna A'ebɛrɩ, tɩ A'ebɛrɩ sↄ dɛna Asala,
42003036	tɩ Asala sↄ dɛna Akayinam, tɩ Akayinam sↄ dɛna Arfasadɩ, tɩ Arfasadɩ sↄ dɛna Asɛm, tɩ Asɛm sↄ dɛna Anoe, tɩ Anoe sↄ dɛna Alemɛkɩ,
42003037	tɩ Alemɛkɩ sↄ dɛna Amatusala, tɩ Amatusala sↄ dɛna A'enõkɩ, tɩ A'enõkɩ sↄ dɛna Azarɛdɩ, tɩ Azarɛdɩ sↄ dɛna Amalelɛlɩ, tɩ Amalelɛlɩ sↄ dɛna Akayinam,
42003038	tɩ Akayinam sↄ dɛna A'enõsɩ, tɩ A'enõsɩ sↄ dɛna Asetɩ, tɩ Asetɩ sↄ dɛna Adam, la Nawẽnnɛ n nãam Adam.
42004001	Azezi daan ze'ele la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaam lebe, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la kↄ'ↄn bↄna la ẽ. La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la weem.
42004002	Bilam tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ dabsa pinaasɩ. La dabsa pinaasɩ la pʋam a ka di sɛla sɛla, tɩ a kↄm dõnna.
42004003	Bɛla tɩ Asũtãana yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ yele kugre wã tɩ a lebge dia."
42004004	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Nẽrsaala kãn vↄa dia mã'a ı̃yã.' "
42004005	Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo, pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nif-kabsɩgↄ pʋam.
42004006	Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bãna wuu de la mam n soe, bɛla mam tã wʋn bↄ nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ mam boorɩ mɛ. Mam wʋn bↄ fↄ dũnia wã na'am la wuu, la so'olʋm bãma wuu pẽka.
42004007	Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, ba wuu wʋn dɛna la fõn dẽnnɛ."
42004008	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga pʋam yetɩ: 'Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.' "
42004009	Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ze'ele kalam ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa,
42004010	tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma tɩ ba gu fo.
42004011	La ba wʋn kↄkɛ fↄ la ba nu'usi tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.' "
42004012	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ yele tɩ: 'Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.' "
42004013	La Asũtãana n daan makɛ Azezi bɛla wuu zɩgɛ koŋe la, a basɛ ẽ dee gu'ura la a sãn le yẽ folle.
42004014	La Azezi daan lebe Galile la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pãŋa, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ kↄ'ↄn saagɛ zẽ'a wuu.
42004015	La a ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, tɩ ba wuu pẽgra ẽ.
42004016	La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ la Nazarɛtɩ, ban daan uge ẽ tẽn-sɛka la. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem wʋ ẽŋa ẽn kẽ'era se'em na, yãŋa isge ze'ele tɩ a karẽŋɛ.
42004017	Tɩ ba dɩkɛ gõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ la bↄ ẽ. Tɩ a lakɛ gõŋↄ la yẽ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a boorɩ la, yãŋa karẽŋɛ wʋ zẽ'a la n yele se'em na:
42004018	"Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n boe la mam, ẽŋa n looge mam bↄ mam pãŋa, ((tɩ m bʋglɛ sũ-sã'aŋↄ dõma sũure,)) tɩ m mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bↄ nasdõma, dee tõm mam tɩ m tↄgɛ bↄ yamsɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ yolsgo, dee tↄgɛ bↄ fↄↄsɩ tɩ ba nini wʋn pike, dee yese sɛba n boe nãmsgↄ pʋam la basɛ,
42004019	dee mõolɛ tɩ wakatɛ paagɛ ya, tɩ Zuudãana wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽrba yel-sõnnɛ."
42004020	La ẽn karẽŋɛ ba'asɛ la, a lebe laglɛ gõŋↄ la mɛ bↄ sɛka n gu'uri gõnnↄ la, dee zı̃'ire. Tɩ nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe wẽndeem na bɩsra ẽ zı̃i.
42004021	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zı̃na, lɛɛlɛ wã, sɛla tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ yãma wõm wã, la ẽŋɛ wʋ lan yele se'em na."
42004022	Tɩ ba tↄgɛ pẽgɛ ẽ, la a yetↄg-sõma la tɩ a tↄgɛ la di'ige ba mɛ. Dee tɩ ba sↄkra yetɩ, la ka de Azozɛfʋ dayʋa la n wãna?
42004023	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam põn mina tɩ ya wʋn makɛ makrɛ ẽna bↄ mam yetɩ: 'Tɩɩm dãana, tɩbɛ fʋ mẽŋa.' La ya wʋn ken yele mam yetɩ: 'Bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ daan ẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋam tɩ tõma wõm na, ẽŋɛ bɛla nõo fʋ mẽŋa tẽŋam kalam mẽ.' "
42004024	Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba ka nannɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa baa ayɩla a mẽŋa tẽŋam.
42004025	La de la sɩra tɩ mam yetɩ ya tɩ: Pↄkõpa zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'eli wakatʋm na mɛ, la saaga ka ni yʋʋma atã la wõr-sɩyoobɩ, tɩ kↄm yʋʋn ba bↄna tẽŋa la wuu pʋam.
42004026	La Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm A'eli yetɩ a sẽŋɛ pↄkõ-bãma zẽ'am. A tõm ẽ na pↄkõorɛ n boe Sarɛpɩta n boe Sidõ so'olʋm pʋam na zẽ'am.
42004027	La kõnkↄma zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'elize wakatʋm na mɛ, la baa ayɩla ka yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, la Anãamã sɛka n yese Siiri so'olʋm na mã'a n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
42004028	La ban wõm bɛla la, sɛba n boe wẽndeego la pʋam wuu sũure daan yı̃ige mɛ.
42004029	Tɩ ba isge ve'ege Azezi tẽŋa la pʋam yese. Tẽŋa la boe la tãŋa zuo. Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka n zãagɛ la tẽŋa la, ba daan boorɩ tɩ ba zã'agɛ ẽ basɛ mɛ tɩ a lui ki.
42004030	La Azezi kẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la tẽŋasʋka fõrgɛ.
42004031	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Galile tẽŋa ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Kapɛrnaʋm, tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ daan paagɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeem ka zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
42004032	Tɩ a zãsŋↄ la daan di'ige ba, a yetↄga la n tarɩ pãŋa la ı̃yã.
42004033	Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ a tı̃i kaasɛ yetɩ:
42004034	"A'a! Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma? Mam mi fõn de sɛka, fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
42004035	Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: "Go'oge, yese dee basɛ bʋraa la!" Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam, dee yese, la a ka pↄglʋm ẽ.
42004036	Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: "Yetↄga ẽna de la bẽm? A tarɩ la pãŋa la ke'eŋo, dee tãsra kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba yɛsra."
42004037	Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ saagɛ zẽ'e-bãma wuu.
42004038	Tɩ Azezi isge ba wẽndeego la pʋam yese ka kẽ Asimõ yire. Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pↄka bẽ'era, tɩ a ı̃yã ba tʋlgɛ. Tɩ ba tↄgɛ a yelle bↄ Azezi,
42004039	tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka suure a zuo, dee tãsɛ bã'a la yetɩ a basɛ ẽ. La ẽn yele la, bã'a la basɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a isge tↄtↄ ẽŋɛ ba sãanↄ.
42004040	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bↄna mı̃ kẽ'era, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am. Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba nẽra woo zuo, tɩ ba wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42004041	La kʋlkã'arsɩ daan yesrɩ mɛ dee basra nẽrba zozo'e, dee kaasra yetɩ: "Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa." Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ ba, ka basɛ tɩ ba tↄgɛ sɛla sɛla, se'ere n soe la, ba daan bãŋɛ tɩ a de la Krisi n de Fãagra la.
42004042	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽra ka boe mı̃. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ɛɛra ẽ. La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, bↄↄra tɩ ba gu ẽ tɩ a da le yese ba zẽ'am.
42004043	La Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n ãn se'em tẽnsɩ basɛba mẽ pʋam, la de la bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam."
42004044	La a ẽn mõola kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam mɛ.
42005001	Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi ze la Zenezarɛtɩ mõgrɛ nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ kaagɛ ẽ mikra taaba bↄↄra tɩ ba wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
42005002	Tɩ a yẽ õornↄ bayi n ze mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ zũn-yõgrɩba sige pɛɛra ba yʋgsɩ dee basɛ.
42005003	La õorŋↄ ayɩla daan de la Asimõ bõnↄ. Tɩ Azezi kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam, dee yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Mõm õorŋↄ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa fẽe." La Azezi n yele bɛla la, Asimõ mõm õorŋↄ la mɛ, tɩ a lebe ko'om pʋam fẽe. Tɩ Azezi zı̃'ire õorŋↄ la pʋam pa'alɛ nẽrba la.
42005004	La ẽn pa'alɛ ba ba'asɛ la, tɩ a yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Mõm õorŋↄ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om tɩ ya lobe yʋgsɩ la."
42005005	Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma nãmsɛ mɛ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wã wuu dee ka yõkɛ sɛla sɛla. La fõn yele la ı̃yã, tɩ wʋn lobe tɩ yʋgsɩ la."
42005006	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om ka lobe ba yʋgsɩ la, yãŋa yõgɛ zũma ba zo'oge, tɩ ba yʋgsɩ la zɩgra la ba ãasʋm.
42005007	Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ ba taaba õorŋↄ ayɩla la pʋam yetɩ, ba wa'am sõŋɛ ba. La ba taaba la sẽŋɛ mɛ ka sõŋɛ ba, tɩ ba pɩrɛ õornↄ bayi la wuu la zũma, halɩ tɩ ba zɩgra la ba mise.
42005008	La Asimõ yʋ'ʋrɛ ayɩla n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ a ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõrgɛ mam zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana."
42005009	Se'ere n soe tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla la, ẽŋa la a taaba la n daan yẽ zũma la tɩ ba yõgɛ se'em na botɩ ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
42005010	La dabeem mẽ n daan kẽ Azebede dayↄↄsɩ Azakɩ la Azã n daan ẽn dↄla la Asimõ tõnna la. Tɩ Azezi yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, tɩ lan sẽŋɛ zı̃na wɛ'ɛsa wuu, fʋ wʋn ɛɛra la nẽrba tɩ ba dↄla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na."
42005011	La Azezi n yele bɛla la, ba tarɩ õornↄ la dooge mɛ yãŋa basɛ sɛla woo dee dↄla Azezi.
42005012	La Azezi daan boe la tẽŋa ayẽma pʋam, tɩ bʋraa mẽ bↄna mı̃ dɛna kõnkonne, la bã'a la kẽ a ı̃yã zo'oge mɛ. Tɩ a yẽ Azezi ka ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa sose ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bↄↄra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa."
42005013	Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ dee yetɩ: "Mam bↄↄra, yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa." Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa.
42005014	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fʋ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bↄ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
42005015	La bɛla wuu, Azezi yelle daan malɩn saagɛ la zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e lagsɛ tɩ ba selse a yetↄga la, dee tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42005016	La Azezi ẽn sẽnna la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe la pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
42005017	La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi bↄna mı̃ pa'ala nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, tɩ Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Galile, la Zude, la Zerizalɛm mẽ zẽa mı̃ sɛlsra. Tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa daan bↄna la Azezi, tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42005018	Tɩ bʋraasɩ zɛ bʋraa n de kↄↄrŋↄ gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am. La ba boorɩ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ kẽ la de-sɛka tɩ Azezi boe mı̃ na pʋam, ka bı̃ŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
42005019	La nẽrba la mike mɛ, tɩ ba ka yẽ folle tarɩ ẽ kẽ. Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ ba zɛ kↄↄrŋↄ la zom gↄsgↄ, ka lakɛ gↄsgↄ la bↄbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike ẽ la a bõn-gã'ala la nẽrba la sʋkam bı̃ŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
42005020	Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bↄ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "M sɩrɛ, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
42005021	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la tẽ'esra yetɩ: "A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne tↄgra pↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ. Ãne n tã wʋn basɛ nẽra tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?"
42005022	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna wã?
42005023	Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo n de nãana, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana?
42005024	Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ." A yele bɛla dee yele kↄↄrŋↄ la yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule."
42005025	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kↄↄrŋↄ la isge ba wuu nẽŋam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la kulla, dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
42005026	Tɩ nẽrba la wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Tɩ zı̃na yẽ bõn-yãlma."
42005027	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ ka yẽ lampo-tↄ'ↄsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Alevi, tɩ a zı̃ lampo to'osgo deem. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge dↄla mam."
42005028	Tɩ a isge basɛ sɛla woo dee dↄla ẽ.
42005029	Tɩ Alevi dʋgɛ dia zo'oge ẽŋɛ kibsa a yire bↄ Azezi, tɩ ẽŋa la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la nẽrba zozo'e zẽa dita.
42005030	Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba, la ba lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma yõnna Azezi karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma lagɩm na lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?"
42005031	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba n tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba. Sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba.
42005032	Mam ka wa'am dũnia zuo sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ ya la ı̃yã, mam wa'am tɩ m yele la tõon-be'ero dõma tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero."
42005033	Tɩ nẽrba la yele Azezi yetɩ: "Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi ẽn lʋta nõorɛ mɛ dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi dita dee yũura."
42005034	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽra n di pↄka ẽŋɛ kibsa, tɩ a tadãandõma bↄna mı̃ tɩ ba naagɛ la ẽ di kibsa la, yãma wʋn sakɛ tɩ ba lʋ nõorɛ mɛ dee tɩ pↄgdita la ken bↄna ba zẽ'am bɩɩ?
42005035	Ayɛɩ. La wakatɛ wʋn wa'am tɩ ba wʋn yese pↄgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ."
42005036	Tɩ Azezi le makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nẽra kãn ãagɛ fu-paalɛ dɩkɛ lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, a wʋn sã'am fu-paalɛ la mɛ, la tãn-paalɛ la kãn masɛ la fu-kɛka la.
42005037	La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wↄ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wↄↄsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ. Bɛla dãam na wʋn ka'agɛ mɛ sã'am, tɩ wↄↄsɩ la mẽ sã'am.
42005038	La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wↄ-paalsɩ pʋam.
42005039	La nẽra sãn yũ dã-kɛka n kele la, a ka le bↄↄra dã-paalga. A wʋn yetɩ, dã-kɛka la n ãn sõŋa."
42006001	Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi dↄla vatↄ pʋam tↄlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi kↄ si wẽena ↄbra.
42006002	Tɩ Farisi dõma nẽrba basɛba yẽ ban ẽŋɛ bɛla la, yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma ẽŋɛ sɛla n sisri tõma vo'osgo daarɛ?"
42006003	Tɩ Azezi lerge soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kↄm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ Adavidi ẽŋɛ se'em na?
42006004	A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bı̃ŋe bↄ Nawẽnnɛ na obe. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽma la mã'a. La Adavidi yʋʋn obe borborɩ bãma mɛ, dee bↄ a nẽrba la tɩ ba obe."
42006005	La Azezi ken yele ba mɛ yetɩ: "Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ."
42006006	Vo'osgo daarɛ ayẽma tɩ Azezi kẽ Zifdõma wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga. Tɩ bʋraa daan bↄna mı̃, tɩ a zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo ki.
42006007	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la daan bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ nẽra la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan eerɩ la so-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ a sã'am bãma sisgo dõrɛ ẽ.
42006008	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgↄ la, yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: "Isge ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka." Tɩ a isge ze'ele.
42006009	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ m soke ya mɛ bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em? Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?"
42006010	Dee bɩsɛ ba wuu kaagɛ, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la." Tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo la, tɩ a nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
42006011	Tɩ ba sũnsõa yı̃ige halɩ tɩ ba bãnna ban wʋn ẽŋɛ Azezi se'em.
42006012	La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, bↄna bilam pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wuu.
42006013	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a wi a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am. Tɩ a looge karẽnbiisi pia la ayi bãma pʋam. Bãma n de nẽr-sɛba tɩ a wʋn tõm na.
42006014	Ba daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la A'ãndre n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi,
42006015	la Amatie, la Atoma, la Azakɩ sɛka n de Alfe bia la, la Asimõ sɛka n daan de Zelↄtɩ nẽra ayɩla la,
42006016	la Azudaasɩ n de Azakɩ bia la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo sɛka n wʋn zãm Azezi la.
42006017	La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige zẽ'e-sɛka n naagɛ taaba. La a karẽnbiisi basɛba zozo'e, la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ zozo'e n yese Zude, la Zerizalɛm, la Tiiri la Sidõ so'olʋm n boe ko-kãtɛ nõorʋm na n lagsɛ bilam.
42006018	Ba wa'am tɩ ba selse la Azezi yetↄga, dee tɩ a bↄ ba bã'adõma ı̃mã'asʋm. La nẽrba basɛba n daan boe mı̃ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dↄla ba, tɩ ba daan yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42006019	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu ɛɛra tɩ ba kalʋm ẽ, se'ere n soe la, pãŋa n yesrɩ a pʋam bↄ'ↄra ba wuu ı̃mã'asʋm.
42006020	Tɩ Azezi gorge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Yãma sɛba n de nasdõma la tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ya bõnↄ.
42006021	Yãma sɛba kↄm n dõnnɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka di seke. Yãma sɛba n kaasrɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka la'ara.
42006022	Yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba sisri ya, dee bↄkra ya, tʋʋra ya, dee ka nanna ya wʋ ya de la tõon-be'ero dõma, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ı̃yã la, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
42006023	Wakat-sɛka tɩ ba ɩtɩ yãma bɛla la, ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn yẽ yↄↄrↄ zo'oge mɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la bɛla.
42006024	La yãma sɛba n de bõntatba la wʋn yẽ toogo, yãma n põn yẽ bõn-sõma la ı̃yã.
42006025	La yãma sɛba n tarɩ sɛla woo lɛɛlɛ wã tɩ la seke la, wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka sẽnna la kↄm. La yãma sɛba n la'arɩ lɛɛlɛ wã wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya sũure wʋn ka sã'am tɩ ya kaasɛ.
42006026	La yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba wuu pẽgrɩ ya la, wʋn yẽ toogo. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma mẽ yʋʋn pẽgrɩ nõtↄ'ↄs-sɛba n de põmpↄrndõma la bɛla."
42006027	Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "La mam yetɩ yãma sɛba n selsrɩ mam wã tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, la sɛba n sisri ya la, ya ɩta ba sõŋa.
42006028	La ya kã'ara kã'a-sõma bↄ'ↄra sɛba n kã be'em bↄ'ↄra ya la, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'ↄra sɛba n ɩtɩ ya be'em na.
42006029	Nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ pɛka ayɩla, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ ayẽma la pa'asɛ. La nẽra sãn fãagɛ fʋ fu-kãtɛ, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka pa'asɛ.
42006030	La nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bↄ ẽ. La nẽra sãn dɩkɛ sɛla n de fʋ bõnↄ, fʋ da yetɩ a bↄ fↄ fʋ bõnↄ na.
42006031	La yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta bõn-sɛba bↄ'ↄra ya la, ya mẽ ɩta bɛla bↄ'ↄra ba.
42006032	La ya sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ba mɛ.
42006033	La ya sãn ɩta sɛba n ɩtɩ ya sõŋa la mã'a sõŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma ɩtɩ la bɛla.
42006034	La ya sãn pɛŋra sɛba tɩ ya tẽ'esrɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ lebse ya la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma peŋrɩ tõon-be'ero dõma mɛ dee le tↄ'ↄsra bɛla.
42006035	La, la sãn dɛna yãma, nõŋɛ-ya ya bɛ'ɛba, dee ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa. Peŋe-ya nẽrba dee da tẽ'esra tɩ ba le bↄ ya. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya yↄↄrↄ wʋn zo'oge mɛ, la ya wʋn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu kↄma, se'ere n soe la, a ɩtɩ sɛba n ka mi yel-sõnnɛ, la pʋtʋʋl-dõma sõŋa mɛ.
42006036	Zↄta-ya nẽrba ninbãalga, wʋ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ nẽrba ninbãalga se'em na."
42006037	"Da tↄgra-ya nẽra yelle yetɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn tↄgɛ ya yelle yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ be'em. Da zɛrgra-ya nẽrba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn zɛrgɛ ya. Basɛ-ya taaba taalɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya taalɛ.
42006038	Bↄ-ya ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn bↄ ya. Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya zo'oge wʋ ban dɩkɛ wan-kãtɛ makɛ pɩrɛ sõŋa tɩ la saara. Bõn-sɛka tɩ yãma dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya taaba la, bõn-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bↄ ya."
42006039	Tɩ Azezi daan makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Fʋa tã wʋn ve'ege fʋa mɛ tɩ ba wuu kãn lui boko pʋam?
42006040	Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la karẽnbia sãn zãsʋm sɛla woo ba'asɛ, a ãn wʋ a karẽnsãama la.
42006041	Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sↄkↄ n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?
42006042	Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sↄbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sↄkↄ a nifum, dee ka bɩsra dↄↄgↄ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum? Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dↄↄgↄ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sↄkↄ la n boe fʋ sↄbia nifum na."
42006043	"Tɩ-sõŋↄ ka wↄnnɩ biɛ be'ero. Tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka wↄnnɩ biɛ sõma.
42006044	Ba bãŋrɩ tɩɩsɩ wuu la ba biɛ pʋam. Gõ'osɩ kãn wↄm kẽnkãma, la kẽkↄ mẽ kãn wↄm tã'ama.
42006045	Nẽr-sõŋↄ sũure n ãn sõŋa botɩ a tↄgra la bõn-sõma, la nẽr-be'ego sũure n ka ãn sõŋa botɩ a tↄgra la bõn-be'ero. Se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe nẽrsaala sũurum n yesrɩ a nõorʋm."
42006046	"Bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma wi'ira mam tɩ 'Zuudãana, Zuudãana', dee ka ɩta mam n yetɩ ya ɩta se'em na?
42006047	Nẽr-sɛka woo n sẽm mam zẽ'am, dee sɛlsra mam yetↄga, dee sakra ɩta mam n yele se'em na, mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya ẽŋa dãana n ãn se'em:
42006048	A ãn wʋ nẽra n boorɩ tɩ a mẽ a yire, tũ paagɛ tãmpı̃a, ẽebɛ a yire tãmpı̃a la zuo. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ yire la, tɩ a ka lui, ẽn mẽ sõŋa la ı̃yã.
42006049	La nẽr-sɛka n wõnnɩ mam yetↄga, dee ka ɩta mam n yele se'em na, ãn wʋ nẽra n mẽ a yire tẽntõnnↄ zuo, dee ka tũ ẽebɛ. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wa wẽ yire la, tɩ a kↄ'ↄn lui saam saam."
42007001	Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla wuu bↄ nẽrba la ba'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm.
42007002	Tɩ Rom sʋda-kɛ'ɛma bↄna mı̃ tara a tõntõnna tɩ a nõŋɛ. Tɩ tõntõnna la bẽ'era dee la a ki.
42007003	Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la wõm Azezi yelle, tõm Zifdõma kẽma basɛba a zẽ'am tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa botɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42007004	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka tı̃i belem ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa la de la nẽr-sõŋↄ.
42007005	A nõŋɛ tõma buuri mɛ, la ẽŋa n mẽ wẽndeego bↄ tõma. Bɛla ı̃yã, mõrgɛ sõŋɛ ẽ."
42007006	Tɩ Azezi dↄla ba wɛ'ɛsa ka lɛm yire la, tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la le tõm a sɩrdõma tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, da nãmsɛ fʋ mẽŋa. Mam ka narɩ tɩ fʋ wa'am mam yire,
42007007	bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ yetɩ mam mẽŋa ka narɩ tɩ m wa'am fõn zẽ'am. Wen tↄgɛ yetↄga mã'a, tɩ m tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42007008	Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba. Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ', a we'esɩ mɛ. La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: 'Wa'am', a sẽm mɛ. Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: 'Ẽŋɛ wãna', a ɩtɩ mɛ."
42007009	Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la daan di'ige ẽ mɛ, tɩ a wẽrgɛ yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bↄ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ."
42007010	Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la n tõm sɛba la lebe a yire ka yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42007011	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi we'esɩ la tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nayin, tɩ a karẽnbiisi, la nẽrba zozo'e dↄla ẽ.
42007012	La Azezi paagɛ tẽŋa la nõorʋm, tʋ'ʋsɛ la nẽrba n zɛɛrɩ budibla n ki wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka laagɛ. Budibla la ma de la pↄkõorɛ. La a bia de la ẽŋa mã'a. Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zozo'e daan kↄlgɛ ẽ dↄla wɛ'ɛsa.
42007013	La Zuudãana Azezi n yẽ pↄkõorɛ la, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da kɛlla."
42007014	A yele bɛla dee sẽŋɛ paagɛ kalʋm na sãŋandɛ la, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n zɛɛrɩ kũm na ze'ele, tɩ a yele kũm na yetɩ: "Budib-polle, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge."
42007015	Tɩ sɛka n ki la vo'oge isge zı̃'ire, yãŋa tↄgra. Tɩ Azezi yele a ma la yetɩ: "Fʋ bia n bɛla."
42007016	Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba wuu, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-kãtɛ n wa'am tõma zẽ'am." Dee le yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am tɩ a sõŋɛ a nẽrba."
42007017	Tɩ yetↄga la saagɛ Zude so'olʋm, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba wõm Azezi n ẽŋɛ se'em.
42007018	Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi tↄgɛ bõn-bãma wuu pa'alɛ ẽ. Tɩ Azã wi a karẽnbiisi bayi
42007019	tõm ba Zuudãana Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"
42007020	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azã sɛka n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n tõm tõma yetɩ, tɩ soke fʋ bɩsɛ, fõn de sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?"
42007021	Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee botɩ fↄↄsɩ zozo'e nini yẽta.
42007022	Tɩ Azezi lerge sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n yẽ bõn-sɛba, dee wõm se'em na wuu: Fↄↄsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kↄↄrnↄ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkↄma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vↄ'ↄra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
42007023	La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ı̃yã tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
42007024	Sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na lebe kule mɛ. Tɩ Azezi yãŋa tↄgɛ nẽrba la Azã yelle yetɩ: "Yãma daan sẽŋɛ mõom tɩ ya ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõogↄ tɩ kʋsebgo mı̃ini bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ.
42007025	La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ. Nẽr-sɛba n yɛɛrɩ fu-sõma dee tarɩ bõn-sõma la, kẽ'erɩ la na'adõma yiɛ pʋam.
42007026	La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa bɩɩ? Ẽe. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
42007027	La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam tõntõnna n wãna tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bↄ fↄ.'
42007028	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dↄgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã, la nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
42007029	La nẽrba la wuu, baa la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la n wõm Azã yetↄga la, ba basɛ tɩ Azã mise ba ko'om pʋam mɛ. Bɛla pa'alɩ mɛ tɩ ba sakɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ sɩra.
42007030	La Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n zagsɛ tɩ Azã ka mise ba ko'om pʋam na, ba zagsɛ la bõn-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bↄ ba la."
42007031	Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ mam wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n ɩtɩ se'em na. Ba ɩrgↄ wõn na bẽm?
42007032	Ba ãn wʋ kↄma n zı̃ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ: 'Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa. Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma ka kɛlla.'
42007033	Se'ere n soe la, Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ, dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
42007034	Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ.
42007035	Nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm n boorɩ se'em na n mi tɩ a tarɩ yɛm."
42007036	Farisi nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n daan wi Azezi tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ yire la ka zı̃'ire bↄna mı̃ tɩ a di.
42007037	La pↄka n boe tẽŋa la pʋam tõnna yalsɩ tõoma. La pↄka la n wõm tɩ Azezi boe Farisi nẽra la yire dita la, tɩ a tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
42007038	Yãŋa ze'ele lɛm Azezi nãma bↄba kɛlla. Tɩ a nintãm yɛsra tↄgra Azezi nãma zuo. Tɩ pↄka la suure duuse Azezi nãma la, la a zomto, dee kↄkɛ a nãma la, sõogɛ ba la tɩdarɛ kaam na.
42007039	Tɩ Farisi nẽra la n wi Azezi la yẽ bɛla, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ pↄg-ẽna n kalʋm ẽ wã n de nẽr-sɛka, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ tɩ a tõnnɩ la yalsɩ tõoma."
42007040	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Asimõ, mam tarɩ la sɛla tɩ m yele fo." Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, yele!"
42007041	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra n daan boe tɩ nẽrba bayi tara a sãnnɛ. Nẽra ayɩla sãnnɛ de la lig-kõba kↄbsnuu. Tɩ ayẽma la mẽ sãnnɛ dɛna lig-kõba pinuu.
42007042	Tɩ ba daan ka tãna wʋn yↄ ẽ a ligri la. Tɩ a basɛ ligri la bↄ ba. Bãma bayi la, ãne n wʋn nõŋɛ ligri la dãana gãnna?"
42007043	Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ sɛka sãnnɛ n zo'oge la." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn lerge se'em na de la sɩra."
42007044	Dee gelge bɩsɛ pↄka la, yele Asimõ yetɩ: "Fõn yẽ pↄka wã? Mam n kẽ fõn yire la, fõn ka bↄ mam ko'om tɩ mam peege m nãma. La pↄka la peege mam nãma mɛ la a nintãm, dee duuse ba la a zomto.
42007045	Fõn ka kↄkɛ mam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ fʋ to'oge mam sõŋa. La mam n kẽ'em na, pↄka la kↄkɛ mam nãma mɛ ka basɛ.
42007046	La fõn ka nã'asɛ mam ẽŋɛ kaam mam zuugo, la a sõogɛ mam nãma mɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam.
42007047	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam yele fʋ yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero n zo'oge la taalɛ mɛ. Bɛla n soe tɩ a nõŋrɛ la zo'oge. La nẽr-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ fẽfẽe la, a nõŋrɛ mẽ de la fẽe."
42007048	Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele pↄka la yetɩ: "Fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna fʋ zuo."
42007049	Tɩ sɛba n daan diti la ẽ na tↄgra la taaba sↄkra yetɩ: "A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ?"
42007050	Tɩ Azezi yele pↄka la yetɩ: "Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã n fãagɛ fↄ basɛ. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm."
42008001	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la dↄla ẽ.
42008002	La pↄgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan dolɩ ẽ. La kʋlkã'arsɩ, la bã'asɩ n daan nãmsrɩ pↄg-bãma, tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Pↄgsɩ la ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Amaari n yese Magdala, ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ daan yese dee basɛ ẽ na.
42008003	La ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azanɩ. Ẽŋa de la Asuza n bɩsrɩ naba A'erↄdɩ yire yelle la pↄga. La ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Asuzanɩ. Pↄg-bãna, la pↄgsɩ zozo'e n tarɩ ba mẽŋa lↄgrↄ sõŋra Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la.
42008004	La nẽrba n ze'ele tẽnsɩ to'oto'ore sẽnna Azezi zẽ'am. Nẽrba la n daan lagsɛ zo'oge pãɩ la, tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ:
42008005	"Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri. Ẽŋa n boe mı̃ lↄbgra la, tɩ bõnbuuri la basɛba lui sore zuo tɩ nẽrba nẽ ba, dee tɩ niinto mẽ wa'am wa di ba.
42008006	Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpı̃a zuo bule, la mã'asrɛ n ka boe mı̃ na ı̃yã tɩ ba zẽkɛ ki.
42008007	Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ bãma la gõ'osɩ la wuu lagɩm yese, tɩ gõ'osɩ la fʋrɛ ba.
42008008	Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋↄ zẽ'a yese, wↄm biɛ zo'oge paagɛ kↄbga kↄbga." Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla la, dee yetɩ: "Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
42008009	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
42008010	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ, la sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, mam makrɩ la magsa bↄ'ↄra ba. 'Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsra, dee ka yẽta, ba wʋn wõnna, dee ka bãŋra ba võorɛ.'
42008011	Makrɛ la võorɛ n wãna: Bõnbuuri la de la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
42008012	Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa yese yetↄga la ba sũure pʋam, botɩ ba kãn sakɛ yẽ fãarɛ.
42008013	La tãmpı̃a la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, dee sakɛ la sũ-yẽlga, la yetↄga la ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam sõŋa. Ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, tɩ yelle sãn paagɛ ba, tɩ ba basɛ.
42008014	La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, tɩ ba yɛm yↄↄra la ba vↄm yelle, tɩ bõntarsõm la dũnia yẽlʋm yɛmleego botɩ ba ka tãna wʋn bɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam.
42008015	La zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetↄga la, dee sakra dɩkra yetↄga la ɩta ba sũure pʋam sõŋa sõŋa, mõrgɛ zɛ kãŋkãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam wʋ bõnbuuri la n wↄm biɛ se'em na."
42008016	Azezi le yetɩ: "Nẽra ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ lↄkↄ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ ẽ sʋgɛ gↄrgↄ tilum. A wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem tɩ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la yẽta.
42008017	Bõn-sɛka woo n lile la wʋn lilge mɛ, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn wa puke mɛ tɩ nẽrba bãŋɛ.
42008018	Mõrgɛ-ya bãŋɛ yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ. Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ sɛla, ba wʋn bↄ ẽ pa'asɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka tarɩ sɛla, bõn-sɛba fẽe tɩ a tẽ'esɛ tɩ a tara la, ba wʋn to'oge ba."
42008019	Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ n daan wa'am tɩ ba yẽ ẽ. La nẽrba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ paagɛ a zẽ'am.
42008020	Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: "Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n boe yẽŋa bↄↄra tɩ ba yẽ fↄ."
42008021	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba wuu n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, dee sakɛ ɩta lan yele se'em na, n de mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ."
42008022	Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi kẽ õorŋↄ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ dooge ya mõgrɛ la ke bↄba doone." Tɩ ba mõnna õorŋↄ la wɛ'ɛsa.
42008023	La ban mõnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a gı̃se. Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ isge ko'om na zuo vugra, tɩ ko'om kẽ'era õorŋↄ la pʋam, tɩ la lebge pakrɛ bↄ ba.
42008024	Tɩ ba paagɛ nẽegɛ Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, karẽnsãama, tõma yetɩ tɩ ki mɛ." Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko-mı̃'isi tɩ ba ãna sı̃m. Tɩ kʋsebgo la ko-mı̃'isi la yõkɛ, tɩ la ãna sı̃m.
42008025	Tɩ a soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya ka bↄ mam sɩra?" Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Ãne n de ẽna tã'agɛ tãsra kʋsebgo la ko'om, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ?"
42008026	La ba paagɛ la Geraza dõma tẽŋa. Mõgrɛ la boe la tẽn-ẽŋa la Galile tẽŋasʋka.
42008027	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋↄ pʋam sige. Tɩ tẽŋa la bʋraa ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ẽ sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ. A ka yɛɛrɩ fuugo, halɩ tɩ la yuuge, la a ka kẽ'erɩ yire, a boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ yↄↄrↄ boe mı̃ na.
42008028	Nõor-faa tɩ kʋlkã'arga la ẽn girge ẽ. Tɩ ba gu'ura ẽ, dee ba a nãma, la a nu'usi wuu la bãnsɩ. Tɩ a kↄ'ↄra bãnsɩ la. La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la mõom. La bʋraaga la n yẽ Azezi la, a kaasɛ mɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm boe mam la fõn tẽŋasʋka? M sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ da nãmsɛ mam." Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ tɩ a yese dee basɛ bʋraa la, bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
42008030	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa." Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, kʋlkã'arsɩ la n dolɩ ẽ na zo'oge mɛ.
42008031	Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ, a da botɩ ba sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa bog-ko'ogo la pʋam.
42008032	La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge bↄna tãŋa zuo ↄbra yↄnnↄ. Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ, a bↄ ba nõorɛ tɩ ba kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ Azezi sakɛ ban yele se'em na.
42008033	Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki.
42008034	La sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, ba zoe sẽŋɛ la tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
42008035	Tɩ nẽrba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na. La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yɛ la futo zẽa Azezi nẽŋam, dee tarɩ yɛm sõŋa sõŋa. Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
42008036	Tɩ sɛba n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, yele ba lan ẽŋɛ se'em tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ bʋraa la.
42008037	Tɩ Geraza tẽŋa nẽrba la wuu belem Azezi yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n ba kẽ ba. Tɩ Azezi kẽ'era õorŋↄ la tɩ a fõrgɛ.
42008038	Tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, sose Azezi tɩ a basɛ tɩ a doose ẽ. Tɩ Azezi zagsɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ:
42008039	"Lebe kule ya yire, ka pa'alɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ bↄ fʋ la." Tɩ a doose tẽŋa la wuu pʋam, mõola pa'ala Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bↄ ẽ na.
42008040	Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bↄba. La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n põn lagsɛ bilam zɛ gu'ura ẽ. Azezi n daan paagɛ mı̃ na, ba to'oge ẽ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa.
42008041	La bʋraa ayɩla n boe mı̃ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azayirusi, a de la Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana, wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: "Wa'am mam yire,
42008042	tɩ mam pↄyʋa n tarɩ yʋʋma pia la ayi n dee la a ki." Bʋraa la bia de la ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a. Tɩ Azezi dↄla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mikra ẽ.
42008043	La pↄka n daan boe mı̃ luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gↄ'ↄra. Tɩ a daan dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu sã'am tɩbdõma zẽ'am, la baa ayɩla ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42008044	Tɩ a paagɛ Azezi poorʋm, kalʋm Azezi fuugo nõorɛ. La bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩɩm na ze'ele ka le yɛsra.
42008045	Tɩ Azezi soke yetɩ: "Ãne n kalʋm mam?" Tɩ nẽra woo sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, nẽrba wã wuu n lagɩm gilge fõn mikra se'em wã tɩ fõn sↄkra?"
42008046	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Nẽra n kalʋm mam, se'ere n soe la, mam bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese mam zẽ'am."
42008047	La pↄka la n bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn yãŋɛ sʋgɛ la Azezi la, tɩ a gõgra wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam se'ere n soe tɩ ẽŋa kalʋm ẽ, la ẽŋa n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa se'em.
42008048	Tɩ Azezi yele pↄka la yetɩ: "M bia, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã n botɩ fʋ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm."
42008049	La Azezi n nãn boe mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ nẽra ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ pↄyʋa la ki mɛ, da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama la."
42008050	La Azezi n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a yele Azayirusi yetɩ: "Da zoe dabeem, wen bↄ mam sɩra, tɩ fʋ pↄyʋa la wʋn yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm."
42008051	Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ a yire, la a ka botɩ nẽra nẽra doose ẽ kẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la bia la sↄ, la a ma mã'a.
42008052	La nẽrba la wuu daan kellɩ mɛ fabla bia la ı̃yã. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Da kaasra-ya, bia la ka ki, a gı̃sri mɛ."
42008053	Tɩ ba la'ara Azezi, ban mi tɩ bia la ki mɛ na ı̃yã.
42008054	Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ bia la nu'ugo, tı̃i tↄgɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Bia, isge."
42008055	Tɩ bia la vↄm leme, tɩ a isge bilam mẽŋa. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya bia la dia tɩ a di."
42008056	Tɩ la daan di'ige bia la sↄ, la a ma. Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
42009001	Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la lagsɛ mɛ, bↄ ba pãŋa, la nõorɛ tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42009002	Dee tõm ba yetɩ ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42009003	La a yele ba yetɩ: "Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sẽŋɛ. Da dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, bɩɩ dia, bɩɩ ligri. Da dɩkɛ ya futo bayi bayi.
42009004	La yi-sɛka tɩ ya paagɛ tɩ ba to'oge ya, bↄna-ya yi-ẽŋa pʋam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
42009005	La zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka to'oge ya, yese-ya tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam, dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnↄ basɛ. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa."
42009006	Azezi n yele bɛla la, karẽnbiisi la yese mɛ sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽta ı̃mã'asʋm.
42009007	Galile Naba A'erↄdɩ n daan wõm bõn-sɛba wuu n ɩtɩ la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba basɛba n daan yele ẽ tɩ Azezi de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge.
42009008	Tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli n le wa'am dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma n vo'oge.
42009009	Tɩ A'erↄdɩ yetɩ: "Mam daan botɩ ba wike Azã zuugo mɛ, dee tɩ ãne n de ẽna wã tɩ mam wõm a yelle wãna wã?" La a daan boorɩ tɩ a yẽ Azezi mɛ.
42009010	Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a daan tõm na, lebe mɛ ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu. Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba doose la ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betisayida.
42009011	Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la bãŋɛ ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'am na, babsɛ ẽ. Tɩ a to'oge ba, tↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle bↄ ba, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
42009012	La wẽnnɛ n daan boe mı̃ tɩ a kẽ, tɩ karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n lɛm na ka ɛ dia, la gã'a-zẽ'a, se'ere n soe la, tɩn boe zẽ'e-sɛka wã de la mõom."
42009013	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma mẽŋa bↄ ba dia tɩ ba di." Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a, sãn dagna tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka da dia wa'am wa bↄ nẽr-bãna wuu."
42009014	La bʋraasɩ n daan boe mı̃ de wʋ tʋsanuu. Tɩ Azezi yele karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba la welse zı̃'ire pinu-nu."
42009015	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la botɩ nẽrba la wuu zı̃'ire bɛla.
42009016	Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ dia la ı̃yã, dee fiise borborɩ la zũma la bↄ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽrba la.
42009017	Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtↄ pia la ayi.
42009018	Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi daan boe la kẽnkɛrŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bↄna a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?"
42009019	Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Nẽrba basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'eli, tɩ basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayẽma n vo'oge."
42009020	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Dee yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?" Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: "Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na."
42009021	Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra,
42009022	dee yetɩ: "Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
42009023	Azezi yele bɛla dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: "Nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgↄ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam.
42009024	Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm mam ı̃yã, a wʋn yẽ vↄm.
42009025	Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorↄ de la bẽm?
42009026	Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ı̃yã, la mam yetↄga la ı̃yã, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ la ẽ wakat-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn leme wa'am la m na'am pãŋa, la Nawẽnnɛ, la a malɛkadõma na'am pãŋa la.
42009027	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm."
42009028	Yetↄg-bãma poorʋm, la daan ẽŋɛ wʋ dabsa anii, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã doose ẽ zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.
42009029	La ẽn boe mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra la, tɩ a nẽŋa teege, tɩ a futo pelge yẽgra.
42009030	Tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi darɛ zɛ tↄgra la ẽ. Ba de la Amoyisi, la A'eli
42009031	n puke ba mẽŋa nẽegɛ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am peelem tↄgra la Azezi, ẽŋa n wʋn ki Zerizalɛm se'em tɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ a wa'am tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ yelle.
42009032	La gẽem n daan tarɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a taaba la tɩ ba gı̃se, yãŋa nẽegɛ yẽ Azezi n yẽgrɩ, tɩ nẽrba bayi la zɛ a zẽ'am.
42009033	Tɩ nẽrba bayi la daan bↄna mı̃ tɩ ba fõrgɛ, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tı̃ põnsɩ batã, ayɩla bↄ fõn, ayɩla bↄ Amoyisi, la ayɩla bↄ A'eli." A daan wen tↄgɛ mɛ, a ka mi ẽn tↄgrɩ se'em na.
42009034	La ẽn daan boe mı̃ tↄgra bɛla la, tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. La sawatɛ la n lile ba la, dabeem n yõkɛ karẽnbiisi la.
42009035	Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam looge. Selse-ya ẽ."
42009036	La kõa la n tↄgɛ la, ba yẽ la Azezi mã'a n ze. Tɩ ba daan sı̃na wakat-ẽŋa ka yele nẽra nẽra bãma n yẽ sɛla la.
42009037	Tɩ beere daan wiige, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ daan tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
42009038	La bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam belnɩ fʋ mɛ, bɩsɛ m bia wã. A de la mam bi-yẽŋa, la kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
42009039	Kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a botɩ a kaasra mɛ, dee luta kinki'ire, tɩ nõtõorʋm yɛsra a nõorʋm. Kʋlkã'arga la ẽn nãmsɛ ẽ zo'oge mɛ, pↄglʋm ẽ dee basɛ ẽ.
42009040	Bɛla tɩ mam belem fʋ karẽnbiisi yetɩ, ba dige ẽ tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ."
42009041	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bↄ'ↄrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa. Mam wʋn mã'agɛ m mẽŋa la yãma yuuge paagɛ la wakat-kãna?" A yele bɛla dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: "Tarɩ bia la wa'am."
42009042	La bia la n paarɩ Azezi zẽ'am na, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ tɩ a gõgra. Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a basɛ bia la. Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ ẽ lebse a sↄ.
42009043	La nẽrba la wuu n yẽ Nawẽnnɛ pãn-kãtɛ la, la di'ige ba mɛ. Nẽrba la wuu daan ken ze la yɛrɩ la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Azezi ẽŋɛ la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
42009044	"Selse-ya yetↄg-ẽna tɩ mam yetɩ m tↄgɛ wã sõŋa: Ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ la nẽrsaalba nu'usum."
42009045	La ba daan ka bãŋɛ a yetↄga la võorɛ. Yetↄga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ a võorɛ, dee zↄta dabeem ka soke ẽ.
42009046	Azezi karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba, bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
42009047	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yõkɛ bia ze'ele lɛm a mẽŋa,
42009048	dee yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, a to'oge la mam, la sɛka n mẽ to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na. Nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka ya zẽ'am na, ẽŋa n de nẽr-kãtɛ."
42009049	Tɩ Azã yele Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tõma yẽ la bʋraa n digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ ba yɛsra, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ı̃yã, tɩ tõma gu ẽ yetɩ a basɛ."
42009050	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Da gu-ya ẽ, nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri yãma, a de la ya nẽra."
42009051	Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azezi daan wʋn zẽkɛ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire la n daan lɛm, tɩ a kↄ'ↄn yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ ẽŋa sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm.
42009052	A daan tõm na nẽrba yetɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋam. Tɩ nẽrba la daan dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Samaari tẽn-pɩka pʋam tɩ ba mãasna sɛla woo dee gu'ura ẽ.
42009053	Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zagsɛ tɩ bãma kãn to'oge ẽ, ẽn we'esɩ Zerizalɛm na ı̃yã.
42009054	La a karẽnbiisi Azakɩ la Azã n bãŋɛ bɛla la, tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ wi bugum tɩ ba ze'ele saazuum wa di ba mɛ bɩɩ?"
42009055	Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ, gi ba ((yetɩ: "Yãma ka mi sɩ-sɛka n tarɩ ya la.
42009056	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ a sã'am nẽrba vↄm, a wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ.")) Tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayẽma.
42009057	Ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bʋraaga yele Azezi yetɩ: "Mam wʋn dↄla fↄ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna."
42009058	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto mẽ tara tʋgrↄ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose."
42009059	Dee le yele bʋraa ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: "Doose mam." Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sↄ dee wa'am wa dↄla fↄ."
42009060	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Basɛ tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am na laagɛ ba kũm. Dee tɩ fõn sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la."
42009061	Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam wʋn doose fo, la basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka keese m yir-dõma."
42009062	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka n gʋrɛ nii-kũure kↄↄra dee bɩsra poorʋm, ka tã wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma."
42010001	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi looge la karẽnbiisi basɛba pisyopↄɩ la ayi tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi tɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋa sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba, la zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ ẽŋa mẽŋa wʋn sẽŋɛ la.
42010002	A yele ba yetɩ: "Va'am na bõnkↄↄla lagsgↄ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la pↄ'ↄrɩ mɛ. Bɛla ı̃yã sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkↄↄla la."
42010003	Dee yãŋa yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya, yãma ãn wʋ piisi tɩ mam tõm saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka.
42010004	Da dɩkɛ-ya pʋtmãanɛ, bɩɩ tãmpↄkↄ, la da dɩkɛ-ya tagra pa'asɛ, da ze'ele-ya sore bↄ nẽra gã'a.
42010005	La ya sãn yetɩ ya kẽ yire pʋam, ya dẽŋɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ yire la dõma yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bↄ ya sũ-mã'asʋm.'
42010006	Nẽra sãn bↄna mı̃ bↄↄra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ẽ. La nẽra sãn ka bↄna mı̃ bↄↄra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn leme ya mẽŋa zẽ'am.
42010007	Da lↄsna-ya yiɛ, bↄna-ya yire ayɩla pʋam, yũura dee dita bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bↄ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tõntõnna to'oge a yↄↄrↄ.
42010008	Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ba to'oge ya, di-ya bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bↄ ya la,
42010009	la ya botɩ tẽn-ẽŋa bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee yele nẽrba la yetɩ: 'Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.'
42010010	La tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ya kẽ tɩ ba ka to'oge ya, ya yese sore dee yele tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu yetɩ:
42010011	'Tõma pɩɩsrɩ la ya tẽŋa tẽntõnnↄ n tabɛ tõma nãma la, tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa. La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.'
42010012	Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom nẽrba kãn ba yẽ toogo wʋ tẽn-ẽŋa nẽrba n wʋn yẽ toogo se'em na.
42010013	Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bↄra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
42010014	La sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bↄ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.
42010015	La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ ka paagɛ bug-tẽŋa."
42010016	La Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Sɛka n selsrɩ ya yetↄga, a selsrɩ la mam yetↄga, la sɛka n zagsɛ ya, a zagsɛ la mam. La sɛka n zagsɛ mam, a zagsɛ la sɛka n tõm mam na."
42010017	La karẽnbiisi pisyopↄɩ la ayi la sẽŋɛ mɛ dee leme wa'am la sũ-yẽlga wa yetɩ: "Zuudãana, baa la kʋlkã'arsɩ sakrɩ tõma nõorɛ mɛ, ban zotɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ la ı̃yã."
42010018	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yẽ la Asũtãana n ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa wʋ saaga n yãkɛ la.
42010019	Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam bↄ ya pãŋa mɛ tɩ ya nẽ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la nãnsɩ, dee yãŋɛ Asũtãana la a pãŋa wuu, la sɛla sɛla ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ya be'em.
42010020	La da ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga kʋlkã'arsɩ n sakrɩ ya nõorɛ la ı̃yã, ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga ya yʋ'ʋra n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire vↄm gõŋↄ pʋam na ı̃yã."
42010021	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yetɩ: "Mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fↄ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄm-pɩgsɩ la. Ẽe, mam Sↄ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ı̃yã."
42010022	"Mam Sↄ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum. La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sↄ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sↄ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na."
42010023	Azezi yele bɛla dee wẽrgɛ la a karẽnbiisi la bↄba, yele bãma mã'a yetɩ: "Yãma sɛba n yẽtɩ sɛla tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
42010024	La mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la na'adõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm."
42010025	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama isge tɩ a di Azezi yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
42010026	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ gõŋↄ la pʋam yetɩ bẽm? Fõn karẽŋrɩ ẽ na, a yetɩ bẽm?"
42010027	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "La yetɩ: Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, dee nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na."
42010028	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ yele sõŋa. Ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ vↄm na."
42010029	La ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ a bↄ a mẽŋa bʋʋrↄ la, tɩ a soke Azezi yetɩ: "Ãne n de mam tadãana?"
42010030	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra n daan yese Zerizalɛm wɛ Zeriko, tɩ fãarba yõkɛ ẽ fã a lↄgrↄ wuu, dee wẽ ẽ tɩ a dee la a ki, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
42010031	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgↄ kẽema ayɩla dↄla so-ẽŋa tↄlla, yẽ ẽ, lↄkɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
42010032	Tɩ Leviti nẽra mẽ wa'am tↄlla, yẽ ẽ, bʋrgɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
42010033	La Samaari nẽra n mẽ daan dolɩ so-ẽŋa tↄlla yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ.
42010034	Tɩ a paagɛ a zẽ'am dɩkɛ dãam peege a nõtↄ la, ẽŋɛ kaam ı̃mı̃ vile. Yãŋa yõkɛ ẽ bã a bõŋa zuo, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ sãama yire ka bɩsɛ a yelle.
42010035	Tɩ beere wiige tɩ a dɩkɛ lig-kõba bayi bↄ nẽr-sɛka n bɩsrɩ sãama yire yelle la, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Bɩsra a yelle, ligri la sãn pↄ'ↄgɛ, mam sãn leme, mam wʋn yↄ fↄ.' "
42010036	Azezi tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm dee soke ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽrba batã wã, fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ ãne n de nẽra la tɩ fãarba yõkɛ la tadãana?"
42010037	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama la lerge yetɩ: "Sɛka n zoe a ninbãalga sõŋɛ ẽ na." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ mẽ ka ẽŋɛ bɛla."
42010038	Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ ka kẽ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam. Tɩ pↄka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amartɩ bↄna tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam to'oge ẽ a yire.
42010039	Amartɩ tarɩ la yɩbga tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. Tɩ Amaari zẽa Zuudãana Azezi nãma bↄba sɛlsra a yetↄga.
42010040	La Amartɩ tõoma yelle n daan mõ'ogɛ a nini, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: "Mam Zuudãana, mam yɩbga la n basɛ tɩ mam m yɩla mã'a tõnna la, fõn yetɩ bẽm? Yele ẽ tɩ a wa'am wa sõŋɛ ma."
42010041	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Amartɩ, Amartɩ, fõn botɩ fʋ yɛm n yↄↄra la yɛla zozo'e yelle.
42010042	La bõnↄ ayɩla mã'a n de yel-kãŋkãŋɛ. Amaari looge la bõn-sõŋↄ, la nẽra nẽra kãn tã'agɛ to'oge bõn-ẽŋa a zẽ'am."
42011001	Azezi daan boe la zẽ'a ayɩla pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ. La ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, pa'alɛ tↄ tõma n wʋn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ se'em, wʋ Azã n pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi se'em na."
42011002	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra, ya yetɩ: 'Tõma Sↄ, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka, wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka,
42011003	bↄ'ↄra tↄ daarɛ woo la a dia.
42011004	Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, tɩ tõma mẽ basrɩ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ mɛ. Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tↄ tɩ tɩ lui.' "
42011005	Dee le yele ba yetɩ: "Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, yãma nẽr-sɛka sãn tara sɩrɛ, tɩ a wa'am a zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ wa sose ẽ yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, bↄ ma borborɩ batã,
42011006	mam sɩrɛ n ze'ele sore wa'am, tɩ mam ka tara sɛla wʋn bↄ ẽ tɩ a di.'
42011007	Tɩ a sɩrɛ la bↄna deem dee lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Da dãam mam, mam yʋ m zanõrɛ mɛ, tɩ mam la m kↄma gã, mam kãn yãŋɛ isge bↄ fↄ fõn boorɩ sɛla la.'
42011008	Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa a sãn põn kãn isge bↄ ẽ sɛla ban de sɩtↄ la ı̃yã, a wʋn isge bↄ ẽ ẽn boorɩ sɛla la mɛ, ẽn bʋlɛ ẽ na ı̃yã.
42011009	Bɛla mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ya sose Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya, ya ɛ, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ, ya wẽ kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bↄ ya.
42011010	Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bↄ ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bↄ ẽ.
42011011	Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ zũfo, tɩ a dɩkɛ bõnsɛla bↄ ẽ?
42011012	Bɩɩ a sãn sose ẽ zelle, tɩ a dɩkɛ nãŋa bↄ ẽ?
42011013	Yãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bↄ ya kↄma bõn-sõma, Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Sↄ n boe saazuum n ãn sõŋa la wʋn bↄ nẽr-sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ a Sɩa la gãnna."
42011014	La Azezi daan dige la kʋlkã'arga n tarɩ bʋraa tɩ a dɛna muko, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la daan yese, dee tɩ bʋraa la n de muko la yãŋa tã'agɛ tↄgra, tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la.
42011015	Tɩ nẽrba la basɛba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽn digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la, la de la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra ba."
42011016	Tɩ nẽrba basɛba bↄↄra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a tõm tõon-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ a pãŋa la ze'etɩ la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
42011017	Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: "So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ. La so'olʋm ẽŋa yiɛ mẽ wʋn lui mɛ.
42011018	La Asũtãana sãn welge zɛbra la a mẽŋa, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele. Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la ı̃yã tɩ mam yele bɛla.
42011019	Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãn pãŋa digri kʋlkã'arsɩ? Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrↄ.
42011020	La de la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am mɛ wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
42011021	Pãŋa dãana sãn mãasʋm sõŋa la a bʋdaan-lↄgrↄ gu'ura a yire, sɛla kãn ẽŋɛ a bõntarsõm.
42011022	La nẽra n tarɩ pãŋa gãnna ẽ sãn wa'am wa zɛbɛ yãŋɛ ẽ, a wʋn fãagɛ la a zɛbrɛ lↄg-sɛba tɩ a te'ege la yiɛn, dee yãŋa vaagɛ a yire lↄgrↄ la pʋɩ.
42011023	Nẽr-sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ."
42011024	Azezi le yetɩ: "Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pↄgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ɛ zẽ'a koŋe, a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.'
42011025	La a sãn lebe ka yẽ tɩ a pɩɩsɛ mɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa,
42011026	a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopↄɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa mẽŋa wa'am, tɩ ba kẽ lagɩm bↄna mı̃. Bɛla, nẽr-ẽŋa toogo yãŋa wʋn gãnna a kʋrʋm toogo la mɛ."
42011027	Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ pↄka ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Pↄg-sɛka n dↄgɛ fↄ, tɩ fʋ mõgɛ a bı̃'isum na, tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
42011028	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, dee sakra ɩta lan yele se'em na, n tõn tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
42011029	Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am zo'oge, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba de la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ. Ba eerɩ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma ayẽma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlma sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azonaasɩ la.
42011030	Bõn-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Azonaasɩ la, pa'alɛ Niniivi dõma la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ de la sɛka n pa'alɩ zamãan-ẽna dõma Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa.
42011031	Sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pↄka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gↄbga bↄba la wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetↄga la, la sɛka n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ.
42011032	Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma mẽ wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã. Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga bↄ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero. La sɛka n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm."
42011033	"Nẽra kãn yõ fɩtla sʋgɛ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgↄ vuge ẽ, a wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo tɩ a nẽegɛ bↄ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la.
42011034	Fʋ nini n nẽerɩ peelem bↄ'ↄra fʋ ı̃yã wʋ fɩtla la, bɛla fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ. La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ı̃yã wuu boe la lika pʋam.
42011035	Bɛla ı̃yã, guuse tɩ bõn-sɛka n de peelem fʋ pʋam na, da dɛna lika.
42011036	La fʋ ı̃yã wuu sãn tara peelem sõŋa, tɩ baa bↄbrɛ ayɩla ka tara lika, fʋ ı̃yã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ wʋ fɩtla n tarɩ peelem nẽera bↄ'ↄra nẽrba se'em na."
42011037	Azezi n daan tↄgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ Farisi nẽra ayɩla wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka kẽ zı̃'ire bↄna mı̃ tɩ a di.
42011038	Tɩ Farisi nẽra la yẽ tɩ Azezi ka peege nu'usi wʋ ban ɩtɩ ba sisgo se'em na, dee yetɩ a di, tɩ la di'ige ẽ.
42011039	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yãma Farisi dõma peerɩ ya wama la ya laasɩ pↄa mɛ, la yãma mẽŋa pʋam pɩrɛ la dẽgrↄ n de fãaga la pʋtʋʋlgↄ.
42011040	Ya de la geto! La dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ poorʋm na, n ken ẽŋɛ pʋam na?
42011041	Dɩkɛ-ya yan tarɩ sɛla la bↄ nasdõma la ya sũure wuu, tɩ sɛla woo wʋn ãna sõŋa bↄ ya.
42011042	Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma bↄ'ↄrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorↄ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, la ya ka ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, la ya ka nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ. La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
42011043	Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma eerɩ la zẽ'esɩ nẽŋa tɩ ya zı̃'ire wẽndeto pʋam, dee bↄↄra tɩ ba nã'asra ya da'asɩ pʋam.
42011044	Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, ya ãn wʋ yↄↄrↄ n naagɛ la tẽŋa tɩ nẽrba nẽera ba zuto tↄlla, dee ka mina tɩ yↄↄrↄ n boe mı̃."
42011045	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãama ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fʋ sãn tↄgra bɛla fʋ po pↄ'ↄra la tõma wuu."
42011046	Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: "Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma mẽ wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n botɩ nẽrba la ɩta se'em na, ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ya zelgrɩ nẽrba la, la yãma mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ya kalʋm ba la ya nu'ubiire.
42011047	Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma mẽtɩ la yↄↄrↄ bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la. La yãma yaabdõma n yʋʋn kʋ ba.
42011048	La yãma n mẽtɩ sɛba tɩ ya yaabdõma kʋ la yↄↄrↄ la, la pa'alɛ tɩ ya sakɛ tɩ ban yʋʋn tõm se'em na ãn sõŋa mɛ.
42011049	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ yɛm na yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn tõm nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la Tõntõnɩba bↄ ba, la ba wʋn kʋ basɛba, dee nãmsɛ basɛba.'
42011050	Bɛla Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sɩbgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma wʋ la de la bãma n kʋ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la halɩ dũnia pı̃'iluŋo, wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã,
42011051	lan pↄsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa, halɩ wa paagɛ Azakari tɩ ba kʋ kãabgↄ bı̃mbı̃nne, la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋↄ tẽŋasʋka la. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ tõon-be'ero bãma wuu taalɛ boe la zamãan-ẽna nẽrba zuo.
42011052	Yãma lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n gu'uri nẽrba tɩ ba ka bãŋra Nawẽnnɛ sɩra. Yãma mẽŋa ka sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra la, dee mẽ gu'ura nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba sakɛ la."
42011053	La Azezi n ze'ele bilam fõrgɛ la, tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la Farisi dõma sũure ba isge la ẽ. Tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽ, sↄkra ẽ sokrɩsɩ zozo'e
42011054	bↄↄra tɩ a tↄgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ.
42012001	Wakat-ẽŋa nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n lagsɛ zo'oge mikra taaba, nẽera taaba nãma, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma pʋlibsum na n ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ n botɩ dãam wuu kɛlla la.
42012002	Bõn-sɛka woo n lile wʋn lilge, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn puke.
42012003	Bɛla, bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya tↄgɛ lika pʋam, ba wʋn tↄgɛ ẽ na peelem pʋam tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm, la bõn-sɛka tɩ ya waasʋm deem na, ba wʋn zom na gↄsgↄ mõolɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm."
42012004	"M sɩrdõma, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da zↄta dabeem la sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ı̃yã mã'a, dee ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla pa'asɛ la.
42012005	Mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya lan masɛ tɩ ya zↄta sɛka. Zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn kʋ, dee tara pãŋa wʋn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa la. Asɩra, zↄta-ya Nawẽnnɛ.
42012006	Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto banuu la lig-kõba bayi mã'a? La Nawẽnnɛ ka yı̃nni baa ayɩla yelle.
42012007	La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ. Bɛla ı̃yã, da zↄta-ya dabeem, tɩ yãma tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ."
42012008	"La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
42012009	La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ẽŋa dagɩ mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam tɩ a dagɩ mam nẽra.
42012010	La nẽr-sɛka woo n tↄgɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la be'em, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, la nẽr-sɛka woo n pↄ'ↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
42012011	Ba sãn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, bɩɩ na'adõma nẽŋam, bɩɩ kɛ'ɛndõma nẽŋam tɩ ba di ya sarɩya, da fabla-ya yan wʋn lerge se'em, bɩɩ yan wʋn tↄgɛ se'em to'oge ya mẽŋa.
42012012	Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn pa'alɛ ya wakat-ẽŋa yan wʋn tↄgɛ se'em."
42012013	Azezi n tↄgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ nẽra ayɩla n boe nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, yele m kẽema tɩ a dɩkɛ tõma sↄ n ki dee bõn-sɛba la, pʋɩ bↄ ma m bõnↄ."
42012014	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n bↄ mam nõorɛ tɩ m dɛna ya sarɩyadita, bɩɩ m pʋta ya bõntarsõm bↄ'ↄra ya?"
42012015	Dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: "Guusra-ya ya mẽŋa, da ɛɛra bõntarsõm zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽra n tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge ı̃yã tɩ a tarɩ yõvore."
42012016	A yele bɛla, dee makɛ la makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tɩ a vatↄ bõnkↄↄla mãalɛ sõŋa,
42012017	tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: 'Zẽ'a ka boe tɩ m wʋn sũm m bõnkↄↄla la. Bɛla ı̃yã, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?'
42012018	Yãŋa yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: 'Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em. Mam wʋn wõrɛ m bã la mɛ, malgɛ mẽ bã-kãra, sũm m bõnkↄↄla, la m sɛla woo.
42012019	Dee yele m sũurum yetɩ: M tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge, la wʋn seke ma paagɛ yʋʋma zozo'e. Bɛla m wʋn vo'ose mɛ di dee yũ, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.'
42012020	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Gergo wã, yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna wã m wʋn to'oge fʋ vↄm na. La ãne n wʋn sↄna bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ bı̃ŋe la?' "
42012021	La Azezi le yetɩ: "La de la bɛla la nẽr-sɛka woo n lagsrɩ bõntarsõm bı̃ŋra a mẽŋa ı̃yã, dee ka tara sɛla sɛla Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am."
42012022	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bɛla ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da fabla ya vↄm yelle, ya wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ ya wʋn yɛ fu-sɛba la yelle.
42012023	Vↄm yelle gãnnɩ dia mɛ, tɩ ı̃yã yelle mẽ gãnna futo.
42012024	Bɩsɛ-ya gõorↄ, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba ka lagsrɩ bõnkↄↄla, la ba ka tarɩ bãarɛ bɩɩ dia bı̃ŋre zẽ'a, la Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ'ↄrɩ ba dia. La yãma ka tarɩ yõorↄ gãnna bõn-ẽgla zo'oge sɩra?
42012025	Ãne n boe ya pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vↄm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ı̃yã?
42012026	La yãma sãn ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla n de bõn-pɩka, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ yãma fabla bõn-sɛba n weege la yelle?
42012027	Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo. La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
42012028	La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorↄ n boe zı̃na dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ ya yelle sõŋa gãnna bɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
42012029	Da basɛ-ya tɩ yan wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ yan wʋn yũ sɛla yelle pakɛ ya.
42012030	La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu. La yãma Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
42012031	Ɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na gãnna wuu, tɩ a wʋn bↄ ya bõn-bãma pa'asɛ."
42012032	"M nẽrba, ya ka zo'oge, la da zↄta-ya dabeem, se'ere n soe la, la paagɛ ya Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm mɛ tɩ a yetɩ a bↄ ya a so'olʋm.
42012033	Koose-ya yãma n tarɩ sɛla la dɩkɛ ligri la bↄ nasdõma. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya eerɩ la bõntarsõm n ka sã'anɩ. Ɛ-ya bõntarsõm tɩ ba bↄna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ wuu, bilam tɩ nayigba kãn tã'agɛ zũ, tɩ bõn-mõgla mẽ kãn tã'agɛ sã'am ba.
42012034	Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam."
42012035	Azezi le yetɩ: "Mãasʋm-ya lʋ ya sagãna ya sɩɩsɩ tɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ tõm, dee yõ ya fɩtladõma,
42012036	ãna wʋ nẽrba n gu'uri ba zuudãana n wʋn ze'ele pↄgdire kibsa wa'am, tɩ a sãn wa'am wa wi, tɩ ba yo'oge yaŋa tↄtↄ bↄ ẽ.
42012037	Tõntõn-sɛba tɩ ba zuudãana wʋn paam tɩ ba ze gu'ura ẽ, tarɩ zu-yẽlga. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a wʋn basɛ tɩ ba zı̃'ire, tɩ zuudãana la mẽŋa mãasʋm wa pʋɩ ba dia.
42012038	A sãn wa'am sõnsʋa, bɩɩ bewiine, wa yẽ tɩ ba ken gu'ura ẽ, ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
42012039	Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina wakat-sɛka tɩ nayiga wʋn wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
42012040	Bɛla, yãma mẽ mãasʋm zɛ sõŋa, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ yãma ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na."
42012041	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn makɛ makrɛ ẽna wã la tõma mã'a bɩɩ, nẽrba wuu?"
42012042	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋↄ n tarɩ yɛm? La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bↄ'ↄra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
42012043	Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
42012044	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bↄ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
42012045	La tõntõnna la sãn tẽ'esɛ yetɩ, ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna, yãŋa wẽ'era tõntõn-bʋraasɩ, la tõntõn-pↄgsɩ, dita, dee yũura bugra,
42012046	a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ. La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na sɛba n ka bↄ ẽŋa sɩra la yẽ sɩbgrɛ.
42012047	Tõntõn-sɛka n mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ka mãasʋm bɩɩ ka tõm ẽn boorɩ se'em na, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ mɛ zozo'e.
42012048	La tõntõn-sɛka n ka mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ na fẽe. Sɛka tɩ ba bↄ ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ yɛla zozo'e yelle mɛ, la sɛka tɩ ba gu'ule ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ halɩ yɛla zozo'e yelle gãnna mɛ."
42012049	"Mam wa'am tɩ m tʋʋrɛ la bugum dũnia wã zuo, la mam boorɩ nɩ mɛ zozo'e tɩ bugum na põn darɛ dita.
42012050	La dẽnɩ tɩ mam yẽ nãmsgↄ zozo'e wʋ mam mise la ko'om pʋam na, la a yelle la wʋn nãmsɛ mam mɛ halɩ tɩ la wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.
42012051	Ya tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba nõorɛ n dɛna ayɩla dũnia zuo bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, mam yetɩ ya tɩ mam tarɩ la welgre wa'am.
42012052	La, lan pↄsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, nẽrba banuu sãn bↄna yire ayɩla pʋam, nẽrba batã wʋn welge mɛ sisra nẽrba bayi la, tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ sisra nẽrba batã la.
42012053	La sↄ wʋn sise a dayʋa, tɩ dayʋa mẽ sise a sↄ. La ma wʋn sise a pↄyʋa, tɩ pↄyʋa mẽ sise a ma. La dayʋa pↄga wʋn sise a sɩra ma, tɩ sɩra ma mẽ sise a dayʋa pↄga."
42012054	Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Ya sãn yẽ tɩ wara sobge bↄbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tↄtↄ tɩ saaga wʋn ni mɛ, tɩ a sɩrɩ ni.
42012055	La ya sãn le yẽ tɩ kʋsebgo vugri bↄbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɩ wↄlgↄ lɛm mɛ, tɩ wↄlgↄ wʋn sɩrɩ paagɛ.
42012056	Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma bɩsrɩ mɛ mina tẽŋa, la saazuum yɛla n ãn se'em. La bẽm tɩ yãma ka mina bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã võorɛ bↄkɛ?"
42012057	"Bẽm tɩ ya mẽŋa ka tẽ'esɛ bãŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ bↄkɛ?
42012058	Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tarɩ fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, mõrgɛ tɩ ya mãalɛ yelle la sore, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tↄgɛ fʋ yetↄga la dɩkɛ fʋ bↄ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fↄ yʋ'a deem.
42012059	Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yↄ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ."
42013001	La wakat-ẽŋa nẽrba basɛba n wa'am wa tↄgɛ pa'alɛ Azezi, gↄmna Apilatɩ n daan botɩ ba kʋ Galile nẽrba basɛba wakat-sɛka tɩ ba boe mı̃ kãabra bↄ'ↄra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ ba zɩɩm yese gaam na kãabgↄ la zɩɩm.
42013002	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ Galile nẽr-bãma n daan yẽ nãmsgↄ ẽŋa la, bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Galile dõma basɛba la bɩɩ?
42013003	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.
42013004	La nẽrba pia la anii tɩ de-tʋgma yʋʋn lui kʋ ba Silo tẽŋa la, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Zerizalɛm nẽrba basɛba la bɩɩ?
42013005	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla."
42013006	Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ẽna wã yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n tarɩ kẽnkãŋa n sele a va'am pʋam, yãŋa wa'am tɩ a bɩsɛ a sãn tara biɛ, ka yẽ sɛla sɛla.
42013007	Tɩ a yele va'am na gu'ura yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma atã n wãna tɩ mam sẽnnɩ dee ka yẽta biɛ kẽnkãŋa wã zuo. Sɛ ẽ basɛ, tɩ a yẽrɛ la zẽ'a.'
42013008	Tɩ gu'ura la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, basɛ ẽ yʋʋn-ẽna mã'a, tɩ mam wʋn kↄ gilge a tille, ẽŋɛ bugulgo basɛ ẽ,
42013009	la yʋʋnɛ sãn kaagɛ tɩ a wↄm, la ãn sõŋa, la a sãn ken ka wↄm, fʋ yãŋa sɛ ẽ basɛ.' "
42013010	Azezi daan boe la Zifdõma wẽndeem vo'osgo daarɛ zãsna nẽrba,
42013011	tɩ pↄka ayɩla bↄna mı̃ tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ botɩ a dɛna kobgo paagɛ yʋʋma pia la anii, yũre ka tãna wʋn dↄ'ↄgɛ.
42013012	Tɩ Azezi yẽ pↄka la, wi ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, fʋ yẽ yolsgo, fʋ bã'aga la basɛ fↄ."
42013013	Dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ pↄka la zuo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ pↄka la bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a tã'agɛ dↄ'ↄra, yãŋa pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
42013014	Tɩ wẽndeego la naba sũure isge la Azezi, ẽŋa n botɩ pↄka la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la ı̃yã. Tɩ a yele nẽrba la yetɩ: "Dabsa ayoobɩ n boe tɩ ya tãna wʋn tõm. Wa'am-ya dabs-bãma pʋam wa tɩbɛ ya mẽŋa, dee da sẽnna vo'osgo daarɛ tɩbra ya mẽŋa."
42013015	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma nẽra woo ka lorgrɩ a lↄlga, bɩɩ a bõŋa sẽnna yũula ko'om vo'osgo daarɛ mɛ bɩɩ?
42013016	Tɩ pↄg-ẽna wã n de Abraham yɩɩŋa tɩ Asũtãana lʋ ẽ yʋʋma pia la anii wã, la ka narɩ tɩ mam lorge ẽ vo'osgo daarɛ?"
42013017	La ẽŋa n yele bɛla la, tɩ yãnnɛ yõkɛ a bɛ'ɛba la wuu, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm la a tõon-yãlma sɛba wuu tɩ a ẽŋɛ la.
42013018	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wõn na bẽm? La mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la ẽ?
42013019	A ãn wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire tɩ nẽra bʋrɛ a va'am pʋam, tɩ a bɩ lebge tɩ-kãtɛ. Tɩ niinto sẽnna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrↄ a wila zuo."
42013020	La a le yetɩ: "Mam wʋn le dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm?
42013021	A ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pↄka dɩkɛ gaam na borborɩ zom la-kãra batã wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke."
42013022	Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm dↄla tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam zãsna nẽrba.
42013023	Tɩ nẽra soke ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, nẽrba fẽe mã'a n wʋn yẽ fãarɛ bɩɩ?" Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ:
42013024	"Nargɛ-ya pãŋa doose zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, tɩ mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn wa ɛɛra mɛ tɩ ba kẽ, la ba kãn yãŋɛ.
42013025	La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, yidãana wʋn isge yʋ yaŋa la mɛ, la ya sãn weege yẽŋa, ya wʋn wẽ'era mɛ kↄkↄ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, yo'oge tɩ tɩ kẽ.' La a wʋn lerge ya yetɩ: 'Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a.'
42013026	La ya wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Dagɩ tõma la fõn n daan lagɩm dita, dee yũura, tɩ fʋ sẽnna tõma tẽŋam zãsna nẽrba?'
