42013027	La a wʋn le lerge ya yetɩ: 'Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a, fõrgɛ ya mam zẽ'am, yãma de la tõon-be'ero dõma.'
42013028	La ya wʋn ka yẽ Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba wuu, tɩ ba boe Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, la yãma wʋn weege la yẽŋa kɛlla dee dɩkɛ ya nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
42013029	La nẽrba wʋn yese dapↄ-bↄba, la zanõ-bↄba, la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, la gↄbga bↄba wa'am wa zı̃'ire Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam di.
42013030	Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba basɛba n de poorʋm dõma wʋn lebge nẽŋam dõma, tɩ basɛba n mẽ de nẽŋam dõma wʋn wa lebge poorʋm dõma."
42013031	La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: "Basɛ kalam dee sẽŋɛ zẽ'a ayẽma, tɩ Naba A'erↄdɩ eerɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ a kʋ."
42013032	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele yɛm be'ero dãana la yetɩ: 'Zı̃na la beesã, mam wʋn dige kʋlkã'arsɩ mɛ tɩ ba yese, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, la dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ mam wʋn ba'asɛ m tõoma la wuu.'
42013033	La dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ m sẽnnɛ na zı̃na, la beesã, la dabsa atã daarɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ki zẽ'a ayẽma, sãn dagna Zerizalɛm pʋam.
42013034	Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, dee lↄbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am la kuga kʋʋra. Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kↄma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bↄↄra.
42013035	Bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa bↄ ya, tɩ a lebge daboto. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: 'Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.' "
42014001	Vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ Farisi dõma naba ayɩla yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ nẽrba la n boe mı̃ na bɩsra ẽn wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
42014002	La bʋraaga ayɩla n boe mı̃ tɩ ı̃-fʋʋsŋↄ bã'aga tara ẽ, tɩ a zɛ Azezi nẽŋam.
42014003	Tɩ Azezi soke lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la yetɩ: "Sore boe tɩ nẽra botɩ nẽrba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, sore ka boe?"
42014004	Tɩ ba sı̃na. Tɩ Azezi botɩ bʋraaga la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, basɛ ẽ tɩ a kule.
42014005	Dee soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a dayʋa, bɩɩ a lↄlga wʋn lui lʋa pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kãn zoe tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ ka yaagɛ ẽ?"
42014006	Tɩ ba makɛ tɩ ba lerge ẽ koŋe.
42014007	Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba wi tɩ ba wa'am wa di la n loosrɩ zẽ'e-sõma zı̃'ita, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ yele ba yetɩ:
42014008	"Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pↄgdire kibsa wi fo, da kãn sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire zẽ'e-sõŋↄ, tã tɩ a mẽ wi la nẽra n gãnnɩ fõn.
42014009	Tɩ sɛka n wi ya wuu la, da wa'am wa yele fʋ yetɩ: 'Isge, dee tɩ ẽna zı̃'ire.' Tɩ fʋ yãŋa isge sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire poorʋm poorʋm la yãnnɛ.
42014010	Nẽra sãn wi fo, sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire poorʋm, tɩ sɛka n wi fʋ la sãn wa'am yẽ fↄ, a wʋn yetɩ: 'M sɩrɛ, wa'am wa zı̃'ire nẽŋam.' Bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ nã'asgↄ nẽr-sɛba tɩ fʋ zı̃ la ba la zẽ'am.
42014011	Nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ."
42014012	La Azezi yele sɛka n wi ẽ na yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wʋntɛɛŋa, bɩɩ yʋ'ʋŋↄ wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am wa di, da wi'ira fʋ sɩrdõma, bɩɩ fʋ sↄbiisi, bɩɩ fʋ nẽrba, bɩɩ fʋ sawiiba n de bõntatba, se'ere n soe la, ba mẽ wʋn wa ẽŋɛ bɛla daar-sɛka mɛ wi fo lebse bɛla sãnnɛ.
42014013	Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am di, wi nasdõma, la kↄↄrnↄ, la wↄbsɩ, la fↄↄsɩ.
42014014	Fʋ sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, fʋ wʋn tara zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ lebse fo. Bɛla, wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ a yɛm na vo'oge la, fʋ wʋn yẽ yↄↄrↄ."
42014015	La nẽrba la n lagsɛ zẽa dia zẽ'a la Azezi la, ba wõm ẽn yele se'em na mɛ, tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn po di dia Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam na tarɩ zu-yẽlga."
42014016	Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bↄ ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe, ẽŋɛ dia zozo'e, wi nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba wa'am wa di.
42014017	Tɩ dia la wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽrba la tɩ ẽŋa yetɩ: 'Wa'am-ya tɩ mam mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ gu'ura ya.'
42014018	Tɩ ba nẽra woo yɛta lan pakɛ ẽŋa se'em, tɩ ẽŋa sↄsra sugri. Pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Mam da la va'am, tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ lan ãn se'em, bɛla tɩ mam sↄsra ẽ sugri.'
42014019	Tɩ ayɩla yetɩ: 'Mam da la nii-kↄↄrsɩ pia bↄↄra tɩ m makɛ ba bayi bayi kↄ bɩsɛ, bɛla tɩ mam sↄsra ẽ sugri.'
42014020	Tɩ ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: 'Mam di la pↄg-sãana, bɛla tɩ mam kãn yãŋɛ wa'am.'
42014021	Tɩ tõntõnna la lebe ka tↄgɛ bɛla bↄ a zuudãana la. Tɩ a zuudãana la sũure yı̃ige, tɩ a yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Yese tↄtↄ sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la sorↄↄrↄ zuto ka tarɩ nasdõma, la kↄↄrnↄ, la fↄↄsɩ, la wↄbsɩ wa'am tɩ ba di.'
42014022	Tɩ tõntõnna la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ a zuudãana la n yele se'em na, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fõn yetɩ mam ẽŋɛ se'em na, mam ẽŋɛ mɛ, la zẽ'a ken dee mɛ.'
42014023	Tɩ zuudãana la le yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ sorↄ-pɩgsɩ la wuu zuo, ka mõrgɛ tarɩ nẽrba la wa'am tɩ ba kẽ tɩ mam yire pɩrɛ.'
42014024	La mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ba tɩ ba wa'am, tɩ ba zagsɛ la, ba nẽra nẽra kãn le malɩn di mam dia la."
42014025	Azezi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ dↄla ẽ, tɩ a gelge yele ba yetɩ:
42014026	"Nẽra sãn yetɩ a doose mam dee ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a sↄ, la a ma, la a pↄga, la a kↄma, la a sↄbiisi, la a tãpa, bɩɩ a sãn ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a mẽŋa vↄm, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
42014027	La sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgↄ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dↄ-puurŋa dↄla mam, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
42014028	Ya mi tɩ nẽra sãn bↄna ya pʋam bↄↄra tɩ a mẽ de-tʋgma, a wʋn dẽŋɛ zı̃'ire mɛ geele bɩsɛ, ẽn tarɩ se'em na wʋn seke tɩ a yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, bɩɩ la kãn seke?
42014029	La sãn dagna bɛla, a sãn ẽebɛ ẽbrɛ dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, sɛba wuu n yẽ bɛla la wʋn la ẽ mɛ
42014030	yetɩ: 'Nẽr-ẽna ẽebɛ la deego, dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ.'
42014031	Bɩɩ naba sãn wɛ'ɛsa tɩ a zɛbɛ la a na-tadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dẽŋɛ tẽ'esɛ bɩsɛ, ẽŋa n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspia la, a wʋn tã'agɛ zɛbɛ la na-sɛka n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspisyi, bɩɩ a kãn tã'agɛ?
42014032	La a sãn bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn tã'agɛ, naba ayẽma la n ken zãagɛ la, a wʋn dẽŋɛ tõm na a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ naba la zẽ'am ka soke ẽ bɩsɛ, bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ zɛbrɛ la ba'asɛ.
42014033	Bɛla mẽ, yãma nẽr-sɛka woo n ka basrɩ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a tarɩ la, ka tã wʋn dɛna mam karẽnbia.
42014034	Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la a sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
42014035	A ka le tara yõorↄ la tẽŋa, la a ka tã wʋn dɛna bugulgo mẽ, ba lobrɩ ẽ basra mɛ. Sɛka n wõm yetↄga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa."
42015001	Lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e n daan sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am tɩ ba selse a yetↄga.
42015002	Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la yõnna yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã to'orɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma, dee dita la ba."
42015003	Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ wã soke ba yetɩ:
42015004	"Bʋra-kãna n boe ya pʋam tara piisi kↄbga, tɩ ayɩla sãn bↄɩ, tɩ a kãn lagsɛ piisi piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la basɛ dũnsẽkam, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayẽma n bↄɩ la halɩ yãŋa yẽ ẽ?
42015005	La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ buke la sũ-yẽlga.
42015006	La a sãn kule yire, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: 'Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m pesgo la n bↄɩ la mɛ.'
42015007	Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ yire pʋam la bɛla gãnna nẽr-sõma piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka eerɩ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
42015008	Bɩɩ, pↄg-kãna n boe wʋn tara lig-kõba pia, tɩ ayɩla sãn bↄɩ, tɩ a kãn yõ fɩtla pɩɩsɛ deego la ɛ lagfↄ la sõŋa halɩ wa yẽ ẽ?
42015009	La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: 'Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m lagfↄ la n bↄɩ la mɛ.'
42015010	Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zẽ'am na bɛla."
42015011	Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Bʋraa n daan boe tara a dayↄↄsɩ bayi.
42015012	Tɩ yɩbga la yele a sↄ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, pʋɩ fʋ bõntarsõm na bↄ mam m bõnↄ.' Tɩ a sↄ pʋɩ a bõntarsõm na bↄ ba.
42015013	Tɩ la ẽŋɛ dabsa fẽe, tɩ yɩbga la lagsɛ a bõntarsõm na wuu yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ, ka tõm tõon-yooro sã'am ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu.
42015014	La ẽn sã'am a bõntarsõm na wuu ba'asɛ la, kↄm kãtɛ n wa'am tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ a ka le tara sɛla wʋn di.
42015015	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la nẽra ayɩla zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ a tõnna. Tɩ nẽra la dɩkɛ ẽ botɩ a sẽŋɛ mõom ka gu'ura a kurkurdõma.
42015016	Tɩ a kↄm dõnna tɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a di kurkuri dia. Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka bↄ ẽ.
42015017	Tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a sũurum yetɩ: 'Mam sↄ tarɩ tõntõnɩba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba dita tɩgra dee basra, dee tɩ mam bↄna kalam kiira la kↄm.'
42015018	Yãŋa yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn lebe kule la m sↄ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em,
42015019	mam ka le masɛ tɩ ba wi mam tɩ fʋ bia. Ɩta mam wʋ fʋ tõntõnɩba la ayɩla.'
42015020	Dee isge kulla a sↄ yire. La ẽn nãn boe zãazãarɛ la, tɩ a sↄ la yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a zoe tʋ'ʋsɛ kↄkɛ ẽ, mõbgɛ ẽ.
42015021	Tɩ bia la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em. Mam ka masɛ tɩ ba le wi'ira mam tɩ fʋ bia.'
42015022	Tɩ a sↄ la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: 'Sẽŋɛ-ya tↄtↄ ka tarɩ fu-sɛka n ãn sõŋa gãnna la wa'am wa yɛ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ nutʋa pire a nu'ubiire, dee dɩkɛ tagra pire ẽ.
42015023	La ya yõkɛ lↄl-polle n nõbɛ wa'am wa kʋ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ dia di, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
42015024	Se'ere n soe la, mam bia wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bↄɩ mɛ, tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.' Tɩ ba yãŋa ɩta sũ-yẽlga.
42015025	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a dayↄ-kẽema la boe la va'am. La ẽn lebe kulna wa lɛm yire la, a wõm na duursi tɩ ba wẽ'erɩ wa'ara.
42015026	Tɩ a wi a sↄ tõntõnna ayɩla soke ẽ yetɩ: 'Bẽm n ẽŋɛ?'
42015027	Tɩ tõntõnna la lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Fʋ yɩbga la n wa'am, tɩ fʋ sↄ kʋ lↄl-polle n nõbɛ, ẽŋa n yẽ fʋ yɩbga la tɩ a tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm na ı̃yã.'
42015028	Tɩ kẽema la sũure yı̃ige halɩ. Tɩ a zagsɛ tɩ ẽŋa kãn kẽ yire. Tɩ a sↄ yese belem ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa kẽ.
42015029	Tɩ a lerge a sↄ la yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma zozo'e tɩ mam tõnnɩ fʋ tõoma, dee ka zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ baa daarɛ ayɩla, la fõn ka bↄ mam bulla baa daarɛ ayɩla tɩ m kʋ tɩ mam la m sɩrdõma ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
42015030	La fʋ bi-ẽna wã n dɩkɛ fʋ bõntarsõm sẽŋɛ ka tõm yalsɩ tõoma sã'am ba wuu dee kulum wã, fʋ kʋ la lↄl-polle bↄ ẽ.'
42015031	Tɩ a sↄ lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'M bia, fõn boe la mam zẽ'am daarɛ woo. La mam n tarɩ sɛla wuu la de la fõn bõnↄ.
42015032	La, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yɩbga wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bↄɩ mɛ. Tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.' "
42016001	Tɩ Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tara tõntõnna tɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle. Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele bõntarsa la yetɩ, tõntõnna la sã'anɩ a bõntarsõm na mɛ.
42016002	Tɩ zuudãana la wi a tõntõnna la yetɩ: 'Bẽm tɩ ba tↄgra fõn yelle tɩ mam wõnna wãna? Geele pa'alɛ ma fõn ẽŋɛ mam bõntarsõm na se'em. Fʋ kãn le bɩsra mam yire yelle.'
42016003	Tɩ tõntõnna la yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: 'Mam zuudãana la yetɩ a dige mam a tõoma la pʋam mɛ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? Kʋa? Mam ka tarɩ pãŋa wʋn kↄ. La yãnnɛ n wʋn tara mam la sosgo.
42016004	Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a sãn wa dige ma, m tara sɩrdõma n wʋn to'oge mam ba yiɛ sõŋa.'
42016005	Tɩ a wi a zuudãana sãnditba ayɩla ayɩla, soke pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yetɩ: 'Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ la wãne?'
42016006	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: 'Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na kaam dugl-kãra kↄbga.' Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋↄ tↄtↄ zı̃'ire gʋlsɛ yetɩ, kaam dugl-kãra pinuu.'
42016007	Dee soke ayẽma yetɩ: 'Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ na wãne?' Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: 'Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na mui bↄra kↄbga.' Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋↄ gʋlsɛ yetɩ pinii.'
42016008	Baa la tõntõnna wã ɩrgↄ n ka doose sore la, a zuudãana pẽgɛ ẽ mɛ, ẽn tõm na yɛm na ı̃yã. Dũni-ẽna wã dõma tarɩ la yɛm tõnna la taaba gãnna nẽr-sɛba n bãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ peelem.
42016009	Bɛla ı̃yã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya dɩkɛ dũnia bõntarsõm yõgɛ sɩrdõma, tɩ dũnia bõntarsõm na sãn wa ba'asɛ, ba wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya bↄna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ."
42016010	"Nẽr-sɛka woo n de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ de la sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam. La sɛka n ka de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ ka de sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam.
42016011	Bɛla, ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma dũnia wã bõntarsõm pʋam, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõntarsõm sɩra sɩra gu'ule ya?
42016012	La ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma la bõn-sɛba n dagɩ ya mẽŋa bõnↄ, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõnↄ bↄ ya tɩ la dɛna ya mẽŋa bõnↄ?
42016013	Tõntõnna ka tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi. A wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pↄ'ↄra ayɩla la. Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana."
42016014	Farisi dõma n nõŋɛ ligri la n wõm bɛla la, ba la'arɩ Azezi mɛ.
42016015	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma pa'alɩ ya mẽŋa nẽrba nẽŋam wʋ ya de la nẽr-sõma. La Nawẽnnɛ mi ya pʋtẽ'era n ãn se'em mɛ. Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba pẽgrɩ la, de la bõn-dẽgrↄ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
42016016	Amoyisi lↄↄ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn pa'alɩ nẽrba ban wʋn ãna se'em, ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Azã wa'am na. Lan pↄsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga mɛ, tɩ nẽra woo nargra pãŋa tɩ a kẽ.
42016017	La, la de la nãana tɩ saazuum la dũnia tole gãnna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la bõn-pɩka ayɩla bↄɩ.
42016018	Nẽr-sɛka woo n basɛ a pↄga, dee le di pↄka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pↄga, la sɛka woo n di pↄka tɩ a sɩra basɛ mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em."
42016019	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Bõntarsa n daan boe, yɛɛra futo n ba ãna sõŋa, dee tara sɛla woo daarɛ woo tɩ la seke.
42016020	Tɩ nasa ayɩla mẽ daan bↄna, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Alazaarɩ, tɩ a ı̃yã wuu tara nõtↄ. A daan ẽn gã la bõntarsa la zanõrʋm,
42016021	bↄↄra tɩ a di bõntarsa la n diti tɩ di-zõra luta la. Tɩ baasɩ sẽnna lɛɛla a nõtↄ la.
42016022	Tɩ Alazaarɩ wa ki. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire Abraham zẽ'am. Tɩ bõntarsa la mẽ wa ki, tɩ ba laagɛ ẽ.
42016023	Tɩ bõntarsa la daan bↄna bug-tẽŋa nãmsra, yãŋa gorge yẽ Abraham halɩ zẽ'a n zãagɛ, tɩ Alazaarɩ zẽa a sakʋkↄ.
42016024	Tɩ bõntarsa la wi Abraham yetɩ: 'M sↄ Abraham, zoe m ninbãalga, dee tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'ubiire tẽ'egɛ ko'om mã'alɛ m zɩlɩŋa, se'ere n soe la, mam boe la bugum pʋam nãmsra.'
42016025	Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M bia, tẽegɛ tɩ fõn daan boe dũnia zuo wakat-sɛka la, fõn daan tarɩ bõn-sõma mɛ, dee tɩ Alazaarɩ yẽta toogo. La lɛɛlɛ wã, a sũure mã'agɛ mɛ, dee tɩ fõn yãŋa nãmsra.
42016026	La bõn-sɛka n pa'asɛ, bog-ko'ogo n beŋe tõma la yãma, tɩ nẽra sãn bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele kalam sẽŋɛ yãma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ. La nẽra mẽ sãn bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele yãma zẽ'am wa'am tõma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ.'
42016027	Tɩ a lerge Abraham yetɩ: 'M sↄ Abraham, la sãn dɛna bɛla, mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ mam sↄ yire,
42016028	tɩ mam tarɩ la sↄbiisi banuu, a sẽŋɛ ka kã'an ba, tɩ ba mẽ da wa'am nãmsgↄ zẽ'a wã.'
42016029	Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Ba tarɩ Amoyisi la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n gʋlsɛ gõn-sɛba la mɛ. La masɛ tɩ ba sakɛ la gõn-bãma yetↄga.'
42016030	Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'M sↄ, ayɛɩ, nẽra sãn vo'oge lebe sẽŋɛ ba zẽ'am, ba wʋn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.'
42016031	Tɩ Abraham lerge ẽ yetɩ: 'Ba sãn kãn sakɛ Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la nõorɛ, baa nẽra n ki sãn vo'oge lebe, ba kãn sakɛ.' "
42017001	Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "La ka tã tɩ bõn-sɛba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basra Nawẽnnɛ sore la ka wa'am. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ bõn-bãma wa'am na wʋn yẽ toogo.
42017002	Ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam, n sõɩ ẽŋa n wʋn botɩ bi-pɩka ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore.
42017003	Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa. Fʋ sↄbia sãn tõm be'em, fʋ kã'an ẽ. La a sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la, fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
42017004	La a sãn ẽŋɛ fʋ be'em nõorɛ ayopↄɩ daarɛ ayɩla, dee leme fʋ zẽ'am nõorɛ ayopↄɩ wa yetɩ: 'Mam tõm na be'em, bↄ mam sugri', dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ."
42017005	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Botɩ tɩ bↄ fↄ sɩra zo'oge."
42017006	Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ba yetɩ: "Ya sãn bↄ mam sɩra fẽe wʋ sↄ'ↄrↄ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele kẽnkãŋa wã tɩ a võogɛ sẽŋɛ ka sele mõgrɛ pʋam ke, la a wʋn sakɛ ya nõorɛ mɛ."
42017007	"Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, nẽra sãn bↄna yãma pʋam tara tõntõnna tɩ a kↄↄra, bɩɩ gu'ura a dũnsi, tɩ tõntõnna la sãn ze'ele va'am wa'am, a wʋn yele ẽ mɛ yetɩ, wa'am wa di bɩɩ?
42017008	Ayɛɩ, a wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Dʋgɛ m dia, dee teege fuugo yɛ, tarɩ dia la wa'am wa bↄ ma tɩ m di. M sãn di dee yũ ba'asɛ, tɩ fʋ mẽ yãŋa di dee yũ.'
42017009	La zuudãana la n yele tõntõnna la tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, zuudãana la kãn pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
42017010	Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ya tɩ ya ẽŋɛ la, ya yetɩ: 'Tõma wen dɛna la tõntõnɩba, tõma ka narɩ pʋ'ʋsgↄ, se'ere n soe la, la de la tɩ tõoma, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ tõm.' "
42017011	Azezi daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm dↄla Samaari la Galile tẽŋasʋka,
42017012	paagɛ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, tɩ kõnkↄma pia tʋ'ʋsra ẽ, ze'ele kẽnkɛrŋa
42017013	kaasra yetɩ: "Zuudãana Azezi, zoe tɩ ninbãalga."
42017014	La ẽn yẽ ba la, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya kãabgↄ kẽma la zẽ'am tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ ya ı̃yã la n ãn se'em." La ban sẽnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bã'asɩ la basɛ ba, tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
42017015	La ba nẽra ayɩla n yẽ tɩ a kõnkↄm na basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a lɛbra Azezi zẽ'am dee tↄgra ke'enke'em pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ,
42017016	sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ. A daan de la Samaari nẽra.
42017017	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "La dagɩ bãma pia n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm? Tɩ bawɛɩ la bↄna la bɛ?
42017018	Bẽm tɩ ẽna n de sãana la mã'a n leme wa'am tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ?"
42017019	Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn bↄ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ fãarɛ, isge sẽŋɛ."
42017020	Farisi dõma soke Azezi mɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba sʋkam. Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ sãn wa dita na'am, la ka de sɛla tɩ nẽrba tã wʋn yẽ la nini.
42017021	La nẽra kãn yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam', bɩɩ 'a boe la ke'. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boe la ya tẽŋasʋka dita na'am."
42017022	La Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ya wʋn bↄↄra tɩ ya yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, baa la sãn dɛna daarɛ ayɩla, la ya kãn yẽ ẽ.
42017023	La nẽrba wʋn yele ya yetɩ: 'Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke', bɩɩ 'bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam.' Da kãn sẽŋɛ-ya, da doose-ya ba.
42017024	Se'ere n soe la, daar-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme na, la wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ saazuum tɩ la nẽegɛ zẽ'a wuu se'em na.
42017025	La, lan dẽŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a nãmsɛ zozo'e tɩ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma zagsɛ ẽ.
42017026	Wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am na, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ tɩ la yʋʋn ãn se'em na.
42017027	Nẽrba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, tɩ bʋraasɩ dita pↄgba, tɩ pↄgsɩ mẽ ɛlla sɩrba, tɩ la wa paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Anoe kẽ õorŋ-kãtɛ la pʋam, dee tɩ ko'om yãŋa wa'am wa pɩrɛ zẽ'a wuu libe nẽrba wuu tɩ ba ki.
42017028	La mẽ wʋn ãna wʋ Alotɩ wakatɛ n yʋʋn ãn se'em na. Ba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, dee da'ara, dee kↄↄsra, dee bʋta, dee mẽta,
42017029	ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Alotɩ fõrgɛ Sodom tẽŋa la, dee tɩ bugum n diti kidibre ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa kʋ ba wuu.
42017030	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo daarɛ la mẽ wʋn di'ige ba la bɛla.
42017031	Daar-ẽŋa, nẽr-sɛka n boe gↄsgↄ dee tɩ a lↄgrↄ bↄna deego pʋam, a da sige bↄↄra tɩ a ze'ele dɩkɛ ba zoe. La nẽr-sɛka n boe a va'am, da lebe kule.
42017032	Tẽegɛ-ya lan yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Alotɩ pↄga se'em na.
42017033	Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vↄm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vↄm, a wʋn yẽ ẽ.
42017034	Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrba bayi sãn gã sõŋↄ ayɩla pʋam yʋ'ʋŋↄ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
42017035	La pↄgsɩ bayi sãn bↄna nẽerʋm nẽena, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
42017036	((Bʋraasɩ bayi sãn bↄna va'am, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.))"
42017037	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la soke Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, bõn-ẽna wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ bõn-kɩ'ɩsɩ boe la, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zõa lagsrɩ taaba."
42018001	Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba sↄsra Nawẽnnɛ wakatɛ wuu da basɛ,
42018002	yele ba yetɩ: "Sarɩyadita n daan boe tẽŋa ayɩla ka zↄta Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba.
42018003	Tɩ pↄkõorɛ mẽ bↄna tẽŋa la pʋam sẽnna a zẽ'am wakatɛ wuu yɛta ẽ tɩ: 'Sõŋɛ ma tɩ m yẽ bʋʋrↄ m bɛ zẽ'am.'
42018004	La pↄkõorɛ la sẽŋɛ ka sose ẽ na nõor-faa, tɩ sarɩyadita la ka sõŋɛ ẽ. La pↄkõorɛ la ẽn ken sẽnna sↄsra ẽ na, sarɩyadita la wa yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm mɛ yetɩ: 'Baa mam ka zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba la,
42018005	pↄkõ-ẽna n sẽnnɩ dãana mam se'em wã, mam wʋn isge mɛ sõŋɛ ẽ. La sãn dagna bɛla, a wʋn sẽnna mɛ nãmsra mam, a kãn basɛ.' "
42018006	Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi le yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya sarɩyadita la n de nẽr-be'ego la n yele se'em.
42018007	La sãn dɛna bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ kãn sõŋɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la n sosrɩ ẽ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ la, bↄ ba bʋʋrↄ gãnna bɛla? A wʋn yuuge mɛ dee sõŋɛ ba bɩɩ?
42018008	Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ a wʋn wa sõŋɛ ba mɛ tↄtↄ. La Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sãn wa leme dũnia zuo, a wʋn yẽ nẽrba n bↄ ẽ sɩra mɛ bɩɩ?"
42018009	Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayẽma bↄ nẽr-sɛba n tẽ'esrɩ tɩ bãma de la nẽr-sõma nẽ'esra nẽrba basɛba la, yetɩ:
42018010	"Bʋraasɩ bayi n sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na tɩ ba ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, ayɩla de la Farisi nẽra, tɩ ayẽma dɛna lampo-tↄ'ↄsa.
42018011	Tɩ Farisi nẽra la zɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsra a sũurum yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ, mam pʋ'ʋsrɩ fʋ, mam n ka wõn na nẽrba basɛba la n ãn se'em na, n de nayigba, bɩɩ nẽr-be'ero, bɩɩ nẽrba n tõnnɩ yalsɩ, la mam n ka wõn na lampo-tↄ'ↄs-ẽna wã la ı̃yã.
42018012	Dabsa ayopↄɩ woo pʋam, mam lʋtɩ nõorɛ la bʋyi, la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ mam yẽtɩ la, pia pʋam woo mam loorɩ ayɩla bↄ'ↄra fõn mɛ.'
42018013	La lampo-tↄ'ↄsa la ze'ele la kẽnkɛrŋa põn ka gorge a nẽŋa saazuum, dee wẽ nupʋ'ʋgↄ yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ, zoe m ninbãalga, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana.' "
42018014	Azezi yele bɛla dee yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ bʋra-ẽna wã n kule la, a yelle masɛ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, dee tɩ Farisi nẽra la yelle ka masɛ. Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ."
42018015	Nẽrba basɛba n daan tarɩ kↄm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto. La a karẽnbiisi la n yẽ bɛla la, ba zɛbɛ nẽrba la mɛ.
42018016	Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya kↄma la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kↄma wã bõnↄ.
42018017	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sↄna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
42018018	Zifdõma nẽrzuo ayɩla n daan soke Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ?"
42018019	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn wi mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋↄ? Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
42018020	Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na: 'Da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pↄga, da kʋ nẽra, da zũ, da tↄgɛ põmpↄrŋↄ kaseto, nanna fʋ sↄ la fʋ ma.' "
42018021	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu."
42018022	Azezi n wõm ẽn yele bɛla la, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la pʋɩ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dↄla mam."
42018023	La bʋraa la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a sũure ba sã'am, se'ere n soe la, a daan ba dɛna la bõntarsa.
42018024	Azezi n yẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am bɛla la, tɩ a yetɩ: "La tↄ mɛ bↄ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
42018025	La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupı̃im yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
42018026	Tɩ sɛba n wõm bɛla la yele yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?"
42018027	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ la, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ."
42018028	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma basɛ tõma n tarɩ sɛla mɛ dee dↄla fõn."
42018029	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a pↄga, bɩɩ a sↄbiisi, bɩɩ a sↄ la a ma, bɩɩ a kↄma, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na ı̃yã,
42018030	a wʋn to'oge zo'oge gãnna ẽn basɛ sɛla la dũnia wã zuo, dee wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ wakat-sɛka n sẽm na."
42018031	Azezi daan tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mɛ yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka yele ba yetɩ: "Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yʋʋn gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle la, wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ mɛ.
42018032	Ba wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ ka ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum, tɩ ba la ẽ, yaalɛ ẽ, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mı̃ ẽ,
42018033	wẽ ẽ na ka'asa, dee kʋ ẽ. La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge."
42018034	La ba ka bãŋɛ ẽn yele se'em na võorɛ baa fẽe, yetↄga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ, tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ yetↄga la võorɛ n boorɩ tɩ la yele se'em.
42018035	Azezi daan we'esɩ ka lɛm na Zeriko, tɩ fʋa zẽa sore kẽnkɛrŋa sↄsra,
42018036	wõm nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n tollɩ la dãmnɛ, soke yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ?"
42018037	Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra la n tollɩ."
42018038	Tɩ a tı̃i tↄgra yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa Azezi, zoe m ninbãalga."
42018039	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋam na tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ a sı̃na. Tɩ a malɩn tı̃i tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga."
42018040	Tɩ Azezi ze'ele, yetɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am. La ẽn lɛm Azezi la, tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ:
42018041	"Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bↄ fↄ?" Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ."
42018042	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Le yẽta, fõn bↄ mam sɩra la ı̃yã n botɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ."
42018043	Bilam mẽŋa tɩ a le yẽta dↄla Azezi pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ nẽrba la wuu n yẽ bɛla la, mẽ nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ.
42019001	Azezi daan dolɩ la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tↄlla,
42019002	tɩ bʋraa bↄna mı̃ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azase. A de la lampo-tↄ'ↄsrɩba naba, dee dɛna bõntarsa.
42019003	A daan boorɩ tɩ a bãŋɛ la Azezi n de nẽr-sɛka. A de la nẽr-gɩlga, la nẽrba la n zo'oge la ı̃yã, a ka tã wʋn yẽ Azezi.
42019004	Tɩ a zoe tole nẽŋam sẽŋɛ Azezi n we zẽ'am bↄba la ka zom kẽnkãŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ Azezi.
42019005	Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ zẽ'e-ẽŋa, gorge bɩsɛ kẽnkãŋa la zuo yẽ ẽ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azase, sige tↄtↄ, se'ere n soe la, dẽnɩ tɩ mam gã'arɛ fõn yire zı̃na."
42019006	Tɩ Azase sige tↄtↄ, to'oge ẽ sẽŋɛ a yire la sũ-yẽlga.
42019007	La nẽrba la n yẽ bɛla la, ba wuu yõnnɩ mɛ yetɩ: "A sẽŋɛ ka kẽ tɩ a bↄna la tõon-be'ero dãana la yire."
42019008	Tɩ Azase zɛ Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam wʋn dɩkɛ m bõntarsõm pʋsʋka pʋɩ bↄ nasdõma. La mam sãn pã'asɛ nẽrba to'oge ba sɛla, mam wʋn lebse bↄ ba nõor-anaasɩ."
42019009	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Zı̃na yi-ẽna dõma yẽ fãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, ẽna mẽ sɩrɩ de la Abraham yɩɩŋa.
42019010	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am dũnia zuo tɩ a ɛ la nẽr-sɛba n bↄɩ la, fãagɛ ba."
42019011	Nẽrba la n daan selsrɩ Azezi yetↄga la, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ bↄ ba, se'ere n soe la, a daan lɛm na Zerizalɛm, tɩ nẽrba la tẽ'esra tɩ wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ diti na'am ba tẽŋasʋka.
42019012	Bɛla tɩ a makɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Nabia n yʋʋn yetɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ ka di na'am leme wa'am.
42019013	Ẽn yʋʋn yetɩ a sẽŋɛ la, a wi la a tõntõnɩba pia bↄ ba sãlma lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla, yele ba yetɩ: 'Dɩkɛ-ya ligri la lɛɛbra, tɩ m sẽŋɛ dee leme wa'am.'
42019014	La a so'olʋm na nẽrba nifo kẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ ẽn fõrgɛ la, tɩ ba tõm tõntõnɩba tɩ ba babsɛ ẽ ka yetɩ, bãma ka boorɩ tɩ a dɛna bãma naba.
42019015	La baa la bɛla a di na'am na mɛ, lebe kule ka basɛ tɩ ba wi tõntõn-sɛba tɩ a daan bↄ ba ligri la, tɩ ba wa'am tɩ a soke ba bãŋɛ, nẽra woo n leebe yẽ yõorↄ se'em.
42019016	Tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, mam dɩkɛ fʋ sãlma lag-kõbrɛ la leebe yẽ la yõorↄ sãlma lig-kõba pia pa'asɛ.'
42019017	Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Fʋ ẽŋɛ sõŋa, fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋↄ! Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la bõnↄ fẽe la ı̃yã, fʋ wʋn sↄna tẽnsɩ pia bɩsra.'
42019018	Tɩ bʋyi dãana la mẽ wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, mam dɩkɛ fʋ sãlma lagfↄ la leebe yẽ la yõorↄ sãlma lig-kõba banuu pa'asɛ.'
42019019	Tɩ a yele ẽ mẽ yetɩ: 'Fõn wʋn sↄna tẽnsɩ banuu bɩsra.'
42019020	Tɩ ayẽma mẽ wa'am wa yetɩ: 'M zuudãana, fʋ lagfↄ la n wãna, mam vile ẽ na tãnnɛ sʋgɛ,
42019021	mam zotɩ fõn mɛ, se'ere n soe la, fõn de la nẽra yelle n tↄɩ. Fõn to'orɩ la bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ mẽŋa ka tõm na yõorↄ, dee lagsra bõnkↄↄl-sɛba tɩ fõn ka bʋrɛ.'
42019022	Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Fʋ de la tõntõn-be'ego, mam wʋn dɩkɛ la fʋ nõorɛ yetↄga la di fʋ sarɩya. Fõn mi tɩ mam de la nẽra yelle n tↄɩ, tↄ'ↄra bõn-sɛba tɩ mam ka tõm na yõorↄ, dee lagsra bõnkↄↄl-sɛba tɩ mam ka bʋrɛ la,
42019023	bẽm ı̃yã tɩ fʋ ka tarɩ m ligri la ka bı̃ŋe bãnkɩ pʋam, tɩ m sãn leme wa'am tɩ m to'oge m ligri la, la yõorↄ?'
42019024	Dee yele sɛba n boe bilam na yetɩ: 'To'oge-ya lagfↄ la bↄ sɛka n tarɩ ligri pia la.'
42019025	Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Zuudãana, a põn tarɩ la ligri pia.'
42019026	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: 'Mam yetɩ ya tɩ sɛka woo n tarɩ, a wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ. La sɛka woo n ka tarɩ, a wʋn koŋe sɛla fẽe tɩ a tarɩ la.
42019027	La sãn dɛna mam bɛ'ɛba la n ka boorɩ tɩ mam di na'am na, tarɩ-ya ba wa'am wa kʋ ba mam nẽŋam.' "
42019028	La Azezi n daan tↄgɛ bɛla ba'asɛ la, a tole la nẽrba la nẽŋa tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm.
42019029	La ẽn daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm Betɩfaazɩ, la Betani n boe Oliivi tãŋa zẽ'am na, a tõm na a karẽnbiisi bayi
42019030	yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe nẽŋa la pʋam. Ya sãn paagɛ mı̃, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ. Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
42019031	La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: 'Wãne tɩ ya lↄrgra ẽ?', ya lerge yetɩ: 'Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ.' "
42019032	La ẽŋa n tõm sɛba la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ, yẽ sɛla woo wʋ ẽn yele ba se'em na.
42019033	Tɩ ba lorge bõn-biire la, tɩ bõŋa la dõma soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya lↄrgra bõŋa la?"
42019034	Tɩ ba lerge ba yetɩ: "Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ."
42019035	Tɩ ba tarɩ bõŋa la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
42019036	La ẽn daan we la, nẽrba la yɛrgɛ la ba futo sore la zuo.
42019037	Ẽn daan lɛm Zerizalɛm na, a dolɩ la Oliivi tãŋa sore la sigra, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu n de a karẽnbiisi la ɩta sũ-yẽlga zẽkɛ ba kõosɩ pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ ke'enke'em, a tõon-yãlma tɩ ba yẽ la ı̃yã,
42019038	yɛta tɩ: "Pẽgɛ-ya na-sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la. Sũ-mã'asʋm boe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum."
42019039	La Farisi dõma basɛba n boe nẽrba la pʋam yele Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tãsɛ fʋ karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba sı̃na."
42019040	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ba sãn sı̃na, kuga wʋn kaasɛ tagurga."
42019041	Azezi n daan lɛm Zerizalɛm yẽ tẽŋa la, a kellɩ mɛ tẽŋa la nẽrba ı̃yã,
42019042	yetɩ: "Ya sãn mi ni zı̃na wã bõn-sɛka n wʋn bↄ ya sũ-mã'asʋm, la wʋn ãn nɩ sõŋa! La, la sʋgɛ mɛ, tɩ ya nini ka yẽta ẽ.
42019043	La wakatɛ sẽm mɛ, tɩ ya bɛ'ɛba wʋn wa'am wa mẽ lalga gilge ya tẽŋa wã wuu gu, tɩ ya nẽrba kãn tã'agɛ yese.
42019044	Ba wʋn sã'am tẽŋa la wuu mɛ, dee kʋ yãma sɛba wuu n boe a pʋam na. Ba wʋn sã'am ẽ saam saam mɛ, tɩ kugre kãn weege a tadãana zuo. Bõn-bãna n wʋn ẽŋɛ la, de la yan ka bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ya la ı̃yã."
42019045	Azezi n tↄgɛ bɛla ba'asɛ la, a kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra sɛba n koosrɩ la tɩ ba yɛsra,
42019046	dee yele ba yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Mam deego wã wʋn dɛna la pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego.' La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgↄ zẽ'a."
42019047	La daarɛ woo a boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la nẽrzuto daan ɛɛra sore tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
42019048	La ba ka mi ba wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan ãn na sɛlɩ sɛlsra a yetↄga la.
42020001	Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba, dee mõola kõ-yẽlga la bↄ'ↄra ba. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma
42020002	wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yele to, fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna, bɩɩ ãne n bↄ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta?"
42020003	Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam mẽ wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla tɩ ya lerge ma:
42020004	Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba?"
42020005	Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: "Tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ı̃yã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
42020006	La tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba, nẽrba la wuu wʋn lobe tɩ la kuga kʋ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la sakɛ tɩ Azã daan de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa."
42020007	Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka mi sɛka n tõm ẽ."
42020008	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bɛla, mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ la zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãna wã."
42020009	Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ ẽna bↄ nẽrba la yetɩ: "Bʋraaga n daan kↄ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, dɩkɛ va'am na bↄ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ ka yuuge.
42020010	Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bↄ ẽ. Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na wẽ ẽ, dee botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
42020011	Tɩ a le tõm a tõntõnna ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, dee yaalɛ ẽ, botɩ a mẽ lebe kule zãŋa.
42020012	Tɩ a le malɩn tõm ayɩla bʋtã pʋam, tɩ ba wẽ ẽ pↄglʋm, dee dige ẽ va'am na pʋam.
42020013	Tɩ va'am na dãana la tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: 'Mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? M yãŋa wʋn tõm na m mẽŋa bi-nõŋrɛ, tã tɩ ba wʋn nã'asɛ ẽŋa.'
42020014	La sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na n yẽ va'am na dãana mẽŋa dayʋa la, tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: 'Ẽna n wʋn wa sↄↄgɛ sↄna a sↄ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnↄ.'
42020015	Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ ve'ege yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka kʋ ẽ. Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽr-bãna la wãne?
42020016	A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ nẽrba la mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bↄ nẽrba basɛba tɩ ba bɩsra." La nẽrba la n wõm bɛla la, ba yetɩ: "La kãn ẽŋɛ bɛla baa fẽfẽe."
42020017	Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba, dee yetɩ: "La bɛla võorɛ de la bẽm tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la, lebge la kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa'?
42020018	La nẽr-sɛka n lui kug-ẽŋa zuo, a wʋn kↄ kↄ mɛ, la kugre la sãn lui nẽr-sɛka zuo, a wʋn mẽrgɛ ẽ mɛ."
42020019	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ɛɛra sore wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, ba bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ la de la bãma ı̃yã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ la. La ba zotɩ la nẽrba la.
42020020	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la pigra Azezi. Bɛla tɩ ba tõm nẽrba n ãn wʋ ba de la nẽr-sõma la tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bẽrɛ Azezi la yetↄga, tɩ a sãn tↄgɛ tuuge, tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ gↄmna n soe nõorɛ nu'usum.
42020021	Tɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn tↄgrɩ se'em na, la fõn zãsnɩ se'em na masɛ mɛ, la fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, dee zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla sɩra sɩra.
42020022	Bɛla, lↄↄ la bↄ sore tɩ tɩ yↄ lampo bↄ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, a ka bↄ sore?"
42020023	Tɩ a bãŋɛ ba yɛmkẽgsɩga la, yele ba yetɩ:
42020024	"Tarɩ-ya lagfↄ ayɩla wa'am." Tɩ ba tarɩ wa'am. Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la Rom na-keko la."
42020025	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee mẽ bↄ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka."
42020026	Azezi n daan tↄgɛ se'em nẽrba la nẽŋam na, ba ka tã'agɛ yõkɛ ẽ, a lergre la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba sı̃na.
42020027	Saduse dõma n daan yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa
42020028	soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Sɛka sↄbia sãn tara pↄga, ki dee tɩ a ka tara bia, a di a pↄkõorɛ la dↄgɛ kↄma bↄ sɛka n ki la.'
42020029	La bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n daan boe dɛna sↄbiisi, tɩ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la di pↄga tɩ a ka dↄgɛ, dee tɩ a ki,
42020030	tɩ bʋyi dãana la mẽ di pↄkõorɛ la ki, dee tɩ a ka dↄgɛ.
42020031	Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla. La bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu lagɩm di pↄkõorɛ la mɛ ki, tɩ ba nẽra nẽra ka dↄgɛ bia.
42020032	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pↄka la mẽ ki.
42020033	Bɛla, bãma bayopↄɩ la wuu n di pↄka la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sↄna pↄka la?"
42020034	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Dũni-ẽna nẽrba diti pↄgsɩ mɛ dee ɛlla sɩrba,
42020035	la nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ tɩ ba masɛ tɩ ba vo'oge kẽ dũnia sɛka n sẽm pʋam na ka diti pↄgba, la ba ka ellɩ sɩrba.
42020036	La ba ka tã wʋn le ki, se'ere n soe la, ba ãn wʋ malɛkadõma la. Ba de la Nawẽnnɛ kↄma, ban vo'oge dee basɛ kũm na ı̃yã.
42020037	La Amoyisi yʋʋn põn pa'alɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ki la wʋn vo'oge mɛ, zẽ'e-sɛka n tↄgrɩ tũntuugo n diti bugum yelle la, Amoyisi yetɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n de Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.
42020038	Bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ bãma vↄa mɛ, se'ere n soe la, Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la nẽr-sɛba n vↄa Nawẽnnɛ. Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am nẽrba la wuu vↄa mɛ, baa la sɛba n ki la."
42020039	Tɩ lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma basɛba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fʋ tↄgɛ sõŋa."
42020040	La ba daan ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sɛla sɛla.
42020041	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Wãne tɩ ba yetɩ Krisi de la Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
42020042	Dee tɩ Adavidi yʋʋn põn dẽŋɛ yele yõoma gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba,
42020043	halɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.'
42020044	La Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ 'Zuudãana', la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?"
42020045	La nẽrba la wuu n selsrɩ Azezi la, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
42020046	"Guuse ya mẽŋa la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ gilgra la fu-wogro, bↄↄra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm, dee bↄↄra nã'asgↄ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
42020047	Ba to'osrɩ la sɛla wuu tɩ pↄkõpa tarɩ, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba. Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu."
42021001	Azezi daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, bɩsɛ yẽ bõntatba n tarɩ ba bↄ'a ɩta ligri daka pʋam,
42021002	dee yẽ pↄkõorɛ n de nasa n ẽŋɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a.
42021003	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ pↄkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
42021004	Bãma wuu looge la bõntarsõm sɛba tɩ ba tarɩ zo'oge la pʋam wa'am wa ẽŋɛ mı̃. La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mı̃."
42021005	La nẽrba basɛba n daan tↄgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la yelle yetɩ, ba dɩkɛ la kug-sõma mẽ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ bↄ'a tɩ ba bↄ Nawẽnnɛ malgɛ ẽ, tɩ a ãna sõŋa sõŋa.
42021006	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ba wʋn lʋbɛ bõn-sɛba tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã wuu saam saam, tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo."
42021007	Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la dabʋrɛ? La bẽm wʋn pa'alɛ tõma tɩ tɩ bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ?"
42021008	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge. Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: 'Mam n de Krisi', bɩɩ ba wʋn yetɩ: 'Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ.' Da doose-ya nẽr-bãma.
42021009	La ya sãn wõm zɛbrɛ, la tẽn-dãmŋↄ yɛla, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ, la, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgↄ."
42021010	Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla dõma isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma,
42021011	la tẽŋa wʋn tı̃i mı̃im mɛ, la kↄm, la bã'a-loŋrɩsɩ n wʋn wa'am zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la yel-kãra n kẽ'esrɩ nẽrba dabeem, la bõn-yãlma n wʋn ẽŋɛ saazuum.
42021012	La, lan dẽŋɛ bõn-bãna wã n wʋn ẽŋɛ, ba wʋn yõgɛ ya mɛ, nãmsɛ ya, tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba wẽndetʋm sarɩyaditba zẽ'am, tɩ ba yʋ ya, la ba wʋn botɩ ya ze'ele na'adõma, la gↄmnadõma nẽŋam mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã.
42021013	La wʋn doose la bɛla tɩ ya yẽ folle tↄgɛ mam yelle pa'alɛ ba.
42021014	Bɛla, ẽŋɛ ya sũurum tɩ la dagɩ ya fabla yan wʋn lerge se'em po'oge ya mẽŋa.
42021015	Mam mẽŋa wʋn bↄ ya yɛm tɩ ya tↄgɛ tɩ ya bɛ'ɛba kãn yãŋɛ lerge sɩ'ɩsɛ ya yetↄga.
42021016	Baa la ya sↄdõma, la ya madõma, la ya sↄbiisi, la ya sɩrdõma wʋn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ka bↄ, tɩ ba kʋ ya nẽrba basɛba.
42021017	Nẽrba wuu wʋn sise ya mam ı̃yã.
42021018	La ya zomto baa ayɩla kãn bↄɩ.
42021019	Ya sãn ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ, ya wʋn yẽ vↄm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
42021020	Ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ sʋdaasɩ gilgri Zerizalɛm, ya bãŋɛ tɩ a sã'aŋↄ lɛm mɛ.
42021021	Bɛla, nẽr-sɛba n boe Zude tẽŋa zoe zom tãnsɩ zuto, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe Zerizalɛm pʋam na yese zoe, la sɛba n boe vatʋm na da kẽ tẽŋa pʋam.
42021022	Dabsa bãma de la tõon-be'ero sɩbgrɛ dabsa tɩ bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam na wʋn ẽŋɛ.
42021023	Wakat-ẽŋa, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bↄ pↄg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa, la sɛba n tarɩ bilɛɛsɩ tɩ ba mõgra la. Se'ere n soe la, nãmsgↄ kãtɛ n wʋn wa'am tẽŋa wã pʋam, la Nawẽnnɛ sũure wʋn yı̃ige mɛ la tẽŋa wã nẽrba.
42021024	Ba wʋn kʋ basɛba mɛ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la ba wʋn yõgɛ basɛba mɛ tarɩ sẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ tẽnsʋm ka ẽŋɛ yamsɩ. Bu-zãŋsɩ wʋn sã'am Zerizalɛm mɛ, halɩ tɩ ba wakatɛ wʋn wa ba'asɛ."
42021025	"Bõn-yãlma n wʋn ẽŋɛ wẽntulle, la wõrga, la wõrbiɛ pʋam. La dũnia nẽrba buuri wuu wʋn fabla mɛ zɛ yɛrɩ, ko-kãtɛ ko-mı̃'isi n wʋn tı̃i wẽ'era ɩta voole la ı̃yã.
42021026	La nẽrba wʋn tẽ'esra la bõn-sɛka n wʋn ẽŋɛ dũnia wuu zuo la, tɩ dabeem wʋn botɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yɛm bↄɩ, se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mı̃im mɛ.
42021027	Wakat-ẽŋa ba wʋn yẽ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la boe wara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
42021028	La ya sãn yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna pↄsɛ ɩta, gorge-ya bɩsɛ saazuum, tɩ ya fãarɛ lɛm mɛ."
42021029	Azezi makɛ la makrɛ bↄ ba yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya kẽnkãŋa, la tɩɩsɩ wuu.
42021030	Ya sãn yẽ tɩ ba võorↄ pusra, ya mẽŋa mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
42021031	Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna ɩta, ya bãŋɛ tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.
42021032	Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
42021033	Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetↄga la kãn malɩn tole.
42021034	Guuse ya mẽŋa tɩ ya yɛm da yↄↄra la di tɩgɛ, la dã-yũure, la dũni-ẽna vↄm yɛla, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo daarɛ da wa di'ige ya
42021035	wʋ bẽrgↄ la. Se'ere n soe la, daarɛ ẽŋa wʋn wa di'ige nẽrba wuu n boe tẽn-gõŋↄ wã zuo mɛ.
42021036	Bɛla, da gı̃sra-ya, pʋ'ʋsra-ya Nawẽnnɛ wakatɛ wuu, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ pãŋa tã'agɛ põsɛ bõn-sɛba wuu n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ la, dee tã'agɛ ze'ele Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nẽŋam."
42021037	Azezi daan ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wʋntɛɛŋa, tɩ yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ a ẽn yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ ka gã'arɛ Oliivi tãŋa la zuo.
42021038	La nẽrba wuu lagsrɩ la a zẽ'am Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ sɛlsra a yetↄga.
42022001	Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zↄↄg-basɛ la daan dee la fẽe la a paagɛ.
42022002	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi, dee zↄta nẽrba la dabeem.
42022003	Tɩ Asũtãana kẽ Azudaasɩ tɩ ba wi'iri Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sũurum.
42022004	Tɩ a sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la gu'urba nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba ẽŋa n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
42022005	Tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bↄ ẽ ligri,
42022006	tɩ Azudaasɩ sakɛ, ɛɛra sore tɩ a botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la da bãŋɛ.
42022007	Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ.
42022008	Tɩ Azezi tõm Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ-ya ka mãasʋm kibsa la dia tɩ tɩ wa'am wa di."
42022009	Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛ tɩ tɩ wʋn sẽŋɛ ka mãasʋm?"
42022010	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya, ya sãn ka kẽ'era tẽŋa la pʋam, ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ kẽ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la pʋam.
42022011	La ya sãn kẽ, ya yele yidãana la yetɩ: 'Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, de-sɛka tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la wʋn di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la boe la bɛ?'
42022012	A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ lↄgrↄ wuu bↄna mı̃. Mãasʋm-ya bilam gu'ura to."
42022013	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ ba mãasʋm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la.
42022014	Tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ, tɩ Azezi zı̃'ire la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ ba di.
42022015	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Mam ba bↄↄra mɛ la m sũure wuu tɩ mam na yãma di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibs-ẽna wã dee tɩ m yãŋa nãmsɛ.
42022016	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, mam kãn le di Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa halɩ tɩ a võorɛ wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam."
42022017	Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yetɩ: "To'oge-ya bãna wã pʋɩ taaba yũ.
42022018	La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ lɛɛlɛ wã kↄ'ↄn wɛ'ɛsa wuu, mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã halɩ ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn wa'am wa dita na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka."
42022019	Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ ba yetɩ: "Ẽna de la mam ı̃yã tɩ mam dɩkɛ bↄ yãma ı̃yã. Ɩta-ya wãna tẽra mam yelle."
42022020	La ban di kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a dɩkɛ la bõn-yũula yetɩ: "Bõn-yũul-bãna pa'alɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe la nõor-paalga, mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ bↄ yãma la ı̃yã.
42022021	La bɩsɛ-ya, sɛka n yetɩ a botɩ ba yõkɛ mam na lagɩm na mam kalam dita.
42022022	Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ tɩ la ẽŋɛ se'em na. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na wʋn yẽ toogo."
42022023	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sↄkra taaba tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽr-sɛka n de ẽ bãma pʋam n yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bɛla.
42022024	Karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n masɛ tɩ a dɛna nẽr-keko gãnna.
42022025	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Dũni-ẽna na'adõma soe nẽrba la pãŋa, la sɛba n tarɩ ke'eŋo la botɩ nẽrba wi'ira ba tɩ: 'Sõm-ɩtba'.
42022026	La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Sɛka n de nẽr-keko yãma pʋam, a ãna wʋ bõn-pɩka la, la sɛka n de nẽŋadãana ãna wʋ tõntõnna.
42022027	La ãne n de nẽr-keko gãnna, sɛka n zı̃ dita la bɩɩ, sɛka n tõnnɩ bↄ'ↄra ẽ na? La dagɩ sɛka n zı̃ dita la? La mam boe ya pʋam wʋ tõntõnna la.
42022028	Yãma de la nẽrba n mõrgɛ weege bↄna la mam, yel-sɛba n paagɛ mam na pʋam.
42022029	Bɛla mam wʋn bↄ ya so'olʋm, wʋ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ mam so'olʋm se'em na,
42022030	tɩ ya wʋn wa zı̃'ire mam so'olʋm pʋam dita dee yũura la mam, dee zı̃'ire na'am bı̃mbı̃na zuto di Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma buuri pia la ayi la sarɩya."
42022031	La Azezi yele Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asimõ, Asimõ, bãŋɛ tɩ Asũtãana sose la sore tɩ a makɛ ya bɩsɛ, wʋ nẽra n yeele si yɛsra urgo la.
42022032	La mam pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ mɛ bↄ fↄ, tɩ fõn bↄ mam sɩra la, fʋ da basɛ. La fʋ sãn wa leme wa dↄla mam, fʋ bↄ fʋ sↄbiisi la bʋraanɛ tɩ ba ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ."
42022033	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam sakɛ mɛ tɩ m kẽ yʋ'a deem la fõn, bɩɩ m ki la fõn."
42022034	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Apɩyɛɛrɩ, mam yetɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ yʋ'ʋŋↄ ẽna wã, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ la nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam, dee tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ."
42022035	La Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: "Mam n daan tõm yãma tɩ ya sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, tɩ yãma ka dɩkɛ pʋtmãanɛ, la tãmpↄkↄ, la tagra la, sɛla daan pↄ'ↄgɛ ya mɛ bɩɩ?" Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ."
42022036	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Lɛɛlɛ wã, la ka le dɛna bɛla. Sɛka n tarɩ pʋtmãanɛ, a dɩkɛ, la sɛka n mẽ tarɩ tãmpↄkↄ, a dɩkɛ. La sɛka n ka tarɩ sʋkↄbgↄ, a koose a fuugo da sʋkↄbgↄ.
42022037	Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Ba dɩkɛ ẽ naagɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma'. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ la de la mam tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ. Asɩra, bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ tↄgra mam yelle la, yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ."
42022038	Tɩ ba yetɩ: "Zuudãana, bɩsɛ sʋkↄbrↄ bayi n wãna." Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ la seke ya."
42022039	Tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ Oliivi tãŋam wʋ ẽŋa ẽn ɩta se'em na, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
42022040	La ẽn paagɛ mı̃ na, a yele ba yetɩ: "Pʋ'ʋsɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui."
42022041	Dee basɛ ba sẽŋɛ zãagɛ fẽe masɛ wʋ nẽra n wʋn lobe kugre se'em, ka ka dũma tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
42022042	"M Sↄ, fʋ sãn bↄↄra, basɛ tɩ nãmsgↄ ẽna tole dee basɛ ma. La, da kãn ẽŋɛ mam n boorɩ se'em, ẽŋɛ fõn boorɩ se'em." ((
42022043	Tɩ malɛka ze'ele saazuum wa'am wa pa'asɛ ẽ pãŋa.
42022044	Tɩ Azezi sũure ba sã'am halɩ, tɩ a malɩn tı̃i pʋ'ʋsra tɩ a mõrgrɛ tↄgra tẽŋa wʋ zɩɩm na.))
42022045	Ẽn daan pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a lebe ka paagɛ a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am, tɩ ba gı̃sri mɛ, ba sũure n sã'am ı̃yã,
42022046	tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma gı̃sra? Isge-ya pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui."
42022047	Azezi n daan ken tↄgra la, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e sẽnna paana. Tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla bↄna ba nẽŋa, sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi tɩ a kↄkɛ ẽ, pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
42022048	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azudaasɩ, fõn yetɩ fʋ kↄkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ?"
42022049	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n ze a zẽ'a, yẽ lan yetɩ la ẽŋɛ se'em na yetɩ: "Zuudãana, tɩ dɩkɛ tɩ sʋkↄbrↄ la zɛbɛ bɩɩ?"
42022050	Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla dɩkɛ a sʋkↄbgↄ sɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna zʋʋgↄ tʋbrɛ fiige.
42022051	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya bɛla." Dee kalʋm bʋraaga la tʋbrɛ la, tɩ a lebe tablɛ.
42022052	Dee yele kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la gu'urba nẽŋadõma, la kẽma n yetɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ la sʋkↄbrↄ, la dasa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
42022053	Mam daan boe la ya lɛ mɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam. La wakat-ẽna wã ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ yan boorɩ se'em, se'ere n soe la, la de la lika pãŋa dãana wakatɛ."
42022054	La ba yõkɛ Azezi mɛ tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana yire, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ bↄna zãazãarɛ li'isra dↄla.
42022055	La ba tʋʋrɛ la bugum yire la zẽnzaka tẽŋasʋka lagsɛ zẽa, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ mẽ lagɩm na ba zẽa.
42022056	Tɩ tõntõn-pↄka ayɩla yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n zı̃ bugum na zẽ'am, bɩsra ẽ zı̃i dee yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna mẽ dolɩ la Azezi."
42022057	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: "Pↄka, mam ka mi ẽ."
42022058	Tɩ la le ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽra ayẽma le yẽ ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mẽ de la ba nẽra ayɩla." Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Bʋraaga, mam dagɩ ba nẽra."
42022059	Tɩ la le ẽŋɛ fẽe masɛ wʋ karf-ayɩla, tɩ nẽra ayɩla le yetɩ: "Asɩra, bʋra-ẽna ẽn dↄla ẽ mɛ, a mẽ de la Galile nẽra."
42022060	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Bʋraaga, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn tↄgɛ se'em na võorɛ." La ẽn ken bↄna mı̃ tↄgra la, tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kↄ'ↄn kaasɛ.
42022061	Tɩ Zuudãana la gelge bɩsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Zuudãana n yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ mam nõorɛ atã mɛ zı̃na, dee tɩ nõ-rↄↄgↄ kaasɛ la."
42022062	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yẽŋa ka kɛlla la sũ-sã'aŋↄ zozo'e.
42022063	Bʋra-sɛba n gu'uri Azezi la daan la ẽ mɛ, dee wẽ ẽ,
42022064	dɩkɛ fuugo vile a nẽŋa wẽ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tↄ sɛka n wẽ fↄ."
42022065	La ba tʋ ẽ na tʋʋrɛ basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ.
42022066	La beere n daan wiige, tɩ Zifdõma kẽma, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma wuu lagsɛ tɩ ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ba sarɩyadia zẽ'am, dee yele ẽ yetɩ:
42022067	"Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na, fʋ yele to." Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam sãn yele ya, ya kãn sakɛ,
42022068	la mam sãn soke ya sokre, ya mẽ kãn lerge mam.
42022069	La lɛɛlɛ wã kↄ'ↄn wɛ'ɛsa wuu, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn zı̃'ire Nawẽnnɛ n de pãn-kãtɛ dãana la zʋʋgↄ."
42022070	Tɩ ba wuu soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛla fõn sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa?" Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Yãma n yele se'em na, mam de la bɛla."
42022071	Tɩ ba yetɩ: "Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma? Tõma mẽŋa wõm a nõorɛ yetↄga mɛ."
42023001	Tɩ ba wuu tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am
42023002	ka dõrɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma yẽ bʋra-ẽna tɩ a boe mı̃ dãmna la tɩ tẽŋa wã dee yetɩ ba da yↄↄra lampo bↄ'ↄra Rom na-keko, dee ken yetɩ ẽŋa de la Krisi, ẽŋa de la naba."
42023003	Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yele se'em na."
42023004	Tɩ Apilatɩ yele kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la, la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Mam ka yẽ bʋraaga wã yel-sɛka n wʋn botɩ tɩ di a sarɩya."
42023005	Tɩ ba sı̃na dee bʋla yetɩ: "A zãsŋↄ la tɩ a pↄsɛ zãsʋm Galile la Zude wa paam kalam na, tarɩ la dãmŋↄ sẽna nẽrba pʋam."
42023006	Apilatɩ n wõm bɛla la, a soke mɛ tɩ a bãŋɛ, bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Galile nẽra.
42023007	La ẽn bãŋɛ tɩ a ze'ele la Galile n de naba A'erↄdɩ so'olʋm pʋam na, tɩ a botɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka bↄ naba A'erↄdɩ. A'erↄdɩ mẽ daan boe la Zerizalɛm wakat-ẽŋa.
42023008	La A'erↄdɩ n yẽ Azezi la, a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ halɩ, se'ere n soe la, a wõm Azezi yelle tɩ la yuuge mɛ, tɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a yẽ ẽ. A tarɩ pʋtẽ'erɛ tɩ a wʋn tõm na tõon-yãlma tɩ a yẽ.
42023009	A'erↄdɩ daan soke Azezi la sokrɩsɩ zozo'e, tɩ a ka lerge ẽ.
42023010	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma n boe mı̃ na dõrɛ ẽ zozo'e yetɩ, a tõm na be'em.
42023011	Tɩ A'erↄdɩ la a sʋdaasɩ yaalɛ ẽ, dɩkɛ fu-sõŋↄ yɛ ẽ, tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tarɩ ẽ lebe ka bↄ Apilatɩ.
42023012	Daar-ẽŋa, A'erↄdɩ la Apilatɩ n de bɛ'ɛba la taaba la, lebge la sɩtↄ.
42023013	Tɩ Apilatɩ wi kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la nẽrba wuu
42023014	yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ bʋra-ẽna wa'am wa bↄ mam yetɩ a tarɩ la dãmŋↄ sẽna nẽrba pʋam. La mam n soke ẽ yãma nẽŋam kalam wã, mam ka yẽ a yel-sɛka n botɩ yãma dõrɛ ẽ na.
42023015	La A'erↄdɩ mẽ ka yẽ a yelle, bɛla tɩ a tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am wa bↄ tõma. Bʋraaga wã ka tõm be'em n masɛ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
42023016	Mam wʋn botɩ ba wẽ ẽ mɛ la ka'asa dee basɛ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ." ((
42023017	Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa wakatɛ woo dẽnɩ tɩ Apilatɩ yese sɛba n boe yʋ'a deem nẽra ayɩla basɛ.))
42023018	Tɩ ba wuu kↄ'ↄn lagɩm tãsra yetɩ: "Kʋ bʋra-ẽna, dee yese Abarabasɩ bↄ tↄ."
42023019	Abarabasɩ daan dãmɛ na tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra, tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ yʋ.
42023020	Tɩ Apilatɩ le tↄgra la nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la bↄↄra tɩ a basɛ Azezi.
42023021	Tɩ ba zagsɛ, dee kaasra yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo."
42023022	Tɩ Apilatɩ le yele ba nõor-atã pʋam yetɩ: "Bẽm be'em tɩ a tõm? Mam ka yẽ yel-sɛka tɩ a tõm tɩ la masɛ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. Mam wʋn botɩ ba wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee basɛ ẽ."
42023023	Tɩ ba ken kaasra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo." Tɩ ba kaasga la zo'oge gãŋɛ.
42023024	Tɩ Apilatɩ sakɛ ẽŋɛ ban boorɩ se'em na,
42023025	yese bʋra-sɛka n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa kʋ nẽra la basɛ, ẽŋa tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ tɩ a basɛ, dee dɩkɛ Azezi bↄ sʋdaasɩ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ ẽ nẽrba la n boorɩ se'em na.
42023026	Ban tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba tʋ'ʋsɛ la Sirɛnɩ tẽŋa bʋraaga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele va'am lɛmna, tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ botɩ a to'oge dↄ-puurŋa la buke dↄla Azezi poore.
42023027	La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n dolɩ ẽ, tɩ pↄgsɩ kɛlla fabla wẽ'era nupʋ'ʋrↄ a ı̃yã.
42023028	Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ ba bↄba yele ba yetɩ: "Zerizalɛm pↄgsɩ, da kɛlla-ya mam ı̃yã, kɛlla-ya ya mẽŋa la ya kↄma ı̃yã.
42023029	Se'ere n soe la, dabsa sẽna tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ: 'Pↄg-kõndↄgrɩba, la sɛba n ka dↄgɛ, sɛba tɩ kↄma ka mõgɛ ba bı̃'isum tarɩ zu-yẽlga.'
42023030	La nẽrba wʋn wa yele tãnsɩ tɩ ba lui dı̃ ba, dee yele kũnkũma yetɩ, ba lile ba.
42023031	Se'ere n soe la, ba sãn ɩta dↄ-mã'asa wãna, la wʋn ẽŋɛ dↄ-kɛ'ɛsɩ la wãne?"
42023032	La ba tarɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma bayi sẽŋɛ tɩ ba lagɩm ba la Azezi kʋ.
42023033	La ba paagɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Zuwaŋrɛ, bilam tɩ ba ka Azezi dↄ-puurŋa zuo, dee ka tõon-be'ero dõma bayi la dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, ayɩla a gↄbga bↄba.
42023034	Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: "M Sↄ, basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ, tɩ ba ka mi ban ɩtɩ sɛla." Tɩ ba dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pↄsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge fu-sɛka.
42023035	La nẽrba la ze la bilam bɩsra ẽ, tɩ Zifdõma kẽma la la'ara ẽ yetɩ: "A fãagɛ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, a sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la, a fãagɛ a mẽŋa."
42023036	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la mẽ la'ara ẽ, lɛm dɩkɛ dã-mı̃'isgo bↄ ẽ
42023037	yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn dɛna Zifdõma naba, fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa."
42023038	La ba gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgↄ lablɛ a zuum yetɩ: "Ẽna wã de la Zifdõma naba la."
42023039	Tɩ tõon-be'ero dõma la n boe dↄ-puursi zuto la ayɩla tʋ Azezi yetɩ: "Dagɩ fõn de Krisi la? Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dee fãagɛ tõma."
42023040	Tɩ ayẽma la tãsɛ a tadãana la yetɩ: "Fõn ka zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ? Ba wʋn kʋ tõma wuu mɛ.
42023041	La sãn dɛna tõma, tõma n tõm tõon-be'ero la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ ba kʋ tõma, la nẽr-ẽna wã ka ẽŋɛ sɛla n de be'em."
42023042	Dee yele Azezi yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, fʋ tẽegɛ m yelle."
42023043	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zı̃na nõo fʋ wʋn bↄna la mam Nawẽnnɛ yire."
42023044	La daan de wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika, tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa ka le yẽkɛ halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã. Tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋↄ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka.
42023046	Tɩ Azezi tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "M Sↄ, mam basrɩ m sɩa la fõn nu'usum." A yele la bɛla dee ki.
42023047	Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Asɩra, bʋraaga wã de la nẽr-sõŋↄ."
42023048	La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la wuu n wa'am tɩ ba bɩsɛ lan wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em na, yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na mɛ. Tɩ ba lebe kulla, dee wẽ'era nupʋ'ʋrↄ.
42023049	La nẽr-sɛba wuu n mi Azezi, la pↄg-sɛba n doose ẽ halɩ Galile wa'am na, ze la kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra lan ɩtɩ se'em na.
42023050	Bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n daan de Azozɛfʋ. A de la Arimate tẽŋa nẽra, dee dɛna Zifdõma sarɩyaditba nẽra ayɩla. A de la nẽr-sõŋↄ tɩ a ɩrgↄ wuu masɛ,
42023051	la a daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka. La ba sarɩyaditba la n daan looge yɛm tɩ ba ẽŋɛ se'em na, a daan ka sakɛ.
42023052	Azezi n ki la, ẽŋa n sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na, tɩ Apilatɩ sakɛ.
42023053	Tɩ a sike kũm na vile ẽ na tãnnɛ tarɩ ka bı̃ŋe yↄↄgↄ tɩ ba tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã nãn ka laagɛ nẽra mı̃ pʋam.
42023054	La de la daar-ẽŋa tɩ Zifdõma mãasnɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ. Wẽnnɛ sãn kẽ tɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ wʋn pↄsɛ.
42023055	Tɩ pↄg-sɛba n doose Azezi Galile wa'am na, doose Azozɛfʋ sẽŋɛ ka yẽ yↄↄgↄ la, dee yẽ ban bı̃ŋe Azezi kũm na se'em,
42023056	dee lebe kule ka mãasʋm tɩdarɛ kaam buuri to'oto'ore tɩ ba tarɩ wa ẽŋɛ kũm na. La vo'osgo daarɛ la ba vo'ose wʋ Amoyisi lↄↄ la n bↄ nõorɛ se'em na.
42024001	Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ tɩ pↄgsɩ la isge dɩkɛ kaam na tɩ ba mãasʋm na tarɩ sẽŋɛ yↄↄm na.
42024002	Ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la tɩ ba dɩkɛ lige yↄↄgↄ nõorɛ la bilge mɛ gã kẽnkɛrŋa.
42024003	Tɩ ba kẽ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam bɩsɛ ka yẽ Zuudãana Azezi kũm na.
42024004	Tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi n ze lɛm ba, yɛ futo tɩ ba yẽgra.
42024005	Tɩ pↄgsɩ la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba suure ba zuto tẽŋa. Tɩ bʋraasɩ la soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ yãma ɛɛra nẽr-sɛka n vↄɩ sɛba n ki zẽ'am?
42024006	A ka boe kalam. A vo'oge mɛ. Tẽegɛ-ya ẽŋa n daan nãn boe Galile dee yele ya se'em na,
42024007	a yetɩ, ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ tarɩ ka bↄ tõon-be'ero dõma, tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, la dabsa atã daarɛ, a wʋn vo'oge mɛ."
42024008	Tɩ ba yãŋa tẽegɛ a yetↄga la,
42024009	ze'ele yↄↄm na lebe kule ka yele a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la, la nẽrba basɛba la wuu lan ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu.
42024010	Ba daan de la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azanɩ, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la pↄgsɩ basɛba, bãma n daan tↄgɛ yel-bãna bↄ Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la.
42024011	La ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ pↄgsɩ la n yele ba se'em na ka tarɩ võorɛ, tɩ ba ka sakɛ tɩ la de sɩra.
42024012	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ isge mɛ zoe sẽŋɛ yↄↄm na ka veese bɩsɛ, yẽ tãna la mã'a, lebe kule ka zɛ yɛrɩ bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ la ı̃yã.
42024013	Daar-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi bayi wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Emayusi. Bilam na Zerizalɛm zãagɛ masɛ wʋ kilomẽtrɩ pia la ayɩla.
42024014	Ba daan tↄgrɩ la taaba bõn-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ la yelle.
42024015	La ban daan sõsrɩ la taaba la, tɩ Azezi lɛm ba, tɩ ba lagɩm sẽnna.
42024016	La ba yɛm lige mɛ, tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ ẽ.
42024017	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma sẽnna dee tↄgra la taaba?" Tɩ ba ze'ele zũŋe ba nẽnsɩ.
42024018	Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Akleopasɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn mã'a n boe Zerizalɛm ka bãŋɛ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ dabsa wã pʋam?"
42024019	Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Bẽm ẽŋɛ?" Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, a de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa n tarɩ pãŋa a tõoma la a yetↄga pʋam, Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba wuu nifum.
42024020	Tɩ tõma kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, di a sarɩya yetɩ ba kʋ ẽ, tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo, tɩ a ki.
42024021	La tõma daan tarɩ pʋtẽ'erɛ tɩ la de la ẽŋa n wʋn fãagɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la. La zı̃na de la dabsa atã n wãna tɩ yel-ẽna wã ẽŋɛ.
42024022	La tõma pↄgsɩ basɛba n botɩ tõma palẽŋa ẽkɛ. Ba isge la bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ sẽŋɛ yↄↄm na,
42024023	leme wa yele tõma yetɩ bãma ka yẽ kũm na, bãma yẽ la malɛkadõma, tɩ ba yele bãma yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ.
42024024	Tɩ tõma nẽrba basɛba mẽ sẽŋɛ yↄↄm na, ka yẽ tɩ la sɩrɩ ãn wʋ pↄgsɩ la n yele se'em na. La ba ka yẽ Azezi."
42024025	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Yɛm-ka-like dõma, bẽm tɩ ya ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba n yʋʋn yele se'em na wuu sɩra tↄtↄ?
42024026	La ka masɛ nɩ tɩ Krisi nãmsɛ la bõn-bãna wuu, dee yãŋa di a na'am na?"
42024027	Tɩ a yãŋa pa'alɛ ba bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ tↄgra ẽŋa yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõnnↄ la pʋam, a pↄsɛ pa'alɛ la Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la wuu n gʋlsɛ la võorɛ n de se'em.
42024028	La ban daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm tẽn-sɛka tɩ ba we la, a ẽŋɛ wʋ a boorɩ tɩ a tole mɛ na.
42024029	Tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ: "Doose tõma kẽ gã'arɛ, se'ere n soe la, wẽnnɛ kẽ mɛ, zẽ'a boe mı̃ sↄbra mɛ." Tɩ a sakɛ doose ba kẽ.
42024030	La ba daan zı̃'ire mɛ tɩ ba di, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bↄ ba.
42024031	Tɩ ba yɛm yãŋa like, tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n de nẽr-sɛka. Tɩ a bↄɩ ba nẽŋam bilam mẽŋa.
42024032	Tɩ ba yɛta taaba yetɩ: "Ẽŋa n tↄgɛ yetↄga la pa'alɛ tõma, dee tↄgra yel-sɛba n boe Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam pa'ala tõma sore zuo la, tõma sũure ka ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm zo'oge sɩra?"
42024033	Tɩ ba isge wakat-ẽŋa lebe Zerizalɛm ka yẽ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la, la sɛba n boe ba zẽ'am na tɩ ba lagsɛ taaba mɛ.
42024034	Tɩ ba yele ba yetɩ: "Tɩ Zuudãana la sɩrɩ vo'oge mɛ, Asimõ yẽ ẽ mɛ."
42024035	Tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ yele ba bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sore la zuo, la ẽŋa n fiisri borborɩ la, bãma n bãŋɛ ẽ se'em.
42024036	Ban boe mı̃ tↄgra bɛla la, tɩ Azezi darɛ wa'am wa zɛ ba tẽŋasʋka, yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-mã'asʋm bↄna la ya."
42024037	Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma yẽ la ki-isgne.
42024038	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ya tẽ'esra pʋtẽ'era bʋyi bʋyi?
42024039	Bɩsɛ-ya mam nu'usi, la mam nãma, la de la mam. Sa'abɛ-ya mam bɩsɛ, ki-isgne ka tarɩ nẽnnↄ, la kõba, wʋ yãma n yẽ mam n tarɩ se'em wã."
42024040	A tↄgɛ bɛla dee pa'alɛ ba la a nu'usi, la a nãma.
42024041	Ba sũure n ãn yẽlʋm dee tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba ken ka bↄ sɩra, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma tarɩ sɛla wʋn di kalam mɛ bɩɩ?"
42024042	Tɩ ba dɩkɛ zũn-sẽ'enɛ bↄ ẽ.
42024043	Tɩ a to'oge obe ba nifum bilam.
42024044	Bɛla poorʋm, a yele ba yetɩ: "Mam n daan ken bↄna la yãma la, mam n yele ya bõn-sɛba la n wãna. Mam daan yele ya yetɩ: Dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ mam yelle Amoyisi lↄↄ gõnnↄ pʋam, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba gõnnↄ pʋam, la yõoma gõnnↄ pʋam na ẽŋɛ."
42024045	Tɩ Azezi like ba yɛm tɩ ba bãŋɛ bõn-sɛba n boe Nawẽnnɛ gõnnↄ pʋam na võorɛ,
42024046	yele ba yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ yetɩ, Krisi la wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ ki, la dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ.
42024047	Ẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã tɩ ba wʋn pↄsɛ Zerizalɛm mõolɛ bↄ buuri wuu yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
42024048	Yãma n de bõn-bãma wuu kaset-dõma wʋn pa'alɛ nẽrba wuu.
42024049	La mam wʋn tõm sɛka tɩ mam Sↄ daan bı̃ŋe nõorɛ bↄ ya la, tɩ a wa'am wa bↄna la ya. Bↄna-ya Zerizalɛm gu'ura halɩ tɩ a ze'ele saazuum wa'am wa bↄ ya pãŋa."
42024050	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi tarɩ ba mɛ tẽŋa la pʋam yese sẽŋɛ ka lɛm Betani, zẽkɛ a nu'usi saazuum kã kã'a-sõma bↄ ba.
42024051	Ẽŋa n boe mı̃ kã'ara kã'a-sõma bↄ'ↄra ba la, a basɛ ba mɛ dee zom Nawẽnnɛ yire.
42024052	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ ẽ, dee lebe Zerizalɛm la sũ-yẽlga zozo'e.
42024053	Ba daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
43001001	Pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ, Yetↄga la põn bↄna mɛ. La Yetↄga la yʋʋn boe la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am. Ẽŋa la Nawẽnnɛ de la bʋyɩla.
43001002	A põn bↄna la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am pı̃'iluŋo wakatɛ.
43001003	Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa n yʋʋn nãam sɛla woo. Sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa ka nãam.
43001004	Ẽŋa n de vↄm dãana. La de la ẽŋa n botɩ nẽrsaalba yẽta peelem.
43001005	Peelem na nẽegɛ lika pʋam mɛ, la lika ka yãŋɛ kı̃ŋe ẽ.
43001006	Nawẽnnɛ daan tõm na nẽra ayɩla, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã.
43001007	A wa'am tɩ a tↄgɛ la peelem na yelle pa'alɛ nẽrba tɩ ba wuu wʋn tã'agɛ bↄ ẽ sɩra.
43001008	Azã mẽŋa dagɩ peelem na, la a wa'am tɩ a tↄgɛ la sɛka n de peelem na yelle pa'alɛ nẽrba.
43001009	Sɛka n de peelem sɩra sɩra la, ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wa'am dũnia zuo. Ẽŋa n nẽegɛ tɩ nẽrsaalba wuu yẽta peelem.
43001010	Sɛka n de peelem na daan wa bↄna la dũnia zuo. Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa n yʋʋn nãam dũnia. Baa la bɛla, nẽrsaalba ka boorɩ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
43001011	A daan wa'am na a mẽŋa tẽŋa pʋam, la a nẽrba la ka to'oge ẽ.
43001012	La sɛba wuu n to'oge ẽ bↄ ẽ sɩra la, a bↄ ba nõorɛ mɛ tɩ ba lebge Nawẽnnɛ kↄma.
43001013	Ba ka lebge Nawẽnnɛ kↄma wʋ nẽrsaalba n dↄgrɩ se'em na, la ka de ı̃yã n boorɩ se'em, bɩɩ nẽrsaala n boorɩ se'em. La de la Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa n botɩ ba lebge a kↄma.
43001014	Sɛka n de Yetↄga la daan lebge la nẽrsaala, kẽ'era tõma tẽŋasʋka. Tõma yẽ a na'am pãŋa mɛ, na'am pãŋa n de Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa n ze'ele a Sↄ zẽ'am na'am pãŋa. La Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ, la a sɩra wuu boe la a zẽ'am.
43001015	La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ Azã daan tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Ẽna n de sɛka tɩ mam põn tↄgɛ a yelle yetɩ, nẽra ayẽma n boe mam poorʋm sẽna, ẽŋa gãnnɩ mam mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a dẽŋɛ mam mɛ bↄna."
43001016	Ẽŋa n botɩ tõma wuu yẽta yel-sõnnɛ woo yel-sõnnɛ, ẽn ba tara Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ na ı̃yã.
43001017	Nawẽnnɛ bↄ a lↄↄ la Amoyisi, tɩ a bↄ tõma. La, la sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ, la a sɩra la, la doose la Azezi-krisi tɩ a bↄ tõma.
43001018	Nẽra nẽra nãn ka yẽ Nawẽnnɛ. La de la Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa la n boe la ẽ lɛ n botɩ tõma bãŋɛ ẽ, ẽŋa la Nawẽnnɛ de la bʋyɩla.
43001019	Azã n daan bↄ kaseto se'em n wãna: Zifdõma nẽŋadõma sɛba n kẽ'erɩ Zerizalɛm na daan tõm na ba kãabgↄ kẽma, la Leviti dõma tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azã zẽ'am, ka soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la ãne?"
43001020	Tɩ Azã tↄgɛ ba vẽelga yetɩ: "Mam dagɩ Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na."
43001021	Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la ãne? Fõn de la A'eli bɩɩ?" Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam dagɩ A'eli." Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la n yetɩ a wa'am na bɩɩ?" Tɩ a yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ."
43001022	Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bɛla fõn de la ãne? Tɩ tɩ tarɩ fõn lerge se'em na, sẽŋɛ ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ sɛba n tõm tõma la. Fõn mẽŋa yetɩ fõn de la ãne?"
43001023	Ban soke ẽ bɛla la, tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ: "Mam de la sɛka n mõolɛ weem tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: 'Malgɛ-ya sore tɩ a dɛna tẽntẽa bↄ Zuudãana la' ", wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn põn yele se'em na.
43001024	Nẽr-sɛba n daan sẽŋɛ Azã zẽ'am na, Farisi dõma n daan tõm ba.
43001025	Tɩ ba daan soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn sãn dagna Krisi la, bɩɩ A'eli, bɩɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la, bẽm tɩ fõn misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam?"
43001026	Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ: "La sãn dɛna mam, mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra ayɩla n boe ya tẽŋasʋka tɩ ya ka mina ẽ.
43001027	Ẽŋa wa bↄna la mam poorʋm, la mam ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra."
43001028	Bõn-bãna wuu daan ẽŋɛ la Betani, Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa la doone, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ Azã daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na.
43001029	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azã yẽ Azezi n sẽm a zẽ'am. Tɩ a yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, ẽna n de Nawẽnnɛ Pebila n yesrɩ nẽrsaalba tõon-be'ero basra.
43001030	La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ mam daan yele yetɩ: 'Nẽra n wa bↄna mam poorʋm dɛna nẽr-keko gãnna mam na, se'ere n soe la, a dẽŋɛ mam mɛ bↄna.'
43001031	Mam daan ka mi ẽn de sɛka, la mam wa'am wa misra la nẽrba ko'om pʋam, tɩ m botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma bãŋɛ ẽ."
43001032	Azã le tↄgɛ yetɩ: "Mam yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire sigra ãna wʋ na'adawenne, wa zoole a zuo.
43001033	La mam daan ka mi ẽ, la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm mam tɩ m mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, yele mam tɩ: 'Fʋ sãn wa yẽ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n sige zoole sɛka zuo la, la de la ẽŋa n misri nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pʋam.'
43001034	La mam yẽ ẽ mɛ, bↄ kaseto yetɩ, ẽŋa n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la."
43001035	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azã daan le zɛ bilam la a karẽnbiisi bayi,
43001036	yẽ Azezi n sẽnnɩ, tɩ a yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ Pebila la n wãna."
43001037	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi bayi la wõm ẽn yele se'em na, isge dↄla Azezi.
43001038	Tɩ Azezi gelge yẽ ban dolɩ ẽ, soke ba yetɩ: "Yãma eerɩ la bẽm?" Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: "Rabi, fõn kẽ'erɩ la bɛ?" (Rabi võorɛ de la karẽnsãama.)
43001039	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Wa'am-ya tɩ ya wʋn yẽ." Tɩ ba doose sẽŋɛ ka yẽ ẽn kẽ'erɩ zẽ'a na, daan weege bↄna a zẽ'am daar-ẽŋa, la daan de wʋ wẽngɛlŋa karf-anaasɩ.
43001040	Nẽrba bayi la n wõm Azã n tↄgɛ Azezi yelle se'em doose ẽ na, ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la A'ãndre, a de la Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga.
43001041	Tɩ A'ãndre dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka yẽ a kẽema Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma yẽ Mesi la. La boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ Krisi." (A võorɛ de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge.)
43001042	Tɩ a daan tarɩ Asimõ sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ, dee yetɩ: "Fõn de la Azã bia Asimõ. Ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Asefasɩ, bɩɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ." (A võorɛ de la tãmpı̃a.)
43001043	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi bↄↄra tɩ a sẽŋɛ Galile, yẽ Afilipi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam."
43001044	Afilipi ze'ele la Betisayida tẽŋa, A'ãndre la Apɩyɛɛrɩ mẽ ze'ele la bilam.
43001045	Tɩ Afilipi sẽŋɛ ka yẽ Anatanayɛlɩ, yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma yẽ sɛka tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ a yelle lↄↄ gõnnↄ pʋam, tɩ a yelle ken gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba gõnnↄ pʋam na. A de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ tẽŋa, Azozɛfʋ dayʋa."
43001046	Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bõn-sõŋↄ tã wʋn ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ?" Tɩ Afilipi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Yi wa'am wa bɩsɛ."
43001047	Tɩ Azezi yẽ Anatanayɛlɩ n sẽm a zẽ'am, tɩ a tↄgɛ a yelle yetɩ: "Ẽna de la Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽra sɩra sɩra n ka tarɩ yelle."
43001048	Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne mina mam?" Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn boe kẽnkãŋa la tẽŋa, lan dẽŋɛ Afilipi n wʋn wi fʋ la, mam yẽ fʋ mɛ."
43001049	Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, la Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba."
43001050	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam n yele fõn tɩ mam yẽ fõn boe kẽnkãŋa tẽŋa la ı̃yã, tɩ fʋ bↄ mam sɩra? Fʋ wʋn yẽ bõn-kãra n gãnnɩ bõn-bãna."
43001051	Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire n yo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zↄnna dee sigra Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la zuo."
43002001	La dabsa atã daarɛ, pↄgdire kibsa n daan boe Kana, Galile so'olʋm pʋam. Tɩ Azezi ma daan bↄna mı̃.
43002002	Tɩ ba mẽ wi Azezi la a karẽnbiisi, tɩ ba wa'am kibsa la.
43002003	Tɩ dãam daan pↄ'ↄgɛ, tɩ Azezi ma yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dãam na pↄ'ↄgɛ mɛ."
43002004	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "M ma, dagɩ fõn wʋn yele mam, mam n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em. Mam wakatɛ nãn ka paagɛ."
43002005	Tɩ Azezi ma la yele tõntõnɩba la yetɩ: "Ẽŋa n yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ se'em wuu, ya ẽŋɛ."
43002006	La kuga dʋgrↄ bayoobɩ n daan boe mı̃ tɩ Zifdõma daan tara pɛɛra ba mẽŋa wʋ ba sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na. Ko'om lɩtrɩ pinii bɩɩ kↄbga n daan pɩtɩ dʋkↄ ayɩla.
43002007	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Ãgɛ-ya ko'om pɩrɛ dʋgrↄ la." Tɩ ba ãgɛ pɩrɛ ba.
43002008	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Kãbgɛ-ya tarɩ ka bↄ sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia yelle la." Tɩ ba kãbgɛ tarɩ ka bↄ ẽ.
43002009	La sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia la yelle la n leme ko'om na, ba lebge la dãam, tɩ a ka mina ban ze'ele zẽ'a. La tõntõnɩba la n ãgɛ ko'om na mi mɛ. Tɩ sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia la yelle la wi pↄgdita la,
43002010	yele ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra woo ẽn dẽŋɛ bↄ la dã-sõma, tɩ ba sãn wa yũ tɩgɛ, tɩ ba yãŋa bↄ'ↄra dã-sɛba n ka ba ãna sõŋa la. La fõn dɩkɛ la dã-sõma ze'ele bↄ'ↄra poorʋm."
43002011	Ẽna n de Azezi pↄspↄsɩ tõon-yãlma tɩ a ẽŋɛ. A ẽŋɛ ẽ na Kana Galile so'olʋm pʋam, pa'alɛ a na'am pãŋa, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bↄ ẽ sɩra.
43002012	Bɛla poorʋm, ẽŋa la a ma, la a yɩbsɩ, la a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm. Ba kẽ bilam na dabsa fẽe.
43002013	La Zifdõma Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa daarɛ n daan lɛm, tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm,
43002014	ka kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam yẽ nẽrba n koosrɩ niigi, la piisi, la na'adawɛma, la lig-tɛɛrba n zı̃ mı̃.
43002015	Tɩ a dɩkɛ mı̃'isi ẽŋɛ ka'asrɛ dige ba, la niigi, la piisi la wuu Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam tɩ ba yese, dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba la taablɩdõma lʋbɛ, tɩ ba ligri la ka'asɛ.
43002016	Dee yele sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la yetɩ: "Tarɩ-ya ba yese. Da dɩkɛ-ya mam Sↄ deego la ẽŋɛ leebgo zẽ'a."
43002017	Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la tẽegɛ tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Nawẽnnɛ, fõn deego la nõŋlʋm tɩ mam tarɩ la, wʋn di mam wʋ bugum na."
43002018	Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma soke ẽ yetɩ: "Tõon-yãlma kãna tɩ fõn wʋn ẽŋɛ pa'alɛ tõma tɩ fõn tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ wãna?"
43002019	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "Sã'am-ya Wẽnde-kãtɛ wã, tɩ mam wʋn le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam."
43002020	Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ba dɩkɛ la yʋʋma pinaasɩ la ayoobɩ mẽ Wẽnde-ẽna wã, tɩ fõn yetɩ, fõn wʋn mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?"
43002021	La Azezi n tↄgrɩ Wẽndeego yelle la, la de la a mẽŋa ı̃yã yelle tɩ a tↄgrɩ.
43002022	La Azezi n daan wa ki dee vo'oge la, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la tẽegɛ tɩ a daan yele la wãna, tɩ ba bↄ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ yetↄga, la Azezi n daan yele se'em na sɩra.
43002023	La Azezi n daan boe Zerizalɛm Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la, nẽrba zozo'e n daan yẽ tɩ a tõnnɩ tõon-yãlma, tɩ ba bↄ ẽ sɩra.
43002024	La Azezi daan ka dɩkɛ a sũure wuu pa'alɛ ba, se'ere n soe la, a mi ba wuu mɛ.
43002025	A ka eerɩ tɩ nẽra tↄgɛ nẽrsaalba yelle bↄ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, a mi bõn-sɛka n boe nẽrsaalba sũure pʋam mɛ.
43003001	Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe Farisi dõma pʋam tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Anikodɛm. A daan de la Zifdõma nẽŋadãana.
43003002	Bʋra-ẽŋa daan wa'am na Azezi zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ wa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tõm fõn tɩ fʋ dɛna karẽnsãama, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-yãlma wʋ fõn ɩtɩ se'em wã wuu, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ n boe la a dãana."
43003003	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn ka yẽ dↄg-paalga, a ka tã wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm."
43003004	Tɩ Anikodɛm soke ẽ yetɩ: "Nẽra n kʋrgɛ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ ba le tã'agɛ dↄgɛ ẽ paalga? A wʋn le tã'agɛ mɛ kẽ a ma pʋʋrʋm tɩ ba le dↄgɛ ẽ bɩɩ?"
43003005	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn ka dↄgɛ la ko'om, la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, a ka tã wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
43003006	Nẽrsaala n dↄgɛ sɛka la de la nẽrsaala, la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n dↄgɛ sɛka la tarɩ la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa vↄm.
43003007	Da basɛ tɩ la di'ige fo, mam n yetɩ: Dẽnɩ tɩ ba le dↄgɛ ya la ı̃yã.
43003008	Kʋsebgo vugri la ẽn boorɩ zẽ'a, tɩ fʋ wõnna a dãmnɛ, dee ka mina ẽn ze'ele zẽ'a sẽna, la ẽn we'esɩ zẽ'a. Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n dↄgɛ sɛka la ãna bɛla."
43003009	Tɩ Anikodɛm le soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne ẽŋɛ?"
43003010	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de Ɩsrayɛlɩ karẽnsãam-kɛ'ɛma dee ken ka mina bõn-ẽna?
43003011	Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ tõma tↄgrɩ la sɛla tɩ tõma mi, dee yɛta sɛla tɩ tõma yẽ. La ya ka sakɛ tõma yetↄga la.
43003012	Mam sãn tↄgɛ dũnia wã yɛla pa'alɛ ya, tɩ ya ka sakɛ, mam sãn tↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire yɛla pa'alɛ ya, ya wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne sakɛ?
43003013	Nẽra nẽra nãn ka zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, sãn dagna Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire sige.
43003014	Wʋ Amoyisi n yʋʋn zẽkɛ bõnsɛla dↄↄgↄ zuo weego pʋam se'em na, dẽnɩ tɩ ba zẽkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ bɛla.
43003015	Tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ ẽ sɩra wʋn tara vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ."
43003016	Nawẽnnɛ nõŋɛ nẽrsaalba mɛ halɩ, tɩ a tõm a Bi-yẽŋa dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n bↄ ẽ sɩra kãn sã'am, la a wʋn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ.
43003017	Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm a Dayʋa la dũnia tɩ a di nẽrba sarɩya sɩbgɛ ba, a tõm ẽ tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ basɛ.
43003018	La sɛka n bↄ ẽ sɩra, ba kãn di a sarɩya. La sɛka n ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la, a põn koŋe bʋʋrↄ mɛ, ẽn ka bↄ Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa la sɩra la ı̃yã.
43003019	Bõn-ẽna n de sarɩyadia la: Peelem wa'am dũnia pʋam mɛ, la nẽrsaalba nõŋɛ la lika gãnna peelem na, ba tõoma n de tõon-be'ero la ı̃yã.
43003020	Nẽr-sɛka woo n tõnnɩ tõon-be'ero sisri peelem mɛ, a ka sẽm peelem pʋam, a zotɩ mɛ tɩ a tõoma la wʋn puke.
43003021	La nẽr-sɛka woo n tõnnɩ sɩra sẽm na peelem zẽ'am, tɩ a tõoma la pa'alɛ tɩ a sakrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ.
43003022	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi la a karẽnbiisi sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm ka bↄna bilam misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam.
43003023	Tɩ Azã mẽ daan bↄna Enõ tẽŋa n lɛm Salim tẽŋa la misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam, se'ere n soe la, ko'om n daan boe mı̃ zo'oge. Tɩ nẽrba sẽnna, tɩ a misra ba.
43003024	Wakat-ẽŋa ba daan nãn ka kẽ'esɛ Azã yʋ'a deem.
43003025	Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi basɛba, la Zifdõma nẽra daan wẽ'era nõke'ene, Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba pɛɛra ba mẽŋa malgra la yelle.
43003026	Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azã zẽ'am ka yele ẽ yetɩ: "Karẽnsãama, sɛka n daan boe la fõn Zʋrdẽ doone ke bↄba la, sɛka tɩ fõn daan tↄgɛ a yelle la, ẽn wãna n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam, tɩ nẽrba wuu sẽnna a zẽ'am."
43003027	Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ: "Nẽra ka tã wʋn to'oge sɛla tɩ la sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ ẽ.
43003028	Yãma mẽŋa tã wʋn bↄ kaseto mɛ tɩ mam yetɩ: 'Dagɩ mam n de Krisi la. La, ba tõm mam mɛ tɩ m dẽŋɛ a nẽŋa wa'am.'
43003029	La ãn wʋ nẽra n di pↄga: Pↄgdita la n soe pↄka la, la pↄgdita la sɩrɛ n ze dee sɛlsra a yetↄga la, a tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ zozo'e. Bɛla mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ zozo'e.
43003030	Dẽnɩ tɩ ẽŋa lebge kãtɛ dee tɩ mam lebge pɩka.
43003031	Sɛka n yese saazuum wa'am n gãnnɩ wuu, la sɛka n yese dũnia de la dũnia nẽra, la a tↄgrɩ la dũnia yelle. Sɛka n yese Nawẽnnɛ yire wa'am na n gãnnɩ wuu,
43003032	la a tↄgrɩ la ẽn wõm dee yẽ sɛla la, la nẽra nẽra ka to'oge a yetↄga la.
43003033	Nẽr-sɛka n to'oge a yetↄga la sakɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ de la sɩra dãana.
43003034	Se'ere n soe la, sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na tↄgrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga, Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ ẽ a Sɩa pãŋa zozo'e la ı̃yã.
43003035	Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ nõŋɛ a Dayʋa la mɛ, tɩ a dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ a nu'usum.
43003036	Sɛka n bↄ a Dayʋa la sɩra tarɩ la vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ. La sɛka n ka sakɛ a Dayʋa la kãn yẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ, la Nawẽnnɛ sũ-isgre boe a dãana zuo."
43004001	Azezi daan bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ Farisi dõma wõm tɩ ẽŋa yẽtɩ karẽnbiisi gãnna, dee misri ba ko'om pʋam gãnna Azã.
43004002	La, la daan dagɩ Azezi mẽŋa n misri ba ko'om pʋam, la de la a karẽnbiisi la.
43004003	La Azezi n daan bãŋɛ ban tↄgrɩ se'em na, tɩ a ze'ele Zude so'olʋm lɛbra Galile.
43004004	La daan de la a doose Samaari so'olʋm pʋam tole.
43004005	Tɩ a daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Samaari tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Sisaarɩ n lɛm va-sɛka tɩ Azakↄbɩ yʋʋn bↄ a bia Azozɛfʋ la.
43004006	Azakↄbɩ lʋa n daan boe bilam, tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ targɛ zı̃'ire lʋa la nõorʋm. La daan de wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka.
43004007	Tɩ Samaari pↄka wa'am tɩ a ãkɛ ko'om. Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽŋɛ ko'om bↄ ma tɩ m yũ."
43004008	(Dee tɩ a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam tɩ ba ka da dia.)
43004009	Tɩ pↄka la soke ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm tɩ fõn dɛna Zifu sↄsra mam n de Samaari pↄka yetɩ, m bↄ fʋ ko'om tɩ fʋ yũ?" Se'ere n soe la, Zifdõma la Samaari dõma daan nẽ'esrɩ la taaba.
43004010	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn mina Nawẽnnɛ n bↄ'ↄrɩ sɛla, la sɛka n yetɩ fʋ tɩ 'bↄ ma ko'om tɩ m yũ' la, fʋ wʋn sose nɩ ẽ, la a wʋn bↄ fↄ ko'om n bↄ'ↄrɩ vↄm."
43004011	Tɩ pↄka la lerge yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, fõn ka tarɩ lʋwannɛ, dee tɩ lʋa la kↄ, fõn wʋn yẽ vↄm ko-bãma la bɛ?
43004012	Tõma yaaba Azakↄbɩ n bↄ tõma lʋa la, ẽŋa la a kↄma, la a dũnsi yũ lʋa la ko'om mɛ. Fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ fõn gãnnɩ tõma yaaba la bɩɩ?"
43004013	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Sɛka woo n yũ lↄ-ẽna ko'om na, koyũuro wʋn le tarɩ ẽ.
43004014	La sɛka n wʋn yũ ko-sɛba tɩ mam wʋn bↄ ẽ na, koyũuro kãn le malɩn tarɩ ẽ. La ko-sɛba tɩ mam wʋn bↄ ẽ na wʋn lebge wʋ bulga, bulla a pʋam bↄ'ↄra ẽ vↄm n ka ba'asrɩ."
43004015	Tɩ pↄka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, bↄ ma ko-sɛba tɩ m wʋn yũ tɩ koyũuro kãn le tara mam na, tɩ m da le wa'am kalam wa ãkɛ ko'om."
43004016	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ ka wi fʋ sɩra tɩ ya wa'am."
43004017	Tɩ pↄka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka tarɩ sɩra." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ tarɩ bʋʋrↄ, fõn yetɩ fõn ka tarɩ sɩra la.
43004018	Fʋ ele la sɩrba banuu, la fõn boe la sɛka lɛɛlɛ wã dagɩ fʋ sɩra, bɛla fʋ tↄgɛ la asɩra."
43004019	Tɩ pↄka la yele Azezi yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã mam bãŋɛ tɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa.
43004020	Tõma yaabdõma yʋʋn pʋ'ʋsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ na tãn-ẽna zuo. Tɩ yãma Zifdõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ Zerizalɛm."
43004021	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, bↄ mam yetↄga wã sɩra tɩ wakatɛ n sẽm tɩ ya kãn pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de tɩ Sↄ la tãn-ẽna zuo, bɩɩ Zerizalɛm.
43004022	Yãma Samaari dõma pʋ'ʋsrɩ la sɛka tɩ ya ka mi. La tõma Zifdõma pʋ'ʋsrɩ la sɛka tɩ tõma mi, se'ere n soe la, fãarɛ ze'ele la Zifdõma zẽ'am.
