43018038	Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Sɩra de la bẽm?" Apilatɩ n yele bɛla la, a le yese sẽŋɛ la Zifdõma la zẽ'am ka yele ba yetɩ: "Mam ka yẽ sɛla n de be'em bʋraa wã zẽ'am.
43018039	La yãma malʋm mɛ tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa wakatɛ woo m yese yʋ'a deem nẽra ayɩla basɛ. Yãma boorɩ tɩ m yese la Zifdõma naba la basɛ bɩɩ?"
43018040	Tɩ ba tↄgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: "Da kãn basɛ ẽŋa. Tõma boorɩ tɩ fʋ basɛ la Abarabasɩ." La Abarabasɩ daan de la fãara.
43019001	Bɛla tɩ Apilatɩ botɩ ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka wẽ ẽ na ka'asa.
43019002	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ, dee yɛ ẽ fuugo n de gomusga,
43019003	sẽŋɛ lɛm ẽ yɛta tɩ: "Zifdõma naba, naa", dee wẽ'era a pɛgsɩ.
43019004	Tɩ Apilatɩ le yese nẽrba la zẽ'am ka yele ba yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, mam wʋn tarɩ ẽ yesem na ya zẽ'am tɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ mam ka yẽ sɛla n de be'em bʋra-ẽna zẽ'am."
43019005	Tɩ Azezi vuge gõ'osɩ mũŋa la, dee yɛ fuugo la n de gomusga la yese yẽŋa. Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ba yetɩ: "Nẽra la n wãna."
43019006	La kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la, la ba tõntõnɩba la n yẽ ẽ na, ba kaasrɩ la tagurga yetɩ: "Ka ẽ, ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ." Tɩ Apilatɩ yele ba yetɩ: "To'oge-ya ẽ ka ka ya mẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, mam ka yẽ sɛla n de be'em a zẽ'am."
43019007	Tɩ Zifdõma la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma tarɩ lↄↄ, la lↄↄ la pʋam la masɛ mɛ tɩ a ki, se'ere n soe la, a ẽŋɛ a mẽŋa tɩ ẽŋa de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."
43019008	Apilatɩ n wõm yetↄg-ẽna la, dabeem n malɩn yõkɛ ẽ.
43019009	Tɩ a le kẽ deem ka soke Azezi yetɩ: "Fõn ze'ele la bɛ?" Tɩ Azezi ka lerge ẽ.
43019010	Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Mam tɩ fõn sı̃m ka lɛrgra? Fʋ ka mi tɩ mam tarɩ nõorɛ wʋn botɩ ba basɛ fↄ, bɩɩ ba ka fʋ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ?"
43019011	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Nõorɛ la sãn ka ze'ele nɩ saazuum, fʋ ka tarɩ nɩ nõorɛ wʋn ẽŋɛ mam sɛla. Bɛla n soe tɩ sɛka n tarɩ mam wa'am wa bↄ fʋ la, tõm tõon-be'ego gãnna fõn."
43019012	Apilatɩ n daan wõm bɛla la, a eerɩ la sore tɩ a basɛ Azezi, tɩ Zifdõma la daan kaasra tagurga yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn basɛ bʋra-ẽna, fʋ dagɩ Rom na-keko sɩrɛ. Nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ a mẽŋa naba, a de la na-keko la bɛ."
43019013	La Apilatɩ n wõm yetↄg-bãma la, a tarɩ Azezi yese la yẽŋa, dee zı̃'ire sarɩyadia la zẽ'am tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ kug-palagsɩ zẽ'a, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ la Ebre yetↄga dɛna Gabata la.
43019014	La daan de la beere n wʋn wiige tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa la di, la daan masɛ wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka. Tɩ Apilatɩ yele Zifdõma la yetɩ: "Ya naba la n wãna."
43019015	Tɩ ba kaasra tagurga yetɩ: "Kʋ ẽ, kʋ ẽ, ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ." Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: "M ka ya naba la dↄ-puurŋa zuo?" Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma ka tarɩ naba ayẽma, sãn dagna Rom na-keko la."
43019016	Bɛla tɩ Apilatɩ bↄ ba Azezi tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ ka ka dↄ-puurŋa zuo. Tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi,
43019017	botɩ a mẽŋa tʋ dↄ-puurŋa la yese tẽŋa la pʋam wɛ'ɛsa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ la Ebre yetↄga dɛna Golgota.
43019018	Bilam tɩ ba ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo. Dee mẽ ka nẽrba bayi dↄ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a gↄbga bↄba, ayẽma a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, tɩ Azezi bↄna ba tẽŋasʋka.
43019019	Tɩ Apilatɩ botɩ ba gʋlsɛ dↄ-palaka zuo lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ, Zifdõma naba la."
43019020	Zifdõma zozo'e daan karẽŋɛ gʋlsgↄ la mɛ, se'ere n soe la, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan ka Azezi dↄ-puurŋa zuo la lɛm na tẽŋa la. La ba daan gʋlsɛ la Ebre, la Latẽ, la Grɛkɩ yetↄga.
43019021	Tɩ Zifdõma kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma yele Apilatɩ yetɩ: "Da gʋlsɛ yetɩ 'Zifdõma naba', gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'A yetɩ ẽŋa de la Zifdõma naba.' "
43019022	Tɩ Apilatɩ lerge ba yetɩ: "Sɛla tɩ mam gʋlsɛ la, mam gʋlsɛ mɛ."
43019023	La sʋdaasɩ la n ka Azezi kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba dɩkɛ la a futo pʋɩ zẽ'esɩ banaasɩ, tɩ sʋdaaga woo daan to'oge pʋrɛ ayɩla, deege fu-woko. La fu-woko la daan ka tarɩ pɛ'ɛsõm, ba daan wʋgɛ a wuu la munne.
43019024	Tɩ ba daan yele taaba yetɩ, ba da ãasʋm ẽ, ba pↄsɛ bɩsɛ sɛka n wʋn to'oge ẽ. Tɩ ba ẽŋɛ bɛla. La de la wãna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n gʋlsɛ yele se'em na ẽŋɛ. La gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ba pʋɩ mam futo bↄ taaba, dee pↄsɛ mam fu-woko la yelle."
43019025	Azezi ma, la a ma yɩbga, la Amaari n de Akleopasɩ pↄga, la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala daan ze mɛ lɛm dↄ-puurŋa la.
43019026	Tɩ Azezi yẽ a ma la, la a karẽnbi-sɛka tɩ a nõŋɛ la n ze lɛm ẽ, tɩ a yele a ma la yetɩ: "M ma, fʋ bia n wãna."
43019027	Dee yele a karẽnbia la yetɩ: "Fʋ ma n wãna." Lan sẽŋɛ wakat-ẽŋa, karẽnbia la tarɩ Azezi ma la mɛ kule a yire.
43019028	Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi mi mɛ tɩ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ mɛ, tɩ a yetɩ: "Koyũuro n tarɩ mam." A yele bɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n gʋlsɛ yele se'em na n ẽŋɛ.
43019029	La lↄkↄ n daan ze pɩrɛ la dã-mı̃'isgo. Tɩ ba dɩkɛ sɩpↄↄm lʋsɛ dã-mı̃'isgo la pʋam zẽkɛ la dↄↄgↄ ẽŋɛ Azezi nõorʋm.
43019030	Tɩ a yũ dã-mı̃'isgo la, dee yetɩ: "Sɛla woo ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ", dee suure a zuugo ki.
43019031	La daan de la beere n wʋn wiige Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ, daar-ẽŋa daan de la dabs-kãtɛ, tɩ Zifdõma la ka bↄↄra tɩ ba basɛ tɩ kũm na weege bↄna dↄ-puursi la zuto daar-ẽŋa. Tɩ ba sose Apilatɩ yetɩ, a botɩ ba kↄ ba nãma dee sike ba dↄ-puursi la zuto.
43019032	Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la sẽŋɛ ka kↄ pↄspↄsɩ dãana la tɩ ba ka lɛm Azezi la nãma, le kↄ ayẽma la mẽ nãma.
43019033	La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ tɩ a darɛ ki mɛ, tɩ ba ka kↄ a nãma.
43019034	Tɩ sʋdaaga ayɩla lʋ a lʋgrɛ la kãnnɛ, tɩ zɩɩm la ko'om yese.
43019035	Nẽr-sɛka n yẽ bõn-bãna la n tↄgrɩ pa'ala ya. La a kaseto la de la sɩra, la a mi tɩ ẽŋa tↄgrɩ la sɩra, tɩ yãma mẽ wʋn bↄ sɩra.
43019036	Yel-bãna ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n gʋlsɛ se'em na n ẽŋɛ. La yetɩ: "A kõbrɛ baa ayɩla kãn kↄ'ↄgɛ."
43019037	La ken gʋlsɛ yetɩ: "Ba wʋn bɩsɛ sɛka tɩ ba lʋ la."
43019038	Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Arimate bʋraa Azozɛfʋ n daan de Azezi karẽnbia dee sʋgra, ẽn zotɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma la ı̃yã, daan sẽŋɛ ka sose Apilatɩ sore tɩ a dɩkɛ Azezi kũm na, tɩ Apilatɩ sakɛ, tɩ Azozɛfʋ sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ kũm na.
43019039	Tɩ Anikodɛm, sɛka n daan sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋↄ la po doose Azozɛfʋ. A tarɩ la bõnↄ yʋ'ʋra n de miiri, la alowe n lagɩm taaba gãŋɛ wʋ kilo pitã tɩ ba yũuŋo ãna sõŋa wa'am.
43019040	Tɩ ba dɩkɛ Azezi kũm na, ẽŋɛ bõnↄ na n tarɩ yũuŋo la ẽŋɛ, vile ẽ na tãna wʋ Zifdõma n ẽn ɩta ba kũm se'em na.
43019041	La gaarɛ n daan boe zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan ka Azezi dↄ-puurŋa la zuo la, la yↄ-paalɛ n tũ tãmpı̃a ı̃yã n daan boe mı̃ tɩ ba nãn ka laagɛ nẽra a pʋam.
43019042	La beere n wʋn wiige vo'osgo daarɛ la, la yↄↄgↄ la n daan lɛm na ı̃yã, ba daan laagɛ Azezi kũm na bilam.
43020001	Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋↄ yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala sẽŋɛ yↄↄm na. Ẽn paagɛ la, a yẽ tɩ kugre la bilge mɛ dee basɛ yↄↄgↄ la nõorɛ.
43020002	Tɩ a zoe sẽŋɛ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ la karẽnbi-sɛka tɩ Azezi nõŋɛ la zẽ'am, ka yele ba yetɩ: "Ba dɩkɛ Zuudãana la yↄↄgↄ la pʋam yese mɛ, tõma ka mi ban bı̃ŋe ẽ zẽ'e-sɛka."
43020003	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la karẽnbia ayɩla la yese wɛ'ɛsa yↄↄm na.
43020004	Bãma bayi daan lagɩm zↄta mɛ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ karẽnbia ayẽma la zoe gãŋɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ dẽŋɛ paagɛ yↄↄm na,
43020005	veese bɩsɛ, yẽ tãna la n gã mı̃, dee ka kẽ.
43020006	Tɩ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ daan paam poorʋm wa kẽ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam, yẽ tãna la n gã mı̃.
43020007	La tãn-sɛka tɩ ba daan dɩkɛ vile Azezi zuugo la gã mı̃ mɛ, la a ka naagɛ la tãna basɛba la, a kilim mɛ gã ayẽma.
43020008	Tɩ karẽnbia ayẽma la n dẽŋɛ paagɛ la, mẽ kẽ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam, yẽ bõn-sɛba n boe mı̃ na, la a bↄ sɩra mɛ.
43020009	La karẽnbiisi la daan nãn ka wõm Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ n yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ Azezi ki dee vo'oge la võorɛ.
43020010	Tɩ karẽnbiisi bayi la daan lebe kule ba yiɛ.
43020011	La Amaari daan ze la yↄↄgↄ la nõorʋm yẽŋa kɛlla. A daan kellɩ mɛ dee veese tɩ a bɩsɛ yↄↄgↄ la pʋam,
43020012	yẽ malɛkadõma bayi n yɛ fu-pɛɛlsɩ zẽa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan bı̃ŋe Azezi kũm na. Ayɩla zı̃ la a zuugo bↄba, tɩ ayɩla zẽa a nãma bↄba.
43020013	Tɩ malɛkadõma la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ fõn kɛlla?" Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: "Ba dɩkɛ la mam Zuudãana, tɩ mam ka mina ban bı̃ŋe ẽ zẽ'e-sɛka."
43020014	Ẽn tↄgɛ bɛla la, dee gelge yẽ Azezi n ze, la a ka bãŋɛ tɩ la de la ẽŋa.
43020015	Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Pↄka, bẽm tɩ fõn kɛlla? Ãne tɩ fõn eerɩ?" Tɩ a tẽ'esɛ tɩ a de la gaarɛ la dãana, yele ẽ yetɩ: "M kẽema, la sãn dɛna la fõn dɩkɛ ẽ, yele ma fõn bı̃ŋe ẽ zẽ'a tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ ẽ."
43020016	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Amaari." Tɩ Amaari gelge tↄgɛ la Ebre yetɩ: "Rabuni." A võorɛ de la karẽnsãama.
43020017	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Da kalʋm ma, mam nãn ka zom m Sↄ la zẽ'am. Sẽŋɛ m sↄbiisi la zẽ'am ka yele ba yetɩ: 'Mam zonnɩ na mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ n de yãma Sↄ, la yãma Nawẽnnɛ na zẽ'am.' "
43020018	Tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala sẽŋɛ ka yele karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ẽŋa yẽ Zuudãana la, dee yele ba Azezi n yele ẽŋa se'em.
43020019	La daar-ẽŋa daan de la Lasrɩ daarɛ wẽnsobre, tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la bↄna deem, la ba daan yʋ de-sɛka tɩ ba boe a pʋam na kʋlɩnsɩ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, ba daan zotɩ la Zifdõma nẽŋadõma. Tɩ Azezi wa'am wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ya."
43020020	Azezi n yele ba bɛla la, a pa'alɛ ba la a nu'usi, la a lʋgrɛ la. La karẽnbiisi la n daan yẽ Zuudãana Azezi la, ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ zozo'e.
43020021	Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ya. Mam mẽ tõnnɩ ya, wʋ mam Sↄ la n tõm mam se'em na."
43020022	Ẽn yele bɛla la, dee fʋʋsɛ ẽŋɛ ba zuo, yele ba yetɩ: "To'oge ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa.
43020023	Nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ ya basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bↄna a zuo. La nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ ya zagsɛ ka basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ken bↄna la a zuo."
43020024	Atoma n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ "Lɩɩba" la, daan ka boe ba zẽ'am Azezi n daan wa'am mı̃ na.
43020025	Tɩ karẽnbiisi basɛba la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma yẽ Zuudãana la." Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Mam sãn ka yẽ kʋʋsa la tɩ ba ka a nu'usi, la yisa dɩkɛ m nu'ubiire kalʋm ba, la mam sãn ka kalʋm a lʋgrɛ la, mam kãn malɩn bↄ sɩra."
43020026	La bɛla poorʋm dabsa anii daarɛ, tɩ karẽnbiisi la daan le lagsɛ taaba deego la pʋam, tɩ Atoma bↄna la ba lɛ. La kʋlɩnsɩ la daan yʋ mɛ, tɩ Azezi wa'am wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka yele ba yetɩ: "Sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bↄna la ya."
43020027	Dee yele Atoma yetɩ: "Dɩkɛ fʋ nu'ubiire kalʋm mam nu'usi la, dee tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo kalʋm mam lʋgrɛ la bɩsɛ. Da kãn sẽ'ena, bↄ sɩra."
43020028	Tɩ Atoma lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ de la mam Zuudãana la mam Nawẽnnɛ."
43020029	Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "La de la fõn yẽ mam na ı̃yã tɩ fʋ bↄ sɩra? Sɛba n ka yẽ dee bↄ'ↄra sɩra la tarɩ zu-yẽlʋm."
43020030	Azezi daan tõm tõon-yãlma basɛba mɛ zozo'e a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am, n ka gʋlsɛ ẽŋɛ gõn-ẽna wã pʋam.
43020031	La bõn-bãna wã gʋlsɛ tɩ ya bↄ la sɩra tɩ Azezi n de Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la, tɩ ya sãn bↄ ẽ sɩra, ya wʋn yẽ yõvore a yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã.
43021001	La bɛla poorʋm Azezi le dɩkɛ a mẽŋa mɛ pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi la Tiberiadɩ mõgrɛ nõorʋm. Ẽn pa'alɛ ba a mẽŋa se'em n wãna:
43021002	Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ, la Atoma tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ lɩɩba la, la Anatanayɛlɩ n ze'ele Kana n boe Galile so'olʋm, la Azebede kↄma, la Azezi karẽnbiisi basɛba bayi n daan lagɩm bↄna la taaba.
43021003	Tɩ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yele ba yetɩ: "Mam we'esɩ tɩ m ka yõgɛ la zũma." Tɩ basɛba la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma mẽ wʋn doose la fʋ sẽŋɛ." Tɩ ba yese ka kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ. La yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽŋa ba ka yõkɛ sɛla sɛla.
43021004	Tɩ beere bↄna mı̃ yɩlɩŋra, tɩ Azezi zɛ mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la ka bãŋɛ tɩ la de la ẽŋa.
43021005	Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: "M kↄma, yãma tarɩ zũma?" Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ."
43021006	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Lobe-ya yʋka la õorŋↄ la zʋʋgↄ bↄba, tɩ ya wʋn yõgɛ zũma." Tɩ ba lobe ba yʋka la, yõgɛ zũma zo'oge ka tãna wʋn ve'ege ẽŋɛ õorŋↄ la pʋam.
43021007	Tɩ karẽnbi-sɛka tɩ Azezi nõŋɛ la yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "La de la Zuudãana la." La Apɩyɛɛrɩ n wõm tɩ a de la Zuudãana la, tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo yɛ, ẽkɛ lui ko'om pʋam dↄↄra.
43021008	Tɩ karẽnbiisi basɛba n daan boe õorŋↄ la pʋam na vɛ'ɛra yʋka la n pɩrɛ la zũma la sẽna, ba daan ka zãagɛ la doone, la daan masɛ wʋ kãntɩɩsɩ kↄbsyi.
43021009	La ban dooge doone na, ba yẽ la bugsãana n diti, tɩ zũma dↄga ba zuo, la borborɩ.
43021010	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Looge-ya zũn-sɛba tɩ ya yõgɛ lɛɛlɛ la basɛba wa'am."
43021011	Tɩ Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ kẽ õorŋↄ la pʋam ve'ege yʋka la n pɩrɛ la zũma la dooge. Zũn-kãra kↄbga la pinuu la atã n daan boe a pʋam. La baa la zũma la n daan zo'oge bɛla la, yʋka la ka ãagɛ.
43021012	Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: "Wa'am-ya wa di." La karẽnbiisi la nẽra baa ayɩla daan ka saagɛ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn de la ãne?" Se'ere n soe la, ba daan bãŋɛ tɩ a de la Zuudãana la.
43021013	Tɩ Azezi paagɛ dɩkɛ borborɩ la pʋɩ ba, dee dɩkɛ zũma la bↄ ba, tɩ ba di.
43021014	Azezi n daan vo'oge la, nõorɛ atã n bɛla tɩ a dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi la.
43021015	Ban daan di kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ Azezi soke Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Asimõ, Azã bia, fõn nõŋɛ mam gãnna bãna n nõŋɛ mam se'em na?" Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽe! Zuudãana, fõn mi tɩ mam nõŋɛ fõn mɛ." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Gu'ura m pebilsi."
43021016	Tɩ Azezi le soke ẽ nõorɛ bʋyi yetɩ: "Asimõ, Azã bia, fõn nõŋɛ mam?" Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ẽe! Zuudãana, fõn mi tɩ mam nõŋɛ fõn mɛ." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɩsra m piisi."
43021017	Tɩ Azezi le soke ẽ nõorɛ atã yetɩ: "Asimõ, Azã bia, fõn nõŋɛ mam?" Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sũure daan sã'am, ẽn soke ẽ nõorɛ atã yetɩ: "Fõn nõŋɛ mam mɛ bɩɩ" la. Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn mi sɛla wuu mɛ, fõn mi tɩ mam nõŋɛ fõn mɛ." Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Gu'ura m piisi la.
43021018	Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ fõn daan de budib-paalga la, fʋ daan lʋtɩ fʋ sagãnnɛ mɛ sẽnna fõn boorɩ zẽ'a, la fʋ sãn wa kʋrgɛ, fʋ wʋn zẽkɛ fʋ nu'usi tɩ nẽra lʋ fʋ sagãnnɛ, dee tarɩ fʋ sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ fʋ ka boorɩ."
43021019	Azezi daan yele bɛla pa'alɛ la kũm sɛka buuri tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wʋn ki tɩ la nã'asɛ Nawẽnnɛ. La ẽn yele bɛla la, a yele ẽ yetɩ: "Dↄla mam!"
43021020	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ gelge mɛ yẽ karẽnbi-sɛka tɩ Azezi nõŋɛ la n dolɩ ba poore. La de la karẽnbi-ẽŋa n daan dente Azezi dia la wakatɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la ãne n yetɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ fõn?"
43021021	Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ ẽ na, tɩ a soke Azezi yetɩ: "Zuudãana, dee ẽna wã, bẽm n wʋn ẽŋɛ ẽ?"
43021022	Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Mam sãn bↄↄra tɩ a vↄa, halɩ tɩ mam wa leme wa'am, bẽm n pakɛ fõn? Fõn wen dↄla mam."
43021023	Tɩ yetↄg-ẽna wã saagɛ sↄbiisi la zẽ'am tɩ karẽnbi-ẽŋa kãn ki. La Azezi ka yele tɩ a kãn ki, a yetɩ: "Mam sãn bↄↄra tɩ a vↄa halɩ tɩ mam wa leme wa'am, bẽm n pakɛ fõn?"
43021024	La de la karẽnbi-ẽŋa n bↄ bõn-bãna kaseto, la ẽŋa n gʋlsɛ ba. La tõma mi tɩ a kaseto la de la sɩra.
43021025	La Azezi daan ẽŋɛ yɛla basɛba zozo'e mɛ. Ba sãn yetɩ ba gʋlsɛ nɩ ba wuu ayɩla-yɩla, mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ zẽ'a kãn bↄna dũnia zuo n wʋn to'oge gõnnↄ na tɩ ba wʋn gʋlsɛ nɩ na.
44001001	Ateofili, mam pↄspↄsɩ gõŋↄ la pʋam mam tↄgɛ pa'alɛ fõn Azezi n daan pↄsɛ tõm se'em, dee pa'alɛ nẽrba se'em wuu halɩ
44001002	ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tarɩ ẽ zom a yire la mɛ. La ẽn daan nãn ka zom Nawẽnnɛ yire la, a daan tarɩ la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pãŋa pa'ala Tõntõnɩba tɩ a looge la, bãma n wʋn tõnna se'em.
44001003	Azezi kũm na poorʋm, dabsa pinaasɩ pʋam tɩ a dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a Tõntõnɩba, tõm tõon-yãlma zozo'e n pa'alɩ tɩ ẽŋa vo'oge mɛ, dee tↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yɛla pa'alɛ ba.
44001004	La ban lagsɛ bↄna la ẽ na, tɩ a bↄ ba nõorɛ yetɩ: "Da yese-ya Zerizalɛm tẽŋa pʋam, gu'ura-ya bõn-sɛka tɩ mam Sↄ daan bı̃ŋe nõorɛ tɩ a bↄ ya, tɩ mam yele ya la.
44001005	Se'ere n soe la, Azã daan misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la, la kãn yuuge dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mise ya a Sɩa pʋam."
44001006	La Tõntõnɩba la n lagsɛ taaba la, soke Azezi mɛ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, la de la lɛɛlɛ wã tɩ fõn wʋn to'oge Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma na'am le bↄ ba bɩɩ?"
44001007	Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: "La ka de ya bãŋɛ wakatɛ la dabs-sɛba tɩ mam Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ looge la a mẽŋa pãŋa.
44001008	La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn wa'am ya zuo, wa bↄ ya pãŋa. La ya wʋn dɛna mam kaset-dõma pa'alɛ mam yɛla Zerizalɛm, la Zude, la Samaari tẽnsʋm, halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu."
44001009	Ẽŋa n tↄgɛ bɛla ba'asɛ la, dee zↄnna Nawẽnnɛ yire, tɩ ba bɩsra ẽ, tɩ wara lile ẽ.
44001010	La ẽn zonnɩ na, ba ken bɩsra la saazuum zı̃i, tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi yɛ fu-pɛɛlsɩ darɛ wa'am wa zɛ ba zẽ'am,
44001011	dee soke ba yetɩ: "Galile nẽrba, bẽm tɩ yãma zɛ bɩsra saazuum? Azezi n yese ya zẽ'am wɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire wã, a wʋn le leme wʋ yãma n yẽ ẽ tɩ a wɛ'ɛsa se'em wã."
44001012	La Azezi Tõntõnɩba la daan boe la Oliivi tãŋa zuo, yãŋa ze'ele bilam lɛbra Zerizalɛm. Tãŋa la, la Zerizalɛm ka zãagɛ gãŋɛ kilomẽtrɩ ayɩla.
44001013	La ban paagɛ Zerizalɛm tẽŋam na, ba zom na saazuum deego tɩ ba ẽn bↄna mı̃ na pʋam. La sɛba n daan boe mı̃ na de la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azã, la Azakɩ, la A'ãndre, la Afilipi, la Atoma, la Abatelemi, la Amatie, la Azakɩ n de Alfe bia, la Asimõ sɛka n daan de Zelↄtɩ nẽra, la Azakɩ bia Azudaasɩ.
44001014	Bãma wuu la pↄgsɩ, la Azezi ma Amaari, la Azezi yɩbsɩ n daan ẽn lagsɛ taaba pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ la pʋtẽ'erɛ ayɩla wakatɛ wuu.
44001015	La daarɛ ayɩla, sɛba n bↄ Azezi sɩra la daan lagsɛ mɛ, ba kãllɛ daan de wʋ kↄbga la pisyi. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ isge ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka yetɩ:
44001016	"M sↄbiisi, la sãn dɛna Azudaasɩ n pa'alɛ nẽrba sore tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yʋʋn dẽŋɛ botɩ naba Adavidi tↄgɛ a yelle mɛ halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm. Bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la masɛ la Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga n yʋʋn tↄgɛ se'em na.
44001017	Azudaasɩ, a daan de la tõma nẽra ayɩla, Nawẽnnɛ n daan looge ẽ tɩ a tõnna a tõoma."
44001018	(La ẽn daan tõm be'em na tɩ ba yↄ ẽ, tɩ a da va'am la a tõon-be'ero la yↄↄrↄ, lui aliko, tɩ a pʋʋrɛ pusge, tɩ a yõorↄ wuu yurge.
44001019	Zerizalɛm tẽŋa nẽrba wuu wõm bɛla mɛ, tɩ ba wi'ira va'am na yʋ'ʋrɛ la ba tẽŋa yetↄga yetɩ "Akeldama". A võorɛ de la zɩɩm va'am.)
44001020	Apɩyɛɛrɩ ken tↄgɛ yetɩ: "La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yõoma gõŋↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'A yire wʋn lebge daboogo, tɩ nẽra nẽra da le kẽ'era mı̃.' Dee ken gʋlsɛ yetɩ: 'Nẽra wʋn sↄↄgɛ a zẽ'am tõm.'
44001021	Bɛla, dẽnɩ tɩ nẽra ayɩla pa'asɛ tõma Tõntõnɩba la pʋam pa'alɛ Azezi vo'ore la sɩra. La masɛ tɩ nẽr-ẽŋa dɛna la nẽr-sɛka n daan põn bↄna tɩ pʋam wakat-sɛka wuu tɩ Zuudãana Azezi daan boe la tõma la, lan pı̃'ilum la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, wa paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Azezi daan yese tõma sʋkam zom Nawẽnnɛ yire la."
44001023	Tɩ ba bãm yetɩ nẽrba bayi. Ayɩla de la Azozɛfʋ, tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Abarsabasɩ, dee tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ ken dɛna Azustusi. Tɩ ayẽma la mẽ yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amatɩyasɩ.
44001024	Tɩ ba yãŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Tɩ Zuudãana, fõn mi nẽrsaalba wuu sũure. Pa'alɛ tↄ nẽrba bayi wã pʋam, fõn looge nẽr-sɛka
44001025	tɩ a wʋn sↄↄgɛ Azudaasɩ zẽ'am lagɩm na Tõntõnɩba la, tõm tõon-sɛka tɩ Azudaasɩ basɛ dee sẽŋɛ lan masɛ tɩ a sẽŋɛ zẽ'am na."
44001026	Ba pʋ'ʋsɛ bɛla dee pↄsɛ mɛ, tɩ la yõkɛ Amatɩyasɩ, tɩ ba botɩ a naagɛ la Tõntõnɩba pia la ayɩla la.
44002001	La Zifdõma kibsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Pãntekↄtɩ daarɛ n daan paagɛ, tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi wuu daan bↄna zẽ'a ayɩla.
44002002	Tɩ voole darɛ ze'ele saazuum wa'am wʋ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa pɩrɛ de-sɛka tɩ ba zı̃ mı̃ na.
44002003	Tɩ ba yẽ sɛla n ãn wʋ bug-zɩlɩsɩ n pʋɩ ayɩla ayɩla zↄↄla ba nẽra woo zuo.
44002004	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa daan wa'am ba wuu zẽ'am la pãŋa, tɩ ba tↄgra bu-zãŋsɩ yetↄga, wʋ Sɩa la n bↄ ba tɩ ba tↄgɛ se'em na.
44002005	La Zifdõma n daan dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore sõŋa n yese dũnia so'olʋm wuu wa'am wa bↄna Zerizalɛm.
44002006	La nẽrba la n daan wõm voole la, ba daan lagsɛ zo'oge mɛ, tɩ la daan di'ige ba, se'ere n soe la, nẽra woo daan wõm tɩ ba tↄgrɩ la a mẽŋa buuri yetↄga.
44002007	Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, nẽr-bãna wã wuu n tↄgrɩ wã de la Galile dõma.
44002008	La, la ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ tõma nẽra woo wõm tɩ ba tↄgra a buuri yetↄga?
44002009	Tõma nẽrba basɛba yese la Partɩ, la Medi, la Elamɩ, la Mezopotami tẽnsʋm, tɩ basɛba mẽ yese Zude, la Kapadↄsɩ, la Põ, la Azi tẽnsʋm,
44002010	tɩ basɛba mẽ yese Frizi, la Pãnfili, la Ezipti, la Libi tẽnsɩ n lɛm Sirɛnɩ, tɩ basɛba yese Rom tẽŋam.
44002011	Nẽrba la basɛba de la Zifdõma, la basɛba dagɩ Zifdõma dee sakɛ dↄla lↄↄ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ Zifdõma. Basɛba mẽ de la Krɛtɩ dõma, la Araabɩ dõma. La baa bɛla wuu tõma wõm mɛ tɩ ba tↄgrɩ tõma buuri yetↄga pa'ala tõon-kãra tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ."
44002012	Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba ka mina ba wʋn tẽ'esɛ se'em, yãŋa sↄkra taaba yetɩ: "Yel-ẽna võorɛ de la bẽm?"
44002013	Tɩ basɛba la'ara ba yetɩ: "Nẽr-bãna wã yũ la dãam buge."
44002014	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a Tõntõn-taaba pia la ayɩla la ze'ele saazuo, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tↄgɛ ke'enke'em yele nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la yetɩ: "Yãma Zifdõma, la yãma sɛba n boe Zerizalɛm wã wuu, selse-ya mam n yetɩ m yele ya se'em wã, tɩ ya tã'agɛ bãŋɛ yel-ẽna wã võorɛ.
44002015	Yãma n tẽ'esrɩ tɩ nẽrba wã yũ la dãam buge la, la dagɩ bɛla, la nãn de la bulika.
44002016	La bõn-ẽna n ɩtɩ wã de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Azʋwɛlɩ n yʋʋn yele se'em na n ɩtɩ.
44002017	A yʋʋn yele tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: 'Dũnia ba'asgↄ sãn lɛm, mam wʋn basɛ tɩ m Sɩa sige nẽrsaalba buuri wuu zuto. A wʋn botɩ ya dayↄↄsɩ la ya pↄyↄↄsɩ to'oge mam yetↄga tↄgɛ bↄ nẽrba. Dee botɩ ya kↄmbɩ'ɩsɩ bɩsɛ yẽ yɛla wʋ zãasŋↄ la, dee botɩ ya bõnkɛgsɩ zãasʋm.
44002018	Asɩra, wakat-ẽŋa mam wʋn basɛ tɩ m Sɩa la sige m tõntõn-bʋraasɩ, la m tõntõn-pↄgsɩ zuto, tɩ ba to'oge mam yetↄga tↄgɛ bↄ nẽrba.
44002019	Mam wʋn botɩ bõn-yãlma ẽŋɛ saazuum, dee botɩ yel-kɩrsɩ n pa'alɩ mam pãŋa ẽŋɛ tẽŋa zuo: Zɩɩm, la bugum, la bug-zũ'usi zozo'e n wʋn bↄna.
44002020	Wẽntulle wʋn wa lebge la lika, tɩ wõrga mõ'ogɛ ãna wʋ zɩɩm na, dee tɩ Zuudãana daarɛ n de na'am kãtɛ daarɛ paagɛ.
44002021	La nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn wi Zuudãana yʋ'ʋrɛ sose tɩ a fãagɛ ẽ, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.'
44002022	Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, selse-ya mam n yetɩ m yele ya se'em wã. La de la Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra la yelle. Nawẽnnɛ n looge ẽ bↄ ya, botɩ a tõm tõon-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ tɩ tẽŋasʋka, wʋ yãma n põn mina se'em na, pa'alɛ tɩ ẽŋa n tõm ẽ tɩ zẽ'am.
44002023	Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn põn tẽ'esɛ bↄↄra tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em na ı̃yã, tɩ a dɩkɛ Azezi ẽŋɛ ya nu'usum, tɩ ya botɩ nẽr-sɛba n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ la yõkɛ ẽ tarɩ ka ka lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.
44002024	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ vo'oge ẽ, fãagɛ ẽ kũm nãmsgↄ pʋam basɛ, kũm n ka tã'agɛ tara ẽ na ı̃yã.
44002025	Adavidi yʋʋn põn tↄgɛ a yelle yetɩ: 'Mam yẽtɩ mam Zuudãana la mam nẽŋam mɛ daarɛ woo. A boe la mam zʋʋgↄ bↄba sõŋra mam tɩ sɛla kãn botɩ mam bike.
44002026	Bɛla ı̃yã mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ, dee tↄgra sũ-yẽlga yetↄga. La baa mam wʋn ki, mam tarɩ pʋtẽ'erɛ mɛ,
44002027	tɩ fõn Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ mam kɩ'ɩn-tẽŋam, fõn kãn basɛ tɩ fʋ pʋpeelem dãana põ'ogɛ.
44002028	Fõn botɩ mam bãŋɛ yõvore sore mɛ. Fõn wʋn wa botɩ mam yẽ sũ-yẽlga mɛ zozo'e fõn nẽŋam.'
44002029	M sↄbiisi, basɛ-ya tɩ m tↄgɛ ya vẽelga vẽelga tɩ yaaba naba Adavidi yelle. A yʋʋn ki mɛ, tɩ ba laagɛ ẽ. Tɩ a yↄↄgↄ bↄna tɩ tẽŋasʋka kalam halɩ wa paam zı̃na.
44002030	Adavidi yʋʋn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa, la a bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe la nõorɛ pↄɩ yetɩ, a wʋn wa botɩ a yɩɩsɩ la nẽra ayɩla le di na'am wʋ ẽn yʋʋn diti na'am se'em na.
44002031	Adavidi dẽŋɛ yẽ Nawẽnnɛ n yetɩ a tõm se'em na mɛ. Tɩ a tↄgɛ Krisi kũm vo'ore yelle yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ ẽ kɩ'ɩn-tẽŋam, a kãn botɩ a ı̃yã põ'ogɛ.'
44002032	Azezi ẽŋa n wãna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ vo'oge. Tɩ tõma waa wuu dɛna kaset-dõma tↄgra a yelle bↄ'ↄra ya.
44002033	Nawẽnnɛ yãŋa zẽkɛ ẽ mɛ ka zı̃'ire a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, tɩ a to'oge a Sↄ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tɩ a yʋʋn bı̃ŋe nõorɛ tɩ a wʋn bↄ tõma wuu la. Bõn-ẽŋa n wãna tɩ ya yẽtɩ dee wõnna lɛɛlɛ wã.
44002034	La dagɩ Adavidi n yʋʋn zom Nawẽnnɛ yire. La a mẽŋa yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ: "Zı̃'ire m zʋʋgↄ bↄba,
44002035	halɩ tɩ m botɩ fʋ bɛ'ɛba bↄna fʋ nãma tẽŋa." '
44002036	Bɛla, Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri wuu masɛ mɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ sɩra sɩra tɩ Azezi tɩ ya daan ka lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la, Nawẽnnɛ pa'alɛ ya tɩ ẽŋa n de Krisi, dee dɛna tɩ Zuudãana."
44002037	Nẽrba la n daan wõm yetↄga wã la, la daan ba kẽ ba sũure mɛ halɩ tɩ ba soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Tõntõnɩba basɛba la yetɩ: "Tɩ sↄbiisi, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?"
44002038	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ba yetɩ: "Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ ya nẽra woo botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam la Azezi-krisi yʋ'ʋrɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ dee bↄ ya a Sɩa la.
44002039	Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la, de la yãma la ya kↄma, la sɛba wuu n boe zẽ'a n zãagɛ tɩ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn wa wi ba a zẽ'am na ı̃yã."
44002040	Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan tↄgɛ la yetↄga basɛba zozo'e pa'alɛ ba sɩra, dee sɩgɛ ba yetɩ: "Basɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ fãagɛ ya zamãan-ẽna nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ la pʋam."
44002041	Tɩ nẽrba la zozo'e daan sakɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetↄga la, botɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam. Nẽr-sɛba n daan pa'asɛ ba pʋam daar-ẽŋa masɛ wʋ nẽr-tʋsatã.
44002042	La ba daan ba mõrgɛ botɩ Tõntõnɩba la zãsna ba mɛ, dee naagɛ taaba la pʋtẽ'erɛ ayɩla, lagsra dita la taaba, fiisra borborɩ dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
44002043	La dabeem daan kẽ nẽrba la wuu mɛ, se'ere n soe la, Azezi Tõntõnɩba la tõm na tõon-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ zozo'e.
44002044	La nẽr-sɛba n daan bↄ Azezi sɩra la wuu daan lagɩm taaba la nõorɛ ayɩla, tɩ ba bõntarsõm lebge ba wuu bõnↄ,
44002045	dee daan kↄↄsra ba lↄgrↄ la ba bõntarsõm, pʋta bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sɛba wuu n bↄↄra sõŋrɛ se'em na.
44002046	La daarɛ woo ba ẽn lagsra Wẽnde-kãtʋm na mɛ, la taaba yiɛ, dita dee fiisra borborɩ, tara sũ-yẽlga la yɛm ayɩla,
44002047	pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ, dee yẽta yel-sõnnɛ nẽrba wuu zẽ'am. La daarɛ woo Zuudãana botɩ nẽrba n yẽta fãarɛ pa'asra sɛba n bↄ ẽ sɩra la pʋam.
44003001	Daarɛ ayɩla zaanõorɛ karf-atã, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã dↄla taaba wɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, wakat-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ẽn sẽnna pʋ'ʋsra la.
44003002	La bʋraa n boe tɩ ba dↄgɛ ẽ tɩ a dɛna kↄↄrŋↄ. La daarɛ woo ba ẽn tara ẽ sẽnna zı̃'ita la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la nõ-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ nõ-sõŋↄ la, tɩ a sↄsra nẽr-sɛba n kẽ'erɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam na.
44003003	La kↄↄrŋↄ la n yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã n boe mı̃ tɩ ba kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a sose ba yetɩ, ba bↄ ẽ sɛla.
44003004	Tɩ ba bɩsra ẽ zı̃i, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ tõma."
44003005	Tɩ a malɩn bɩsra ba, tẽ'esra tɩ ba wʋn bↄ ẽ sɛla.
44003006	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Mam ka tarɩ ligri wʋn bↄ fↄ. La sɛla tɩ mam tarɩ la, mam wʋn bↄ fↄ. La Azezi-krisi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã, isge sẽnna."
44003007	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ gʋrɛ la a zʋʋgↄ nu'ugo zẽkɛ ẽ tɩ a isge. Tɩ a nãma la zı̃ila keŋe bilam mẽŋa,
44003008	tɩ a vaagɛ isge ze'ele saazuo, sẽnna dↄla ba kẽ'era Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, ẽgra sisra, dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
44003009	Tɩ nẽrba la wuu yẽ ẽ tɩ a sẽnnɩ dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
44003010	Tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ la de la ẽŋa n ẽn zẽa Wẽnde-kãtɛ la nõ-sõŋↄm na sↄsra. La ban yẽ sɛla n ẽŋɛ ẽ na, la di'ige ba mɛ zozo'e.
44003011	La nẽrba la n yẽ bʋra-sɛka n daan de kↄↄrŋↄ la n dolɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã la, la di'ige ba wuu mɛ, tɩ ba zoe ka lagsɛ taaba ba zẽ'am zẽ'e-sɛka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de "Asalomõ võnana" na.
44003012	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ a soke nẽrba la yetɩ: "Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, bẽm tɩ bõn-ẽna wã di'ige ya? La bẽm tɩ ya bɩsra tõma, wʋ la de la tõma mẽŋa pãŋa, bɩɩ tõma n ba dↄla Nawẽnnɛ sõŋa la ı̃yã tɩ tõma botɩ bʋra-ẽna isge sẽnna?
44003013	La de la Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tɩ yaabdõma Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ yʋʋn pʋ'ʋsrɩ la, n zẽkɛ a tõntõnna Azezi la yʋ'ʋrɛ. Ẽŋa tɩ ya daan yõkɛ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ sɛba n soe pãŋa la nu'usum, tɩ baa gↄmna Apilatɩ n daan boorɩ tɩ a basɛ ẽ na, ya daan zagsɛ mɛ a nẽŋam.
44003014	La yan daan zagsɛ Azezi la, ya zagsɛ la pʋpeelem dãana, la sɩra dãana, dee daan bↄↄra tɩ Apilatɩ basɛ nẽr-kʋʋra la bↄ ya.
44003015	Bɛla yãma botɩ ba kʋ la yõvore dãana, ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ vo'oge. Tõma daan yẽ bõn-ẽna mɛ, tↄgra a yelle bↄ'ↄra ya.
44003016	La de la Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ n tarɩ pãŋa la ı̃yã, la tõma n bↄ ẽ sɩra la n botɩ bʋra-ẽna tɩ yãma mi dee yẽ wã keŋe. La de la ẽn bↄ Azezi sɩra la n botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm sõŋa ya wuu nẽŋam wã.
44003017	Tↄ. M sↄbiisi, mam bãŋɛ tɩ yan ka mi la ı̃yã, tɩ yãma la ya nẽŋadõma daan ẽŋɛ bɛla.
44003018	La bɛla pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn põn dẽŋɛ botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba wuu tↄgɛ yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ Krisi wa nãmsɛ la, ẽŋɛ.
44003019	Bɛla, teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, dee wa doose Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ,
44003020	dee bↄ ya sũ-mã'asʋm, dee tõm Krisi tɩ a daan põn dẽŋɛ looge la bↄ ya. Ẽŋa n de Azezi.
44003021	Dẽnɩ tɩ a bↄna Nawẽnnɛ yire halɩ ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ sɛla wuu wʋn teege lebge paalsɩ, wʋ Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn põn botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba tↄgɛ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm se'em na.
44003022	Bɛla tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn yetɩ: 'Ya Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele ya buuri pʋam dɛna a nõtↄ'ↄsa bↄ yãma, wʋ ẽŋa n botɩ mam dɛna a nõtↄ'ↄsa se'em na. Dẽnɩ tɩ ya selse bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a wʋn tↄgɛ bↄ ya la,
44003023	la nẽr-sɛka woo n ka selse Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-ẽŋa, ba wʋn yese ẽ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba tẽŋasʋka kʋ.'
44003024	Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, lan pı̃'ilum la Asãmwɛlɩ la sɛba n tↄgɛ ẽŋa poorʋm na wuu, yʋʋn põn tↄgɛ dabs-bãna yelle mɛ.
44003025	Yetↄg-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ botɩ a nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba yʋʋn tↄgɛ la de la yãma ı̃yã, la ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la tɩ yaabdõma la ken dɛna la yãma ı̃yã. A yele Abraham yetɩ: 'Fʋ yɩɩsɩ la ı̃yã tɩ mam wʋn ẽŋɛ dũnia buuri wuu yel-sõnnɛ.'
44003026	Nawẽnnɛ looge a tõntõnna la, dẽŋɛ tõm ẽ na ya zẽ'am tɩ a ẽŋɛ ya yel-sõnnɛ botɩ ya nẽra woo basɛ a tõon-be'ero."
44004001	Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã ken tↄgra la nẽrba la lɛ, tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma, la Wẽnde-kãtɛ gu'urba nẽŋadãana, la Saduse dõma wa'am ba zẽ'am.
44004002	Tɩ ba sũure yı̃ige la Tõntõnɩba la n zãsnɩ nẽrba la, dee mõola Azezi kũm vo'ore yelle pa'ala tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ki la wʋn vo'oge mɛ na.
44004003	Tɩ ba yõgɛ ba ka yʋ, gu'ura tɩ beere wiige, se'ere n soe la, wẽnnɛ daan sobe mɛ.
44004004	La nẽr-sɛba n daan wõm Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba zozo'e daan bↄ yetↄga la sɩra mɛ. Ba kãllɛ daan de wʋ tʋsanuu.
44004005	La beere n wiige, tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma, la kẽma, la lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma lagsɛ taaba Zerizalɛm pʋam.
44004006	La A'annɩ n de kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana, la Akayifu, la Azã, la Alɛgsãndrɩ, la sɛba wuu n de kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana yir-dõma boe mı̃ mɛ.
44004007	Tɩ ba botɩ ba tarɩ ba wa'am wa ze'ele ba nẽŋam, tɩ ba soke ba yetɩ: "Ãne n bↄ yãma pãŋa la nõorɛ tɩ yãma ɩta bõn-bãna?"
44004008	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pãŋa, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Yãma Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽŋadõma, la kẽma,
44004009	yãma n sokrɩ tõma zı̃na daarɛ wã tõon-sõŋ-sɛka tɩ tõma ẽŋɛ bↄ kↄↄrŋↄ la yelle, la bõn-sɛka n botɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm na,
44004010	dẽnɩ tɩ ya wuu, la Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma wuu bãŋɛ tɩ la de la Azezi-krisi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã tɩ nẽra wã n ze ya nẽŋam wã tarɩ ı̃mã'asʋm. Ẽŋa tɩ ya daan ka lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ vo'oge ẽ.
44004011	Ẽŋa ı̃yã tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ pʋam tↄgɛ yetɩ: 'Kug-sɛka tɩ yãma mẽtba zagsɛ la, lebge la kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa.'
44004012	Fãarɛ ka boe nẽra ayẽma zẽ'am, sãn dagna Azezi-krisi mã'a n tã wʋn fãagɛ nẽrba dũnia zuo basɛ."
44004013	Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã n yẽ bʋraanɛ tↄgra la, la di'ige nẽrba la mɛ, ban mi tɩ ba nini ka yo'oge, dee tɩ ba dagna gõn-mitba la, tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ ba daan boe la Azezi lɛ.
44004014	La ban yẽ bʋraa la n yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm zɛ ba zẽ'am na, ba ka mi ban wʋn lerge se'em bↄ ba.
44004015	Tɩ ba yele ba sarɩyadia zẽ'am yetɩ ba yese. Tɩ ba yese. Dee tɩ ba bãm yele taaba yetɩ:
44004016	"Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽr-bãna la wãne? Nẽrba wuu n boe Zerizalɛm wã mi mɛ tɩ bãma n ẽŋɛ yel-kɩrga wã, tõma kãn tã'agɛ sɩ'ɩsɛ bõn-ẽna.
44004017	La tõma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em tɩ ba tõoma la da le saagɛ sẽŋɛ nẽŋa, la de la tɩ zɛbɛ ba yetɩ, ba da le tↄgɛ Azezi yelle bↄ nẽra nẽra."
44004018	Bɛla tɩ ba wi ba yetɩ, ba da le sakɛ tɩ ba tↄgɛ, dee zãsʋm nẽrba Azezi yɛla.
44004019	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã lerge ba mɛ yetɩ: "Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, la masɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam tɩ tõma sakɛ yãma nõorɛ gãnna Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ mɛ bɩɩ?
44004020	Tõma ka tã wʋn basɛ ka tↄgɛ sɛla tɩ tõma yẽ dee wõm na."
44004021	Tɩ ba le gɩ'ɩlɛ ba, dee basɛ ba tɩ ba fõrgɛ. Ba ka yẽ ba wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em botɩ ba sɩbgɛ ba, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu pẽgrɩ Nawẽnnɛ bõn-sɛka tɩ ba ẽŋɛ la ı̃yã mɛ.
44004022	Bʋraa la tɩ yel-kɩrga la ẽŋɛ tɩ a yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm na, gãŋɛ yʋʋma pinaasɩ mɛ.
44004023	La ban basɛ ba la, Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã sẽŋɛ la ba taaba zẽ'am ka tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ba kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la kẽma la n yele bãma se'em na wuu.
44004024	La ban wõm bɛla la, tɩ ba naagɛ taaba pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ la yɛm ayɩla yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn nãam saazuum la tẽŋa, la ko-kãtɛ, la bõn-sɛba wuu n boe ba pʋam na.
44004025	Fõn yʋʋn botɩ tõma yaaba Adavidi n de fʋ tõntõnna la tↄgɛ la fʋ Sɩa pãŋa yetɩ: 'Bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ dũnia buuri wuu sũure yı̃ige, tɩ nẽrba tẽ'esra tẽ'es-yaalsɩ?
44004026	Tɩ dũnia na'adõma mãasʋm zɛ, tɩ tẽŋa la nẽŋadõma lagsɛ taaba tɩ ba zɛbɛ la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, la Krisi tɩ a looge la?'
44004027	La de la sɩra tɩ A'erↄdɩ, la Apõnsɩ-pilatɩ, la bu-zãŋsɩ, la Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba lagsɛ taaba tẽn-ẽna wã pʋam zɛbɛ la fʋ tõntõn-sõŋↄ Azezi tɩ fʋ looge la.
44004028	Bɛla ba ẽŋɛ la bõn-sɛka tɩ fõn yʋʋn põn dẽŋɛ looge yɛm la fʋ pãŋa bↄↄra tɩ la ẽŋɛ se'em na.
44004029	Tɩ Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã bɩsɛ ban zɛbrɩ tõma n de fʋ tõntõnɩba la se'em, bɛla ı̃yã, bↄ tɩ pãŋa tɩ tɩ mõolɛ fʋ kõ-yẽlga la bʋraanɛ.
44004030	La fʋ pãŋa, botɩ sɛba n bẽ'erɩ yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm, dee tɩ tõon-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ ẽŋɛ, Azezi n de fʋ tõntõn-sõŋↄ la yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã."
44004031	Ban pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ ba'asɛ la, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba lagsɛ la mı̃im mɛ. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄ ba wuu pãŋa, tɩ ba tↄgɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la bʋraanɛ.
44004032	Nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n daan bↄ Azezi sɩra la lagɩm tara la yɛm ayɩla, la sũure ayɩla. Tɩ ba nẽra baa ayɩla ka yetɩ, ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la de la ẽŋa mẽŋa mã'a bõnↄ, la de la ba wuu bõnↄ.
44004033	La Tõntõnɩba la tↄgrɩ Zuudãana Azezi kũm vo'ore yelle la pãŋa zozo'e, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ bↄna ba wuu zuo.
44004034	La sɛba n daan tarɩ deto bɩɩ vatↄ la, koose ba mɛ tarɩ ligri la wa'am wa ẽŋɛ Tõntõnɩba la nu'usum. Tɩ ba yãŋa ẽn pʋɩ bↄ nẽra woo ẽŋa n boorɩ sõŋrɛ masɛ se'em. Tɩ nẽra baa ayɩla ka bↄna ba pʋam tɩ sɛla pↄ'ↄgɛ ẽ.
44004036	La Azozɛfʋ n de Leviti nẽra n yese Sipri so'olʋm tɩ Tõntõnɩba la sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Abarnabasɩ. A yʋ'ʋrɛ la võorɛ de la: "Nẽra n bↄ'ↄrɩ nẽrba bʋraanɛ".
44004037	Ẽŋa daan koose la a va'am dɩkɛ ligri la tarɩ wa'am wa ẽŋɛ Tõntõnɩba la nu'usum.
44005001	Bʋraa n daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Ananiyasɩ, tɩ a pↄga yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asafɩɩra. Tɩ ba koose ba va'am,
44005002	tɩ a looge ligri la basɛba sʋgɛ, dee tarɩ lig-sɛba n weege la tarɩ ka bↄ Azezi Tõntõnɩba la. La ẽn ẽŋɛ bɛla la, a pↄga la mi mɛ.
44005003	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Ananiyasɩ, bẽm tɩ Asũtãana kẽ fʋ sũurum, tɩ fʋ parɩm bↄ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, looge fʋ va'am na tɩ fʋ koose la ligri basɛba sʋgɛ?
44005004	Fõn nãn ka koose nɩ ẽ na, a de la fʋ bõnↄ. Fõn koose la mẽ, fʋ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ fʋ yɛm n boorɩ se'em mɛ. Bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ fõn tẽ'esɛ fʋ sũurum ẽŋɛ yel-ẽna wã? Fʋ ka parɩm bↄ nẽrsaala, fʋ parɩm bↄ la Nawẽnnɛ."
44005005	Ananiyasɩ n wõm yetↄg-ẽna la, a lui la tẽŋa ki. La sɛba wuu n wõm bõn-ẽna la, dabeem n kẽ ba.
44005006	Tɩ budib-paalsɩ isge dɩkɛ ẽ põbɛ, zɛ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ.
44005007	Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe masɛ wʋ karf-atã, tɩ a pↄga mẽ wa'am, la a ka bãŋɛ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la.
44005008	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: "Yele ma, yãma n koose ya va'am na, ligri la wuu n wãna bɩɩ?" Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Ẽe! Ba wuu n bɛla."
44005009	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ ya ẽŋɛ nõorɛ ayɩla tɩ ya makɛ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bɩsɛ? Bãŋɛ tɩ sɛba n laagɛ fʋ sɩra la boe la zanõrʋm. Ba wʋn zɛ fʋ mẽ yese."
44005010	Tɩ pↄka la kↄ'ↄn lui tẽŋa ki Apɩyɛɛrɩ nẽŋam. Tɩ budib-paalsɩ la kẽ'em wa yẽ tɩ a ki mɛ, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ yɛglɛ a sɩra la.
44005011	Tɩ dabeem daan kẽ Azezi nẽrba la wuu, la sɛba wuu n wõm bõn-ẽna la.
44005012	Tɩ Azezi Tõntõnɩba la tõm tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ zozo'e nẽrba la wuu sʋkam. Tɩ sɛba n bↄ Azezi sɩra la lagsɛ taaba la yɛm ayɩla, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ "Asalomõ võnana" la.
44005013	Tɩ sɛba n ka bↄ ẽ sɩra la ka sakɛ lagɩm na ba, la nẽrba pẽgrɩ Azezi nẽrba la mɛ zozo'e.
44005014	La bʋraasɩ la pↄgsɩ zozo'e n daan bↄ'ↄrɩ Zuudãana Azezi sɩra pa'asra a nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la pʋam.
44005015	Halɩ tɩ nẽrba tara bã'adõma sẽnna gã'ata sorↄↄrↄ zuto bõn-gã'ala pʋam, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sãn wa dↄla bilam zẽ'a tↄlla, a yinyisŋa lile ba tɩ ba yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
44005016	Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yese tẽn-sɛba n gilge Zerizalɛm na tarɩ bã'adõma, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba wa'am. La ba wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ.
44005017	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana, la sɛba n de Saduse dõma n boe a zẽ'am na, daan isge ɩta sũure,
44005018	yõgɛ Azezi Tõntõnɩba la kẽ'esɛ ba yʋ'a deego pʋam.
44005019	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka sẽŋɛ yʋ'ʋŋↄ ka yo'oge yʋ'a deego la nõorɛ, tarɩ ba yese yẽŋa ka yele ba yetɩ:
44005020	"Sẽŋɛ-ya Wẽnde-kãtʋm na ka tↄgɛ vↄm paalga wã yelle wuu bↄ nẽrba la."
44005021	Ban wõm bɛla la, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bewiine zãsna nẽrba. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la, la sɛba n boe a zẽ'am na, daan wi Zifdõma sarɩyaditba, la ba kẽma wuu tɩ ba lagsɛ taaba. Tɩ ba tõm nẽrba yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem na ka tarɩ Tõntõnɩba la wa'am.
44005022	La ban tõm sɛba la n paagɛ yʋ'a deem na, ba ka yẽ ba, leme wa yele ba yetɩ:
44005023	"Tõma n paagɛ la, tõma yẽ tɩ yʋ'a deego la kʋlɩnsɩ la pagɛ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa, tɩ sɛba n gu'uri la zɛ deego la nõam, tɩ tõma yo'oge ka yẽ nẽra nẽra."
44005024	La Wẽnde-kãtɛ gu'urba nẽŋadãana, la kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma la n wõm yel-ẽna la, ba ze la yɛrɩ, tẽ'esra yel-ẽna n de yel-sɛka.
44005025	Tɩ nẽra wa'am wa yele ba yetɩ: "Selse-ya, bʋra-sɛba tɩ ya kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deego pʋam na ze la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba."
44005026	Tɩ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la gu'urba nẽŋadãana, la a nẽrba sẽŋɛ ka yõgɛ ba wa'am, dee ka le dãam ba, ba zotɩ mɛ tɩ nẽrba la wʋn lobe ba la kuga.
44005027	Ban tarɩ ba wa'am wa ze'ele ba nẽŋam na, kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana la soke ba yetɩ:
44005028	"Tõma daan ka yele ya yetɩ, ya da le zãsʋm nẽrba la nẽr-ẽna wã yʋ'ʋrɛ? La bɩsɛ-ya yãma n ẽŋɛ se'em na, yãma zãsŋↄ saagɛ Zerizalɛm wuu mɛ, dee bↄↄra tɩ ya dɩkɛ bʋra-ẽna kũm taalɛ dↄglɛ tõma zuto."
44005029	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a Tõntõn-taaba la lerge ba yetɩ: "La masɛ mɛ tɩ tõma sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ gãnna nẽrsaalba nõorɛ.
44005030	Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tõma yaabdõma yʋʋn pʋ'ʋsrɩ la n vo'oge Azezi tɩ ya daan ka lablɛ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la.
44005031	Nawẽnnɛ zẽkɛ ẽ mɛ zı̃'ire a zʋʋgↄ bↄba, botɩ a dɛna nẽŋam dãana la Fãagra bↄ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma sore tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
44005032	Tõma de la bõn-bãna kaset-dõma, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tɩ a tarɩ bↄ'ↄra nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ ẽ na, mẽ de la kaset-dãana."
44005033	Ban wõm yetↄg-ẽna wã la, ba sũure yı̃ige mɛ halɩ tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba kʋ ba.
44005034	Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Agamalɩyɛlɩ, a de la Farisi nẽra, a zãsnɩ la nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ yɛla, a de la nẽra tɩ ba wuu nannɩ. Tɩ a isge ze'ele nẽrba la n lagsɛ la tẽŋasʋka, bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba yese Tõntõnɩba la yẽŋa tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe. Tɩ ba yese ba.
44005035	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, guuse ya mẽŋa la yãma n yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ nẽr-bãna wã se'em na.
44005036	La ka yuuge tɩ nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Atedasɩ daan isge zẽkɛ a mẽŋa yetɩ, ẽŋa de la nẽrzuo. Tɩ nẽrba n paagɛ wʋ nẽr-kↄbsnaasɩ daan doose ẽ. Tɩ ba kʋ ẽ, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ẽ na wuu wɩrgɛ. Tɩ la lebge zãŋa.
44005037	La bɛla poorʋm, Azudaasɩ n yese Galile mẽ daan isge mɛ nẽrba kãalgↄ wakatɛ, tɩ nẽrba basɛba dↄla ẽ. Tɩ ba kʋ ẽ, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ẽ na mẽ wɩrgɛ.
44005038	Bɛla ı̃yã, lɛɛlɛ wã mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ya basɛ nẽr-bãna, da kãn ẽŋɛ ba sɛla sɛla. La sãn dɛna nẽrsaalba pʋtẽ'era, la ba tõoma, la wʋn wa lebge zãŋa.
44005039	La, la sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ bõnↄ, ya kãn tã'agɛ sã'am ba. Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa, tɩ ya da wa yẽ tɩ ya zɛbrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ." Tɩ ba sakɛ a yetↄga la,
44005040	dee wi Tõntõnɩba la, tɩ ba wa'am. Tɩ ba botɩ ba wẽ ba, dee yele ba yetɩ: "Da le tↄgɛ-ya Azezi yɛla bↄ nẽrba." Dee yãŋa basɛ ba yetɩ, ba fõrgɛ.
44005041	Tɩ Tõntõnɩba la yese sarɩyadia zẽ'am na sũ-yẽlga, ban masɛ tɩ ba yẽ nãmsgↄ Azezi ı̃yã la.
44005042	La daarɛ woo ba boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, la ba yiɛ pʋam, ken zãsna nẽrba, dee mõola Azezi kõ-yẽlga yetɩ, ẽŋa n de Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm.
44006001	La dabs-bãma wakatɛ karẽnbiisi la daan pa'asrɩ mɛ zↄ'ↄra, tɩ Zifdõma sɛba n tↄgrɩ Grɛkɩ yetↄga la daan yõnna la Zifdõma nẽr-sɛba n tↄgrɩ Ebre yetↄga la yetɩ, ban sõŋrɩ nẽrba la dia daarɛ woo la, ba ka bↄ'ↄrɩ bãma pↄkõpa la wʋ lan masɛ.
44006002	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Tõntõnɩba pia la ayi la wi karẽnbiisi la wuu, yele ba yetɩ: "La ka masɛ tɩ tõma basɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga mõolgↄ dee pʋta dia.
44006003	Bɛla tɩ sↄbiisi, bɩsɛ ya pʋam looge bʋraasɩ bayopↄɩ n de nẽr-sõma, dee dɛna yɛm dõma, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la ba lɛ zozo'e, tɩ tɩ dɩkɛ tõon-ẽna wã ẽŋɛ ba nu'usum.
44006004	Dee tɩ tõma wɩsgɛ tɩ mẽŋa la Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋsgↄ, la a yetↄga la mõolgↄ."
44006005	Tɩ ban yele se'em na daan ẽŋɛ nẽrba la wuu sũure yẽlʋm. Tɩ ba looge A'etɩɛnɩ n bↄ Azezi sɩra zozo'e tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la ẽ lɛ, la Afilipi, la Aprokↄↄrɩ, la Anikanↄↄrɩ, la Atimõ, la Aparmɛnasɩ, la Anikolasɩ n yese Antɩyↄsɩ dee dↄla Zifdõma pʋ'ʋsgↄ sore.
44006006	Tɩ ba tarɩ ba sẽŋɛ Tõntõnɩba la zẽ'am, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba.
44006007	La Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la daan saarɩ zẽ'esɩ mɛ pa'asra, tɩ karẽnbiisi la kãllɛ mẽ pa'asra Zerizalɛm pʋam zozo'e. Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma zozo'e daan bↄ'ↄra Azezi sɩra.
44006008	La A'etɩɛnɩ n tarɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ la a pãŋa zozo'e la, daan tõnnɩ la tõon-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.
44006009	Tɩ Zifdõma basɛba n daan de yamsɩ dee yãŋa to'oge ba mẽŋa, tɩ ba wi'ira ba wẽndeego tɩ soe m mẽŋa dõma wẽndeego, n yese Sirɛnɩ, la Alɛgsãndri, la Zifdõma basɛba n yese Silisi, la Azi tẽnsɩ n wẽ'erɩ nõke'ene la A'etɩɛnɩ.
44006010	La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n bↄ'ↄrɩ A'etɩɛnɩ yɛm tɩ a tↄgra, tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ lerge ẽ.
44006011	Tɩ ba ɛ nẽrba botɩ ba dõrɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Tõma wõm tɩ a tↄgɛ la Amoyisi la Nawẽnnɛ tↄg-be'ero."
44006012	Ban ẽŋɛ bɛla la, ba botɩ nẽrba la, la ba kẽma, la ba lↄↄ karẽnsãandõma la wuu sũure isge mɛ, tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ tarɩ sẽŋɛ sarɩyaditba zẽ'am,
44006013	dee botɩ nẽrba parɩm bↄ ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna wã tↄgrɩ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ tɩ a bↄ Amoyisi la tↄg-be'ero ka gↄ'ↄra.
44006014	Tõma wõm tɩ a yetɩ, Azezi n yese Nazarɛtɩ la wʋn sã'am Wẽnde-kãtɛ la mɛ, dee teege ɩr-sɛba tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn pa'alɛ tɩ yaabdõma yetɩ tɩ ɩta la."
44006015	Tɩ sarɩyaditba la wuu n zı̃ la bɩsra A'etɩɛnɩ zı̃i, yẽ tɩ a nẽŋa ãn wʋ malɛka nẽŋa la.
44007001	Tɩ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana soke A'etɩɛnɩ yetɩ: "La de la bɛla bɩɩ?"
44007002	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "M sↄbiisi la m sↄdõma, selse-ya. Nawẽnnɛ n de na'am kãtɛ dãana la yʋʋn puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ tɩ yaaba Abraham, ẽn yʋʋn nãn boe Mezopotami nãn ka sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire Haran tẽŋam na,
44007003	a yʋʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Yese dee basɛ fʋ tẽŋa la fʋ yir-dõma, dee sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn pa'alɛ fʋ la.'
44007004	Tɩ Abraham yese Kalde dõma tẽŋam sẽŋɛ ka zı̃'ire Haran. La a sↄ kũm poorʋm tɩ Nawẽnnɛ le botɩ a yese sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛka tɩ ya boe mı̃ zı̃na wã pʋam.
44007005	La Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn ka bↄ ẽ zẽ'a tẽŋa la pʋam baa fẽe, dee bı̃ŋe nõorɛ yetɩ, ẽŋa wʋn bↄ ẽ tẽn-ẽŋa, la a kũm poorʋm tɩ a yɩɩsɩ wʋn wa sↄna tẽŋa la. La wakat-ẽŋa a yʋʋn nãn ka dↄgɛ bia.
44007006	Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn yele ẽ na wãna: 'Fʋ yɩɩsɩ la wʋn wa sẽŋɛ tẽŋa ayẽma ka kẽ'era mı̃ wa lebge yamsɩ bilam, la ba wʋn nãmsɛ ba mɛ yʋʋma kↄbsnaasɩ.
44007007	La mam wʋn wa sɩbgɛ so'olʋm sɛka n botɩ ba dɛna yamsɩ la mɛ. La bɛla poorʋm tɩ ba wʋn yese bilam leme wa pʋ'ʋsɛ mam kalam.'
44007008	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bı̃ŋe nõorɛ la Abraham yetɩ, ẽŋa la a yɩɩsɩ wuu wãta ba budimto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba de la ẽŋa nẽrba. Tɩ Abraham yʋʋn wa dↄgɛ A'izakɩ, tɩ dabsa anii daarɛ tɩ a wã ẽ. Tɩ A'izakɩ mẽ wa dↄgɛ Azakↄbɩ ẽŋɛ bɛla. Tɩ Azakↄbɩ mẽ wa dↄgɛ tɩ yaabdõma pia la ayi la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
44007009	Tɩ tɩ yaabdõma la yʋʋn yũuna la ba yɩbga Azozɛfʋ, koose ẽ bↄ Ezipti dõma. La Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn boe la ẽ lɛ mɛ,
44007010	yʋʋn yese ẽ a nãmsgↄ wuu pʋam, dee bↄ ẽ yel-sõnnɛ, la yɛm Afaarõ n de Ezipti naba la nẽŋam. Tɩ naba la botɩ Azozɛfʋ dɛna gↄmna sↄna Ezipti tẽŋa, la a yire wuu bɩsra.
44007011	Tɩ kↄm kãtɛ wa'am Ezipti, la Kanaan so'olʋm halɩ tɩ la dɛna toogo. Tɩ tõma yaabdõma yʋʋn ka tara dia.
44007012	Tɩ Azakↄbɩ yʋʋn wõm tɩ dia boe Ezipti, tɩ a tõm tɩ yaabdõma tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka da.
44007013	La a le tõm ba mɛ nõor-ayi pʋam, tɩ Azozɛfʋ botɩ a kẽendõma la bãŋɛ ẽ. Tɩ Afaarõ mẽ bãŋɛ Azozɛfʋ sↄ yir-dõma yelle.
44007014	Tɩ Azozɛfʋ tõm tɩ ba wi a sↄ Azakↄbɩ, la a yir-dõma wuu tɩ ba wa'am. Ba kãllɛ yʋʋn paagɛ nẽrba pisyopↄɩ la anuu.
44007015	Tɩ Azakↄbɩ isge sẽŋɛ Ezipti. Bilam tɩ ẽŋa la tɩ yaabdõma yʋʋn ki.
44007016	Tɩ ba zɛ ba sẽŋɛ Sisɛm ka laagɛ ba yↄ-sɛka tɩ Abraham yʋʋn da la ligri A'emõorɩ kↄma zẽ'am na.
44007017	La Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ la Abraham wakatɛ n yʋʋn lɛm na, nẽrba la yʋʋn yɩrgɛ mɛ zo'oge Ezipti.
44007018	Halɩ tɩ nẽra ayɩla wa di Ezipti na'am ka mina Azozɛfʋ yelle.
44007019	Tɩ naba la yʋʋn ẽŋɛ yɛm wẽeŋa la tõma yaabdõma nãmsɛ tɩ buuri la, pẽrgɛ ba botɩ ba basɛ ba bilɛɛsɩ tɩ ba ki.
44007020	Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yʋʋn dↄgɛ Amoyisi tɩ a dɛna bi-sõŋↄ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam. Tɩ ba uge ẽ a sↄ yire wõr-sɩtã,
44007021	dee tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka basɛ, tɩ Afaarõ bipugla yʋʋn dɩkɛ ẽ uge, tɩ a lebge wʋ a mẽŋa bia.
44007022	Tɩ Amoyisi zãsʋm Ezipti dõma yɛm wuu, yʋʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ a yetↄga la a tõoma wuu pʋam.
44007023	La ẽn yʋʋn paagɛ yʋʋma pinaasɩ la, tɩ a yʋʋn looge yɛm sẽŋɛ ka kaagɛ bɩsɛ a sↄbiisi n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ yɩɩsɩ la,
44007024	yãŋa yẽ tɩ Ezipti nẽra nãmsrɩ ba nẽra ayɩla. Tɩ a po'oge tɩ nẽra la, wẽ Ezipti nẽra la kʋ lerge sãnnɛ.
44007025	A tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a buuri la wʋn bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boorɩ tɩ a botɩ ẽŋa fãagɛ ba Ezipti dõma nu'usum, la ba ka bãŋɛ.
44007026	Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a le yẽ a buuri nẽrba bayi tɩ ba zɛbrɩ la taaba. Tɩ a pãsɛ ba, bↄↄra tɩ ba sũure mã'agɛ, soke ba yetɩ: 'M sɩrdõma, ya de la sↄbiisi, la bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ ya zɛbra la taaba?'
44007027	Tɩ sɛka n ɩtɩ a tadãana be'em na yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Ãne n bↄ fʋ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna tɩ bɩsra, dee dɛna tɩ sarɩyadita?
44007028	Fʋ boorɩ tɩ fʋ kʋ mam wʋ fõn zaam kʋ Ezipti nẽra se'em na?'
44007029	Yetↄg-ẽna ı̃yã tɩ Amoyisi zoe sẽŋɛ Madiyã ka kẽ'era. Bilam tɩ a dↄgɛ dayↄↄsɩ bayi.
44007030	La yʋʋma pinaasɩ poorʋm, daarɛ ayɩla a boe la weem lɛm Sinayi tãŋa, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka ze'ele tũntuugo tɩ bugum boe mı̃ dita pʋam puke a mẽŋa bilam, tɩ a yẽ ẽ.
44007031	Amoyisi n yẽ ẽ na, la di'ige ẽ mɛ, tɩ a lɛm tɩ a bɩsɛ. Tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele ẽ yetɩ:
44007032	'Mam de la Nawẽnnɛ tɩ fʋ yaabdõma Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakↄbɩ yʋʋn pʋ'ʋsrɩ la.' Tɩ Amoyisi gõgra dee ka tã'agɛ bɩsɛ.
44007033	Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Pirge fʋ tagra la, tɩ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ fʋ ze la de la mam zẽ'e-sõŋↄ.
44007034	Mam yẽ m nẽrba la n boe Ezipti nãmsgↄ la mɛ, dee wõm ba fablɩgↄ la, tɩ mam sigum tɩ m fãagɛ ba. Bɛla ı̃yã mam yetɩ m tõm fʋ la Ezipti.' "
44007035	Tɩ A'etɩɛnɩ ken yetɩ: "Amoyisi ẽna wã tɩ ba yʋʋn zagsɛ ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: 'Ãne n bↄ fↄ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ sↄna tↄ, dee dɛna tɩ sarɩyadita?' Ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn botɩ a malɛka tↄgɛ bↄ ẽ tũntuum na. Ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm tɩ a sↄna a nẽrba la dee yese ba nãmsgↄ la pʋam.
44007036	Ẽŋa n tõm tõon-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ n pa'alɩ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa Ezipti tẽŋam yese ba bilam, dee tõm tõon-yãlma tarɩ ba pãrgɛ mõg-mõlga la, dee bↄna la ba weego la pʋam yʋʋma pinaasɩ.
44007037	Amoyisi ẽŋa n yʋʋn yele Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma yetɩ: 'Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele ya buuri pʋam dɛna a nõtↄ'ↄsa bↄ yãma wʋ ẽŋa n botɩ mam dɛna a nõtↄ'ↄsa se'em na.'
44007038	La tɩ yaabdõma n yʋʋn lagsɛ weem na, la de la ẽŋa n ze'ele tɩ yaabdõma, la malɛka n tↄgɛ la ẽ Sinayi tãŋa zuo tẽŋasʋka, to'oge Nawẽnnɛ vↄm yetↄga tↄgɛ bↄ tↄ.
44007039	Tɩ tɩ yaabdõma yʋʋn ka bↄↄra tɩ ba sakɛ a nõorɛ, yʋʋn zagsɛ ẽ, dee tẽ'esɛ ba sũurum bↄↄra tɩ ba lebe Ezipti.
44007040	Ba yʋʋn yele Aarõ yetɩ: 'Ẽŋɛ baga bↄ tↄ tɩ ba bↄna tɩ nẽŋam. Tõma ka mi bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ Amoyisi n yese tõma Ezipti tẽŋam wa'am na.'
44007041	Bɛla tɩ ba yãŋa yagbɛ na-biire kãabra ẽ tɩ a dɛna ba bagrɛ, ɩta sũ-yẽlga la ba mẽŋa nu'usi n ẽŋɛ sɛla la.
44007042	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bure a poore bↄ ba, dee basɛ ba tɩ ba pʋ'ʋsra wõrbiɛ n boe saazuum, wʋ lan gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba gõnnↄ pʋam yetɩ: 'Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba, yãma tẽ'esrɩ tɩ la de la mam tɩ ya yʋʋn kʋʋrɩ dũnsi, la kãabgↄ basɛba weem yʋʋma pinaasɩ bↄ'ↄra la bɩɩ?
44007043	Ayɛɩ, ya yʋʋn zɛɛrɩ la ya bagrɛ Amolↄkɩ fuu-deego, la ya bagrɛ Arefã wõrbiire, bõn-bãma tɩ ya yʋʋn ẽŋɛ pʋ'ʋsra. Bɛla ı̃yã mam wʋn botɩ ba pe'ege ya sẽŋɛ zãagɛ halɩ gãŋɛ Babilↄnɩ tẽŋam.'
44007044	Tɩ sↄ-yaabdõma yʋʋn tarɩ la fuu-deego weem n pa'alɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boe ba zẽ'am. Ba yʋʋn ẽŋɛ ẽ tɩ a ãna wʋ Nawẽnnɛ n tↄgɛ bↄ Amoyisi yetɩ, ba ẽŋɛ ẽ tɩ a ãna wʋ ẽn yẽ a wõnnɛ se'em na.
44007045	Tɩ yaabdõma yʋʋn to'oge fuu-deego la ba mẽ sↄdõma zẽ'am, zɛ ẽ doose la Azoze wa'am wa zɛbɛ to'oge so'olʋm sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn dige nẽrba tẽŋa la pʋam tɩ ba yese ba nẽŋam na. Tɩ fuu-deego la weege bↄna wa paagɛ naba Adavidi wakatʋm.
44007046	Adavidi yʋʋn yẽ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam, dee sose ẽ yetɩ, a bↄ ẽ sore tɩ a mẽ pʋ'ʋsgↄ deego bↄ ẽ tɩ a bↄna la Azakↄbɩ yɩɩsɩ lɛ.
44007047	La, la de la a bia Asalomõ n yãŋa n mẽ deego la bↄ Nawẽnnɛ.
44007048	La Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu ka kẽ'erɩ deto tɩ nẽrsaalba mẽ pʋam, wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa ayɩla n yʋʋn yele se'em yetɩ:
44007049	'Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, saazuum de la mam na'am bı̃mbı̃nne, dee tɩ dũnia dɛna mam nãma dↄglgↄ zẽ'a. Bẽm deego tɩ ya wʋn mẽ bↄ mam? La bẽm vo'osgo zẽ'a tɩ ya yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ bↄ mam?
44007050	La dagɩ mam mẽŋa n ẽŋɛ sɛla woo bɩɩ?' "
44007051	A'etɩɛnɩ ken yele ba yetɩ: "Ya de la sɩ'ɩsrɩba, ya ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ la ya sũure wuu, ya ka selsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la, dee kↄ'ↄn zagsra Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa daarɛ woo wʋ ya yaabdõma n mẽ yʋʋn ẽŋɛ se'em na.
44007052	Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄs-kãna tɩ ya yaabdõma la yʋʋn ka nãmsɛ ẽ? Bãma n yʋʋn kʋ sɛba n dẽŋɛ mõolɛ sɩra dãana tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm tɩ a wa'am na yelle. La yãma n yãŋa dõrɛ ẽ kʋ ẽ.
44007053	Yãma yʋʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ mɛ malɛkadõma zẽ'am. La ya ka sakɛ lↄↄ la."
44007054	Ban wõm bɛla la, ba sũnsõa yı̃ige mɛ, tɩ ba ↄbra yẽna.
44007055	La A'etɩɛnɩ daan tarɩ la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa, gorge bɩsra saazuum zı̃i, yẽ Nawẽnnɛ na'am n puke yẽgra, tɩ Azezi zɛ Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgↄ bↄba.
44007056	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ-ya, mam yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yire yo'oge mɛ, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la zɛ Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgↄ bↄba."
44007057	Tɩ ba lɩ ba tʋba kaasɛ tagurga, dee lagɩm zoe paagɛ yõkɛ ẽ,
44007058	ve'ege ẽ tẽŋa la pʋam yese ka lↄbra ẽ la kuga tɩ ba kʋ. Sɛba n lobrɩ ẽ na kuga la yɛɛsɛ ba futo gu'ule la budib-polle yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asolɩ.
44007059	La ban lobrɩ A'etɩɛnɩ la kuga la, tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ yetɩ: "Zuudãana Azezi, to'oge m sɩa."
44007060	Dee dɩkɛ dũma ka tẽŋa tı̃i kaasɛ yetɩ: "Zuudãana, da geele ba tõon-be'ego wã taalɛ." A yele la wãna dee ki.
44008001	La Asolɩ daan sakɛ tɩ A'etɩɛnɩ kũm na masɛ mɛ. La daar-ẽŋa tɩ ba pↄsɛ nãmsra Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n boe Zerizalɛm na halɩ, tɩ ba wuu zoe wɩrgɛ Zude, la Samaari so'olʋm pʋam, la Azezi Tõntõnɩba pia la ayi la mã'a n weege.
44008002	Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan dɩkɛ A'etɩɛnɩ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ, dee kɛlla zozo'e a kũm na ı̃yã.
44008003	La Asolɩ daan kↄ'ↄn nãmsra Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la mɛ bↄↄra tɩ a sã'am ba wuu, kẽ'era yiɛ pʋam yõgra bʋraasɩ la pↄgsɩ botɩ ba tara ba sẽnna yʋ'ʋra.
44008004	Tɩ Azezi karẽnbi-sɛba n daan wɩrgɛ la daan sẽnna zẽ'esɩ wuu mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
44008005	Afilipi daan sẽŋɛ la Samaari tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam ka mõolɛ Krisi kõ-yẽlga la bↄ ba.
44008006	La nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la daan selsrɩ Afilipi n tↄgrɩ ba se'em na mɛ sõŋa sõŋa, ban wõm dee yẽ ẽn ɩtɩ bõn-yãlma la.
44008007	La kʋlkã'arsɩ daan ẽn tı̃i kaasɛ mɛ, yese dee basɛ ban tarɩ sɛba la. Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n de kↄↄrnↄ la wↄbsɩ zozo'e daan yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm.
44008008	Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba tara sũ-yẽlga zozo'e.
44008009	La bʋraa n daan boe tẽŋa la pʋam tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asimõ. A daan de la tɩɩm dãana, tõnna tɩɩm tõoma botɩ Samaari so'olʋm nẽrba palẽŋa ẽgra. Dee pa'ala a mẽŋa tɩ ẽŋa de la nẽr-kãtɛ,
44008010	tɩ nẽrba wuu sakra a yetↄga sõŋa, bõnbɩ'ɩsɩ la bõnkɛgsɩ wuu yɛta tɩ: "Bʋra-ẽna de la sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ wẽnnɛ pãn-kãtɛ la n sige."
44008011	Ẽn tõm a tɩɩm tõoma botɩ nẽrba la palẽŋa ẽgra yuuge la, ba sakɛ ẽ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa.
44008012	La Afilipi n mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle, la Azezi-krisi yʋ'ʋrɛ bↄ ba la, ba daan bↄ a yetↄga la sɩra mɛ, botɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, bʋraasɩ la pↄgsɩ.
44008013	Tɩ Asimõ mẽ sakɛ yetↄga la, botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam, tɩ a dɩkɛ a mẽŋa lablɛ Afilipi, la ẽn yẽtɩ bõn-yãlma la yel-kɩrsɩ sɛba n ɩtɩ la, la ẽkɛ la a palẽŋa.
44008014	Azezi Tõntõnɩba la n daan boe Zerizalɛm na wõm mɛ tɩ Samaari dõma to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga mɛ, tɩ ba tõm Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã ba zẽ'am.
44008015	La ban paagɛ mı̃ na, ba pʋ'ʋsɛ mɛ bↄ ba tɩ ba to'oge Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa.
44008016	Se'ere n soe la, ba daan põn mise ba la ko'om pʋam la Zuudãana Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ, dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa nãn ka sige ba nẽra nẽra zuo.
44008017	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto, tɩ ba yãŋa to'oge Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la.
44008018	Asimõ n yẽ tɩ Azezi Tõntõnɩba la n dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto, tɩ ba to'oge Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la, a daan boorɩ tɩ a bↄ ba la ligri,
44008019	yãŋa yele ba yetɩ: "Bↄ-ya mam pãn-ẽna wã tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ mam wʋn dɩkɛ m nu'usi paglɛ a zuo, a wʋn kↄ'ↄn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa."
44008020	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn na fʋ ligri la wʋn sã'am, fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ'a da'arɩ la ligri la ı̃yã.
44008021	Fʋ nẽŋa ka boe yel-bãna pʋam, la fʋ ka tarɩ pʋrɛ mı̃, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sũure ka masɛ Nawẽnnɛ nifum.
44008022	Teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'e-ẽna wã, dee sose Zuudãana, tɩ tã tɩ a basɛ fʋ tõon-be'ero tɩ fʋ tẽ'esrɩ fʋ sũurum na taalɛ.
44008023	Mam yẽ tɩ fʋ tarɩ la sũ-toogo, tɩ tõon-be'ero lʋ fↄ."
44008024	Tɩ Asimõ lerge yetɩ: "Pʋ'ʋsɛ-ya Zuudãana bↄ ma tɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ ya yele mam na sɛla sɛla da paagɛ ma."
44008025	Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã daan tↄgɛ Zuudãana Azezi yetↄga la pa'alɛ nẽrba mɛ, dee daan lɛbra Zerizalɛm. La sore zuo, ba mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga Samaari tẽnsɩ zozo'e pʋam mɛ.
44008026	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka tↄgɛ bↄ Afilipi yetɩ: "Isge sẽŋɛ wẽntulle gↄbga bↄba, doose sorↄ-sɛka n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wɛ Gaza la, sorↄ-ẽŋa dolɩ la weego pʋam."
44008027	Tɩ a isge sẽŋɛ. La Etiopi bʋraa n daan dolɩ sore la, a de la nẽr-kãtɛ, a gu'uri la Etiopi pↄg-naba Akãndase bõntarsõm. A daan sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ,
44008028	dee zẽa wiiri torko pʋam lɛbra kulla. A daan tarɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi gõŋↄ karẽŋra.
44008029	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yele Afilipi yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ lɛm torko wã."
44008030	Tɩ Afilipi zoe paagɛ, wõm tɩ a karẽŋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa A'ezayi gõŋↄ. Tɩ Afilipi soke ẽ yetɩ: "Fõn wõnnɩ fõn karẽŋɛ se'em wã võorɛ mɛ bɩɩ?"
44008031	Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne wõm, tɩ nẽra sãn ka pa'alɛ mam?" Dee sose Afilipi yetɩ, a zom zı̃'ire ẽŋa zẽ'am. Tɩ a zom zı̃'ire.
44008032	Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a daan karẽŋrɩ la gʋlsɛ yele la wãna: "A ãn wʋ pesgo tɩ ba tarɩ wɛ tɩ ba kʋ, dee ãna wʋ pebila tɩ ba sɛɛrɩ a kõbrↄ tɩ a ka kaasra, dee mẽ põn ka ya'ara nõorɛ.
44008033	Ba pↄ'ↄgɛ ẽ mɛ, ka di a sarɩya sõŋa. Tɩ nẽra ka bↄna wʋn tↄgɛ a yɩɩsɩ yelle, se'ere n soe la, ba yese a vↄm mɛ dũnia zuo."
44008034	Tɩ Etiopi bʋraa la soke Afilipi yetɩ: "Ãn yelle tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa la tↄgrɩ wãna? A tↄgrɩ la a mẽŋa yelle bɩɩ, nẽra ayẽma yelle?"
44008035	Tɩ Afilipi yãŋa dɩkɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋↄ la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a karẽŋɛ la pa'alɛ a võorɛ, dee doose bilam tↄgɛ Azezi kõ-yẽlga bↄ ẽ.
44008036	La ban sẽnnɩ wɛ la, ba paagɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ko'om boe mı̃. Tɩ Etiopi bʋraa la yele Afilipi yetɩ: "Bɩsɛ, ko'om n wãna n boe kalam. Bẽm n wʋn gu mam ko'om misga?" ((
44008037	Tɩ Afilipi yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ sãn bↄ Azezi sɩra la fʋ sũure wuu, fʋ tã wʋn to'oge ko'om misga mɛ." Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "Mam sakɛ tɩ Azezi-krisi de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa."))
44008038	Dee botɩ torko la ze'ele. Tɩ Afilipi la ẽŋa sige ko'om na pʋam, tɩ Afilipi mise ẽ ko'om pʋam.
44008039	La ban ze'ele ko'om na pʋam dↄↄra la, tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa zẽkɛ Afilipi fõrgɛ. Tɩ Etiopi bʋraa la ka le yẽ ẽ, dee lebe dↄla a sore la wɛ'ɛsa la sũ-yẽlga.
44008040	Tɩ nẽrba yẽ Afilipi Azↄtɩ tẽŋam, tɩ a dↄla tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga halɩ ka paagɛ Sezaare.
44009001	Tɩ Asolɩ ken nãmsra Azezi karẽnbiisi la, yetɩ a kʋ ba, sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadãana zẽ'am
44009002	ka sose ẽ yetɩ, a gʋlsɛ gõnnↄ bↄ Zifdõma wẽndeto n boe Damaasɩ tẽŋam na yetɩ, ẽŋa sãn yẽ nẽrba n de bʋraasɩ, bɩɩ pↄgsɩ n dolɩ Azezi sore, ẽŋa wʋn yõgɛ ba mɛ, lʋ ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm.
44009003	La ẽn to'oge nõorɛ bↄna sore wɛ ka lɛm Damaasɩ la, tɩ peelem ze'ele saazuum darɛ wa nẽegɛ gilge ẽ.
44009004	Tɩ a lui tẽŋa, wõm kõa n yele ẽ yetɩ: "Asolɩ, Asolɩ, bẽm tɩ fʋ nãmsra mam?"
44009005	Tɩ Asolɩ lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, fõn de la ãne?" Tɩ kõa la lerge yetɩ: "Mam de la Azezi, sɛka tɩ fʋ nãmsrɩ la.
44009006	La isge kẽ tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ba wʋn yele fo fõn wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em."
44009007	Tɩ bʋra-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na zɛ yɛrɩ, ka yele se'ere. Ba wõm kõa la mɛ, dee ka yẽ nẽra.
44009008	Tɩ Asolɩ isge pike nini ka le yẽta. Tɩ ba ve'ege ẽ tarɩ sẽŋɛ Damaasɩ.
44009009	La dabsa atã tɩ a nini ka yẽtɩ. La a ka di, bɩɩ yũ sɛla.
44009010	La Azezi karẽnbia ayɩla n daan boe Damaasɩ, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Ananiyasɩ. Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ẽ wʋ zãasŋↄ la, wi ẽ yetɩ: "Ananiyasɩ." Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: "M Zuudãana, mam n wãna."
44009011	Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Isge doose sorↄ-sɛka tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ sorↄ-tẽntẽa la, sẽŋɛ Azudaasɩ yire ka soke Tarsɩ tẽŋa bʋraa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asolɩ la yelle. A boe mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra mɛ.
44009012	La a yẽ la bʋraa wʋ zãasŋↄ la, bʋraa la yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Ananiyasɩ, a yẽ ẽ tɩ a kẽ'em mɛ wa dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ẽŋa zuo tɩ ẽŋa le yẽta."
44009013	Tɩ Ananiyasɩ lerge yetɩ: "Zuudãana, mam põn wõm bʋraa wã yelle zozo'e mɛ, ẽŋa n tõm fʋ nẽrba be'em se'em Zerizalɛm,
44009014	la a to'oge nõorɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am mɛ wa'am kalam tɩ a yõgɛ sɛba wuu n pʋ'ʋsrɩ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ la."
44009015	Tɩ Zuudãana la yele Ananiyasɩ yetɩ: "Sẽŋɛ, mam looge ẽ mɛ tɩ m botɩ a tarɩ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ sẽŋɛ ka tↄgɛ bↄ bu-zãŋsɩ, la ba na'adõma, la Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma mẽ.
44009016	Mam wʋn pa'alɛ ẽ ẽn wʋn nãmsɛ se'em mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã."
44009017	Tɩ Ananiyasɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ yire la pʋam dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ Asolɩ zuo yele ẽ yetɩ: "M sↄbia Asolɩ, fõn daan boe sore zuo sẽnna tɩ Zuudãana Azezi puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ fʋ la, ẽŋa n tõm mam fʋ zẽ'am tɩ m botɩ fʋ nini le yẽta, dee tɩ fʋ to'oge Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa."
44009018	Tɩ Ananiyasɩ n yele bɛla la, sɛla n ãn wʋ pↄgrↄ n kↄ'ↄn ze'ele Asolɩ ninum lui, tɩ a le yẽta. Tɩ a isge, tɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam,
44009019	dee tɩ a di dia, tɩ a pãŋa le wa'am. Asolɩ daan weege Damaasɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am na dabsa fẽe,
44009020	darɛ kẽ Zifdõma wẽndetʋm mõola Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga yetɩ, Azezi de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.
44009021	Tɩ la di'ige sɛba wuu n wõm na. Tɩ ba yetɩ: "Dagɩ bʋra-ẽna wã n daan boe Zerizalɛm kↄ'ↄn nãmsra nẽr-sɛba n pʋ'ʋsrɩ la Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ la? A nõo ka wa'am kalam tɩ a yõgɛ ba lʋ mɛ tarɩ ba sẽŋɛ kãabgↄ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am?"
44009022	La Asolɩ daan yẽtɩ bʋraanɛ mɛ pa'asra, tↄgɛ yãŋɛ Zifdõma sɛba n boe Damaasɩ la, pa'alɛ ba tɩ Azezi de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm.
44009023	La dabsa faa n pa'asɛ tɩ Zifdõma lagɩm ẽŋɛ nõorɛ ayɩla yetɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
44009024	Tɩ Asolɩ daan bãŋɛ ban bãm yetɩ ba ẽŋɛ se'em na. Ba daan gu'uri tẽŋa la yansɩ la wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋↄ, bↄↄra tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
44009025	Tɩ daarɛ ayɩla yʋ'ʋŋↄ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi daan botɩ a sige pɩ'ɩgↄ pʋam, tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ sike lalga poorʋm, tɩ a fõrgɛ.
44009026	La Asolɩ daan sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm ka bↄↄra tɩ a lagɩm na Azezi karẽnbiisi la. La ba daan zotɩ ẽ mɛ, ba daan ka sakɛ tɩ a sɩrɩ de la Azezi karẽnbia.
44009027	Tɩ Abarnabasɩ daan tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Azezi Tõntõnɩba la zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ba Asolɩ n daan yẽ Zuudãana Azezi Damaasɩ sore zuo, la Zuudãana la n tↄgɛ ẽ se'em, la ẽn daan kãbɛ sũure mõolɛ Azezi yelle Damaasɩ se'em.
44009028	Tɩ Asolɩ yãŋa daan bↄna la ba Zerizalɛm, ɛɛra tẽŋa la pʋam wuu, kãbɛ sũure mõola Zuudãana Azezi yelle.
44009029	La a daan tↄgrɩ mɛ wẽ'era nõke'ene la Zifdõma sɛba n tↄgrɩ Grɛkɩ yetↄga la. Tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
44009030	La Azezi karẽnbiisi la n bãŋɛ bɛla la, ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la Sezaare, tɩ ba botɩ a sẽŋɛ Tarsɩ.
44009031	Tɩ Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n boe Zude, la Galile, la Samaari tẽnsʋm na, daan ka le yẽ nãmsgↄ. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sõŋra ba, tɩ ba kãllɛ pa'asra, tɩ ba zɛ kãŋkãŋɛ nã'asra Zuudãana la ba sũure wuu.
44009032	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan eerɩ gilgra la zẽ'esɩ la wuu, tɩ daarɛ ayɩla tɩ a sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba la n boe Lida la zẽ'am.
44009033	La bilam a yẽ la bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de A'ene, a daan bẽ mɛ kↄↄrʋm gã yʋʋma anii.
44009034	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: "A'ene, Azezi-krisi bↄ fʋ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ. Isge vaagɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la bı̃ŋe." Tɩ a isge bilam zẽ'am.
44009035	Tɩ Lida, la Saarõ tẽnsɩ nẽrba wuu yẽ tɩ bʋraa la yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm mɛ, tɩ ba teege yɛm dɩkɛ ba mẽŋa bↄ Zuudãana.
44009036	La pↄka ayɩla n daan boe Zope dɛna Azezi karẽnbia tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Atabita. (Tɩ Grɛkɩdõma yetɩ, Adↄrkasɩ, a võorɛ de la "mõlfↄ".) A daan tõnnɩ la tõon-sõma sõŋra nasdõma.
44009037	La wakat-ẽŋa bã'a n yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a ki. Tɩ ba sↄ ẽ, tarɩ ẽ zom deego n boe deego zuum ka gã'arɛ ẽ.
44009038	Zope ka zãagɛ la Lida. La karẽnbiisi la n wõm tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ boe bilam na, tɩ ba tõm bʋraasɩ bayi yetɩ, ba sẽŋɛ ka wi ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am, a da yuuge.
44009039	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ isge doose ba sẽŋɛ. La ban paagɛ la, ba tarɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ zom na deego la n boe deego zuo la. Tɩ pↄkõpa wuu lɛm Apɩyɛɛrɩ kɛlla, dee pa'ala fu-sɛba tɩ Adↄrkasɩ daan pɛ bↄ ba, ẽn daan vↄa la.
44009040	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ botɩ ba wuu yese yẽŋa, dee ka dũma tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ, dee wẽrgɛ kũm na bↄba yetɩ: "Atabita, isge." Tɩ a pike nini yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, isge zı̃'ire.
44009041	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ gʋrɛ a nu'ugo, tɩ a isge ze'ele, tɩ a wi Azezi nẽrba la, la pↄkõpa la pa'alɛ ba tɩ a le vↄa mɛ.
44009042	La Zope tẽŋa dõma wuu n daan wõm yel-ẽna wã la, ba nẽrba zozo'e n bↄ Zuudãana Azezi sɩra.
44009043	Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan yuuge Zope paagɛ la dabsa se'em. A daan boe la Asimõ n de gãnzapa la yire.
44010001	Bʋraa n daan boe Sezaare, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Akↄrnɛlɩ. A daan de la sʋda-kɛ'ɛma, ba wi'iri sʋda-sɛba tɩ a de kɛ'ɛma ba pʋam na tɩ Itali dõma sʋdaasɩ.
44010002	A daan de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, tɩ ẽŋa la a yir-dõma wuu daan nanna Nawẽnnɛ. La a daan sõŋrɩ la Zifdõma nasdõma zozo'e, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ daarɛ woo.
44010003	Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan gelge, tɩ a yẽ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka wʋ a zãasʋm mɛ na, tɩ a wa'am wa kẽ a zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: "Akↄrnɛlɩ!"
44010004	Tɩ a daan bɩsra malɛka la zı̃i, tɩ dabeem tara ẽ, tɩ a yetɩ: "M dãana, fʋ yetɩ bo?" Tɩ a lerge yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, la fõn sõŋrɩ nasdõma la paagɛ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm mɛ, a tẽrɩ fʋ yelle mɛ.
44010005	La nãnannɛ wã, tõm nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Zope ka yele Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ tɩ a wa'am.
44010006	A de la sãana bↄna Asimõ n de gãnzapa la yire. A yire la lɛm na ko-kãtɛ la nõorʋm."
44010007	La malɛka la n tↄgɛ la Akↄrnɛlɩ dee fõrgɛ la, tɩ Akↄrnɛlɩ wi a tõntõnɩba bayi, la a sʋda-sõŋↄ ayɩla n tõnnɩ a tõoma, dee mẽ nanna Nawẽnnɛ,
44010008	yãŋa tↄgɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ la wuu pa'alɛ ba, dee tõm ba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Zope.
44010009	La beere n wiige, tɩ ba bↄna sore wɛ ka lɛm Zope, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ zom gↄsgↄ tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ, la masɛ wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka.
44010010	Tɩ a kↄm daan dõnna, tɩ a bↄↄra tɩ a di. La ban nãn boe mı̃ ɩta dia tɩ ba bↄ ẽ na, tɩ a bɩsɛ yẽ wʋ a zãasʋm mɛ na,
44010011	a daan yẽ tɩ saazuum n yo'oge, tɩ sɛla n ãn wʋ fu-kãtɛ n lʋ zẽ'esɩ sɩnaasɩ signa tẽŋa.
44010012	La dũnsi buuri wuu, la tẽŋa bõn-vuula, la bõn-ẽgla buuri wuu n boe a pʋam.
44010013	Tɩ a wõm kõa n yele ẽ yetɩ: "Apɩyɛɛrɩ, isge kʋ di."
44010014	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "Ayɛɩ, Zuudãana, mam ken ka di sɛla n de sisgo bõnↄ bɩɩ bõn-dẽgrↄ baa fẽe."
44010015	Tɩ kõa la le yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, a ãn sõŋa, da kãn yetɩ, a de la bõn-dẽgrↄ."
44010016	Bõnↄ la ẽŋɛ la nõor-atã, dee yãŋa lebe saazuum.
44010017	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan zɛ yɛrɩ, tẽ'esra a pʋtẽ'erʋm bõn-ẽŋa tɩ a yẽ la võorɛ. La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ sɛba tɩ Akↄrnɛlɩ daan tõm na soke Asimõ yire n boe zẽ'a, wa'am wa zɛ yaŋa nõorʋm,
44010018	yãŋa wi soke yetɩ, Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ boe la kalam bɩɩ?
44010019	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ ken tẽ'esra la bõnↄ la tɩ a yẽ la yelle, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bʋraasɩ batã n eerɩ fo, ban wãna.
44010020	Isge sige doose ba, da sẽ'ena, tɩ mam n tõm ba."
44010021	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sige bʋraasɩ la zẽ'a ka yele ba yetɩ: "Mam tɩ ya eerɩ la. Bẽm yelle ı̃yã tɩ yãma wa'am kalam?"
44010022	Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: "Akↄrnɛlɩ, a de la sʋda-kɛ'ɛma, tɩ a ɩrgↄ masɛ, tɩ a nanna Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ Zifdõma wuu tↄgra a yelle sõŋa. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan tõm a malɛka tɩ a wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ, a botɩ fõn wa'am a yire wa yele ẽ fõn tarɩ yetↄg-sɛka la."
44010023	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ botɩ ba kẽ yire la gã'arɛ. Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a isge dↄla ba wɛ, tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi basɛba n boe Zope la kↄlgɛ ẽ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ.
44010024	La dabsa ayi daarɛ tɩ ba paagɛ Sezaare. Tɩ Akↄrnɛlɩ daan wi a yir-dõma la a sɩrdõma lagsɛ gu'ura ba.
44010025	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ n paagɛ kẽ'era la, tɩ Akↄrnɛlɩ tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asɛ ẽ.
44010026	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ gʋrɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Isge, mam mẽ de la nẽrsaala wʋ fõn na."
44010027	Tɩ ba sõsra la taaba kẽ'era, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yẽ nẽrba n lagsɛ zo'oge.
44010028	Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: "Ya mi tɩ Zifdõma sisri mɛ, ba ka lagnɩ la nẽra n de sãana, la ba ka kẽ'erɩ a yire. La Nawẽnnɛ pa'alɛ mam mɛ tɩ m da yetɩ, nẽrsaala de dẽgrↄ dãana, bɩɩ a ka narɩ m lagɩm na ẽ.
44010029	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ fõn wi mam, tɩ mam wa'am ka zagsɛ. La mam boorɩ tɩ m bãŋɛ la bẽm yelle ı̃yã tɩ yãma botɩ mam wa'am?"
44010030	Tɩ Akↄrnɛlɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: "La de la dabsa anaasɩ n wãna wẽngɛlŋa wʋ wakat-ẽna wã, tɩ mam daan boe m yire pʋ'ʋsra, tɩ bʋraa kↄ'ↄn yɛ fuugo n yẽgrɩ zɛ mam nẽŋam,
44010031	dee yetɩ: 'Akↄrnɛlɩ, Nawẽnnɛ to'oge fʋ pʋ'ʋsgↄ la, la a tẽrɩ fõn sõŋrɩ nasdõma se'em na mɛ.
44010032	Bɛla, tõm nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Zope ka wi Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ tɩ a wa'am. A boe la Asimõ n de gãnzapa la yire. A yire la lɛm na ko-kãtɛ la nõorʋm.'
44010033	Bɛla ı̃yã tɩ mam tõm nẽrba tↄtↄ tɩ ba wa'am wa wi fʋ tɩ fʋ wa'am. La fõn wa'am wã, fʋ ẽŋɛ sõŋa. Tɩ wuu yãŋa boe la Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam kalam tɩ tɩ selse bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele fõn yetɩ, fʋ yele tõma la."
44010034	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yãŋa pↄsɛ yele yetɩ: "Sɩra sɩra, mam yãŋa bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ka tũ'usri nẽrba.
44010035	La buuri wuu pʋam nẽr-sɛka n nannɩ Nawẽnnɛ dee ɩta sɛla woo tɩ la masra, ẽŋa dãana n paagɛ a yɛm.
44010036	Tↄ. Ya mi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm a yetↄga la bↄ la Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, a de la kõ-yẽlga n pa'alɩ tɩ tɩ wʋn tara sũ-mã'asʋm la Nawẽnnɛ Azezi-krisi ı̃yã, ẽŋa n de nẽrsaalba wuu Zuudãana.
44010037	Yãma mi yel-sɛba wuu n daan ẽŋɛ Zude la, la daan pı̃'ilum na Galile Azã n daan mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga dee mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na poorʋm.
44010038	Ya ken mina Azezi n yese Nazarɛtɩ la, la Nawẽnnɛ n daan bↄ ẽ a Sɩa pãŋa se'em, tɩ a daan sẽŋɛ zẽ'esɩ wuu ẽŋɛ ɩr-sõma, botɩ Asũtãana n daan nãmsrɩ sɛba la wuu yẽ ı̃mã'asʋm. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ daan boe la ẽ mɛ.
44010039	Tõma yẽ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a daan tõm Zerizalɛm la Zifdõma so'olʋm na wuu mɛ, dee tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dↄ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.
44010040	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan vo'oge ẽ dabsa atã daarɛ, botɩ a dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ.
44010041	La a ka dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ nẽrba la wuu, a dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ la tõma sɛba n de kaset-dõma tɩ Nawẽnnɛ daan põn dẽŋɛ looge la. A vo'ore la poorʋm, tõma daan lagɩm na ẽ mɛ di dee yũ.
44010042	A daan bↄ tõma nõorɛ yetɩ, tɩ mõolɛ ẽŋa yetↄga, dee yele nẽrba, tɩ la de la ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge tɩ a di nẽr-vↄↄsɩ la kɩ'ɩndõma sarɩya.
44010043	Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba la wuu yʋʋn tↄgɛ a yelle mɛ yetɩ, sɛka woo n bↄ ẽ sɩra, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ a dãana tõon-be'ero taalɛ a yʋ'ʋrɛ ı̃yã."
44010044	Apɩyɛɛrɩ n daan ken tↄgra yetↄg-bãna la, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige sɛba wuu n wõm yetↄga la zuto.
44010045	La Nawẽnnɛ n daan botɩ a Sɩa la mẽ sige bu-zãŋsɩ la zuto la, la daan di'ige Zifdõma sɛba n bↄ Azezi sɩra n doose Apɩyɛɛrɩ wa'am na mɛ.
44010046	Se'ere n soe la, ba daan wõm tɩ ba tↄgrɩ la bu-zãŋsɩ yetↄga pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ.
44010047	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: "Nẽr-bãna wã to'oge la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋ tõma n daan to'oge se'em na. Bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ gu ba yetɩ, ba da to'oge ko'om misga?"
44010048	Dee bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba mise ba ko'om pʋam la Azezi-krisi yʋ'ʋrɛ. Tɩ ba sose Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ, a weege bãma zẽ'am ẽŋɛ dabsa fẽe pa'asɛ.
44011001	La Azezi Tõntõnɩba, la a karẽnbi-sɛba n boe Zude so'olʋm na wõm mɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba n dagɩ Zifdõma la mẽ sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga mɛ.
44011002	La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan lebe la Zerizalɛm, tɩ Zifdõma basɛba n bↄ Azezi sɩra la wẽ'era nõke'ene la ẽ,
44011003	yele ẽ yetɩ: "Bẽm n ẽŋɛ tɩ fõn kẽ lagɩm na bu-zãŋsɩ n ka wãtɩ la dita?"
44011004	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yãŋa pa'alɛ ba yɛla la wuu n daan doose se'em na yetɩ:
44011005	"Mam daan boe la Zope pʋ'ʋsra, yẽ sɛla wʋ zãasŋↄ la, tɩ sɛla la ze'ele saazuum sigra wʋ fu-kãtɛ n lʋ zẽ'esɩ sɩnaasɩ sige wa paam mam boe zẽ'a la.
44011006	Tɩ mam bɩsra bõnↄ na zı̃i, yẽ yire dũnsi, la we-dũnsi, la bõn-vuula, la bõn-ẽgla.
44011007	Tɩ mam wõm kõa n yetɩ: 'Apɩyɛɛrɩ, isge kʋ di.'
44011008	Tɩ mam yetɩ: 'Ayɛɩ, Zuudãana, sɛla n de sisgo bõnↄ bɩɩ bõn-dẽgrↄ ken ka kẽ mam nõorʋm.'
44011009	Tɩ kõa la le ze'ele saazuum tↄgɛ bↄ mam yetɩ: 'Bõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, a ãn sõŋa, da kãn yetɩ, a de la bõn-dẽgrↄ.'
44011010	La daan ẽŋɛ la nõorɛ atã, dee viise lebe saazuum.
44011011	Tɩ bʋraasɩ batã kↄ'ↄn paam yi-sɛka tɩ mam boe mı̃ na. Ba daan tõm ba la Sezaare tẽŋam yetɩ, ba wa'am mam zẽ'am.
44011012	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yele mam yetɩ, m doose ba sẽŋɛ, m da sẽ'ena. Tɩ tɩ sↄbiisi bãna bayoobɩ wã kↄlgɛ mam, tɩ tõma sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Akↄrnɛlɩ yire.
44011013	Tɩ a yele tõma tɩ ẽŋa daan yẽ la malɛka n ze ẽŋa yire, yele ẽŋa yetɩ: 'Tõm nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Zope ka wi Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ tɩ a wa'am.
44011014	Ẽŋa n wʋn tↄgɛ yetↄg-sɛba n wʋn botɩ fõn na fʋ yir-dõma wuu yẽ fãarɛ.'
44011015	Mam n boe mı̃ tɩ m tↄgɛ la, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige ba zuto wʋ ẽn daan sige tõma zuo se'em pↄspↄsɩ la.
44011016	Bɛla tɩ mam tẽegɛ Zuudãana n daan yetɩ: 'Azã daan misri nẽrba la ko'om pʋam, la Nawẽnnɛ wʋn mise ya a Sɩa pʋam.'
44011017	La sãn dɛna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba a Sɩa, wʋ ẽn daan bↄ tõma n bↄ Zuudãana Azezi-krisi sɩra se'em na, mam de la ãne wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ Nawẽnnɛ?"
44011018	Ban wõm bɛla la, ba sı̃m mɛ dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: "Bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ botɩ bu-zãŋsɩ mẽ yẽ sore mɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero yẽ yõvore."
44011019	La A'etɩɛnɩ kũm na poorʋm, nẽr-sɛba n yẽ nãmsgↄ la wɩrgɛ mɛ, sẽŋɛ halɩ Fenisi, la Sipri, la Antɩyↄsɩ ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la bↄ'ↄra Zifdõma mã'a.
44011020	La ba bʋraasɩ basɛba daan ze'ele la Sipri, la Sirɛnɩ so'olʋm sẽŋɛ Antɩyↄsɩ mẽ ka mõolɛ bu-zãŋsɩ, tↄgɛ Zuudãana Azezi kõ-yẽlga la bↄ ba.
44011021	La Zuudãana pãŋa daan boe la ba mɛ. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan bↄ Zuudãana sɩra dↄla ẽ.
44011022	La Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la n boe Zerizalɛm na n wõm bɛla la, ba tõm na Abarnabasɩ yetɩ a sẽŋɛ Antɩyↄsɩ.
44011023	La ẽn paagɛ yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ nẽrba la yel-sõnnɛ se'em na, a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ. Tɩ a pa'alɛ ba yetɩ, ba keŋe ba mẽŋa dↄla Zuudãana la ba sũure wuu da basɛ.
44011024	Se'ere n soe la, a daan de la nẽr-sõŋↄ, dee bↄ Azezi sɩra zo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la ẽ. La nẽrba zozo'e n daan pa'asɛ dↄla Zuudãana.
44011025	La Abarnabasɩ babsɛ mɛ sẽŋɛ Tarsɩ tɩ a ka ɛ Asolɩ.
44011026	La ẽn yẽ ẽ na, a tarɩ ẽ mɛ wa'am Antɩyↄsɩ. La yʋʋnɛ tõrɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ la Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la, dee zãsʋm nẽrba zozo'e. La de la Antɩyↄsɩ tẽŋam tɩ ba daan pↄsɛ wi karẽnbiisi la tɩ Krisi nẽrba.
44011027	La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba daan ze'ele Zerizalɛm sẽŋɛ Antɩyↄsɩ.
44011028	Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Agabisi isge ze'ele tↄgɛ la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa yetɩ, kↄm kãtɛ n wʋn wa'am dũnia wuu zuo. La kↄm ẽŋa sɩrɩ wa'am mɛ na-keko Akloorɩ wakatʋm.
44011029	Tɩ karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, nẽra woo looge ẽn tarɩ sɛla bↄ tɩ ba to'oge sõŋɛ Azezi nẽr-sɛba n boe Zude la.
44011030	Tɩ ba daan ẽŋɛ bɛla dɩkɛ ligri la ẽŋɛ Abarnabasɩ la Asolɩ nu'usum, tõm ba yetɩ, ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka bↄ Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ la kẽma n boe Zerizalɛm na.
44012001	La masɛ la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ naba A'erↄdɩ daan nãmsra Azezi nẽrba basɛba,
44012002	dee botɩ ba kʋ Azakɩ n de Azã sↄbia la sʋkↄbgↄ.
44012003	La ẽn yẽ tɩ la ẽŋɛ Zifdõma sũure yẽlʋm mɛ na, a le botɩ ba yõkɛ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, wakat-sɛka tɩ Zifdõma diti borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la.
44012004	La ẽn yõkɛ ẽ kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem na, a botɩ sʋdaasɩ pia la ayoobɩ n pʋɩ bana-banaasɩ gu'ura ẽ sↄↄsna taaba. A boorɩ tɩ Zↄↄg-basɛ kibsa n tole, dee tɩ a tarɩ ẽ yese nẽrba la nẽŋam ka di a sarɩya.
44012005	Bɛla tɩ ba daan pagɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ basɛ yʋ'a deego la pʋam. Tɩ Azezi nẽrba la daan pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ a ı̃yã halɩ ka basɛ.
44012006	Be-sɛka n wʋn wiige tɩ A'erↄdɩ yese Apɩyɛɛrɩ la, daar-ẽŋa yʋ'ʋŋↄ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan gã la sʋdaasɩ bayi tẽŋasʋka gı̃sra. Ba daan ba ẽ mɛ la bãnsɩ bayi, tɩ gu'urba la bↄna zanõrʋm gu'ura yʋ'a deego la.
44012007	La haya! Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka kↄ'ↄn wa'am. Tɩ peelem kↄ'ↄn nẽegɛ deego la pʋam. Tɩ malɛka la wẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lʋgrɛ nẽegɛ ẽ yetɩ: "Isge tↄtↄ." Tɩ bãnsɩ la ba'agɛ lui tẽŋa dee basɛ a nu'usi la.
44012008	Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: "Ga fʋ sagãnnɛ, dee pire fʋ tagra." Tɩ a ẽŋɛ bɛla. Tɩ malɛka la le yele ẽ yetɩ: "Yɛ fʋ fuugo dee doose mam."
44012009	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ doose ẽ yese yẽŋa, dee ka bãŋɛ tɩ malɛka la n ɩtɩ se'em na de la sɩra, a tẽ'esɛ tɩ la ãna wʋ a zãasʋm mɛ na.
44012010	La ban gãŋɛ pↄspↄsɩ gu'urba la, la gu'urba bʋyi dõma la, ba yãŋa paagɛ la kut-yan-sɛka n yesrɩ kẽ'era tẽŋa la pʋam na, tɩ yaŋa la yo'oge a mẽŋa, tɩ ba yese yẽŋa yãŋa dↄla sore wɛ. Bilam zẽ'am tɩ malɛka la fõrgɛ dee basɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ.
44012011	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɛm yãŋa wa'am, tɩ a yetɩ: "Lɛɛlɛ wã mam bãŋɛ sɩra sɩra, tɩ Zuudãana n tõm a malɛka tɩ a wa'am wa fãagɛ mam A'erↄdɩ nu'usum, la bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ Zifdõma eerɩ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ mam na."
44012012	La ẽn bãŋɛ bõn-ẽna võorɛ la, a sẽŋɛ la Azã-markɩ ma Amaari yire. La nẽrba n lagsɛ bilam zo'oge bↄna mı̃ pʋ'ʋsra.
44012013	La ẽn paagɛ mı̃ na, a wẽ la yaŋa nõorɛ, tɩ pↄsↄↄ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Arode wa'am tɩ a bɩsɛ.
44012014	La ẽn bãŋɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ kõa la, tɩ a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm tɩ a ka yo'oge yaŋa la, dee zoe kẽ ka yetɩ: "Apɩyɛɛrɩ ze yaŋa nõorʋm."
44012015	Tɩ ba yele pↄsↄↄ la yetɩ: "Fõn de la zↄlgↄ." Tɩ a le yetɩ: "La de la ẽŋa." Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: "La de la a sɩa".
44012016	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ ken wẽ'era yaŋa la. Tɩ ba yo'oge yẽ tɩ la de la ẽŋa. Tɩ la di'ige ba.
44012017	Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbsɛ nu'usi pa'alɛ ba yetɩ, ba ãna sı̃m. Dee tↄgɛ pa'alɛ ba Zuudãana n ẽŋɛ se'em tarɩ ẽŋa yʋ'a deego la pʋam yese yẽŋa. Dee yele ba yetɩ: "Yele-ya Azakɩ, la tɩ sↄbiisi la, sɛla n ẽŋɛ la." Dee yese sẽŋɛ zẽ'a ayẽma.
44012018	La beere n wiige la, dãmŋↄ zozo'e n wa'am sʋdaasɩ la tẽŋasʋka, tɩ ba bↄↄra tɩ ba bãŋɛ, la ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ ka bↄna.
44012019	Tɩ A'erↄdɩ botɩ ba ɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, ka yẽ ẽ. Tɩ a di gu'urba la sarɩya, bↄ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba kʋ ba. La bɛla poorʋm a yese Zude sẽŋɛ la Sezaare ka bↄna bilam.
44012020	La naba A'erↄdɩ sũure daan yı̃ige mɛ halɩ la Tiiri la Sidõ tẽnsɩ nẽrba. Tɩ ba ẽŋɛ nõorɛ ayɩla tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ ẽ, yãŋa lagsɛ taaba dẽŋɛ yõkɛ Ablastisi n bɩsrɩ naba A'erↄdɩ yire yelle la sɩa. Tɩ bãma la ẽŋa yãŋa doose taaba sẽŋɛ ka sose naba A'erↄdɩ yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ sũ-mã'asʋm wa'am bãma la ẽŋa tẽŋasʋka. Se'ere n soe la, ba dia daan ze'etɩ la naba la tẽŋam sẽnna.
44012021	La A'erↄdɩ looge la daarɛ yetɩ, ba tↄgɛ yetↄga la. La daarɛ la n paagɛ la, a yɛ la a na'am futo zı̃'ire a na'am kʋka zuo tↄgra yetↄg-kãra bↄ'ↄra nẽrba la.
44012022	Tɩ ba kaasɛ yetɩ: "Kõa wã de la Nawẽnnɛ kõa, la dagɩ nẽrsaala kõa."
44012023	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka botɩ bã'a yõkɛ A'erↄdɩ bilam zẽ'am, tɩ zũnzũa di ẽ, tɩ a ki, ẽn ka pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ dee pẽgɛ a mẽŋa la ı̃yã.
44012024	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la daan saagɛ zẽ'a wuu, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e sakra yetↄga la pa'asra.
44012025	La Abarnabasɩ la Asolɩ n daan tõm ba tõoma Zerizalɛm ba'asɛ la, ba daan tarɩ Azã-markɩ mɛ lebe Antɩyↄsɩ.
44013001	Azezi nẽr-kʋʋŋↄ n boe Antɩyↄsɩ la pʋam, Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba, la karẽnsãandõma n daan boe mı̃. Ba de la Abarnabasɩ, la Asimeyõ tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ nẽr-sabga, la Alusiyusi n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, la Amanayɛnɩ tɩ ba daan uge ẽ la naba A'erↄdɩ, la Asolɩ.
44013002	La daarɛ ayɩla ba daan lʋ la nõorɛ pʋ'ʋsra dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yele ba yetɩ: "Looge-ya Abarnabasɩ la Asolɩ tɩ ba tõm tõon-sɛka tɩ mam looge ba tɩ ba tõm na."
44013003	Tɩ ba lʋ nõorɛ dɩkɛ nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto pʋ'ʋsɛ, dee basɛ ba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ.
44013004	La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n tõm ba la, ba sẽŋɛ la Selesi tẽŋam ka kẽ õorŋↄ bilam sẽŋɛ Sipri so'olʋm tɩ ko'om gilge la.
44013005	La ban paagɛ Salamini tẽŋam na, ba daan mõolɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga mɛ Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam. Ba daan tarɩ la Azã-markɩ tɩ a sõŋra ba.
44013006	La ba daan doose la Sipri so'olʋm la pʋam ka paagɛ Pafↄsɩ. Bilam ba yẽ la tɩɩm dãana n parɩm tɩ ẽŋa de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa. A de la Zifu, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Abar-zezi.
44013007	A daan boe la tẽŋa la gↄmna Asɛryusi-polusi n de yɛm dãana la zẽ'am. Tɩ gↄmna la daan botɩ ba wi Abarnabasɩ la Asolɩ, a daan boorɩ tɩ a wõm na Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga.
44013008	La tɩɩm dãana la yʋ'ʋrɛ la Grɛkɩ de la A'elimasɩ. A daan sɩ'ɩsrɩ Asolɩ la Abarnabasɩ yetↄga la mɛ, dee daan ɛɛra tɩ a gu gↄmna la tɩ a da sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetↄga la.
44013009	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bↄna la Asolɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ ayẽma n de Apolɩ la pãŋa, tɩ a bɩsra tɩɩm dãana la zı̃i,
44013010	yele ẽ yetɩ: "Fʋ tarɩ la yɛmkẽgsɩga la pã'asgↄ, fʋ de la Asũtãana bia, fʋ de la tõon-sõma wuu bɛ. Fõn dɩkrɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ sɩra la mɛ tɩ a lɛbgra põmpↄrŋↄ.
44013011	Lɛɛlɛ wã, bãŋɛ tɩ Zuudãana pãŋa wʋn botɩ fʋ fↄ mɛ. Fʋ kãn le yẽ peelem halɩ ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka." La bilam zẽ'am tɩ tɩɩm dãana la kↄ'ↄn fↄ, ba'abra ɛɛra nẽra tɩ a ve'ege ẽ.
44013012	La gↄmna la n yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, a bↄ yetↄga la sɩra mɛ, se'ere n soe la, Zuudãana zãsŋↄ la daan kẽ a sũure mɛ.
44013013	Apolɩ la a taaba la ze'ele la Pafↄsɩ kẽ õorŋↄ sẽŋɛ Pɛrzɩ n boe Pãnfili so'olʋm pʋam na. Tɩ Azã-markɩ basɛ ba bilam dee lebe Zerizalɛm.
44013014	Tɩ ba daan ze'ele Pɛrzɩ sẽŋɛ Antɩyↄsɩ n boe Pisidi so'olʋm pʋam na. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ paagɛ, tɩ ba kẽ ba wẽndeem zı̃'ire.
44013015	La ban karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ lↄↄ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsrɩba gõnnↄ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ wẽndeego la nẽŋadõma tõm nẽrba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yele ba yetɩ: "Tɩ sↄbiisi, ya sãn tara yetↄga n wʋn bↄ nẽrba la bʋraanɛ, ya tↄgɛ."
44013016	Tɩ Apolɩ isge yɩbsɛ la nu'ugo yele ba yetɩ: "Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba, la yãma sɛba n po nanna Nawẽnnɛ, selse-ya.
44013017	Nawẽnnɛ tɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma pʋ'ʋsrɩ wã, ẽŋa n yʋʋn looge tɩ yaabdõma, ban yʋʋn boe Ezipti na, ẽŋa n botɩ ba yɩrgɛ zo'oge. La ẽŋa n yʋʋn tõm pãŋa tõoma tarɩ ba yese Ezipti.
44013018	La ban boe weem yʋʋma pinaasɩ la, a ẽŋɛ sũ-mã'asʋm la ba mɛ.
44013019	Dee yʋʋn sã'am buuri bayopↄɩ Kanaan so'olʋm pʋam, dee bↄ ba tẽŋa la tɩ ba sↄna.
44013020	Bɛla wuu yuuge masɛ wʋ yʋʋma kↄbsnaasɩ la pinuu. La bɛla poorʋm a bↄ ba la nẽŋadõma, tɩ ba sↄna ba wa paagɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtↄ'ↄsa Asãmwɛlɩ wakatʋm.
44013021	Tɩ ba yãŋa sose yetɩ, bãma boorɩ la naba. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bↄ ba Akisi dayʋa Asayuli n de Abẽnzamẽ buuri nẽra, tɩ a di na'am yʋʋma pinaasɩ.
44013022	Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn to'oge Asayuli na'am na, dee botɩ Adavidi dɛna naba. Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn tↄgɛ Adavidi yelle yetɩ: 'Mam yẽ la Azese bia Adavidi n ãn mam sũure yẽlʋm. Ẽŋa n wʋn ẽŋɛ mam n boorɩ se'em na wuu.'
44013023	La de la ẽŋa buuri nẽra ayɩla n de Azezi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ botɩ a dɛna Fãagra bↄ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, wʋ ẽn yʋʋn bı̃ŋe a nõorɛ se'em na.
44013024	Ẽŋa n daan nãn ka wa'am na, Azã n daan mõolɩ a wa'aŋↄ yelle bↄ Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba wuu yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero tɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam.
44013025	La Azã n daan boe mı̃ tɩ a tõm a tõoma ba'asɛ la, a soke ba yetɩ: 'Yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam de la ãne? Yãma n tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam de nẽr-sɛka la, mam dagɩ ẽŋa. La selse-ya, ẽŋa boe la mam poorʋm sẽna, mam ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra.'
44013026	M sↄbiisi, yãma n de Abraham yɩɩsɩ, la yãma sɛba n po nanna Nawẽnnɛ, la de la tõma ı̃yã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm fãarɛ kõa wã.
